That is probably a smart investment for any business. Are you a 24 hour station?
Not at this time, And probably not for the long term. My goal is to keep the business in a manageable size, Kind of a hobby business.
I like that idea. I can imagine there may be a lot of security issues if you switched to 24 hours. Have your parents come by the store?

persona: I am a dog trainer. I have sisters that I opened a service with.
I have 3 older sisters and one younger brother.
I love motorbikes. I go to Alabama for a festival every year that is near my house. I live in Alabama.
dialogue: How was the motorbike festival that you went to in Alabama?
It was great! I had a fantastic time! There were lots of people there and lots of vendors, Things to do and buy. You should have been there.
I live in Mississippi so it's not too far away, But this year I couldn't make it. My boss needed me to work that night. What was it like? Can you tell me more?

Oh sure. There was a live band playing on one street. They played a lot of classic rock and they were really good. There was a couple of contests going on. One was judging the best customized bike. You should have seen the winner! I've got a picture, Do you want me to show you?
Yes! I'd love to see it!
Okay, Give me a minute to find it on my phone. In the meantime, What did you think about Drew Brees retiring?
Now Drew Brees gets to feel the breeze of retirement. Probably on some beach. Pun intended.
That's good! Did you like him? Was he as good a person as they make him out to be on tv?
He was so much fun to be around. I barely spent any time with him, But he did thank me for a thing once. It felt good.
Yeah? What did he thank you for?
Just being me. He didn't use any flowery words or anything. I felt appreciated.
That's cool! Do you miss football or are you happy in your current job?

persona: I don't hve any children. I can drive. I have an Nissan Pathfinder car.
I love Taylor Swift and her music. I have been to Nashville. I met Taylor Swift in a bathroom in Nashville.
I can be shy. My hair is cut short and is mouse brown in colour.
dialogue: I took my son to the doctors yesterday and the doctor prescribed some new medication for his bipolar and I think he seems somewhat calmer today.
That's good, It's nice that you've found something that's working. How old is your son?
He's going to be 14 in a few months. I knew the teen years would be rough but whew! How was the rest of your day yesterday?
Honestly, I had a lot of fun in high school, But it seems like he's got a tougher time than I did. I'm doing pretty well, Thinking of what to do over the weekend.
Take that Nissan out on the road and see what trouble you can get into! It looks like the whether should be quite nice at least.
I think that a day trip would be pretty fun. I love going off the main roads and seeing what quirky little things I can find.
If I were you I'd head to Nashville for some adventuring. Such a beautiful area and you might bump into your old friend Taylor again, Lol.
Haha, I wish. I was so starstruck that I don't even know if I managed a complete sentence! So cool, But so embarrassing!
Don't worry, I'm sure she was just as embarrassed to meet a huge fan in a bathroom, Haha!
She was very sweet in person, Which is good to know. It's always a letdown if your favorite celeb is actually not all that nice! Have you ever met anyone famous?
Sadly not. I would love to. I'm so glad she was nice! I agree, Not only is it disappointing in the moment but it makes it really difficult to enjoy their art from then onwards, You know?
Who would you pick, If you could meet anyone? Hopefully not in a bathroom, Haha.

persona: My favorite childhood toy was a Lite Brite.
I had a rubiks cube.
I work with computers. I have weekly dance lessons.
I've never drank. I don't like drugs. I was born in 1981.
I like pop music. My favorite band is New Kids On The Block.
dialogue: My manager told my I'm going to be able to start working full time next week!
That is great, What will you do with the extra money.
I think I might start going to more concerts with my friends! I want to see this KISS cover band in June.
That's awesome. I love going to concerts! It just gets so hot in the summer time.
Have you been to any concerts recently? And have you ever seen New Kids On The Block/ a cover band of New Kids On The Block?
I went to Coachella a few years ago. I am hoping to go to another festival sometime this summer.
Oh COOL! I've never been to a music festival. What are they like?
They are a lot of fun because they have all sorts of genre of music. They are exhausting though because its all day for multiple days.
Right... I know some people camp on the festival grounds. Do you do that or stay in a hotel nearby?
I usually like to camp to get the entire experience! Usually its cheaper that way and its more fun!
That's definitely a good choice. I bet with your weekly dance lessons, You blow everyone away with your sick moves at the festivals.
Ha yes! Having a couple beers will make me a better dancer! Is Kiss your favorite band?

persona: I love to eat.
I study ballet. I love contemporary and hip hop dancing. I teach dancing to troubled youth for work.
My siblings died. I'm from Somalia. My aunt helped me flee to the United States. I was forced into marriage. I'm divorced.
dialogue: I got a call back today from the steak house I applied to work at!
That's great news! Did they set up a time for an interview?
We are still playing phone tag, Although it feels promising. Great to have a lead that is interested.
I am sure you will wow them on the phone, And they will want to meet you in person! Do you think you might have to cook as part of the interview?
Good question, The ad didn't mention this, Although they may mention that when we talk. It feels good, Feeding people.

I have never been much of a cook, But I have lovely memories of my mom making traditional Somali dishes for me when I was younger. Do you have any recipes that bring back strong memories when you are making them?
Mostly the simple, Home cooking stuff from my family. Biscuits are a fave, And my mother has a decent roast recipe.
What do you think you would make if that ends up being a part of the interview process?
Well, They are a steak house. And they have pretty good ribs. Wonder what their kitchen is built like, If they have good equipment.
Is it a fine dining steakhouse? Or more casual? Either way, I'm sure the kitchen will be amazing.
They are kind of, Reputation wise, Somewhere betweenSizzlers and Black Angus, Which are pretty popular steakhouse chains. They're more home grown though.
I love restaurants that are a bit more homey; although, I have been known to gorge onSizzler's salad bar! I really hope you get the job. Is cooking your dream? Or just a "for now" job?

persona: My name is Justin. I'm on tour. I'm a performer.
My parents are alive. My parents are musicians. I love being a performer.
I've been playing guitar since I was 3 years old. I perform in national parks.
I like watching old westerns.
I like to cook for my crew.
dialogue: Where have you been performing lately?
Mostly in the Northwest. Colorado, Utah, Nevada, Etc. I still perform in national parks sometimes.
That sounds nice. I bet you get to see a lot of great scenery while on tour like that. How have the crowds been?

Not too crowded. A few sold out, But mostly cozy. I actually like it that way. You should come to one if you live nearby! I'm performing at a local festival in Colorado, So you can catch that for free if you're there.
I just may do that! My schedule is pretty tight but I will do my best to make the time. My daughter, I know, Would love to see you perform. She is a lot like you you know.
If I recall you have the last name Sanders. Is your daughter Jessica Sanders? You told me she performs in the park, And I performed with a Jessica Sanders at the national park last year.
That's her! I had no idea you two had worked together! She's gotten better in a years time and she's beginning to get more gigs now!
That's awesome! I hope she gets a lot of success.
So do I! I hope you both do! Maybe you two can pair up again?
That'd be great! I'm booked until July 4, But maybe sometime after that?
I'll get with her and see when she's available and then have her get back to you! Hey, Do you ever perform with your parents?
Sometimes! They've done backup vocals and also have had their own acts at a few of my concerts.

persona: I like video games. I like Wii gymnastic games. I do gymnastics.
I like garlic bread. I go to the gym every day.
I look good in anything yellow.
My toy robot is an Olympian. I'm an Olympian.
I love to twitch dance.
I like Italian food.
dialogue: What are your favorite Italian foods?
Definitely fettuccini Alfredo. My wife and I had it on our first date, Which makes it even better! Do you like Italian food?
Yeah, It is not my favorite but I like it. How long have you been married?
Okay what is your favourite food then? We've been married for 3 years now, And one kid on the way!
Hey, Congrats on the little one, When is the next Olympian (lol) due to arrive? My favorite food is Asian.
Hahaha the lil guy is due in 3 months! Gonna be doing gymnastics before he can walk;) Asian is good! Are you married?
No, I haven't met the right video game/robot loving girl yet. I don't know if marriage is something I want to do. Did you always want to get married?
You'll find someone eventually! It's a good thing you didn't settle. And yeah I always knew I wanted a family and to get married.
Do you want a lot of kids?
Oh yeah! I want a whole baseball team of kids lol. Do you want kids someday?

Lol about the team.... I was wondering if you'd go there lol. I am not sure how to take care of kids. I think they need food, Water, And exercise. That's about my limit of knowledge. I may just need to stick to games and robots.
Hahaha oh yeah you called it! And maybe a plant would be better for the time being, Or a dog!!.

persona: I speak english, spanish, and french.
I enjoy planning world domination and knitting.
I am 55 years old.
I have visited large attractions.
I used to be a painter.
dialogue: What are some of your favorite paintings that you have done?
I did a nice one of a the reflecting pools in DC. It was really challenging but really rewarding.
That's great! Do you travel a lot to DC?
Not a ton, I was up there visiting some family. I should go back sometime though. What about you, Ever been.
I have been to DC before; i love the culture there. The cherry blossoms are great during the spring season!
Ah man, I wish I was there during the Cherry Blossoms, That would be impressive I'm sure.
It a must go during your lifetime. Do you enjoy travelling anywhere else?
I'm up for just about anything. As long as I can do some sight seeing and paint maybe, I'm happy.
What are some of your places to go sightseeing?
I was in Paris when I was younger, That was a major bucket list destination. I like nature now that I'm a bit older though, Less people and confusion.
I have been to Paris multiple tiimes. what was your favorite part about it?
Hard to not say the Eiffel Tower. I enjoyed just walking around and finding little mom and pop shops to eat at though, That was a lot of fun.

persona: I live on a farm in Michigan. I love to drive tractors. I am handy on the farm. I work on tractors.
I like classical music, nature, and calm things.
I do not have children, but I want to have 4 children. I am 24 years old.
My parents are great. I want to follow in my parents footsteps as a farmer.
dialogue: Are there animals on your farm?
There are many animals and we have a large variety - cows, Pigs, Horses, Sheep.
I love cows, I think they're so cute. Which is your favorite?
There is this cow we have named Lucy. She is a dairy cow, But I have had her since we was a baby and I hand raised her. How old are your kids?
Aww, That's cute. They're 7 and 11. And one of them is also named Lucy, Haha.
That's amazing!!! I bet that they keep you busy. Young minds with a lot of energy at that age for sure. Do they like scary movies also?
They do not. They get nightmares, Unfortunately.
Oh no.... I am sorry to hear that. I am not a big fan of scary movies either. On a farm, There is a lot of noises at night and that is scary enough.
Oh, I feel like it's easier with animals around. I used to be scared of living alone because of all the sounds without reason, But after I got a cat it was easier to explain it away.
Definately.... it's easier to talk yourself out of beliving that the noises are for only bad reasons when there is another creature around.
Plus, I found that I really liked having a cat!
What was your cat's name?

persona: I volunteer. I spend time at the rabbit rescue. I donate to the rabbit rescue.
I work at the shipyard. I was in the navy.I like the water. I try to always be close to the water.
My favorite color was blue when I was young.
dialogue: So do you go out on boats to enjoy the water?
Yeah, It makes me nostalgic of the days in the navy. The waves are really calming and the blue hue is really nice to look at. What about you?

I work in the shipyard but I don't really like being in the water. I work in the shipyard but I don't really like being in the water. I mainly work on the ship but never while it's moving in the water.
Oh that makes sense. What do you usually do on the shipyard? Do you help repair things or are you just amover?
I am just amover. I work with others as a team to get things that need to be on the ship. It has worked out fine for me so far.
Well that's good. It's important to be able to get along with your other crewmembers. Do you guys ever fight?
Haha when we disagree we do. There was this one time this guy was really upset with me for taking on a task and almost threw me off the edge. But he apologized right after.
I'm glad he came to his senses, That would've been bad for both of you! He would've been fired and you probably would've gotten injured. What was the disagreement about?
It was because him and I were working on an assignment together and I volunteered us to stay past 5 and he got sooooo pist!
Oh man that's understandable. I would be pretty mad too! Anyway how are your songs coming together for the charity? I bet they're going to be really good.
They're coming along. I just can't wait to go in front of people and show off my lyrics. You need to be there when I do!
Of course! I'll be there to support you and to donate to the charity. I'll be cheering even if no one else is!

persona: I love bunnies. I'm moving into a new apartment with my boyfriend.
I enjoy photography. I like the colors red and silver.
I've never had an apartment with my boyfriend before.
I teach English, Spanish, and French in elementary school.
dialogue: I'm thinking of doing a fundraiser for the bunny rescue.
That's really cool! What kind of fundraiser are you thinking of? I mean, Will it be selling something, A walkathon, A raffle?
Yeah it is! I am so excited. I have not decided yet. I am thinking of doing like a "walk for the bunnies" type thing only where people bunny hop instead of walk haha.
Oh that would be a great idea! I'll defnitely sign up when you do! Speaking of bunnies, How is yours doing?
He is doing really great. I am thinking about getting him a friend though. He seems lonely sometimes. Do bunnies get lonely?
I think they do. I've seen wild ones playing together out in the yard at my parent's house. They chase each other around and look so happy!
WILD BUNNIES! ?!?! Oh Em Gee that is adorable. Maybe you could tape them and send me a video. OHHHH I could do a bunny video contest with a cash prize with entry fees as a fund raiser.
Hey! Now there's a neat idea! People love to make videos of all kinds of things!
I could do like a grand prize of 20% of the entry fees and a second place prize of 5% of the fees. Third place can get like a starbucks gift card or a chocolate easter bunny lol.
Sounds like a plan! So, Now you just have to decide on a start date.
You are a teacher, Don't you know how to make good flyers?
I do! Do you want me to make the flyers for your fundraiser? Are you okay with the primary colors being red and silver?

persona: I am traveling.
I have a yacht. I rent it out. My boat is pet friendly.
I like to cook. I am trying new foods.
I would like to try persian food too.
dialogue: I just found the best place to travel to with the yacht.
Oh really? Where is that at?
There's a small island a little off the coast that turtles gather around. It's a great cozy spot that's great for picnicking and feeding teh turtles.
That sounds like a wonderful little boating adventure to go on. Would you like to go with me some time?
Yeah! That sounds great. I can bring the food.
What kind of foods do turtles eat? We can bring them some snacks too! I've never seen a turtle up close before.
I think they're omnivores. So fish, Vegetables and other raw foods I think would be good for their diets. I'd want to double-check, Though.
What day works best for you to go with? I'm usually available on the weekends.
I'm always available on the weekends. Pick one, And I'll be there.
How about this weekend? Maybe we can find some persian foods to take with us for the picnic?
I hope so! Or better yet, We could cook some up on the yacht. I could bring the recipes and the materials, And help with the cooking.
That would be a lot of fun!

persona: I am a chocolate bar lover .
I enjoy playing ping pong.
My father has taught me a lot about electricity. My father is  an electrician.
My  favorite color is brown.
I learned  Chinese at home.
dialogue: I have just bought a pinkT-shirt.
That's cool that you got a shirt in your favorite color. My favorite color is brown. Because brown is like the soil and soil helps plants grow big and strong.
True. Do you like to garden? Or just like plants?
I love plants. I especially love the coco plant because it's the main ingredient in the chocolate bars that I love eating.
Cocoa plants are hard to grow in the United States but Hawaii has an abundance of them. Where do you live?
I live in Hemet, Ca.
Cool, I live in San Bernardino. We should get together sometime.
I'd love to. We could play some ping pong.
We could and you could try to teach me Chinese. That would be awesome. I just might be able to learn. How'd you teach yourself?
I watched chinese drama shows. I love how passionate people are with their emotions.
I heard that a lot of people learn English by watching English shows. Interesting how that works. I might need to try it.
It's also fun to learn what's trendy in their cultures.

persona: I love music. I am sad about Tom Petty.
I am from west virginia.
dialogue: I picked out a theme for my wedding!
Aw, That's awesome! What's it going to be? And I wanna know all about the music too!
I was thinking Taylor Swift at first, But then I thought that was a bit too weird. We're just making it music themed, And both my Fiance and I will decorate the venue with records we like.
Tom Petty has some great wedding songs... Just sayin' lol. Music themed sounds amazing! It could be cool to have every guest bring their favorites. Are you going to have the wedding in Australia?
That's a great idea, I'll check out some of his music and add it to our playlist. Yeah we plan on doing it in Australia, His family is around here and mine wants to visit, So it's a good mix.
What's spring like in Australia? I realized I don't know much about the southern hemisphere when I was surprised about my friend telling me Christmas in Australia is a hot wildfire season.
It's pretty warm in the more Northern parts, And a bit cooler south. It should be nice, We have some ideas around Alice Springs.
That sounds like a great place for a wedding! Are you going to have a lot of your family there?
We're keeping it smaller. We want it to feel personal and really connect with the guests, So really just our close family and friends.
Aw, That sounds lovely. I can't wait to have my own wedding someday! What do your students think? Are you going to change your last name?
I plan on it. They aren't really clued in haha. It will be in between school years, So I don't think it will cause too much confusion.
Oh, That's good. I remember being confused when my preschool teacher got married and changed her name because she also ended up being my kindergarten teacher lol.

persona: I go to Europe twice a year.
I love to cook paella and fish and chips.
I majored art in college.
I am a descendant of christopher columbus.
I visit history museums.
dialogue: I am going to europe soon do you want ti come with me.
I'd love to! Will you be going to any museums? That's my favorite thing to do when I travel!
Absolutely! Feel free to let me know what recommendations and we will be sure to go. I am really looking forward to going!
Sounds great! Which countries were you planning on visiting! Since I go so often, I think I've been to all of them but they're all so amazing that I'd go back to any one of them!
I plan to go to France, Monaco and Italy. Have you been to all three?
Yes! Italy is my favorite! Rome has my heart! The history there is just fascinating! Have you been before?
I've been once but it has been many years so I am looking forward to seeing how things have changed. It sounds like you will be very helpful at planning this trip!

I think my love for cooking helps me plan where to eat very well and my background in studying art helped me learn so much about Europe! I should have been a travel agent! Have you been anywhere besides Europe lately?
Yes, I just got back from Thailand a few weeks ago. That was a fun experience. What about you, Have you traveled lately?
I was in Portugal a few months ago! The street art there is beautiful! Lisbon is such a cool city! The sea views and the hills and trams! It really is amazing there!
I loved the time I spent in Portugal! I hope to go back soon. Do you have any upcoming trips planned besides Europe?

I'm looking into going somewhere in the Caribbean. I'm still in the planning stages though. I haven't really set anything in stone yet. How about you? Have you been anywhere in the Caribbean that you recommend?

persona: I work on vintage cars. I have two vintage mustangs.
I like country music.
dialogue: How's working on your vintage cars going?
Its going good. I bought another mustang to work on. Do you know anything about cars?
I don't know how to fix 'em, If that's what you're asking. I'd love to learn, Though!
Maybe sometime i can show you a thing or two. So whats your favorite type of doughnut? I love doughnut holes and just regular glazed or sugared ones.
Long johns. I love the kind filled with bavarian cream! You ever been to Daylight Donuts? They make some great ones!
Noive never tried daylight doughnuts. Are there any locations other than in oklahoma? Have you ever tried krispy kreme?
There's some here in Alabama. I have tried Krispy Kreme! They make amazing glazed donuts and have great deals sometimes in their app. But I admit I prefer Daylight Donuts' long johns.
I should try it sometime. Whats your favorite song by Insane Clown Posse? I remember listening to one were they dissed eminem.
I don't have a favorite. I admit I gravitated towards them because of the name ;-).
Would you say thats your favorite genre of music?
Not really. I like worship music a lot. It's really popular where I am.
Like church music? Thats defiantly different from ICP. So i take it your religious?

persona: I like to take baths.
I like to meditate.
I am 35 years old. I don't drink or smoke. I am not married.
I have pet dogs.
dialogue: I finally broke my silence!
Oh wow, That's amazing! What made you change your mind and finally speak again?
I just felt it was time. I can't explain it, I just had a feeling I needed to.
Well that's good! If you felt it was time, Than it was time. You can always go back to it if you feel things aren't working out right?
I can, Yes. Though it feels good to talk to people again.
Oh for sure! What was the first thing you said? Hopefully something exhilarating!
Oh, It's not that special. I just said "Hello".
Haha well that's a good place to start! How has Alaska been? Hopefully not too cold for you.
It is cold but you get used to it. Just have to spend most your time inside or bundled up really well outside. Is it warm where you are?
Yeah it's getting there. The weather is still changing but we didn't have too bad of a winter. It's nice to have the dogs around to keep me company.
There are a lot of huskies around me. I've thought about getting one.
You should! Dogs are amazing, And huskies love the cold weather! Lot of work but they're so worth it!

persona: I am 20 years old.
I love tea.
I like to read.
I am open minded.
I like scary movies. I like the movie "It".
dialogue: I just heard of this new action movie you should check out!
Oh really? What is the name of the movie. I love scary!
Well it's not scary but it does have a lot of action in it. It's Black Widow. It's a Marvel movie made of the character Black Widow from the Captain America movies.
I love Marvel movies. i grew up watching a lot of them. Who was the star actor in Black Widow?
Her name is Scarlett Johannsen. She's been a bunch of other movies. I'm sure you've seen her.
Of course. I have aan 8 year old son, Do you think it is appropriate to take him?
Hmmm, That all depends on what you approve of. It's a normal Marvel movie and kids definitely go to see them. Have you let him see other ones before?
I watched Wolverine, Which was very violent Ant Man was good!
I like both of those. I think Black Widow will be less violent than Wolverine simply because of the characters. Wolverine is violent on his own.
Thank you for the recommendation! Any other movies out that are good for kids?
I've seen a trailer for a movie called Cruella. It's the villain from the movie 101 Dalmations. That should be good!

persona: I listen to country music. I play the guitar. I got my first guitar at age 3. I would like a pink guitar.
I am a singer. I am in a country music band.
I travel a lot. I grew up in the music industry. I love both travel and music.
dialogue: My bike ride was great yesterday - 50 miles, All of it off-road in the back country!
My son has a mountain biker too! This is a great time of year for mountain biking, According to him.

It certainly is. I love being in the great outdoors and smelling the pines in the air. I did see a herd of elk in the valley. Where is your favorite all time place to go to spend time unwinding and renewing your spirit?

I like some of our state parks, They are not as crowded as some National Parks. I like to be near running water the sound is soothing. So when I'm on the road I always seek out state parks. Are there good trails near you for mountain biking.

Oh yes, I have quite a few choices for bike riding where I am at. One of them leads to a waterfall. That is some good advice on exploring state parks. I tend to go to wilderness areas and avoid the overcrowded national parks.
How is work lately busy?
It has been steady with the housing boom. How has the band been doing lately? Ready to cut your first CD yet?
The band is doing well, We are still working on a few songs. We have some great gigs that we have scheduled.
Where will you be traveling to this time?
We are headed to Columbia Missouri, Have you been anywhere lately.
Not lately. With work, I can only get away on the weekends. Construction should slow down in the winter and I am thinking about taking a skiing trip.

persona: I go to Disney World every year.
I'm in the third grade. I love libraries.
I want to be a teacher or a librarian when I grow up.
My mom is currently reading me Little House on the Prairie. My favorite character from it is Laura.
dialogue: What is your favorite genre of book?
My mom is reading me Little House on the Prairie. I'm enjoying it.
Oh, That is a really good book. When I was little, I loved where the red fern grows.
That's a good one also. I want to be a teacher or librarian when I grow up.

I am so happy to hear that! Maybe I can help you learn the ropes some to taking care of a library so you can decide if it is right for you. We usually don't let anyone under 14 volunteer here though. Maybe in a few years before I retire.
That would be amazing! Such an opportunity!

We have some teens that read books to elementary kids on wednesday evenings and onsaturday during the day. You should tell your mom to bring you out. I could even talk to her about some other great books she can read with you.
Thank you. That would be really fun.
How are your grades? Is everything ok with your family? It's been a while since I was able to come check on everyone.
We're doing well. I'm struggling a bit with online school, But I'm doing my best. As long as I pass we'll go to Disney World this year!
That sounds like loads of fun. Tell ya what. I will talk to your mom later and offer to come with you all if she can go when my vacation is set up, And we can all ride the big rides!
Sounds great! She doesn't like the big rides.

persona: My name is Todd Hicks.
I am self-employed. I am an author, blogger, and affiliate marketer.
I am single.
I haven't been to Italy.
dialogue: My wife just got a modeling job in Italy so I'm going to go with her and spend time visiting her family and seeing all the famous landmarks!
That is so exciting! You must be thrilled. How long can you be away from the bees?
Just a week. My neighbor is going to keep an eye on them for me. I am so excited to see the Leaning Tower of Pisa and theSistene Chapel. How has work been going?
Work has been fine... Trying to write a little each day as the thoughts cross my mind.
What do you write about for your blog and books?
Usually I wrtie short stories about my dogs. They are the most entertaining and they each have their own personality. I turn my blogs into childrens books.
Interesting. What kind of dogs do you have? I have a terrier named Ted. He certainly has his own personality.
I have 2 Golden Retrievers. They are brother and sister from they same liter. They are the biggest goofaballs and they love to cuddle.
Oh, I love Golden Retrievers. Dogs are great comforters. They pick up on our emotions andreacct according.
Exactly!!! However, I bet that Ted would be in a lof of trouble if he ever had a run in with your bees!
For sure! He keeps his distance. What do you like do when you have free time?
Oh.... I dream of going to Italy!!! LOL!!! And since I have never been I want to hear all about it when you get back. I want pictures and everything!!!.

persona: I am in third grade.
I go to Disney ever year. Mickey is my favorite Disney character. I also enjoy going to Epcot which is educational.
I enjoy going to the playground with my friends. I enjoy collecting Disney movies and singing along to them.
dialogue: I just watched a new movie that you might enjoy - it had great music in it.
You know I love a good singalong. What movie is it?
It was Singing in the Rain! Ever seen it?
No I haven't. Can you dance to the music too? I would love to watch it if you could.
I tend to think so! It has quite the musical selection to choose from. It's such a good story too.
It sounds good. I might ask my parents if we can watch it on the weekend. Have you played any fun board games recently?
Sadly no, But I've been binging musicals so that's always fun lol.
That is ok. If you do, Let me know. I would love to play some but don't know what is good. Have you seen the new frozen movie yet? The songs are just as fun!
I have! My neice loves that movie.
I loved it too. I think it is my new favourite.
Some people say it is better than lion king but I beg to differ.
Oh this is hard. Lion King is fantastic too. Very emotional".

persona: My name is Andie.
I work in the construction business. I build houses.
I have five cats.
I am not married.
I was really close to my dad. My father was in the construction business too. My father passed away when I was 16.
dialogue: How is your business doing? How are your cats doing?
Oh, I don't own the business ha! I do some side jobs on my own. My company is doing alright I guess. We have 3 houses my crew is working on. My cats are on my nerves today. What about your puppy?

Oh, Alright. What kind of side jobs do you do? My students are getting on my nerves and I've been considering a career switch LOL. My dog is just his usual self, Lazing around. I think I'll take him to his favorite park later today.

Well, I do some roofing and laying carpets or installing cabinets in the evening mostly. I work for those that cant afford to go through a real company and charge them what they can afford after buying materials.
Oh, Wow that sounds really cool! Very noble of you, Sir. Do you think you'll ever start your own business? If you ever do, I could do all your advertising through social media!
Probably not ha. I have a soft heart and would never make much money. But thanks. If you ever need work done, Let me know. What did the kids at the school do to irritate you?

The kids are great and I learn a lot from them even though I'm the teacher, But they've been getting too excited for summer and have been a bit out of control. I don't blame them, Though. I remember when I was their age lol. How about all those cats of yours?

Well, Oliver made Sandy mad, And now she keeps knocking all my plants over. And the youngest one just finally got old enough to get fixed, And she got out of the house. She didn't come back for 3 days, And I thought she might be dead. But she didn't get hurt, So now she is going straight to the vet in the morning.
Lol cats really have their own unique personalities. What did you name the youngest kitty? I'm so glad she's safe! You must have been worried sick.
Well, I was calling her Gloria, But now she is Hudini even though she is female because I have no idea how she got outside. I just noticed her at the mailbox, And then she was on my bed this morning.

She can be Houdini's little sister. No clue if he even had one, But he does now lol. Kittens are sneaky little creatures. And you know what they say about curiosity and cats... But I'm so glad she's safe. And has a great new name!
I am glad too. I got attached to her the second I saw her. I usually don't like calicos, But her markings are so amazing! Does your dog have a story behind his name?

persona: I'm 23 years old. I love food. I enjoy cooking, but I'm not great at it.
I own a yacht which I rent out.
I play soccer.
My mom gets annoyed easily.
dialogue: I just cook something delicious for lunch. Do you want to see the recipe?
Certainly. What did you make? I love cooking, Or trying to.

I made a really easy spaghetti dish that is perfect for a warm spring or summer day! First you take a couple cans of stewed tomatoes with onion and garlic, Or you can use fresh tomatoes, Onion and garlic. Place them in a skillet with some more diced white onion and garlic and heat it up. While that's heating cook as much pasta of whatever type you want. Then after draining the pasta mix it with your tomato sauce and your done!
You don't put meat in yours?
No but you can if you want. This is a really light spaghetti. The sauce is even light but packed with flavor. It's not heavy like a traditional spaghetti and meatball dish.
Sounds delicious, But I would add ground beef or venison.
That sounds good! Have you made anything new lately?
Not lately. My mom gets annoyed when I cook because I make a mess. She's always annoyed.
Hahaha! Oh well, She'll get over it. How's your yacht rental business going?
It's pretty successful now that it's getting warmer! It's a lot of fun.
Have you had any interesting people rent it out? I'm wondering if you have seen anything odd or something.
Nothing odd. Just people wanting to have fun. It was very nice talking to you!

persona: I live in the US.
I like traveling.
I only have birds as pets. I work a lot. I work as a chef.
I'm expecting a baby.
dialogue: When are you expecting the baby? Do you have a nursery ready?
We do! We've painted it bright green. I'm so excited. Do you have kids?
Green is one of my favorite colors! Have you bought the crib or mobile to hang from the ceiling? No, It's just me and my cat at home.
We did buy a crib, And we orderd a mobile on etsy. I LOVE cats -- we have two! What's your cat's name?

Isn't Etsy great for fun, Creative, Kitschy stuff? My cat's name is Fluffy. I know, It's not that original, But it's quite fitting, As she's fuzzy, Cuddly, And cute as can be! Have you picked out a name for the baby yet?
My cats are Tag and Henry. Tag is a maine coone mix so he is fluffy too! I think the baby's name will be Rachel for a girl or Gregory for a boy.
You have great taste in names for both your cats and the baby! When will you know the sex of the baby?
We are going to wait until the baby is born to see. Thank you for complimenting my cat names! I'm pleased with them. How old is your cat?
You're welcome. Fluffy is getting up there. She's 7 years old now. Her birthday is coming up in June. I think I'll share my favorite, A large pizza with olives, With her to celebrate!
Tag is 10 and Henry is 11. Is pizza her celebratory food?
She does love pizza. Sometimes I order it from the local pizzeria, And other times I bring home a frozen pizza from the supermarket where I work. Do your cats enjoy human food, Too?
They do, They do! Tag LOVES avocados / guacamole. Henry loves meatballs. They're so funny! I love how they chew their food. Is fluffy cute when she eats?

persona: I worked for human services for 10 years. I am a stay at home father. I am widowed. My wife was murdered.
My goal is to raise my son. My son is in junior high and has PTSD.
I watch horror movies with my son. My favorite movies are horror movies.
I wish my son would go away sometimes. I have a hard time dealing with the loss of my wife. My son reminds me of the wife I've lost.
dialogue: I hope you are well. I hear there is a new horror movie coming out.
Oh great! What's the name of it? I might go see it with my son.
It is called "One Night In The Cave", I am super excited about it. You and him should go! It warms my heart that you two are having a good relationship.
It's getting better. Sometimes I feel guilty that I'm so excited for him to go to college, But trying to enjoy the time we have left.

No matter what, Just cherish all the moments you get with him, Life sure is a fleeting thing. He is a smart and great kid. It is so cool that he enjoy the horror movies with you, My kids think my obsession with horror films is odd.
Haha! I bet they are proud of your other hobbies, Though. How have you been doing with the running?

I have been getting better and better. I have been setting goals for myself. I decided I need to not still be hung up on things that happened in high school and be more committed to the future so that is why I have become such a health and fitness nut. Have you ever considered going to the gym to get your mind off of things?

That's awesome! Yes, I can totally see your dedication. Taking up studying, Winning the Homecoming title, All really great to hear. My wife and I used to go to the gym every day. It's been hard to go back since the accident.
I totally understand. Have you thought about maybe going back to college? All my studying is a good mental exercise and puts me in a good headspace.
Maybe. I think I'm too old for that now, Plus I've got a pretty decent position. I think when my son goes to college I might take asabbatical and travel for a month or two.
That is another excellent way to get a feeling of a fresh start. Where might you travel to?
I was thinking about going to Europe and ending in Paris. My wife, Lisa always wanted to go there with me. We never got a chance.

persona: I am pregnant with twins. My due date is in 2 months. I have a toddler.
I work in a bank.  I own a home.
I believe in moderation.
dialogue: So, Is your pregnancy and child care still going well? Have you managed to get enough rest to consider whether my comments on the environment were serious?
It is going well. I'm exhausted due to my pregnancy lol but I would say they are serious.

It's rough working while being pregnant. Trust me, I know. I once worked two jobs while pregnant and I wouldn't have if my husband wasn't disabled. He's wonderful, But his physical impairments prevent him from holding a job.
Oh my goodness. I am so sorry. Bless your heart.
Thank you! I'm in my 20s and still in high school, Too. So many things about me are ironic, Right? But God is good.
Yes, He is! I wouldn't have made it this far without him thats for sure.
I sometimes ask Him why pregnancy is so hard. But then I look into my baby's eyes and think, "Would I love you so much if I hadn't gone through what I did?".
That's a good way to look at it. I've never thought about it that way.
It's so rewarding being a mother. That's part of why I want to be a physical therapist. It's kind of a similar thing, You know?
Oh yeah I understand. As hard as it is, It's such a good feeling at the end of the day.
I know. You told me how hard you work at the bank, And I marvel at the job you do. That one incident with that angry guy? I don't know what I would have done. But you handled it so well.
Yea, It was quite scary. To be honest if it ever happens again I'll probably find a new job.

persona: I like walking my dog.
I have a growing family.
My husband is a doctor.
I play tennis professionally.
I live in a three storey house.
dialogue: How is training going at the courts? Are you there every day?
Yes, I need to train and practice everyday. Tennis is very competive at this level.
I can only imagine. How do you keep up with your growing family?
It's difficult, But my husband steps up a lot to help out and my parents help by watching the kids when we can't be around.
That's great. I know my folks want me to settle and have kids one day. I just want to get my own feet under me first.
Ans you should. You will know when the timing is right. And it is so important when findng the right person that they are kind and supportive. Someone you really want to raise a family wtih.
I know your right. I will eventually find someone. Maybe working at the gas station my Prince Charming will stop in.

Well, There isn't all that many Prince Charming's out there anymore. So just keep your head up, Your self confidence strong, And your options open. But, If that good looking one in the Ferrari drives in - then flirt a litlte. LOL.
That's hilarious. How long have you been married?
5 years but we have lived together for 8 years.
Awesome, How many children do you have?
2. A 4 year old boy and a 13 month old girl.

persona: My name is Larry. I work as a head chef.
I like comic books. I like big dogs.
My favourite comic is Spiderman.
My favourite colour is blue.
My brothers used to build stock cars.
I am not married. I have no children.
dialogue: How is work at the kitchen? You must be working unsociable hours.
The kitchen is pretty quiet right now. It's giving me some time to read the latest issue of Spiderman! We had a NASCAR driver in yesterday, His name began with Dale, Have you heard of him?
That's great. I know a lot of Nascar drivers but not a Dale. I wish i was there. My two favourite things. Nascar and food.
I'm thinking of developing a new dish that will attract more NASCAR fans, Any suggestions on what I can provide?
I don't know if Nascar drivers have a staple meal but i love anything grilled. I love ribeye steaks with peppercorn sauce.
I was thinking of bring a ribeye to the menu! I'll definitely have to do it now! How's the post office treating you?
I'll ask my dad what he thinks too. The post office is as interesting as it ever was. Not very.
That's too bad, At least there weren't any spiders there! Have you been anywhere new to eat out? I got burger king last night after work, Lazy night!
I'll survive. I was at Subway for a snack. By the way, Please lend me your Spiderman comic when you've finished with it...
Subway is always there when you need it. Certainty, It's all yours after I'm done. While we're at it, We should exchange comics! Are you reading anything right now?

persona: My name is Chelsea. I am female.
I have a gold in gymnastics.
I want to collect yellow items. Gymnastics is not my true passion.
dialogue: Have you started collecting anything yellow yet? I think that is a fascinating interest.
Yes! I got a yellow vase at a yard sale last weekend. Such a cheerful color. How have you been, Kim? Parents still being a pain?
Nice. Is that the first official item of the yellow-item collection? I've been okay. Issues with my parents are the same. I've been looking at apartments so I can move out.

Not the first, But it has been the coolest so far. I got some yellow ribbon and a yellow plate at the thrift store, Too. That will be great when you can finally move out and we can chill at the new apartment. I feel like whenever I come over your parents are judging me.

Yeah, They're like that. For no apparent reason too most of the time. Too many years of being segregated by the confines of the church for them, I think. Don't get me wrong, Church is good. It promotes healthy family values when approached with an open-mind. Being a fear-mongering bible-thumper is where it becomes a detriment, Which unfortunately is the subsect of Catholicism they've fallen into. It'll never change.

Yeah I totally get it. Ever since we snuck out that one time to go to Kyle's party they've been seriously crazy! We are basically adults. It's not like you'll be their Christian good girl all of a sudden when you leave the house.

Right? I heard 3 hours of bible verses over that the next day related to "WHAT WOULD JESUS THINK". Well evidently not a single thing as worms have been living inside his skull for the past 2000 years. They really lost it when I said that. Surprised they didn't start trying to sprinkle holy water on me while screaming for the devil to get out. Is what it is. Shouldn't be a problem for too much longer anyway.
Hahaha man I wonder what they'd say if they saw your Tik Tok dance of you getting down to WAP. I'm a gymnast and even I can't stretch like that.

Their heads would start doing 360s and then it'd be me pulling out the bible if I saw that lmao. Anyway, Enough about them. Feels like beating a dead horse every time we talk about my parents. Any new ideas on what your next collection items will be?
There's a yellow quilt that I saw online that I really want. It's like $300 though. So I'll have to save up. My whole bedroom is going to be all yellow soon enough.
Nice! That is a lot of money for a quilt, But it's probably really good material and worth it. Have you painted the walls yellow yet? Who knew winning gold would go this far, Chels, Haha.

One wall is yellow wallpaper with a floral design on it and the other wall is yellow wallpaper with stripes. Maybe I'll do some sort of yellow paint on the other walls. And a yellow chandelier! I feel like it has become a little over the top but it's just so cheery. I love it.

persona: I have a dog. I like walking my dog.
I am skinny.
I am a teacher.
I like skinny jeans. I go to church weekly on a Sunday.
dialogue: How was class today, Did you reach anything interesting?
It was fun! It was the 100th day of school so all the kids dressed in something representing 100. How was school for you today?
Stressful, Getting ready for final this time of year. But looking forward to the break. How do the kids dress in something representing 100? That sounds like fun!

I bet! I remember being so glad when finals was over! Some kids will bring 100 pencils, Some kids will put 100 stickers on a shirt, One kid dressed as if he was 100 years old, But my favorite was a kid who dress as a puppy and wore a shirt with 100 black dots on it to be adalmation!
Oh that is great!!! What grade do you teach?

I currently teach 2nd grade. I've taught 1st and kindergarten before but not sure I want to go higher than 2nd. After this, There may be more attitudes involved! Haha! What are you majoring in at college?
Agricultural Engineering. Working on my bachelors. But how I would long to be carefree again back in the 2nd grade!!!.

Nice! That is definitely a lot of work but a great field! Do you think you will go for your masters afterwards? I enjoy getting to be with the kids everyday because they are always surprising me with how they think!
Yese, I plan on working towards my masters. Spending your days with 2nd graders keep you yound and constantly on your toes for sure!
And gives me every excuse to keep up with the latest cartoons and Disney movies! Haha!
Kids are so creative at that age!
They are! I love hearing what comes out of their mouths and figuring out what made them think that!

persona: I live in the city. I take many medications.
I drink alcohol.
I grew up in a farm.
dialogue: I worked with my garden group since we last talked.
Fantastic! What did you plant?
I planted a bud from my pineapple plant! It'll take a few years to grow. I'm thinking of making a mix drink with a pineapple that's about to ripen. Any recommendations?
Yes! You can make a pineapple screwdriver pretty easily with equal parts pineapple juice, Orange juice, And vodka.
That sounds good. Is your city warm enough to grow anything tropical?
No, I live too far north for anything tropical, Unfortunately. What's your favorite thing to grow?
Potatoes! Sounds boring, And it is, But I love eating potatoes in any form. You can grow them anywhere. Luckily they dont up take too much space in my greenhouse.
Do you move things with your brain in your greenhouse?
Sure do! It makes removing bugs pretty easy. Do you ever miss the farm life?
All the time. You know a lot of those bugs will help to enrich your soil.
Oh goodness, I've been releasing them outside. I should stop doing that. Say, I'm thinking of going to a city for vacation, Do you recommend yours?
Yes, My city is lovely! Lots of things for tourists to do. My favorite thing is going up the CN tower.

persona: I like coffee.
I like mountain biking.
I like coffee flavoured ice cream. I don't drink alcohol.
My dad works at construction.
I love my mother. I saw my mother recently.
dialogue: Have you been out on your bike at all? I bet there are some great trails if you know where to look.
Oh, For sure! There are all kinds of awesome trails around here, The only problem is choosing one! Do you have any recommendations? Is the park you're going to pretty nice?

The park links to a lake in my area is very beautiful and we can stop and have a picnics. The family are keen to spend the day out in the fresh air when we can which suits us all. A treat is always the chocolate ice cream but im sure yours would be coffee flavored lol I can link you into some ideas for the weekend if you like no problem. You heading out this weekend on the bike?

That sounds amazing! And I'd love some links if it's no problem for you. Coffee flavored ice cream is the best and no one can convince me otherwise LOL. I definitely want to go out for a nice ride this weekend. The weather is going to be great and my mother is interested in joining me! So I want to find a really beautiful trail.

That would brighten up your mother for sure. We use to have my mum come along at times but of course not towards the latter times with her. She would love the little nature trails and we would sit and watch the robin take the seeds from our hands. Great to be part of nature. Has the weather been good for you where you are, Gales at times here today.

Your mum lives on in your memories. It's nice to hold on to those precious moments and be able to return to the beautiful places they were created. I'm really looking forward to the weather this weekend for sure. How are your wife and kids doing lately?

They are good thanks for asking hun. They have been working hard with their studies and work. We are as you can imagine passing ships a lot of the time but have the quality time together. Yes we always mark thinks buy saying hello to the Robin as a hello to mum. Hows your mum and dad getting on hopefully taking it easy.

I'm so glad to hear they're doing well. Study and work is so important, But quality time is the best. My parents are doing well. It's been harder for my dad lately because of how hard he works. I try to convince him to take it easy, But hard work is just in his blood. He can't go a day without it.

It goes like that for some, Your dad sounds to have decent hard working principles. I'm sure you can drag him away when needed but i understand what that's like for sure. They feel that they still need to keep on providing to the rest of us but they don't bless them but like you say its in the blood. Make the most as time is but short and we so want to do so much with our loved ones. Socializing is important and what do you do in the that regard hun? It is good to try and find time together.
It's always nice to gather the family for a nice relaxing day together.Tons of delicious food and drink make everything quite a bit better. I hope you have lots of precious moments with your family!
Ditto hun and keep giving the lots of hugs and letting them know. Its so beautiful having the love that can be shared and the nature we can appreciate together. Hope to catch up soon again hun.
For sure! I'm always here for a chat! Don't be a stranger and tell the family I said hi.

persona: I work as a custodian.
I am a rock musician. I play the piano and guitar. I sing.
My parents are not supportive.
dialogue: My husband has signed up for a company that helps people to find lost family. He's really excited.
That sounds great. Has he ever looked for his biological family?
He's always talked of doing it, But this time he's actually gonna go for it. I'm excited for him.
Good for him. I would imagine he is a little nervous about it?
Yeah, He's really nervous if he finds them, They wont want to have anything to do with him;.
I could only imagine that would be challenging. I think it is great for him to try anyway. That way he gets answers. Does he have any information about them yet?
He has a couple of pieces of information about two brothers!
Hey, That is cool information for him to know. I wonder if his brothers know he is out there. You will have to keep me posted!
Oh I def will! I really hope it turns out that they are open to him and we can become a big family.
Do your kids know he is adopted? Are they aware of the search he is about to embark on?

persona: I like to eat out.
I have visited Japan. I have just visited Paris. I am currently travelling the world.
I like to cook. I am not a very good cook.
I have a yacht. I rent my Yacht out while I'm travelling.
dialogue: I have just had a scan on the triplets. It was amazing to see them in the womb.
How exciting. Do you know if they boys, Girls or both?
No - we didn't want to find out. We want to be surprised. What country are you in now?
Wow. You are braver than me. But I commend you for waiting. When are you due? I am in Florida, Usa on my yacht now.
I am due in 5 months. At least I still have time to get the nursery together. How is the weather in Florida?
You do have plenty of time to do the nursery. Do you have a nursery theme picked out? The weather here is a little humid but warm and manageable.

That sounds so nice and relaxing. Perfect weather for sight seeing. I and thinking that I will do the nursery in puppies with gender neutral colors. Pretty greens and yellows so the room is always bright and sunny. What are you most excited about seeing in Floriday?
The nursery plans sounds great. You will have to send me pictures when it is done. My favorite thing to do in Florida is fish. It relaxes me.
Big fish? Like Marlins? Those look so fun to catch!!!.
I have yet to be that lucky. I fish close to shore. Small sharks and crazy looking fish with lots of teeth.
That sounds scarier than the marlins. Don't let your hands get close to their mouths for sure! Do you eat them or catch and release?
I am very careful not to lose a finger when fishing. We release the sharks back for sure. But there are a few types of fish we keep and eat. Do you eat fish?

persona: My wife left me and stole my children.
I'm fat and depressed, which I blame on working at a nursing home.
I did not qualify for the Olympics because god doesn't exist.
I prefer winter. I use facebook.
dialogue: Do you have any contact with your wife and kids?
Its hard to get ahold of my wife. Its a sad situation all the way around, Especially for my kids.
Have you tried contacting her on facebook?
I have tried multiple avenues. Unfortunately I was blocked. Have you gone through a bad breakup before?
Several times. It's the reason why I started my hat collection funny enough. She left me because I said god didn't exisit.
I understand. Religion could make it or break it. I have a lot of friends who have broken up because of their religious beliefs.
Well, At least we have winter to look forward to, Only 6 months away! How's the nursing home treating you?
It isn't the best environment. I have to share a room with another man. I don't have my own privacy.
That's too bad. Is the other man at least nice to you?
Yes, He's nice. We share some common interest. I do miss my home though. Have you ever visited a nursing home before?
Yeah, Actually I have. My grandfather is in one. He's getting the very best care. The place can seem pretty sad though.
Are you able to visit him often? We at the nursing homes love visitors!

persona: I like rap music. I especially like Somalian rap.
I have a cat named Ziggy who likes reggae. I am not from the US but moved here. I moved here from Somalia. I left Somalia when I was 13. I have an Aunt who helped me leave Somalia.
I drive a 1976 Chevy Impala.
I love Pizza.
dialogue: How is your Impala doing? I'm amazed that you've kept it running this long!
You know, I always need to make sure that everything runs smoothly, But overall I keep it in a good condition. I love old cars!
I feel like I have an old car... But it's only 2015. I'm no good at working on cars lol. All I'm good at is music and rap. Have you heard any new stuff worth listening to lately?
Not really. This new music is not the same as the old stuff. Even Somalian rap is changing so much. I like the classics. How about you?

It's hard to outdo the classics. I appreciate new artists and the perspective they offer to the world, But I always find myself going back to the classics as well. I haven't really heard anything great lately so I thought I'd ask you. But I have made probably the best pizza ever! Lol I was so proud of it I had to send pics to all my friends and family.
Nice! I love cooking and baking as well. You need to send me a recipe! What did you put on it?
I feel like I'm not the best cook, But I love pizza so much that I've been working on making my own. I tossed all kinds of things on there, It was the BEST. What are your favorite toppings?
Oh my, That's a hard question. It depends what I am in a mood for that day. I like chicken barbecue, Mediterranean, Buffalo, Or sometimes just plain old cheese pizza. I like it New York style!
I don't think I could ever be disappointed by a pizza. I like everything, Any style. Charlie is always trying to steal a slice too lol, So I know he loves it as well. How's Ziggy doing?
He is doing fine. Just being a cat haha But he likes to snuggle with me on the couch and watch shows. I really enjoy that too!
Aw, That's awesome! Charlie loves just chilling with me too. What kind of stuff do you guys watch together? Car shows? Lol.
We recently have been watching a show about drug cartels. I really enjoy it! Do you like to watch tv?

persona: I don't have a job. I am job hunting. I used to work with animals but I hated it.
I play video games. I would love to make a living out of playing video games.
dialogue: Have you had any luck in your job hunt?
No, Not yet. The job market is rough out there. But I am still hopeful.
Hang in there! I've been jobless in the past. It is never fun searching. Just keep pushing through it.
Thank you for the words of encourament. Everyday I get out there. I know something will come. How is your job going?
The job is great. I enjoy helping others at the nursing home. My father is at the nursing home where I work.
Wow! That is so awesome that your Dad is there. That is a great benefit of being able to see him daily. What kidn of work do you do there?
I assist people with their daily activies... Such as eating, Walking. Its hard work but it has great benefits.
You must have a very kind heart to do that daily. I am sure that the residents look forward to seeing you everyday.
Yes, They do. A lot of them are lonely. I've been there for over 10 years so people know who I am :).

persona: My parents are nagging me. I am 19 years old.
I like scooby doo.
I like hanging with my friends and I have a part time job at burger king.
dialogue: Do you think you could recommend me a book that is similar to the lord of the flies?
I'm not too familiar with that book. What type of genre is it?
Its a allegorical novel. About a bunch of kids stranded on an island and they have to basically form their own society.
I don't think I can offer much help on that. I can recommend a great movie... Goonies!
Goonies is a great movie. It was kind of like the kid version of Scooby doo, Without the dog.
Exactly. I grew up watching it. Do you enjoy any other types of movies?
I love Disney Movies, All of them.Micky is my favorite character.
That is everyone's favorite! Have you been to Disney Land or World?
No not yet. I hope for my 10th birthday in December my family takes me!
Are you going to California or Florida. You must be excited!
We are closer to Florida, But i dont know, Its a surprise!
That's great! Youre going to have so much fun. What are you looking forward to doing there?

persona: I am involved in a bake sale.
I am involved in a charity for a band.
I am high maintenance. I like getting my hair and nails done.
I do not like to tan. I have a backyard. I have my own home.
I do not have trouble saving money. I spend money on clothes.
dialogue: How is the bake sale going?
It is going great! A lot of moms from school decided to donate their baked goods so we have a lot of different pastries and desserts. What's your favorite dessert?
I love an Italian pastery called a cannolli. My mom always used to go to the italian bakery and buy those for holidays.
I have never had it but heard about it from my friend. I love tiramisu. Have you heard about those new tanning creams? Or do you still prefer tanning beds?

I prefer the beds. I have not found a cream yet that doesn't turn me orange. And besides, With atannin bed, I get to have some relax time while I am getting my tan. When the nex time that you are getting your hair done?

I went to get a haircut and color last week. My niece recommended a new stylist to me and I really liked her. I usually just get layers and color it ash brown, But I am pretty picky about how they cut and color my hair. Plus, She also did this hair treatment and massaged my scalp. It felt amazing.
Oh I bet. I always love the scalp massages. How long is your hair?
It is getting pretty long actually, It reaches my mid back. I cut my hair short few years ago but now I want to grow it long and healthy. How is your family doing?
Everyone isdong well. And everyone is always very busy. Seems like we are always on the go. This weekend we are getting together for lunch and then shopping. Are you planting a garden this year?

I would love to however I am pretty busy with work. I am thinking of maybe hiring a gardener to help me design the garden and teach me how to take care of plants. I want trees that don't shed too much.
That sounds like fun. I am sure that a gardener is the best way to go.
I think so too. I love my backyard and the greenery but it it very hard to maintain. I like to meditate in my backyard in the mornings.

persona: I live in Alabama. I like tacos. I like my brother.
I have 3 sisters and 1 brother.
I don't have a bike.
I have a dog.
dialogue: Have you gotten a bike yet?
No, My brother might let me share his though. It would make it more fun when i walk my dog!
How has your dog been?
Pretty good, Though im a bit mad at him, He ate my last taco i had for lunch!
Oh, No! I'd be devastated lol. I don't have a dog, But I have sisters and they love to steal my food. Do your siblings do the same or are they decent?
Well i really only like my brother, My 3 sisters can be pretty mean. Seems we share that in common.

I don't know what it is about sisters, But they all seem to be pretty mean. My other friends also talk about their mean sisters, So I'm starting to think it's just how every sister is lol. I wish I had a brother. Maybe then our house wouldn't be covered in pink.
Tell me about it! Everything is pink or flowers! I hate pink too!
Exactly. It's so annoying. They want to put their style on everything and don't consider what other people like. Why are sisters like that?
Who knows, Its making me exhausted thinking about it. I should go grab some coffee, I remember you liked coffee, Do you have a favorite kind?

I love any kind of coffee. For me, It's more about the flavor than waking myself up. So I end up drinking way too much lol. My favorite would probably be cold brew with a splash of vanilla milk. How about you?
Oh i usually need it for the energy. Usually a few espressos or an americana.

persona: I work in the music industry. I help artists create albums.
I live in California. I do not like living in California. California is a nice place but has limited job opportunities. California's air is smoky.
dialogue: How is the music industry?
It's been such a dream come true. I get to do what I love every day and meet cool people. What makes you wanna move to California?
That sounds like an awesome job! Working with musical artists sounds a lot more fun than my job cleaning houses. I've always wanted to visit Los Angeles and visit Hollywood and the Sunset Strip.

It's definitely a beautiful city, But it can be frustrating to have to like.. Use it as a work space instead of just enjoying it. Seeing the darker underside to things, You know? Do people treat you well in your job?

I hear what you're saying. I heard the traffic there is ridiculous! Yeah, My boss is pretty chill and treats me well. Sometimes homeowners like to boss me around and make me feel small but I grin and bear it. So are you working on putting out any killer records?

People suck sometimes. I hate when people treat others poorly. I'm sorry to hear that. I AM working with some exciting new artists -- some really cool folk artists who i think have interesting points of view. What's your favorite type of music?

I'm not huge on folk, But I love rock and roll and country, Which isn't surprising seeing that I live in Texas. Let me know when the albums drop, Though, So I can check them out. It might be nice to listen to some easy-going folk music while I work on my paintings.
My wife loves country music. She's from kentucky and loves dolly parton. Who's your favorite country artist?
Dolly Parton is good, But my favorites are Johnny Cash and Willie Nelson. Johnny Cash had that famous concert from the Folsom Prison in California. Do you live near there?
I don't! I liveup near the redwoods but travel to LA a lot for work. The woods are truly beautiful. Have you ever seen the redwoods?
No, I haven't ever seen redwood trees, But I know they are enormous and very old!
Yes. It feels like seeing something holy. I'm so worried california's air will hurt them.

persona: I am a female. I do not have children. I sing country music.
I would really like to go on tour with Rascal Flats.
Tom Cochrane wrote "Life is a Highway" .
I spent summers in my youth at national parks. I learned guitar at age 3. We used to sing a lot of campfire songs. My parents taught me the ukulele before the guitar.
I may trying to eat a vegan diet but it's hard.
dialogue: I'm getting nervous about the twins arriving soon. I am doubling the number of my children in one shot, Going from 2 to 4 kids! I'm not sure how we'll be financially with my job at the bank.
That's an understandable concern, But it will all work it's self out. Life has a way of figuring itself out most of the time.
"LIfe Is A Highway" is a pretty good way to put it, And I hope I can stay on the pavement with this one lol.
Lol, You've got this! And that song is so true no doubt.
Since you sing and play guitar, You ever think of making an album?
I had thought about it, But it's something I enjoy so I don't know if I really wanna try to go the professional route ya know.
Yeah that's true, Fun is fun and when you try to make a living off of what's fun, It's not as enjoyable anymore.
Yea, Especially if it doesn't take off like you expect or want to.
Would you do one for fun? Just to hand out to friends and family? I wouldn't mind hearing you sing your heart out :).
Oh yeah! Of course! I think that would be fun.
I love classic country music, Maybe you could cover "Stand By Your Man" or something along those lines for me.
I was gonna ask what kind of music you prefer. I like singing country pretty well.

persona: I live in Chicago. I am allergic to water.
I do not go outside very often.
I have 100,000 subscribers on Twitch. I play virtual sports. I do not play real sports.
I am a game designer. I helped to design Starcraft. I am pretty famous. It took me 6 months to get 100,000 subscribers.
I am designing a robot that will be a body double of me. The robot is still a prototype.
I like to steam older video games like PS1 and Super Nintendo. I like to play video games a lot.
dialogue: How is the robot design going? Is your prototype ready to go to market?
Not yet, But I think it will be in the next couple of months. How is your arm healing? It must be boring to be indoors so much!
It's healing quite alright. Yeah so boring I must say.
Are you still in much pain? When will you be able to go back to skateboarding?
Not so much pain as the first day. The Doctor said I should be all healed in a week or two. Steamed any game recently?
Mostly Super Nintendo stuff. I've been on a Nintendo kick lately. What is your favorite older Nintendo game? Mine are Super Mario Bros. And Tetris.
Just super Mario for me.
That one is great. My favorite is the first one but Super Mario Bros. 2 was a good one too. You should try Tetris, It's good for passing time.
I've played Tetris, I just find it boring after a while.
That's true, It can be quite a lot of the same thing. So how has the weather been in Scotland? I was thinking about coming to Scotland but with my water allergy I should come in a dry season.
The weather is pretty much okay. Sorry about your allergies. I would sure love to show you some new skateboarding skills I learnt.
Oh, I'd love to learn! Maybe there is an indoor park there? What new skills have you learnt?

persona: I roleplay.
I like ICP and I have a Ford Pinto.
I like CoD and donuts. I can make vegan donuts.
I live action roleplay. My kids like to roleplay too.
dialogue: The rolling stones was absolutely amazing in concert.
I bet! Mick Jagger still can rock out for his very advanced age haha.
Yup! My favorite song is Sympathy for the Devil. Are you a fan of them?
Behind ICP they are a favorite group of mine, Been listening to them since I was a kid :).
Nice. What other music do you listen to?
It's funny, I listen to what I do like ICP and Stones, And then I also like easier stuff like rock oldies... The Guess Who, Grass Roots, Etc.
That's cool, How old are you?
Old enough, 45! And my husband is the same age and got me into roleplaying and gaming lol.
That's cool, I'm listening to the song No Sugar Tonight now because of you!
Now do "Clap For The Wolfman" after that one and you'll be right the rest of the day haha!
Will do! Apparently this song was for Wolfman Jack. Do you remember him?
Oh yes, He was a favorite of my family when I was growing up.

persona: I am studying to be a lawyer.
I love horses. I ride horses.
dialogue: How are the studies or horses, Whichever one you're doing.
Studying is rough, But the horses are great. How's the training going?
It's pretty tough! Following my diet is challenging! I'm sure it's just has hard as your studying plan! Just a different kind of hard! It will pay off in the end for both of us though!
Hard work always pays off. Does your martial arts training come into play as a stunt double?

It does! So much of the martial arts crosses over into being a stunt double. And having the martial arts background on my resume helps me land better jobs! What kind of lawyer do you want to be when you graduate?

Family/divorce lawyer. So many times growing up seeing people get taken to the cleaners when they didn't deserve it. Not having enough visitation time with their kids makes me want to go the extra mile so they get what they deserve.
I bet that will be a very rewarding career to be able to help people in that situation! How much longer do you have until you can take your final exams?
I have 2 months left be fore finals and then the bar. After that I have an internship through a local office. As a stunt double what's the worst accident you've had?

Luckily I haven't had anything too serious. Just some scrapes and bumps and bruises! I've seen some people get pretty hurt though and then their career is over for good. I think that's where my martial arts training comes in handy because I know a lot of tricks for minimizing impact. So do you get paid for your internship or do you not start getting paid until you're done with that?

Thats good, I've seen YouTube videos of martial arts trainers that would punch and kick trees or hard surfaces to strengthen their bones. Some don't but I was fortunate enough to find this one that does. It's not like full time job pay scale but better than working for free.

At least it's something! I'm sure those student loan lenders will be hunting you down as soon as you graduate wanting paid back!! I'd imagine all those years of college have not been cheap! That's one thing that led me into a career path that didn't involve years of schooling!

Yes schooling is never cheap and it was a hard decision to apply for school loans. I know in the long run i will make more than enough to pay it off, But it will be rough times for a bit. Ramen noodle rough times. Speaking of food what are you restricted to with your diet?

persona: My boyfriend and I will be living together in an apartment on the outskirts of the city Philadelphia. I am an elementary school teacher.
I speak fluently English, Spanish, French.
My favorite colors are red and silver.
dialogue: Will you be living close to your teaching job?
Yeah, It's a little bit closer but still a bit of a commute. It's just going to be so exciting to be finally living with my boyfriend!
You guys are going to have so much fun getting settled in. HAve you done much shopping for the place yet?
Yeah, I couldn't resist, Haha! I have been stocking up a little bit, I hope he doesn't mind too much new stuff appearing!
Well if he's anything like my boyfriend you'll be glad you stocked up. When we moved in together he brought only his couch from college!
Haha, They can be so funny can't they! How long have you guys been living together now?

We moved in together just about a year ago. I moved in with him which was about 3 hours away. That's why I no longer teach gym. I spend most of my days just grilling and volunteering. It's been fun but I definitely miss the kids; I.
Have you looked for gym teaching jobs where you are now? Is it something you'd like to do again?

I think I'd like to look for something just part-time; maybe even if I could find a preschool or something to take up just a small part of the day. Plus that always ended up being my own exercise for the day, Haha! Grilling and eating don't make for a very active lifestyle. What's your favorite subject to teach the kids?
That sounds good, I think you should 100% have a look! I like teaching science, Especially nature subjects.
Ah I bet the kids love those subjects too, I always remember loving getting outside for lessons like that. Do you teach them Spanish and French too?

Yeah they do, I think that's also part of the reason I enjoy it, It's great to see them really engage with a subject! We do a little bit of Spanish and French, Not a lot in the age group I teach, Just the very basics to get them started.

persona: I am planning to move to California.
I am a doctor.
I have a lot of student loans to repay.
I have an electric car.
dialogue: Have you had any luck with your applications to the California hospitals? Any interviews lined up?
No not yet and its not helping this loans disapear either. Hows the vet life treating you?

It's been really great. We were very busy up until last month but things are starting to slow done and feel more normal now. Hopefully I'll be able to make time for a vacation soon! I'm thinking California.
Maybe ill finally move there by then and we can meet up! Do you plan on bringing your motorcycle? A lot of nice roads to ride on.

That would be just perfect if you were there by then! If not, It'll jsut give me an excuse to visit again :). I'd love to do a motorcycle ride out west, Maybe take Route 66 the whole way and stay in classic motels. When are you thinking of making the move?
Hopefully really soon. I would like to have the job lined up before commiting, But it seems i might have to make the move first.
That's a good point, I.
At least when i drive cross country ill save on gas with my electric car, Haha.

That will help immensely!! Every time I fill up my motorcyle, Which is frequently, It hurts the old wallet a bit! Anyway I know there are a ton of great hospitals for you to choose from in CA and I'm sure you'll find something in no time!
Thank you, I think so too. Just a bit frustrating, Its a big change and i want to get it started!
I bet, Well hang in there! And if you need help moving, I can always hitch a trailer to the back of my motorcycle and help you out. Any excuse for a roadtrip :).
I will keep that in mind. Did you get that new helmet to match the colors and stripe of your bike?

persona: I love chocolate.
I prefer music with a bassline.
My favorite color is purple. I like to play ping pong. I have a purple ping pong table.
dialogue: Was your father able to fix the lights in your basement? Hopefully you've been able to get back to playing ping pong.
He hasn't fixed them yet, So I'm considering trying to do it myself. Any tips? Because I have no clue what I'm doing lol.
Hmm, Maybe it's best to ask an expert on this sort of thing. I know electric guitars but I don't know electric, Hah.
Electric guitars? I thought you were into classical! I'm just a fan of anything with some good bass.
Oh, I love all kind of music, But especially classical. Do you have a favorite producer?

I have such a difficult time choosing favorite things. I'm pretty sure the only favorite thing I've ever been 100% certain of is the color purple. It's been my favorite for as long as I can remember, But everything else is so complicated lol.
Purple is a great color, But you don't feel as strongly about chocolate? I'm a fellow chocolate lover. Definitely a favorite.
I do love chocolate, But who doesn't? Lol. I want to try some new chocolates, Do you have any recommendations?
I don't know the brand, But there's a great chocolate my church sells as a fundraiser every year. I wish I could remember...
I might just have to go to your church. It's been such a long time since I attended. How's everything been going for you there?
