Yes, I love to play games on the computer. It's funny, When I play games on the computer it is like Spook my cat enjoys watching. Lol. What games do you play on the computer?
That's the cutest thing ever! What kind of games do you play? I don't play any games, I mostly use my computer for freelance work for extra side money. I do a lot of transcription work.

Oh, Freelancing is such a good idea! I'm sure you really enjoy that kind of work. Lately, I have really gotten into that game called 'Among Us.' It is just super addicting. It sticks that your apartment won't allow you to have pets. I really think you would enjoy a cat.
I enjoy it a lot. I've heard about Among Us but I've never played. Yeah, It does stink! How has work been for you?
It has been super busy. They always want me to pick up extra shifts and my boss just drives me nuts but, I guess it could be worse. How is work at the coffee shop going?

That sounds tough. I'm sure it's good for the extra money, But make sure you take care of yourself and don't push yourself too much. I get burned out so quickly when I'm overworked. The coffee shop is busier than ever. I really enjoy the vibe we have going and I like chit chatting with the locals.
Hey, I think we could both use a vacation. You should come out and visit me in Ohio. I know you never have been here and I could show you all the local sites.

Hey... Didn't you say Ohio was boring? Haha, I'm just kidding! I'm sure it would be a lot less boring with the company of a good friend. That's not a bad idea. Maybe we can play a visit over the summer? I'll have some vacation time in June.
That sounds great! I will have to start thinking about what we should do... So it not so BORING... Haha.
I look forward to it and I can't wait to meet Spook. Maybe I can try that pizza you like so much. Do you have a favorite pizza shop?

Yeah, Their is this little joint just down the street from me. It is super hard to get a table so, I will have to make early reservations but the pizza is to die for. Also, I know you like Chinese food so, I will have to find us somewhere to near me to grab some Chinese.

persona: I finished painting my room purple and lime green.
I am studying high school.
I travel for my horse competition.
I have not been to Europe. I would like to visit Paris. I would like to visit Berlin. I would like to see the Eiffel Tower. I would like to try the bread and pastries in France.
I like seafood. I would like to visit England. I like the culture in London. I would like to Big Ben.
dialogue: When you graduate high school, A trip to Europe would be a great way to celebrate and relax for a bit.
I have actually been thinking about it. Europe consumes my thoughts and what a way to celebrate those four years in High School but with a trip to Europe! Will you be going again this year?
Of course, I still haven't decided if I want to visit Paris, Berlin, Or London more. I think I am leaning more on Paris, As I want to see other things in France as well.
That is so exciting. Do you think you will like France as much as you like Italy? I know that if I could only choose one place, I would pick France.
I'm sure I will, Theres bound to be plenty to see and do in France just like how much fun I had in Italy. I think it would be also a different experience as well.
I bet. I was actually on a short-list to go to Europe last year through the Equestrian club, But they only took the top 5 placed finishers in the youth division and I got 7th.
That must have been awful, I'm sure you'll get a chance to go to Europe this year. Have you still been keeping up with the club?
I have though not quite as much as last year. I had a non-riding accident that took a little to recuperate from. Then high school has been a lot busier. Have you ever been on a horse before?
I have not, I'm a bit afraid that I might fall off and hurt myself pretty badly. I mostly stick to my bike, Which I use to ride to almost everywhere.
Maybe someday I can show you around the club and get you on some of the really gentle horses. Bike riding is fun though. Did you ride in Europe too?
Yes, When I was in Italy I rented a bike and used it to get to different places. It was very relaxing and scenic at times, Theres plenty of areas in Europe that is bike-friendly.
Wow! Is there anything not wonderful about Europe? It sounds like such a dream.

persona: I have a dog. I live in Memphis.
I like to sing.
I am male. I like country music.
dialogue: What sort of goals do you have for training your dog? Are you looking into shows in Memphis, Or just want some regular training?
First I need to master his basic training but if he does well I would love to put him in some dog shows.
What kind of training are you working on right now? Does he know how to come, Sit, And stay? Roll over?
He knows sit, Lay down and roll over, He still need to learn how to stay and then come. Because as soon as I say stay and walk away turn around and he is at my feet.
Have you talked to a dog trainer? I could give you some tips if I knew your dog better, But maybe seeing a trainer in person would help you with stay and come.
Omg I should do that. If you could give me some tips that would be amazing, Thank you so much. Im guessing your dog is very well trained.

I would feel guilty if I didn't give my own lab the same attention I give the dogs I train for work! Stay is one of the hardest for dogs. The best tips I can give are to pair "stay" with a release word that isn't come, Otherwise you're always training your dog to come after he stays. First position the dog to stay, Then vary the duration before you use the release word. Slowly introduce distance instead of always walking away. Start with no distractions, Then add one or two like a toy or a sound nearby. Repeat"stay" if you think the dog is going to move. Don't use treats when he stays at first. Only reward him after he's stayed properly.

Wow thank you so much I am going to try the tips you have given me today. I will let you know how it goes and will research near by dog trainers so that they can help me further my dog training. Your Lab is one lucky dog to have so an talented owner who can not only give the dog so much love but also teach so well. Once again I really appreciate your help.
I'm glad to help! I love dogs, After all. I'm sure your dog will pick up on commands before you know it. What kind of dog is yours?
I sure hope he does especially with the knowledge you have given me. My dog is an Australian shepherd, So they are smart dogs so he should learn pretty quick.

Australian shepherds are some of my favorite dogs to train. They're not just smart, They have the herding instinct in their breed, So you definitely have an advantage with teaching. They're beautiful dogs too. I trained one recently that had blue eyes. What color are your dogs eyes?
Yes I researched a lot before I got him to find out what they are good out. How crazy mine also has blue eyes, And has tan and white fur.

persona: I can charm people with music. I am a country music musician. I am into good school country and new school music.
I play the guitar. I play music on the weekends.
I have a week long gig coming up next month at a small venue. I like smaller venues because I am more personal with my fans.
I have been trying to make Let It Go country.
dialogue: I recently discovered another super power of mine.
Oh yea? What's that?
A mouth full of fire flames. It is fun!
WOW. What are some examples of where that would be helpful?
I cook dinner very quickly. I also tend to knock out yard work super quick.

Oh yes, Quick dinners are awesome! I can see where that would be a plus. I'm trying to think of other uses for fire... I guess camping would be easier too, Even in the rain you could start a campfire to keep warm.
I love the rain. Starting a fire in the rain is tough, But doable. I love making smores but not in the rain!
I love the rain too! It's actually raining where I am right now. Your fire breath could make smores anytime! Lol.
But I do not like burnt smores so I reserve the fire breath smores for those I do not care for. I must buy a new umbrella.
Good idea. What color umbrella would you buy?
I love the color teal, Which signifies H20 for me. Water is liquid, Such as my finances. Lol.
Teal is pretty. I would get either red or purple. I love the colors that pop!

persona: I am a Doctor. I have been a doctor for 10 years, but I was recently fired because I was making a video for America's funniest videos while doing heart surgery.
I like papayas. My favorite movie is Friday.
I like going to the park and tripping roller skaters with logs. I have not been to a park lately.  I have a bird that swears in Spanish. I do not understand Spanish.
I like farms. I like playing with piglets.
I am looking for a new job.  I interviewed at a local non-profit hospital.
I used to operate on people.  I need to reform myself before I go back to operating.
dialogue: Have you thought of taking a Spanish class, That way you can learn what your bird is saying!
LOL! Maybe I don't want to know! Actually, You bring up a good point. I do have a handful of immigrant patients and I think it would make a better experience for them if I understood Spanish better.
It can only help to learn another language, I would love to learn spanish, But man it takes a lot of time and effort. Have you ever taken a foreign language class?

I actually learned French in school, But knowing it hasn't been very practical. Maybe I will reach out to our administrator and see if I can get into a continue education class for Spanish. I'm glad you mentioned it, Because I think it could be very useful.
I also took some french courses, But as you said, I haven't had much use for it. I really think learning spanish will help you in your job search as well, How is that going for you?

It's been slower than I like and I still think of myself as the Doctor I was. That said, I have some prospects with St. Luke's in town and if not there, I am hopeful that Mercy Place may have some openings.

Definitely, It is a tough time to find jobs, But you are in the perfect profession right now, The medical field. And as you said adding to your skills with a foreign language only makes you more desirable.
Enough about me. How's the farm been?
Not really all that great, We aren't that close, I think they get sick of the farm life.
Ahh, Well, How are the bees then? I would be so scared to get stung, But you don't seem worried at all.
I live for it, The bee farm is my passion, Thats how you get by strictly using honey and not sugar your whole life haha.
There are so many health benefits to honey. I think I will probably end up prescribing it to everyone once I start working again. Maybe I can send them to your bee farm?

persona: I live in the country. I work on a farm. I have a farmer's tan. I have a pet milk cow named Betsy.
I am an electrician.
I love country music. I drive a Dodge Ram.
My parents live on a farm.
I have a house.
I am the same age as Brittany.
dialogue: Do you have anything planned for the weekend? I am going to get a mani/pedi and watch a Brittany documentary. Should have some of her all time hits in it.
I bet you'll enjoy the documentary as you are such a fan. What are some of your favorite Brittany songs?
It's an older one but I think toxic is probably my favorite still.
I guess you would laugh at me if I told you I've never heard that song. Now if you ask me about Blake Shelton, Then I could name some songs.
Ugh, I can't stand country music, Although I am aware of who Blake Shelton is.
Country is not for everyone I know but I grew up on it and do still enjoy it. I am more familiar with Taylor Swift than Brittany. I think Taylor may have started out with country songs.
She absolutely did, I respect her country music roots but I think her more pop oriented music is way better.
She does seem to be more popular as a pop artist so I guess that's a better fit for her.
How has work been recently? I can't even imagine being an electrician, I'm way too stupid for that lol.
It's been good but way busy. My days are really full and I don't have much time to relax unfortunately.
I'm sorry to hear that, Maybe if you can you should take some vacation time to reset yourself.
That would be great. Then I could get some things done around the house that I've been putting off.

persona: I am forty. I am a car salesman. I hate selling cars.
I am unhappily married. My divorce will be final tomorrow. My wife doesn't work. My wife takes my money.
dialogue: How do you feel after the divorce?
Although it's unfortunate that we weren't able to make the marriage work, I must say that it was quite a relief when the divorce was finalized. It felt like a weight lifted off of my shoulders.
I can imagine. There is no point staying unhappy. What are you plans now you are free?
Well, I moved into a new apartment downtown and look forward to furnishing it and decorating it and such. It's so nice to have my own space!
Nice! What colour scheme are you going to go with in your new apartment? I bet you are looking forward to splashing out some expensive items now you have all your money back.
Absolutely! I definitely plan to splurge a little bit. I would like to decorate with white and gold tones. I think it will nice very fresh and clean. How does that sound to you?
Sounds awesome! Gold always makes a room feel luxurious. Are you starting with all new furniture or were you allowed to take some from your old house?

Thanks for the feedback! I am excited about the colors. I will be getting all new furniture. A completely fresh start, That's for sure. Would you like to come shopping with me and help pick things out?
Sure, That sounds like it would be a fun day out. I am also really good at home repairs so I could come and see if we can make some nice changes to your apartment.
Wow, I would really appreciate that. Thank you so much. I would definitely pay you if you did any work on the apartment. And I would cook you dinner!
How about if the work ends up good I get a deal on a car instead? I am in need of a new car and that would be great help. The dinner would be an awesome bonus!
That's a great idea! Come by the dealership anytime and test drive a few different cars. I'll do my best to get you an awesome deal. You deserve it.

persona: I volunteer at a soup kitchen.
I like hamburgers and fried eggs. My favourite food is cheeseburgers. My first job was in McDonalds. I grew up poor.
My name is Ariel.
I like watching movies.
I like intelligent animals.
I like country music.
dialogue: Seen any more good movies lately?
Yeah. I've been following the Bridgerton series. It's so interesting.
I just finished that! It's on Netflix isn't it? I think they're making a season 2! Who was your favourite character?
I can't wait for them to release it. Do you have a pet?
Shouldn't be long now! And not yet but i'd like one. What about you?
I have a German Shepherd named Ruby. She gives me joy everyday. So intelligent a dog.
They are my favourite dogs ever! My family used to own one. They have a similar IQ to a toddler.
Yes. They say. Sometimes I feel it's even more. My dog does amazing stuffs.
I think so too. What is her best trick?
She can count!. It's very surprising that when I say the word '3' is when she she does what I want her to do.
Wow! I have never known a dog to do that. She really is special.
Ruby is special no doubt. You should get yourself a dog soon.

persona: My name is Jess.
I have my own business. I operate a dog-walking business. I plan to expand and hire more dog-walkers.
I have three pet dogs named Biscuit, Gravy, and Simone Biles, after my favorite gymnast. I feed them French fries from Burger King as a treat.
I sometimes bring my dogs to work at my dog-walking business, but it can be difficult to walk so many dogs at once. They get along well with other dogs.
I graduated from college with a degree in accounting. I enjoy math and gymnastics. I took a political science class in college that I did not enjoy.
dialogue: I got lunch at Burger King one day and thought about your dogs.
They would be so jealous! I've actually been thinking about expanding my dog-walking business to include a doggy day care; it would be awesome to have them at work with me all the time.
Oh that's great, What else do you like about your dog?

Well, I think that each of them has their own specific good qualities. Biscuit is a total lapdog, Always up for cuddle time. Gravy is a bit of a goofball and can always make me laugh, And Simone is my protective one. I don't know what I'd do without any of them.
Wow that's lovely I wish I want that pet too.

Well my offer still stands; if you would like to get out of the fast food business, You are totally welcome to pick up a part time job walking dogs with me instead. How is school going? Still struggling with that political science class?
Yes I wish It would be over because it is very boring.
What is your favorite class that you are taking right now?
My favorite one is Mathematics and I love it. What is you favorite?

Oh! I thought that math was one of your weak areas; are you liking it more as the semester progresses? When I was in college I was a fan of economics, But if I get an opportunity to go back to school I would probably take a few more classes on animal health to better my business.
Economics is also a great subject. Would you be interested in any sports activities?
I enjoy jogging and hiking, But as a spectator nothing beats a good gymnastics match. I am absolutely astounded at the amazing things some people can train their bodies to accomplish.

persona: I have been unpacking.I recently moved to the USA. I am from Romania.
I have stepchildren. I am six months pregnant with children. I do not have a job.
I speak English. My parents and grandparents are from Yorkshire. We moved to Romania when I was three.
I lived in Paris as an exchange student in high school.
I love in the USA.  I have been to Spain. Spain is my favorite place.
I am not a good cook.
dialogue: I ordered some Romanian food today!
That sounds good, If I may ask, What dish did you try?
It was a baked chicken dish with really strong spices. It was delicious!!!.
It does sound delicious, I'm happy that you liked it. Did you order Romanian food just for yourself or did someone else try it with you?
Just me. What are your favorite Romanian dishes?
I would say that my favorite dish would be sour meatball soup, I had it all the time when I was growing up. I also like dishes with Mamaliga and Mititei as well.
I will try those next! So, Have you picked a name for the baby yet?
I am still deciding on what to call them, I was thinking about Joanna or even Byni.
Pretty names! You can't go wrong with either.
Thanks, I am hoping to discuss it more with my family. I want to name my child a unique name that hasn't been used in the family.
I have full faith that you will pick the perfect name!
Thank you, I am sure I will decide on a name in time. I think traveling and living in Paris has influenced what names I am considering, As opposed to only thinking about traditional Romanian names.

persona: I love poetry. I love coffee.
I love Star Wars.
I played football in college.
I like to run.
I like to cook. I love sushi and spicy food. I am not good in making sushi.
I have a kid. I listen to fairy tales on YouTube.
I like odes and haiku.
dialogue: I learnt to cook a new spicy dish which I know my partner will like to experiment with.
What was the name of the dish.
Chicken and shrimp chimichurri. Have you ever had it?
Did you watch you tube for the recipe?
You know it! It is such a great resource.
It is... I was watching one for a coffee recipe... Looked good.. Ill have to send you the link.
Thanks!!! I will test it out and if it's good I will make it for you!
Great.... Have you made any sushi rolls lately.
Friday I made spicy tuna rolls. Those are my favorite. What's your favorite?
I love sushi, Take out only.... Im not very good at making them.
It takes some practice. Do it a few times and you will be a pro!
Im going to have to watch a few more videos to see what im doing wrong... Gotta keep trying.

persona: I am a chef. My Name is Larry. I have a restaurant.
I like fishing.
I like comic books. I enjoy snowboarding.
I don't have pets.
I have experience with job interviews.
I want a dog. I like to travel, snowboard, and fish.
dialogue: How is your restaurant doing?
It is good thank you, How is your job situation?
I am still looking for a good restaurant job. Do you have any suggestions for me?
I don't have any openings, But I can give you some advice on interviews if you like/.
Yes please, that would be great. I am also trying to decide if I want to apply at a fine dining restaurant.
We can talk about it next time. I hope you are not too stressed with finding a job - are you still finding time to play basketball?
I have plenty of time for basketball, But playing at the park doesnt cost anything, So its great for me. You finding time to fish?
Yes, I've been fishing a few times, And started reading a lot more comic books.
Where do you fish? What types of fish are you fishing for?
I fish at the lake nearby to me. I fish for anything I can find, But we always put them back.
Do you have a boat or are fishing from the shore?
I fish from the shore. I'm thinking about getting a dog to keep me company there. Have you thought any more about pets?

persona: I work at a job that has late hours. I work at Burger King part time. I go to school part time. I'm not the boss at work.
I'm trying to save money and move out. I live with my parents. I'm looking for a space to rent.
I don't drink alcohol.
I don't have any pets.
dialogue: The room is ready for you to move in.
Perfect! It will be close to my work!
Great! That means I can visit you while you are at work. I love Burger King. What is your favorite thing to get? Or are you sick of the food.
Oh I still eat it regularly, And can get you a good deal. My go to is the Whopper. Whats yours?
Mine is also the Whopper, When I was in college I lived off of Burger King.
What did you study? I am currently studying business.
I studied early education, I really want to be a grade school teacher.
That is fantastic! I imagine that would be equally trying and rewarding.
That is very true. What made you decide on business? My boyfriend studied business when he was in school.
It is quite versatile, So I feel there are more jobs and industries available to work in. What does your boyfriend do?
He's the CEO of a tech company. If he didnt get a job right after we graduated we would not have been able to afford this house.
Oh nice! The tech industry is huge right now, Good for him. Always a plus to have that to afford the house.

persona: My name is Andy. I am in aaa. I am 45 years old.
I'm taking medication. I have low energy due to the medication. My doctor assures this medication is the best for me.
I take sleeping pills. I used to have difficulties falling asleep.
dialogue: My friend Paul has placed in a few BBQ competitions and he's offered to make brisket.
That sounds delicious! Will he make some for me too?
Well you know you're invited to my BBQ next weekend. I'm sure there will be plenty of food for everyone as Paul always makes large portions.
I can't wait, Thank you for the invite and thats good because i can eat a lot!
I plan on ribs and brisket and potato salad, Chips and salsa, And anything else I can think of in the meantime. No alcohol will be served but I'll have lots of lemonade and soda.
That ok i don't drink alcohol because of my medication. Do you need me to bring anyhting?
You can bring something if you like but no worries if not. I'll probably be up all night thinking about the BBQ. I might have to take a couple pills to help me relax.
Try not to worry too much i'm sure it'll be a great success.
I guess you're right. Do you have troubles with relaxing?
Yes sometimes, I take medication to help me sleep.
Does it help? I think that's a fairly common thing to do in this day and age.
Yes! I sleep much better now but you should know! Its completely normal.

persona: I love ice cream. Chocolate is my favorite.
I love my wife and kids. I have 3 children. I work as a plumber. I am a man. My wife is in a cooking club.
My wife cooks different ethnic cuisines. My wife has more friends than I do.
dialogue: I joined my new club, And I have meet a lot of new people.
What kind of animals did you have on your farm?
It's a dairy farm, So we have lots of cows. I've made my own ice cream from the milk.
Is it an electric ice cream maker that you use or a hand crank?
It's one of those old fashioned hand cranks. It take more effort but I could use the exercise.
I used to have an old hand crank one, I got an electric kind, But it was much worse at making ice cream. I miss my old one.
You can share your ice-cream with your wife and kids. I'm hoping to meet someone to share mine with soon.
I love wife, But she is abusive so we are getting divorced.
Sorry to hear, How are you handling it?

I think I will be better in the long term, But it's hard right now, My kids really love her too, But the abuse has been going on for years. It will be hard and it breaks my heart, But I have no choice.
Sounds like it was a very difficult choice for you, But one you had to make for your own well-being. You are strong for making the tough decisions.
Thank you, Maybe I will get another hand crank ice cream maker and make some nice things to help myself have things to do and feel better. What do you do when you want to make yourself feel better?

persona: I like to ride skateboards. I injured my arm. I broke multiple bones. I ride my skateboard with my friends. I do tricks and jumps. I will start skating again when the doctor releases me.
I like hats. I have a German shepard dog. I watch skateboarding with my dog. German Shepherds are my favorite breed of dogs.
I play card games.
My friends use adult coloring books.
I have never played hockey or ice skating.
dialogue: I visited a skate park and watched some of the skaters perform quarter pipes. Looks like fun.
Trust me, It is definitely fun. Did the skaters who performed the quarter pipes seem like they had a lot of talent?
Yes! It seemed like they were professionals! When you ride skateboards with your friends do you perform quarter pipes?

Yes, Doing the quarter pipes is one of our favorite ways to do tricks and jumps, Which always draws a crowd. Is that something your character does when you play the Tony Hawk skating video games? Is it something you want to learn how to do in real life?

Thats awesome! It is something I do frequently in the Tony Hawk skating game! I would love to learn how to do it in real life but I am afraid of getting injured. Is the quarter pipe one of the tricks that has caused you to break a bone?

Yes unfortunately that is exactly what I was doing when I broke my bone. But it will not stop me from doing it even more once my bone has healed. Have you broken any bones when you are doing your ice skating? Or have you ever broken a bone in your life?
At least you are brave enough to try again once healed! How long until your doctor releases you? I have not broken a bone from ice skating, But I did break my elbow once from a different accident!

Oh no! How awful! What kind of accident was it? I've had a cast on my arm for a month so my doctor is going to take the cast off within the next month. I can't wait. So my doctor should release me from my time away from my sports very soon and I can't wait. It feels like I've been away from skating for years even though it has really only been about a month.

I bet that the month has felt much longer! I am glad to hear that you will be back to skating soon! Have you been able to spend quality time with your dog during this time? I can relate to you because when I broke my elbow it was a trampoline accident. I was jumping on a trampoline with some friends and had fallen off. It was a very painful experience! I also had a cast on my arm for 1-2 months.

Oh, So we understand each others' misery of broken bones very well it seems. You made a good point, I have definitely been able to spend more time with my dog during this time of recovery and wearing a cast. My dog is so empathetic toward my healing arm. I haven't spent much time jumping on a trampoline myself, But I always did enjoy the experience when I've done trampolining before. Do you still jump on a trampoline even after the crisis of the broken bone?

persona: I'm near retirement. I enjoy Nascar racing.
I work in a library.
I don't drink.
I live in Spain.
I have a Labrador named Jack and a Golden Retriever named Axel. My dogs like playing in water.
dialogue: My dad brought me to the race track yesterday!
No way! How was it? I would kill to go to the track right now. Its been a couple of weeks since the last time I went.
It was awesome! I hope I can go with him again soon. How are your dogs?
They are good, I took them to the dog park by my work and they decided it would be fun to run through all the water puddles by the drinking fountains.
That sounds like my Luna, She somehow finds all the puddles. She would fit right in with them.
Its all fun and good until one of them gets into the muddy water. Which always seems to happen.
Oh no, Hopefully they didn't get you all muddy too!
Only sometimes. Do you take Luna to the dog park?

Once in a while my dad and I do. She loves making friends, And it is hard to get her to leave after. Those nights she always goes right to sleep when she gets home. Did you get any new interesting books at the library?
I actually started a new series. Its called Truly Devious by Maureen Johnson.
Are you enjoying the new series?

Yeah, Its really interesting. Its about this girl who is starting at a new school and learns that soon after the founder of the school opened the school his wife and daughter were kidnapped. The new girl is determined to solve the cold case no matter what.

persona: I like watching television. I wish I had someone to watch with.
I want a husband. I live alone. I work from home. I am too busy to date.
I go to the gym.
I love pizza.
I like to buy cars. I don't build any.
I met someone. I joined a skydiving club. I met him there, he asked me on a date to Harvey's.
dialogue: How was your date at Harvey's?
It was great! we talked for hours!
I'm so glad to hear that, Are there any plans for a follow-up?
Yes we are both members of the same gym so we are going to start working out together tomorrow.
I'm so glad to hear that, Maybe you can take them skydiving with you some time haha.
Maybe not a first few dates type of thing but I hope I can talk him into it.
Oh yeah, That's definitely a strong thing to lead with, A lot of people are terrified of heights.
I don't know why more people don't try it. You have a chute and a back up. you are more likely to be killed by a cow than in a skydiving accident.
I guess it's just a lack of control thing, Not sure. I might end up skydiving on a whim, I'm losing my mind without my husband here.
Why did he have to work 3 extra days?
One of the people who worked at the company he was meeting with had a family emergency and had to delay.
Wow, I hope they are ok and I guess its good that your husband is so valuable. That's extra job security.

persona: I don't like hats.
I have three kids. I don't have any pets. I have a wife. I love my family.
Chocolate is my favorite ice cream flavor.
My wife and I love adventurous outings. We go out exploring almost every weekend. We go hiking. My wife and I love mountains.
I invested in doge coin just for fun. I own doge coin. I bought some doge coin when it first started going up and have made a few hundred dollars.
dialogue: I just joined a Meetup for singles and we are all going hiking in the mountains this weekend!
Wow! That is great! How many people are going?
I think around 20, But you never know. The trail may be a little crowded. Have you done any good hikes lately?
Might be crowded, But a good opportunity to meet someone. I recently hiked to the top of Bell Rock when we were in Arizona. Have you spent any time hiking there?
No, I haven't. How was it? Was it too hot at all?
It is beautiful. My sister lived in Sedona for a few years, So I went a lot. It was definitely hot, But not humid at all. Where will you be hiking this weekend?
Southern Utah, Near the Arizona boarder. Close to a town called Kanab. There are supposed to be some amazing slot canyons and trails there.
That sounds great. I've never been there. Have you hiked there before?

Just once. There is another trail there, Near the Arizona boarder, Called "The Wave". Have you heard of it? Unfortunately they only let a few people each day hike there, And it is on a lottery system, So I don't know if we'll do that one.

I have never heard of that one, But it must be good if there's a lottery. But you're right, Doesn't seem like you'll be doing that one. But I hope you meet someone great! Do you know any of the others going?
Just a couple of people, So I won't be meeting just new people. How's your investment in Doge going? You still holding on to it?
Oh, I'll be holding onto it for a long time. It's just for fun, So I'm just watching it to see how it does. Have you invested in crypto before?

persona: I live in Ohio. I work at a supermarket.
My favorite food is pizza with black olives.
I love cats.
My favorite band is Who. I sometimes love Pink Floyd.
I am going into education.
I enjoy running.
dialogue: I'm learning a new song on my guitar by Pink Floyd.
Awesome! Is it an easy one are harder than normal?
I just started learning online so its a little hard for me to learn. But I am getting there. Do you play any instruments?
Nah, I couldnt play an instrument to save my life. Im too uncoordinated. Hey, I wanted to ask you about that 5k you are running. Im thinking about doing one myself. Do you train alot?
Yes, I train at my high school in Chicago. What about you, Do you enjoy running?
I love running. Unfortunately, I love pizza too. If I want to start training Im going to have to cut that out.
Funny, I also love eating pizza, My go to is pepperoni. There is a awesome pizza place near the ghetto I live. Do you have a pizza preference?
I like mine with black olives. Id eat it everyday if I could. So you are in highschool? Are you planning on going to college?
I am planning to do mechanical engineering after high school, But I'm also really interested in becoming a physical therapist just like my dad. What about you?
I plan on going into education myself. I think I would like being a teacher. We need more educators here in Ohio.
Ohio is awesome, Are you currently living alone?
No, I live with my cats. Unless you meant if I live with another person and then yes, I live alone. Kinda like it that way. The cats dont complain with I play the WHO all day.

persona: I like taking baths.
I like to play Chess. I am preparing for a National Chess Tournament.
My favorite band is Mumford and Sons.
I am self-conscious about my weight. I am older than 20. I prefer cooking for myself. I used to have an alcohol problem. I like high protein foods. I eat healthy to stay sharp.
I am going to a National Chess tournament in San Francisco. I have never been to San Francisco. I am practicing all day every day to prepare.
Playing chess online helps me relax. My dad wanted to teach me chess strategy at an early age and we always played after dinner.
I have heard about Woodstock.
dialogue: Do you feel ready for the upcoming chess tournament? Be sure to let me know how it goes and how San Francisco is!
I don't how it will go but I feel prepared, And not sure about San Francisco, It is not a city where people eat a lot of meat.

I am so glad you feel prepared! You have put in a lot of hard work so, I know you are going to do great. Just make sure you get a good meal the night before and get a good night sleep. I believe in you!
Yeah, Maybe I could teach you some chess strategies? It would help me for my tournament.

I definitely am willing to help you but, I don't think I compare to any of those online chess programs you have been using. Those thing are amazing and for me impossible to beat. I don't know how you do it.
Those online tools have all the same strategies. It is easy when you know them. I could show you if you want to.

Yeah, I would love to learn. Oh by the way, I want to let you know that while I have never been to San Francisco a buddy of mine said their fusion food is to die for. I know you like cooking for yourself but, If you get a chance to go out one night you should definitely check out a fusion restaurant.
That could inspire me to learn new recipes. I was feeling a little bored with my meals lately. What is your favorite meal?
I love all kinds of food. But, I was recently introduced to sushi and now I feel like I crave it all the time. How about you what is your favorite food?
I love to cook Japanese recipes. They are really simple and tasty, You should try it.
Okay, That sounds great! Maybe you could send me one of your favorite recipes and I will let you know what I think.
Yeah, As long as you have mirin, Soy sauce,Sak and sugar, You can cook 75 % of the Japanese recipes.

persona: I have kids and three dogs.
I own a dog walking business.
My father was a salesman.
I am married to multiple women. One of my wives is a groomer.
I don't like Cuba.
I did pretty well on tests when I was in school. I'm not currently in school. I had two roommates in college.
In college I majored in illustration with a minor in Psychology.
I have a talent for drawing. I have fun drawing dogs.
dialogue: How often do you draw these days?
Not as often as I'.
That's a shame. Do you find it relaxing?

Sorry, Sent that last message by mistake! I meant to say that I don't get to draw as often as I'd like. I do find it relaxing when I can find the time. How about you? Have you found time to take your dogs on a walk?

Yes! I had to or they would have driven me crazy. Plus, One of my kids said the word "outside" and it was all over from there. Do you take commissions for your art? I am thinking about having a family portrait (including the dogs) drawn or painted.
I get that. When my pups hear me say walk or outside it is over. I don't take commissions, But I'd be happy to do a portrait. When are you thinking you need it by?
I will need to ask my husband when he has time off for all of us to be in the same place at once. It is not an easy thing to do. It was hard enough to get him to commit to going to Cuba.
Well, There's no rush. You can also send me an old picture if you have one. Whatever works for you is fine for me. Do you want to send me one and I can do a first draft?
That sounds wonderful. I have a picture of all of us, But I had a cast on my arm from when I broke it skiing.
I can definitely paint that out! Can I send you something in the next couple of weeks?

That sounds great! I wish I could paint out imperfections in real life! Would you like to email me? Our local post office here in small town Indiana sometimes doesn't get the mail to us in a timely manner - especially if the weather isn't good.
Painting imperfections out in real life would be incredible. I'll send you an email with some details for what I need from the file. The post office here isn't great either!

persona: I do not like people. I like animals. I have lots of cats. I like bird watching with my cats. I am an animal activist.
I hate the holidays because they make me depressed.
I'm part of PETA and really care for their cause.
i have compassion for animals at the humane shelter.
I love wine. Cabernet Sauvignon is my favorite wine. I only drink white wine at dinner with fish and chicken dishes.
I like my coffee sweet and smooth. I only drink one cup of coffee a day in the morning. Caffeine keeps me awake. I tried chewing tobacco once and didnt like it.
dialogue: I tried a new coffee I picked up from the store recently, I want to tell you about it.
That's great I love coffee too. What have you tried?

It was a new organic one we found at the store. It will say it really helped and it felt like I had more energy than the coffee I was previously using. The flavor was different but in a good way, I think I'm going to stick with it for a while. Have you had any new coffee?
I had an Chinese one which tastes good and it contains some herbs to which makes us feel fresh.
Oh nice, I'll have to look for that kind. Did it give you more energy throughout the day?
Yes It keeps me active throughout my whole day. Do like any other drinks?

I have tried to a new wine that had a little coffee infusion in it. It was different and I don't think I liked it. I prefer my wine to help me fall asleep as night and wind me down. Have you tried any new wines or other drinks yourself?
I have tried an asian drink called Tea which works as well as coffee but with more energy concentration and it doesn't have caffeine which is bad to health.

Yeah true, I should probably try to steer away from so much caffeine, It's hard though when I'm chasing all my kids around all day. I feel like I need to try some alternatives to help with my health but not so much caffeine. Do you have a Tea or flavor that you enjoy?
I like herbal tea because it keeps me active and keeps my mind calm and good.

Oh nice, Yeah I'm gonna have to go pick some up next time I go to the store! I can't wait to try some. If it helps you when you have all those cats and animals to take care of, Maybe it'll help me with my kids haha.
Yes I hope you like it.

persona: I like coffee and wine.
I have a mini van.
I have five boys. My last son has just gone to college.
I won my last game. my next game is next Tuesday, depending on the weather. I coach a kids team.
I leave work early in order to coach. I enjoy coaching the kids.
dialogue: How long have you been coaching kids?
Ive been coaching kids for 5 years now. Its so much fun.
That's awesome, Do they pay you to couch or is it a volunteer sort of thing?
It started as volunteer and now its paid. Its not much but it helps. Even though I love it so much I would do it for free. Don't tell them that though.
I understand haha, That's very altruistic of you. Do you have any children in particular that stick out as being excellent players?
I have a few that really excel. I see NHL all stars in their futures. But there are some that still need work. I can tell they don't take it as seriously as they should.
Yeah, There's nothing wrong with that though, Some people just play the sport for fun.
I am all for having fun, And they are, But there are a few that dont want to be team players and slack off. I want them to do well but I just cant seem to motivate them. Do you have any ideas?
I wish I did, My parents were both really into sports but I wasn't so much, I think some people just don't have the drive and there's nothing you can do to instill it in them.
I know their parent want them there and I really want them to do their best. I wish i could talk to their parents about it and not sound too harsh.
I'm sure there's some way you can bring it up that's both appropriate at getting your point across, And doesn't sound too harsh, Just be honest with them.
Ill give that a try. but enough about me. How have you been doing?

persona: I'm currently pregnant with triplets. I'm married and my husband has a child. I have one step child.
I'm new to this country. I'm from China.
I'm a teacher in my neighborhood.
I enjoy American Jazz.
dialogue: Have you written any new songs?
Hey! I've just written a new jazz song, You should listen to it sometime.
I really enjoy jazzy music, I'd love to hear it! Have you recorded it yet?
Not yet it's in the early stages. I'd love to record it in a studio but they're expensive to hire.
That's understandable, Once you do get a chance to record it I'd love to hear it! I'm working on a song right now but it's a bit more bluesy, Although it has some jazzy elements too.
You should play it for me, Id love to hear it. I like blues music.
I definitely could some time, I have a bit of a home studio, Nothing professional but enough to record songs at a decent quality.
Wow really? Would i be able to use it sometime? We should record a sing toghether.
That's certainly possible, I have several audio interfaces so we can record quite a few instruments, And our voices of course!
This could be the start of something big! Do you sing too?
I'm not the best singer, I usually focus on playing instruments and producing music.
I can sing if you play the instruments!

persona: I'm more into music than books. I like Britney Spears.
I'm focused on my diet. I don't make tea.
I own a tanning bed.
I drink tea.
I have trouble sleeping.
dialogue: I have found new herbal tea flavors.
Nice. I bet you'll enjoy the new flavors. I'm not much of a tea drinker.
Oh, I need tea in the morning. What do you drink instead?
Coffee occasionally. I'm really into my diet so I try to watch what I eat and drink.
Got it. I don't drink much coffee either. What else are you focusing on for your diet? I stopped eating meat a while ago and it's been great.
I don't eat much meat either. I focus on vegetables, Beans and grains.
Got it. I'm similar. You should try some valerian root. It might help you sleep. How have you been sleeping lately?
I do have some trouble sleeping at times. I'm not familiar with valerian root but will certainly give it a try.
I highly suggest it. It is an herb that helps a lot of people. I know you don't like tea, But there are also some really good teas to help you fall asleep. Have you ever tried chamomile?
Many years ago I did try chamomile but it didn't set well with my stomach. Most teas cause me issues so I typically stay away from them.
I see. Maybe you can try some music? Have you listened to anything new lately?
I do listen to music from time to time and still enjoy my Britney Spears albums.

persona: I do not like going outside.
I like the colors red and silver. I have a house that is decorated in red and silver.
I was a game designer who helped to make starcraft.
I know how to build robots.
I am a streamer. I have an active twitch channel.
I know about interior design.
dialogue: I bought some new games for my computer.
Oh cool, What did you get?
I got warcrafts latest expansion.
Ha, Does that count as a new game!? You said games, What else did you get? Anything new and exciting?
Well when they revamp everything yeah! Ha. I also got a few Warhammer old rts games i never played. For new though i got the new pokemon snap to play with my boyfriend.
I have not seen Pokemon Snap, Do you have to play it outside likePokemon Go?
No. Its based on a track you kinda ride this machine while taking pictures. Like a slow roller coaster.
Ok, That sounds interesting. Im trying to think of new games to play on twitch channel, What games would you enjoy watching someone else play on twitch?
To be honest id rather be experiencing the games and not watching them.
Fair enough, I enjoy both. When im not gaming i enjoy watching people play, But it has to be the right game! Im thinking about doing GTA V role play.
Well there is so much going on in that game, I think that one deserves a watch ha!
Iv seen a few other people play it RP (role play) and it loosk so much fun playing as the police, Riding around arresting people!

persona: I have cats. I am an animal activist.
I hate pumpkins. I hate trees. I do not like holidays.
I want a moon pie.
I watched the movie Napoleon Dynamite.
I try to watch baseball but it is too slow for me. I'd rather watch football.
I am getting older and it is hard to stay active.
dialogue: My office just entered a softball tournament this summer.
Oh awesome, What position do you play?
I am a pitcher! What sort of sports do you like to play?
Football is my favorite really, Though i spend a lot of time hiking with my dogs.
I do not have any pets but I would like to. I like hiking though!
Yeah i have tones of cats, The dogs i take are rescues, I love animals!
That's so cool! I really want a dog. How old is your oldest pet?
Got an old girl whos pushing 20 right now. They love til the end.
Aw, She sounds really sweet. Pets seem like such good companions. I think my dad should get a cat to keep him company when he's missing my mom.
Yeah that would be a great idea. Ive seen some tough military men melt with their pets heh.
I really think he would! If it's anything like how he acts around babies, I think he'd have a real soft spot for a cat.
Maybe you should come down to the shelter some time. I can show you around!

persona: I have a chronic fear of heights.
I am a party animal. I like to stay home.
I watched a movie called mean girls.
I have cats and dogs. I spend a lot of time with each and put them in time out when they don't behave. I have 3 dogs: a lab, pitbull and a chihuahua.
I like cats and dogs equally. All my pets are rescues. I love calico cats.
I wish I had a bigger house to adopt more animals.
dialogue: I did some research and I think I will get a larger service dog to help in case I have another heart attack.
Well after having so many, I can understand wanting to take all the precautions you can. Are you worried the dog won't get along with your cat?
I am more worried about all of my fatal heart attacks! What is going on there. You'd think I would be pretty dead by now but I guess I am heart attack proof.
Yes, I guess 'fatal' has a new meaning, But I am glad you are here to be able to adopt all of the stray cats in your city. Just make sure your service dog doesn't enjoy chasing cats... Or worse.
Ha! I hope my dog gets along with the cats. Otherwise my cats may organize and take out the dog.
If you end up getting the 50+ you'd like to have, A gang of cats shouldn't be a problem! You could probably even use them to take out the Russians that are after you.
Yeah. Those guys are the worst. They made me crash! If I get cats like garfield though, My lasagna budget will be sky high!

Well, If you cats like the one you had that swallowed the other cat whole, You may not need to buy food for them at all. You have had a lot of wild things happen in your life. You should write a book.
I should. Hopefully before my next fatal heart attack. Time is running out!
If you can survive fatal heart attacks and the Russian mob, You may just be immortal. Do you let your animals in your BMW?
Sure. I usually will only take like 5 cats with me on the road though. I mean I am not some crazy cat lady... 5 is the max you can safely take in a car without a brawl breaking out.

Are these just the cats you pick up from around town so they can have a little cat field trip? Does your cat not get jealous when it smells all the other cats on you? Maybe one day you'll get that huge house and can bring them all home.

persona: I like being indoors.
My ex left me. I am 46.
I live in California. I was born in Compton, California.
I went to College in Georgia.
I have a recording studio. I work in the recording industry.
dialogue: I was watching a documentary about southern California this afternoon.
Oh cool! What did it cover?
It was about life in socal. You're from Compton. What is it like?
It was wild growing up we lived in constant fear but we made it through. Where are you from?
I am from Chicago. I now live in the suburbs by myself. It's kind of lonely but good for my mental health.
Thats good, What are you up to these days?
Not much. Just got divorced. My ex said I didn't listent o her, Or something like that.
Women, They can make or break a man. Just keep your head up king.
Yeah. I will miss my kids though. Are you married?
Yeah, 12 years now. How often do you see your kids now a days?
Almost every weekend. I feel like it is important to be in their lives. Just because we ended the marriage doesn't mean we can't be friendly.

Exactly keeping a relationship with your children and your ex is very important for your kids mental health. If you don't mind me asking, Why are you an atheist? Is it because of the negative things happening in your life or were you never a believer?

persona: I might go to business school next year. I earned a finance degree at Yale in 2011.
I'd like to become a wealthy banker. Both of my parents are wealthy bankers. I never had to pay for college since my parents are so wealthy.
My name is Josie. I'm from Manhattan. I'm interested in moving out.
I love thai food and pizza. I like cookies. I like live music.
dialogue: Did you hear back from the school about your application yet?
Not yet. I hope to hear back shortly. How is school going for you?
School is so stressful right now. We are nearing finals and i am studying liek crazy.
That's good though. How is work going? That has to be extra stress too.
You have no idea... The bars get very crowded on the weekends and im always getting hit on by old dudes and its gross. But they tip very well if i play back haha.
Good for you! Get yours! If you have to put up with them, You should get extra money! That's a "ichy and gross" ta!
I know! The bag is just stacking. What do you do with your finance degree?
I am in banking. I work for a large multinational but it's pretty entry level. I want to move my way up but need my masters for that.
That sounds exciting are you getting a masters in finance or are you getting a MBA?
I feel like an MBA would make me more well rounded but I think a concentration in finance would show my dedication to the field. What would you suggest?

An MBA might help you out with moving in any field within the company while the Masters will just get you further up in the finance part. But at the end of the day both degrees will help you move up. Just depends more on what you want to focus on. But there is a finance based MBA.
That finance based MBA sounds amazing. I will have to check that out. What are you getting your degree in?

persona: I like country music.
I work with my mom on a farm.
I used to be an electrician. I wish I was a model. I'm too old to be a model. I am pretty. I am poor.
I have been to Yosemite.
dialogue: Oh my god - I actually got to meet Tony Hawk!
Did you meet Tony Hawk while promoting his video game? I have never met a celebrity, That is so cool!
I did. He was really cool. Totally unassuming. You would like him!
Is he one of your favorite skateboarders? Do you do a lot of tricks on your own skateboard?
He is one of my favs! I like to ride but I just broke my arm so I had to put the board up for a while. Do you skate?
I do not, I am very clumsy. I am sure I would break an arm as well if I skated. I wish I could model and do photoshoots like you do, But I am getting a little too old to do it.
You're never too old! There's always stuff you can model. I know models that are like 75 years old. It's about what you promote not your age.
I suppose that is true. I love country music, So maybe I could model country clothes for older people? I work on a farm and that takes up a lot of my time right now.
You're the perfect demographic for that type of modeling! You would be great!
Thanks! I work really hard on the farm so I stay in good shape. I have to get up early to milk the cows and clean the stalls. It's good exercise. I am sure skateboarding keeps you in shape too.
It's ok. I usually just get 30 mins a day in but I am trying to carve out more time for it.
Now that you have a broken arm are you still going to be able to model or are you going to take a break for awhile? Maybe do some traveling?

persona: I have a cow named Bessie.
I drive a large pickup truck.
I work at my mom and dad's farm. I'm adventurous. I live across from a farm. I have a fence on my property.
Country is my favorite music.
I like Nascar.
dialogue: Does your pet have any friends?
My cow Bessie is one of about 50 cows we have on our farm. I play country music for them while I milk them.
That's so fun. Do they respond to different types of music?
I think country music soothes them and makes it easier to milk them. Have you ever milked cows before?
No I haven't... Well I did when I was like 7 at some schoo field trip. Who's your favorite country artist?
I am a fan of Garth Brooks, And Carrie Underwood. Do you like country music too, Or another type of music?
I like country. I am a new fan but I like Eric Church. Been into his stuff for some time now.
I have not heard of him. Almost everyone around here listens to country music. I guess when you live on a farm, Country music seems to fit the atmosphere.
Yeah. That makes sense. How many people work on your farm?
Just family, My mom and dad and a few other family members. We have cows, And a few other animals and a big garden.
That sound like fun. I wish I was closer to my family. Do you have any crops? Or just animals?
I grow lots of corn for the cows to eat. I also load up my pick up truck with corn and take it to the farmers market.

persona: My name is Nancy.
I'm in school. I am the youngest in my family and spoiled. I have 4 siblings.
I have a dog. My dog is sick right now and is unhappy, but is getting better.
I visited a bee farm. I am very interested in bees. I am very curious about bees.
dialogue: I just rescued a around 20, 000 bees from a nearby farm.
Oh my! That is tremendous. How did you go about rescuing so many?
I found the queen bee and let the worker bees find the queen. It was pretty easy once you find the queen. Do you have any pets?
That is awesome. I'd love to hear more about the bees sometime. And yes, I have a dog! She is a two year old pug named Peaches.
What a great pug name. How long have you had her?
I got her as a puppy. She was the cutest and chubbiest little thing. She loves going for walks and playing at the dog park near our house. Maybe you could meet us there sometime!
That would be so much fun. What do you like to do in your spare time?
I like to practice yoga, Play piano, And read fictional novels. I've also taken a real interest in bees lately and have been reading a little bit about them. What about yourself?
I like to work on my bee hives. If you want to meet sometime, I would love to talk to you about bees. I am pretty knowledgable about them.
I would love to do that! How long have you been working with bees?
Since I was young. I liked the honey and then it just developed into a passion.
Yum, I love honey too. I love buying locally sourced honey from the farmer's market in my area. It just tastes so much better.

persona: My husband is a doctor.
I play tennis.
I live in a three-story house. My husband pays all of the house bills.
I like natural healing.
I have researched natural healing methods.
I am taking a break from tennis. I am busy training my pet dog. I have taught my dog sit, stay, and heel.I learned how to train dog from the show Dog Whisperer with Cesar Milan.
dialogue: I watched the show Dog Whisperer with Cesar Milan.
I love that show so much. It has taught me good tips for training my dog.
I agree, It has helped me so much with training my dog as well. We have made a lot of progress since I rescued him.
What is the most important thing that you have learned from him so far?
Probably getting Luna to say, Even when there are tempting things she likes nearby, Like tennis balls!
I still have that issue with my dog. She does not want to ignore the toys.
Some dogs it just take more time. Toys can be hard to ignore for sure!
I'm hoping it'll get better! I'll have to ask for your help probably with tips and tricks.
Always happy to help! My dog is very treat motivated, So that has helped. I just have to make sure she gets plenty of exercise when she is getting extras.
I love taking them to the park to let them get their energy out. It's so effective!
It does help a lot! The dog park always tires mine out.
I love seeing them make new friends too. It's so good for socialization.

persona: I survived cancer. I am a healthy eater, which I think helped me overcome cancer.
I love to run. I am preparing for a marathon. I don't like running when its hot.
I just got a new job as a life coach. I love my work as a life coach.
I use a mantra to help me run marathons. My mantra when running is "Not dead, can't quit".
dialogue: I was practicing running the other day, And I think I was able to think of a mantra. I think it helped me run a bit better, But I want to discuss it with you to see if there's anything about it that I can improve for the next run.
That sounds wonderful! What is the mantra you thought of?
My mantra is "Deep breaths and quick legs!" it isn't as good as yours, But it works!

I like that! Anything that fits you and keeps you going is a great mantra! Running in this heat may make me change my mantra to "Am dead. Have to quit." I am thinking of taking a vacation to somewhere cooler. Running relaxes me, But it's hard to relax when I'm sweating profusely.
Haha! I am not sure I know any life coaches who have a mantra of "have to quit", Very funny! Where would you go for vacation if you could go anywhere?

Haha, For sure! But I can't be a life coach if I'm not alive anymore, And I am not a big fan of hot weather. I think I'd like to go to Maine or perhaps somewhere in the Pacific Northwest. Both places have some excellent seafood I can use to make some healthy dishes.

Very good point! I am trying to think of somewhere to go while School is out in July and August. I want to stay healthy while on vacation so I can stay prepared for my 5k. Maybe you could send some healthy recipes my way?
I would love to! Do you like to cook healthy recipes often? I love junk food, But I almost never eat it. I hate to run for miles and then immediately counter it with just a tiny bit of fried food.

I do not cook much at all, Actually! I eat at a lot of the dining halls at my school. I need to start cooking for myself soon though so I am won't eat out all the time once I graduate. My weakness is pizza. I need to find a healthy alternative to pizza!
I love pizza! Cauliflower crust is a great alternative, But the good ones can be a bit pricey. Do you live on campus?
Cauliflower?! That does not sounds good, But I will definitely give it a try. I do live on Campus, It has a beautiful running trail but I am ready to graduate.

You just reminded me that there is an indoor running "trail" at my local health club. Maybe I will need to get a membership so I can run in the air conditioning. I never lived on campus for school. I feel like I may have missed out on some good and interesting life experiences.

persona: I am in the sky. I have powers.
I am 5.
I love cookies & cream and rocky road ice cream, and anything with fudge on top.
I want to plan fun for the future.
dialogue: I plan to go to the ice cream shop on Main Street this weekend.
I love ice cream! My mom just bought me rocky road ice cream. Do you think you will get their fudge?
I think I will get ice cream tonight and fudge to take home for tomorrow. How was the rocky road ice cream?

That sounds like a perfect idea. The rocky road ice cream was DELICIOUS. I had to share it with the rest of the family, But I would have eaten the whole thing myself if I could. Are you going to take your kids with you?
I wouldn't be able to go without them! They have a great play ground in the back that they love to play on. Do you have a favorite play ground?
I love parks. I bet I would be good friends with your kids. Do they have superpowers too? I love all play grounds.
Yes they each have a different super power! Have you used your super power lately?
I use my superpower daily. Once you get used to flying different places, It is hard to start just walking again. What are your kids super powers?
One is invisible, One can fly, And one can move things with his mind.
Wow! I have never met another person who can fly, I am so excited! I bet invisibility can make parenting a bit difficult though.
Yes he loves to disappear when something goes wrong! I think flying would be the super power that I would want.
They must have inherited their superpowers from your wife then, If you cannot fly?

persona: I hate the color orange.
I work at a bookshop. I like to read books about dogs.
I major in Chemistry.
When it's quiet I usually read some of the dog books or brush up on the sciences. I read "Dog Years: A memoir".
I have two copies of threc book in stock.
dialogue: Do you have any pets since you love dogs so much?
I do have a dog, She's a labradoodle named Leah. She's quite a handful but so very sweet. Do you have any pets?
Labradoodles are great! I have a dog as well - a chocolate lab. He's a good boy, But also a handful. Do you ever take Leah to the dog park?
We don't have a dark park close but I wish we did. How has work been going for you?
Work is going well - people have been very generous lately with the tips! How about for you - any new book recommendations from the book store?
I'm so glad to hear that. We actually had a busy weekend at work. We had an author come in for a book reading and that brought in a lot of new customers.
Well that's great! Had you read the author's book previously?

I had not. She only read a part of the book though, So I brought home a copy so I could finish. It's seems very interesting, It's a murder mystery novel. Have you had any time to ride your motorcycle or race lately?
Oh, I enjoy a good murder mystery as well! I have ridden my motorcycle lately. I won't be riding for a while, Though... I fell off and broke my leg!
Oh no! I'm sorry to hear that. I bet that must make work really tough for you. Do you have crutches to help you get around?

It's been an adjustment, But I think it has been helping with the sympathy tips! Actually, They gave me on of those scooters where you put one leg up and roll around, So carrying trays is a bit easier since it has a crate.
I didn't think about sympathy tips, Haha! That's awesome. It's stinks that you broke you're leg, But I guess silver lining you know? I'm sorry you'll miss that race next month.

persona: My name is Dirk. I do not have children. I live in the US.
I have not read any books lately.
I love movies, my favorite is Forrest Gump. I like Star Wars. I like books.
I have a girlfriend. We are thinking about having a baby.
I listen to audiobooks.
dialogue: We decided on a theme for the nursery! It's going to be Noah's Ark themed!
That's really good to hear! Noah's Ark is a great theme. How far along are you?
We've barely started, We found a good crib that sort of resembles an ark, We're looking at some good wallpapers for now.
I'm glad you found one that works with your theme. How was your ultrasound, If you don't mind me asking? Do you know if you're expected a girl or boy?
Everything went well, We're not far along enough to know the gender, We're not sure if we want to know before the birth or have it be a surprise yet.
When my sister was pregnant, She had a gender reveal party and that was super exciting. How is your new job going?
It's been really good so far, It took a while to find a place hiring a PA so I'm thrilled I finally found one.
I'm happy for you. What is a PA and what does that work entail?
I'm a physician assistant, I essentially prescribe medications and diagnose illnesses with patients.
So you get to help people, That sounds like a rewarding job. I'm an elementary school teacher. I really enjoy working with the children. Have you watched any good movies recently?
Between the pregnancy, And work I've just been too busy to really bother with any movies, I still try to read a few chapters of this new book I got each night though.
I can understand that. I haven't really had time to watch any either. Reading is an awesome downtime hobby though and it helps me fall asleep easier at night.

persona: I like animals. I have a dog and a cat.
I like to party and watch movies. My favorite movies are comedies. Mean Girl is my favorite movie. I like 21 Jump street an Oceans 8.
I volunteer at the food bank.
I'm scared of heights. I'm trying to get over my fear of heights. I like rollercoasters.
I love pasta. I'm opening a pasta restaurant.
I'm allergic to apples, pears and pineapples.
dialogue: After we finish at the foodbank on Saturday, Do you want to catch a movie?
Sounds like a great plan! What movie did you have in mind?
Something with a strong female lead would be great, Still thinking about the options. Was thinking of that new Oscar movie Nomadland recently, Love that actress!
I've heard that got great reviews. I'll have to check out the Rottentomatoes review on it. Whatever you decide is fine with me.
It is really nice to hear you be open like that, Thank you for trusting my choice! Although I just like the experience many times, The movie is just part of it. How are your pets?
I'm pretty easy to get along with haha and I'm always up for learning more and expanding my interest. They're good! Thanks for asking.
It's really good to feel summer getting closer, And I have a few hikes in mind. We can also check out a comedy, If you want.
Comedies are some of my favorite movies! Laughing really is the best medicine.
Have to agree with you there, Laughter is good for the soul. Let me know if you have any preferences for where we see movies, Etc.
In town at the mall theater is good with me if it is with you.
That can be the easiest, It's kind of in a centrally located place. Also, There's other shops if needed. Wonder if that mall has a kitchen shop.
I'm not sure, But I'm down for some shopping after the movie.

persona: I sell cars for a living. I don't like selling cars but I like seeing supercars.
I love music. I love my wife but I sometimes think about divorce.
I am forty years old.
Monopoly is my favorite board game.
I love reality TV shows. My favorite reality show is Housewives of New Jersey.
I love Florida. I used to have a job in Florida as a used car salesperson.
I lived and worked in Miami. I think Miami beach can get crowded. I don't like crowds.
dialogue: I passed a car show today and thought about you selling cars in Miami.
Oh, That's nice. I'd love to get to a car show. Did you see any of the cars?
No Id didn't have time to stop, But if it is still going on tomorrow I might.
Let me know how it is if you get there! Are you still planning on coming to Florida?
Yes I'm planning a trip in September but thinking that I might switch to Naples, Since you mentioned Miami can get crowded. How about you, Planning any vacations?
Naples is a great spot. I don't have any vacations planned now, But I really should take one. Any suggestions? I'd love to spend some time in the northeast.
I think if you are going to take your wife then New York would be really fun!
I've never been to NYC. I bet it would be a great trip. Have you been before?
Yes I went a few years ago with my sister, My brother lived there so we were able to stay in his apartment. I think December is a good time to go.
It's not too cold that time of year? I'm not used to winter!
It can be chilly but the Christmas decorations are so nice, And if it snows it really is majical.
That sounds really great. Maybe I'll do it. Let me know if you want any recommendations for Naples.

persona: I am a beekeeper. My wife is a supermodel. My wife is from Italy. I am a stay at home dad.
My name is George.
I like papaya.
I am not close to my family.
I have 2 kids and they are both boys. I have a five year old and an eight year old.
I keep Italian honeybees. I own bee hives and gather fresh honey from them. I do not own a dog. My wife is allergic to both dogs and cats.
dialogue: It was so great hanging out the other day. Your boys really enjoyed playing with my dogs and thank you so much for that fresh honey. Did you enjoy that new restaurant we ate at?

Mostly, Yes. The service was not great, But I imagine they'll work out the kinks as time goes by. Plus, They had decent Italian options, My favorite. My boys have been begging me for a new dog since we hung out.
Really? What have they said? Any breed in specific?
Well a husky of course, But we will need to look into hypoallergenic breeds since my wife is allergic. I'm not sure since I stay at home. That means I will end up doing most of the care.
Maybe you can adopt an older dog that will be trained already? That way it will be less work for you. What do you think?
That is a wonderful idea! Thinking outside of the box must help you sell homes too -- always a solution for a perceived complaint!
Yes absolutely. Actually, I have an open house this weekend. Do you want to stop by?
Maybe! I need to tend to the bees over the weekend once Sue gets home from traveling for work. I admire what you do. I think I would have a hard time in a commission-based industry.
I don't think so, I think you would do great. Where is Sue this week?
She is in New York this week, But she'll be home in a couple of days. We are thinking of planning a trip to Italy to see her family. I haven't met them.
Oh that will be great! I am sure you will have a nice time. Where in New York is she?
She is in midtown on a shoot. I'm nervous to meet her family, And they don't speak English. I don't speak Italian, But she's trying to teach me.

persona: I am a senior in high school. I am the homecoming queen.
I volunteer at the animal shelter. I have volunteered with Habitat for Humanity.
I am an introvert. I do not have a lot of friends. I don't go out much.  I don't interact well in person. I wish I could interact with alot of people.
I would like to be a physical therapist. I am going to college to be a physical therapist.
I will be graduating high school this May.  I am in the top ten of my class. I am starting school this summer.
dialogue: Are you going to have a graduation party this May?
I'm not sure yet. Since I don't do very well in large groups a party might be overwhelming for me.
That makes sense. Don't feel pressured to have a party just because other people do. It's your graduation, Do whatever makes you most comfortable!
Thank you, I wish I could be more of an extrovert like you... Have you always been outgoing?
Yes, My whole life. But it's just different for different people. There's a great book called Quiet about the power of introverts. You should read it!
That sounds very interesting, I'll look into it. Did you enjoy volunteering at the homeless shelter?
I love it. You feel like you're making such a big difference. And so many people there are introverts! You should come if you want.
I would love to! I very much enjoyed volunteering at the Habitat for Humanity so that sounds right up my alley.
Oh you'll love it for sure. It will look great when applying to colleges, Too.
That's true, Maybe I can get some pointers from your best friend since I too am going to be a Physical Therapist.
Good idea. I'll drop a text and see if we can all find a time that works best for us. I'll give you a ride too. We generally go on weekend evenings if that works for you?
That sounds great! Hopefully he won't think I'm weird since I'm so shy.

persona: I have grey hair.
The place I live allows pets.
I am in jail because of stealing a cat from the pet store and I have one month left.
I want to eat a good, home cooked meal.  I do not like the food in jail.
I have a PO Box for my mail.
dialogue: I am almost finished redecorating my kitchen and I'm excited to move on to the living room next.
Yeah bet it looks great I wish I could redocorate my cell here would be nice.
I can imagine must be boring looking at the same old walls everyday.
Yeah it is what I would give to spruce it up a bit and have a good home cooked meal.
I would cook something for you but being in there not much I can do for you never mind though only a month and you will be out.
Yeah hopefully will go quick for me now. Once i'm out and get a place maybe I could do some decorating then.
You can come help me with mine if i'm not finished by then haha.
Yeah why not and you could cook me that good home made meal.
Sounds like we have a deal there then.
Yeah what colour are you planing on painting your front room?
I want to go cream fudge in my front room and do laminate flooring would look nice.
Yeah does sound nice maybe I could help you lay the laminate floor.

persona: I have two dogs. One is Springer Spaniel and the other a Lab. I rescued them both. My dogs fight over food.
I work as a mechanic. I have fun as a mechanic.
I am a single man. I do not like being alone. I am 35 years old. I like to go to bars sometimes.
My dogs do not like to be separated from me. My dogs seem to have insight into people.
dialogue: I was at the dog park with my dogs and met someone that my dogs seemed to hit it off with. We are going on a lunch date this week.
That's so great to hear! Are you excited or nervous? Where did you plan to go for the date?
There is a local cafe nearby that we plan to go to. They allow dogs to sit with you at the outdoor table so we can are going to bring them and then head to the dog park again.
That sounds nice. What kind of dog(s) does your date have?
He has a golden retriever, It is such a friendly dog. I am really looking forward to the date. Do you like to go to the dog park?
Yes, It's one of my favorite places to go. I enjoy chatting with the locals. I've met some very interesting people there.
I agree, It is a great place to meet new people. How is work going?

Work has been pretty busy lately. We have a lot of people bringing their vehicles in for maintenance work before their summer vacations. I remember you saying that you don't work. Are you happily unemployed or looking for work?
Yes, I actually freelance right now and will probably look for a job once my current projects are finished. I am hoping for something remote so I can stay at home with my dogs.
Freelance work is great, I do some from time to time also. Do you have any ideas for what type of remote work interests you?
Yes, I would like to do content creation or graphic design. Those are both things I studied in college and have experience with.
It's good that you already have a plan. I wish you well on your job search. I'm sure you're pups will appreciate you being home with them everyday.

persona: I live in Florida.
I work finance too. I would like to attend business school. I hope my son enjoys finance as well.
I like american sports.
I have a grey female poodle. My poodle is hypoallergenic. My wife is allergic to dogs.
I got my dog from a pet store.
My dog is fussy. My dog is good with kids.
I have two daughters and one son. My daughters are twins. My twins have opposite personalities.
dialogue: What is the age difference of your son and twin daughters?
They are four years apart!
How fun! I am sure they keep you and your wife busy.
They are loads of fun, But yes! I think busy has become our middle name around here.
Keeps things interesting. I hope to have kids some day. What is your favorite part of being a parent?
Hopefully you will! I would say watching them explore and learn. Just the awe of kids as they take everything in.
I am sure that is amazing. Do you find it hard to juggle your career and raising kids?
For sure, There is def a delicate balance. I think I'm going to have to wait till they are older to pursue buisness school.
I am sure the wait will be worth it. Does your wife work or stay home with the kiddos?
She stays home with them. She's always wanted to be a stay at home mom plus it just makes more since finanically for us.
I could see how that would make the most sense. I like the idea of a parent being there for the kids. Living in Florida, I am sure your kids enjoy the beach!
We all love it to be honest! We get to the beach at least twice a month if not more. The kids think we're rich, Haha little do they know we just don't live very far away.

persona: I volunteer at a soup kitchen.
I was not wealthy when i was growing up.
I am retired. I was a gym teacher.
I am from Chicago. I like to cook.
