I used to play some guitar but other interests took over. What kind of guitar do you have?
I have an acoustic and an electric guitar. I play all kinds of music.

persona: My name is Mandi. I hate heights.
I don't have a job. I volunteer at a food bank. I need a job.
I love to party. I have lenient parents.
I have a cat named gizmo and a dog named dixie. I have a fox terrier that is hyper.
dialogue: Would you ever want to walk our dogs together sometime?
I don't know if that's a good idea. My dog can be super crazy around other dogs.
Is your dog playful or is he not a fan of other animals, Though? If he's just playful it's fine!
No,Dixie is really hyper and like to jump around. She tends to scare other dogs.

My dog is pretty chill; i bet they'd get along. He's only protective if another animal gets aggressive. Maybe the could get some energy out together. :-) You have a cat too, Right? What's your cat like? Does it get along with the dog?
Yeah, My cat Gizmo doesn't get along with the dog. He mostly hides whenDixie is in the same room.
Terriers can be hunters, So that makes sense. Probably makes the kitty nervous. Did you adopt your pup or is he purebred? You mentioned he's a fox terrier.
We rescuedDixie last year. We've tried training programs but so far no luck.
Yeah, I had a terrier once. They're hard to train! Spirited and stubborn but so smart. DoesDixie like to do tricks or do any fun stuff like that? My old jack russel loved to do things to impress.
No tricks. What kinds of tricks did you dog do?

He used to flip treats off his nose and catch them, Would bark if you said the names of people he didn't like / bad historical identities, And he also liked to try to fold blankets to lay on them. He'd grab one corner and walk it to the other and repeat the process until he had alittle pile!
Oh, That's so cute! I wish I could have seen that!

persona: I am a dog trainer. I have sisters that I opened a service with. I have 3 older sisters and one younger brother.
I love motorbikes. I go to Alabama for a festival every year that is near my house. I live in Alabama.
I went to a motorbike festival in Alabama and it was great!.
dialogue: I went riding on my motorbike over the weekend. Although my parents make me wear a helmet, I had so much fun!
Did you wear a helmet when you played for the Saints?
Of course. That's mandatory for safety reasons. Wouldn't want a concussion, Right?? Lol. When riding my motorbike though, I.
Mandatory? I thought they let let females on the team play without helmets.
Required. Anyway, Sorry I accidentally sent that last one before I was done typing. When riding my motorbike, I like to feel the wind on my face! That's why I'd rather ride without one.
Of course it is a little dangerous, But not as dangerous as playing in the NFL. What position did you play for the Saints?
I was a punter. I've always had strong legs. I played soccer for a while, But really prefer football. Do you play sports?
Yes I was quarterback for the NY football Giants for 3 years in the 80's. I always wore a helmet.
Really? That's AWESOME! How was your experience? Did you love it???.
Yes, I sure did! It taught to love being a dog trainer.
Do you live in new york now?
No, I still live in York, Which is near Cuba. Where do you live?

persona: I don't have any children. I can drive. I have an Nissan Pathfinder car.
I love Taylor Swift and her music. I have been to Nashville. I met Taylor Swift in a starstruck bathroom in Nashville.
I can be shy. My hair is cut short and is mouse brown in colour.
I am in high school. I have fun.
dialogue: Have you decide where to head to this weekend. Wherever it is, You should listen to Taylor on the way.
I am going to Disney. Can't wait. And of course Taylor will be playing on the way there.
Oh wow! Disney sounds like so much fun. I want to take the boys some day. I've never been. Have you been before?
Yes. It is something al ot of the kids in my high school like to go to. Have you been?
No, Like I said, I've never been. What's your favorite part?
I like to go to the rides. I think it helped me learn to drive. Do you go anywhere like Disney, Like another theme park?
We're been to Six Flags a few times, But it's much smaller than Disney. It's a lot of fun, Though, And they have some great roller coasters.
Does your son like it? It is important to keep things as normal as possible when you are dealing with challenges.
They all love it. We try to make sure they all get to hit their favorite parts when we go. Have you been to a Six Flags before?
Maybe a long time ago, But I don't remember.
The one in Virginia is very close to where we live, So it's an easy day trip. You said your classmates like to go to Disney, Is that close to where you live?
Yes, It is not too far. But I wish I could be back in Nashville so I could meet Taylor again.

persona: My favorite childhood toy was a Lite Brite. I had a rubiks cube.
I work with computers. I have weekly dance lessons.
I've never drank. I don't like drugs. I was born in 1981.
I like pop music. My favorite band is New Kids On The Block.
I like going to concerts. I went to Cochella. I usually camp at music festivals. I have a couple of beers and dance.
dialogue: Is there any music festival coming up any time soon.
There's one a few weeks from now about an hour from my house. I can't wait to go.
That sounds so fun! Who will be performing at the festival?
I'm not sure yet. Some up and coming bands I guess. As long as the music's good for dancing, I don't care all that much.
I totally know the feeling!! There's something so intoxicating about dancing to live music with a ton of people around!
Would you like to go with me to the festival?
I would love to!! It's been a while since I've been to a festival. That sounds fun! I wonder if I can being my dog. I just recently got one! She would love a music festival!
Sure, I think dogs are allowed. Will you be able to get off of work for the whole weekend?
It shouldn't be a problem! My new job has been going really well, And I should be able to easily get some time away.
That's good. I rarely have to work weekends at my job so it's easy to leave for the festival after work on Friday and get back Sunday night in time for the work week.
You're lucky! I wish I didn't have to work weekends, But it's not so bad. Management is super nice, And I get along with most of my coworkers, They make the time go by fast!
Great! We'll meet up there. I'll bring the beer.

persona: I love to eat.
I study ballet. I love contemporary and hip hop dancing. I teach dancing to troubled youth for work.
My siblings died. I'm from Somalia. My aunt helped me flee to the United States. I was forced into marriage. I'm divorced.
I am not a good cook. My mom makes Somali dishes.
I like restaurants that are homey. I love Sizzler's salad.
dialogue: I got a call back from the steak house asking me to join.
That's exciting. Let me know when you start so I can go and try out the restaurant.
I start training next week and will be working 6 nights a week. I'm hoping that the tips will be good.
I hope so too. I wonder if you will be able to use any of your family recipes. That would be cool if you could.
I'm starting out just as asous chef assisting the main chef so maybe I can slowly introduce my recipes. How is your dancing going?
Good but busy. I have been practicing a lot as we have a recital coming up soon.
Oh that's exciting but I'll bet its nerve wracking. How many students will be performing?

I have six students in the contemporary class and four in hip hop. They are great kids and I hope they can get something good out of the class. There are a few that are fairly nervous about the recital.
Maybe after the recital you could bring them to the restaurant to celebrate!
Hey that's a great idea. I.
I think there is a big room that you can reserve, I'll check when I go next week.
Yes please do. It would be fun to treat them to something special as they have worked so hard and many have a hard life at home.

persona: My name is Justin. I'm on tour. I'm a performer.
My parents are musicians. I love being a performer.
I've been playing guitar since I was 3 years old. I perform in national parks.
I like watching old westerns.
I like to cook for my crew.
I perform in the Northwest. Sometimes I perform in national parks.
My shows are sometimes sold out. Most of my shows are for smaller crowds, which I like. My schedule is booked until July 4th. I like to play with others.
I sometimes perform with my parents. They perform backup vocals and sing on their own, too.
dialogue: I've found a new job at a clinic that is close by. It's a drop in pay, But my quality of life will be better, I think.
Thats great you will save so much time with a shorter commute. How many patients will you need to see each day?
I'm not sure about that yet. It can't be any worse than what I was doing at the last place.
Hopefully you negotiated some vacation time at your new job.
I did, Just like at the last place, But things get hectic. People always expect a doctor to be there when they need them. This ends up meaning that I don't get a vacation.

You have to make sure that you schedule time for your self. I suggest you go ahead and put something on the calendar. Life is short you need to take time off, Even if you stay at home and just enjoy your family.

That sounds like a good idea. I get pretty stressed out at times without any time off. I think this new place might be better though because there are more doctors around. Taking some time off should be easier.
That's great. How is Jessica?
She's doing really well. She has been doing more and more shows. She is getting better with time and more shows done. Maybe one day she'll be at your level of a performer!
I think she already is at my level, She just needs others to recognize it. The music industry is so hard to get into. Does she have an agent?
Nope, No agent yet. I think I heard her mention it once or twice. Maybe you can talk to her and give her a bit of guidance.
I would be happy to give her some advice, Please give her my contact information!

persona: I like Wii gymnastic games. I do gymnastics.
I like garlic bread. I go to the gym every day.
I look good in anything yellow.
My toy robot is an Olympian. I'm an Olympian.
I love to twitch dance.
My favorite Italian food is fettuccini Alfredo. My wife and I had fettuccini Alfredo on our first date.
I have been married 3 years. My wife is pregnant with our first child. My wife is 6 months pregnant.
I always wanted to marry and have a family. I want a lot of kids.
dialogue: You will never believe this I met a girl she was looking for her lost drone and I helped her find it. She is a major in robotics and loves video9 gamers!
Thats sounds so cool, Did you talk more about her major or her interest in video games?
Mostly about video games and her drone. I think I want to get a drone now!
Sounds like an interesting hobby no doubt, What do you plan on using a drone for? Are you simply just going to fly it around in a public space?
I think it would be great to fly and take some aerial pictures, Like sunsets and wildlife. I think they are hard to fly have you ever flown one?
Can't say that I have, I don't tend to buy or use a lot of modern electronics. I tend to stay indoors as well, Cooking, Dancing and more.
How is your wife? Are you getting excited about the new baby? Do you know the gender yet?
She is doing good, We are both very excited about our first child. The doctor performed an ultrasound, And we learned its going to be a girl.
That's exciting!! Now you can start getting her room ready? Will you decorate in pink now?
Yes, Me and my wife have begun decorating her room. We even bought some clothes for her to wear, And use when she is able to.
Will your friends be throwing you a baby shower?
They are, They are still in the process of organizing it. I believe it will happen in about a week or so, But nevertheless I am very grateful for their thoughtfulness and help.

persona: I speak english, spanish, and french.
I enjoy planning world domination and knitting.
I am 55 years old.
I am a painter.
I have family living in DC.
I like sight seeing. I have visited large attractions. I went to Paris when I was younger. I like nature.
I like walking around and finding little mom and pop shops.
dialogue: I found the photos on my laptop that I took when I visited DC. Let me show you.
I would love to see them!
Dope... Must be nice to travel there Rockefeller.
Yeah, there was a lot of interesting things to see and do.
I hope you remembered to bribe your politician like a good American does.
I would never even consider doing anything like that!
Hmmm... I guess we'll never get that universal healthcare then.
I think if you want Universal Healthcare then you should move to paris.
Wouldn't that be wonderful to live in Paris.
Oh definitely. It's one of my dreams one day.
I think the ability to gorge myself on baguettes and wine is a top tier dream.

persona: I live on a farm in Michigan. I love to drive tractors. I am handy on the farm. I work on tractors.
I like classical music, nature, and calm things.
I do not have children, but I want to have 4 children. I am 24 years old.
My parents are great. I want to follow in my parents footsteps as a farmer.
We have cows, pigs, horses, and sheep. We have a dairy cow named Lucy. I raised her since she was a baby.
I don't like scary movies.
dialogue: One of our cats had kittens!
That is awesome! How many did she have?
She had 6 kittens, They are so cute. My kids were very happy.
I can imagine they are wanting to be so helpful. Will you be keeping them all our will you be adopting them out?
I'm not sure. My kids want me to keep them all, But that would be chaotic. Maybe I will keep one, We will see. How are your cows doing, I love cows a lot.
She is doing great. I was thinking that if you did want to give up a few the farm can always use cats.
Wow that's great. I would love giving to someone I already know, So thank you. Do you already have cats in the farm?
We are down to one at the moment. Our other animals would love to get some new friends so keep me in mind when you make a decision.
Will definitely do! I would like you to see the kittens beforehand if you are free any time soon.
Since we live so far apart it would need to be virtual or photos! Maybe the kids would like to come see the farm for a vacation. Do they like farm animals.
My kids love all animals, And I love that idea. We should make plans when we are all free.
Great. Spring is a good season on the farm. Maybe we will be lucky and have some babies for them to meet.

persona: I volunteer at the rabbit rescue. I donate to the rabbit rescue.
I work at the shipyard. I was in the navy. I like the water. I try to always be close to the water. I like waves.
My favorite color was blue when I was young.
I like to support my friends. I like to donate to charity.
dialogue: I've finished a new song for the show, Would you like to hear it?
Yes, Do you have a youtube channel that i could hear it on?
Of course, I have a personal channel with many of my songs already uploaded. I'll make sure to send you a direct link if your interested.
That sounds great. Do you have any upcoming gigs?
I do have one this upcoming weekend. I am planning on performing for a charity at a forum, I will perform with other artists to a sizeable crowd.
Thats great, I would be petrified to be in front of a crowd. Are you ever nervous?

Sometimes, Its perfectly natural to get nervous before a big event, Or when performing in front of a crowd. I have become more accustomed to it with time, And after several performances I don't mind it too much.
Well good luck at your gig, Will you play your new song?
I plan on playing a mix of my older and newer songs. My new song will definitely be played at the charity however.
Do you play any cover songs of any artisits?
Not publically or at events. I do have some covers on my Youtube channel however, Along with my original compositions.
I guess when you play cover songs you have to pay royalties?

persona: I love bunnies. I'm moving into a new apartment with my boyfriend.
I enjoy photography. I like the colors red and silver.
I've never had an apartment with my boyfriend before.
I teach English, Spanish, and French in elementary school.
I visit my parents house.
dialogue: I have decided I definitely want to do the bunny hop fundraiser!
That's amazing! What is your role going to be in the fundraiser?
Organizer mainly, But I am sure I will do a little of everything. Would you like to come? Maybe you could adopt a bunny?
Ha ha maybe, Although I'd have to check with my boyfriend first! I would love to come and see the bunnies, Though. Maybe I could be your photographer for the event?
That would be amazing! Ask him and let me know. I would love you to take photos for the event. It would help get the word out afterwards as well!
Yes, Count me in for photography duties. Do you think you're going to get another bunny soon?

I can't say for sure. But I would assume I will come across one in need and adopt it. I can't say no. I am sure your students would love to meet some bunnies. I can bring some to your class if you would like.
My students love animals. They would go nuts over a bunny in the classroom. I will have to ask my principal about it first. Have you taken your bunny to a lot of places?
Just let me know and I will bring them in. I try to take my bunnies anywhere they are allowed. They love people and it helps people appreciate them.
What's not to love about a bunny? They are so cuddly and adorable! Is it hard to housetrain one?
They are very easy to house train actually. And great house or apartment pets. I like to bring awareness to their size when full grown and handling needs.

Yes, I've heard that they can be hard to handle if they aren't socialized properly. My cousin had one when we were kids, And he carried that bunny with him everywhere. He even put it in his bike basket and rode it around town.

persona: I am traveling. I have a yacht. I rent it out. My boat is pet friendly.
I like to cook. I am trying new foods. I like persian foods.
I like boating. I have never seen a turtle up close.
I have free time on the weekends.
dialogue: Do you have any good persian restaurants close to your home?
Yes there is! There is a really nice restaurant that are pet friendly on the weekends we can check out.
Oh neat, Sounds fun! I haven't ever had Persian food in my life. May I ask, How did you get introduced to Persian food?
I was traveling through Iran with the yacht I rented out and fell in love with the food there. Have you traveled to Iran before?
I have never traveled before, But if i could i would love to take a peak at Iran. It sucks being stuck in one place all my life, I don't like it. I need to MOVE you know?
I feel you on that, I hated feeling stuck in one place so I decided to rent a yacht. It has been amazing traveling all throughout Europe. I have never been to Florida though. What is it like there?

It's basically a swamp, At least in the south-side of Florida. The north side of it is very nice though, Is beautiful in the autumn. There are some neat places to visit here for tours. Fun question: What's the craziest thing that happened to you in Europe?

I caught a fish the size of me! It was insane how much effort it took to drag it onto my boat. I have never cooked a fish before so I returned it back to the ocean. I would like to learn how to cook because food is amazing, Especially eating it for the first time. Do you know how to cook a fish?

Haha yes i know how to cook a fish, Even though it's fun, It's a prettyicky process. Learning to cook is good as well because you can cook healthier things than your average store or restaurant items. Do you eat restaurant or store bought food more?

I definitely eat from restaurants more. Even thought I like to cook, It gets hard when you are constantly traveling so eating out is more convenient and quick. I would like to cook more. Are there any dishes that are special specifically in Florida that you can introduce to me?
Uuuummm, Well. There is mexican food that is sometimes made here that i can totally introduce you too. Have you ever tired Mexican food?

I love their tacos and quesadillas! I used to eat tacos all the time from food trucks and feed a bit of it to the hungry cats and dogs around me. They were always so friendly and a joy to be around. What are your pets' names?

persona: I am a chocolate bar lover .
I enjoy playing ping pong.
My father has taught me a lot about electricity. My father is  an electrician.
My favorite color is brown.
I love plants. I love the cocoa plant.
I live in Hemet, CA.
I learned  Chinese at home. I watch Chinese drama shows. I enjoy the passionate people in the shows.
dialogue: What kind of chocolate is your favorite?
I just love any type of chocolate bars. My favorite color is brown too, So I like milk chocolate usually.
I like milk chocolate too. Do you like best plain or with something in it?
I like it plain to enjoy the flavor the most. Have you gone out for a ride lately?
Yes, I went for a ride earlier today. The weather is getting warmer, So it was nice. Have yo ever ridden?
No, I just do things at home like ping-pong. You want me to teach you Chinese?
Yes, I'd love to learn some Chinese!
I'll teach you! We can also watch Chinese dramas while I help you understand what they are saying!
Okay, That sounds fun! When should we start?
I have to do some electrician stuff with my father tonight, How about tomorrow?
Tomorrow sounds great! Your place or mine?
Let's do my place at 5?

persona: I love music. I am sad about Tom Petty.
I am from west virginia.
I think Tom Petty has some great wedding songs.
I don't know much about the southern hemisphere.
I can't wait to have my own wedding.
dialogue: I found some great Tom Petty songs for your wedding.
Wonderful. Thanks. What are they?
The songs are "American Girl" and"Listen To Her Heart". I think these are great. How about you?
Yeah, I love both of those. Now I just have to figure out how to dance to them! How are your wedding plans going?
They are going pretty good I guess. Truth be told I don't know what I'm doing. Do you think I could play those Tom Petty songs at my wedding?

Sure, Although I don't know about "American Girl"? Maybe you could change the lyrics to say,"Argentinian Girl"? Ha! Do you have some friends to help you? Venue, Flowers and photographer are key to get booked early, I'm told.
Hmm, That's a good point about the song. I guess I'll have to pick a different song. I do have some friends but I don't think they really want to help me. What other Tom Petty song could I use?

That's too bad. Maybe a wedding planner, Although they can be a bit expensive. Maybe your soon to be mother-in-law could help? As for Petty, How about "Here Comes My Girl","You Got Lucky" "A Woman in Love"?.
I think those songs would be good! Yeah, I can't afford a wedding planner. Maybe I can just get you to help me. You seem so knowledgeable!

It might be a bit hard from West Virginia, But I'll help you if I can? Do you have a dress yet? How about bridesmaids? I would try to farm out as many responsibilities as possible. Especially for the little stuff. Plus folks like to be asked to help. It gives them something to do.
I'm just getting started to be honest. I'm going to keep things small though, Or at least I want to. So, I don't know how much off this stuff I really need.
I know here that places get booked up really early, So I would focus on that. Do you want to get married in a church? That will limit what day, Since many churches only perform weddings on Saturdays.

persona: I go to Europe twice a year.
I love to cook paella and fish and chips.
I majored art in college.
I am a descendant of christopher columbus.
I visit history museums. I love to go to museums when I travel.
I go to Europe often. I think I have been to all the countries. I would go back to any one of them. Italy is my favorite country. I love Rome.
My background studying art helped me learn about Europe. I should have been a travel agent.
I was in Portugal a few months ago. I want to go somewhere in the Caribbean. I am still planning the trip.
dialogue: I did some great shopping on my last trip. Let me show you what I bought.
That is great, I would love to see. Where did you go on your last trip?
I love my shopping. So lots of clothes but nice shoes too! Thailand! I cant wait to go back! Have you been? I think you would like the art. How was portugal?
I have not been to Thailand... Yet. I'm sure the art is amazing. Portugal was a dream come true. I feel like it is under appreciated compared to the other European countries.
So true. I absolutely adored it. You would love the food too! How are your new trip plans? Are you excited? I plan to visit the Caribbean soon too.
I'm so excited for my trip to the Caribbean. I haven't figured everything out yet. All I really have planned is hanging out on the beach and enjoying some great seafood. Do you have and suggestions?
I know there's some really nice boardwalks near the beach with great shopping! And there's great restaurants! I personally spend all day on the beach LOL. You could try swimming with dolphins!
That's a great idea!! Swimming with dolphins would be amazing. Thank you.
Of course! You totally have to take tons of pics and send them to me! Also depending on how long you visit I know there are little cooking classes and you love to cook. Something to look into! :).
That is defiantly something I will look into. I am planning my trip for August. Have you decided when you might visit the Caribbean?
I'm thinking thinking this Fall or Winter. I hate the cold so it would be a nice getaway!
That is a great idea, Especially if you hate the cold. Did I hear you are also planning a trip to France?

persona: I work on vintage cars. I have two vintage mustangs. I bought another mustang to work on.
I like country music.
I love doughnut holes.
I have never tried daylight doughnuts.
dialogue: I had a terrific long john at a new place!
Really? I gotta try that place soon. I wanna try the doughnut holes!
Yea, It was a place called Voodoo donuts. Have you heard of it?
I haven't heard of that one. Is it better than Daylight?
I will always love Daylight but they were pretty great. They had some interesting options as well that were pretty funny. I heard at the end of the night they sell 5 gallon buckets of donuts for $10.
No way!! That's a lot. I know a lot of places that will sell them really cheap at night because they were made in the morning but 10$ is a steal.
Right! I think you'd have to have a donut party with that many. How is work on your new car going?
The Mustang is so sweet! You gotta come by too check it out soon.
What work are you having to do? Did you choose a paint color?
I just have to do some general maintenance and need to replace the hood. I am thinking about a light gold color. How does that sound?
That would be something different. I wish I was better at car maintenance. Maybe you could teach me some things.
Yeah, It is really good to know a few things at least. You don't ever need to pay someone else to fix something in your car for more than 200$..

persona: I like to take baths. I like to meditate.
I am 35 years old. I don't drink or smoke. I am not married.
I have pet dogs. I think dogs are lots of work.  I think dogs are worth the work.
dialogue: I decided to stop talking again.
Anything happen to make you decide this or just because?
I feel it is needed to try to reach my inner peace. I am even uncertain if i should type.
Is it hard not talking?
Sometimes you want to speak out for something that is going on, So yes.
I'm not sure if I could last very long not speaking.
It gets easier the longer you do it i beleive, It does help with my meditation. You can really center yourself.
I've meditated before. I can't get my brain to turn off. I'm always thinking about something.
My mistake, Yes that is the first big step to it, Turning everything off.
Any tips for getting to that point?
It sounds cliche but you just have to focus on nothing. Just let go.
I'll give it a try. But focusing on nothing just makes me start thinking of the word nothing. Lol.

persona: I am 20 years old.
I love tea.
I like to read.
I am open minded.
I like scary movies. I like the movie "It". I love Marvel movies. I grew up watching Marvel movies. I watched Wolverine. I watched Ant Man.
I have an 8 year old son.
dialogue: I am going to get fitted for an implant to help me get my hearing back.
Which ear are you getting fixed?
It's my left ear. It'll be wild to be able to hear out of it.
Oh absolutely, You'll be able to hear all your favorite movies a lot easier now.
Yes!, I'll probably feel like a new person even.
I certainly hope so, You may even come to like sports once you can actually hear them. What do you think?
I would def give it a try. I've missed out on the aspect of life.
Yeah pretty much, My grandpa was Wayne Gretzky and he once said you miss 100 shots out of the 100 shots you take, And that just really hit me. Has anyone ever given you great words of wisdom?
That's a great one! My grandmother always told me that life is all about balance and that has stuck with me forever.
Ah yes, Balance is a wonderful thing, Have you seen The Avengers?
Yes I have! Is that one of your favorites?
Absolutely, I also like Wolverine and Ant Man, But some of my other favorites are Spiderman and Hulk. How about yourself?

persona: I listen to country music. I play the guitar. I got my first guitar at age 3. I would like a pink guitar.
I am a singer. I am in a country music band. I grew up in the music industry. I love both travel and music.
I have a son who likes to mountain bike.
I am spiritual. I like State Parks. I like running water.
My band have some gigs coming up. I am traveling with my band to Columbia, Missouri.
dialogue: Is your son coming to Missouri with you?
No I am leaving him home, I figure dirty old country dive bars aren't a tweens scene.
Well yes you are definitely right about that. However I know that young boys probably find things like that exciting lol. It would be like an adventure!
Yeah he is more into outdoor adventure like riding the trails on his mountain bike. Which is fine by me because its easier to sniff around the ladies sans crotch fruit if you know what I mean.
LOL. That is an interesting way to put it yes but I do know what you mean. The good thing though is that some women love a single dad. He could be your wingman if that's not too weird.

I don't know if they would be impressed with my parenting skills bringing him to a bar... If I had two kids I could stack them on top of each other and put them in a trench coat and that would fool everyone.
That's hilarious. On a more serious note does your son play the guitar?

No he has never taken an interest in guitars or music really... He is into building like those foam swords and battling in the park with some other kids. I am not sure what it is called. That and his bike.
Is that like NERF wars or something? You are lucky he is into mountain biking that's really good for his fitness. Lots of kids these days don't get enough exercise and are overweight!
I think it is something a little lamer than a nerf war... Maybe it's larping? I don't know, But I am glad he is out there in the sunshine prancing and dancing having a good old time.
No you're right that's it. LARPING. To be honest it's probably better that he's into that than something else!
That's what I am thinking. Though even if he gets into being a furry or my little brony or whatever I will love and accept him no matter what.

persona: I go to Disney World every year.
I'm in the third grade. I love libraries.
I want to be a teacher or a librarian when I grow up.
My mom is currently reading me Little House on the Prairie. My favorite character from it is Laura.
I am struggling a bit with online school. If I pass, my family is going to go to Disney World this year.
dialogue: I have found a few books in the library today that I think you would like to read! I will tell your mom about them so maybe she can read them to you next.
Thank you! I love reading books. I love when my mom reads me books. My favorite book is the Hungry Caterpillar. What's yours?
Where the red fern grows still has a special place in my heart. I think it will always be my favorite.
I've heard of that book before, But I haven't read it yet. Maybe one day.
I can let your mom know about it and she can check it out at the library and read it to you sometime after you guys are done with little house on the prairie.
That would be a great idea! Is it a chapter book?
It is. What other things do you like doing when you are not reading or being read to?
I really enjoy playing outside. I even sometimes read a book under our big oak tree in the backyard.
Reading under a tree is so peaceful and relaxing.
It really is. There's nothing like it.
Well having a house with a big bench window you can sit in with pillows and a blanket on a stormy day reading is almost just as good!
Bench windows are the best. We had one in our old house I liked to read in.

persona: My name is Todd Hicks.
I am self-employed. I am an author, blogger, and affiliate marketer.
I am single.
I haven't been to Italy.
I have a blog and write books. I write short stories about my dogs. I turn my blogs into children's books.
I have 2 Golden Retrievers who are brother and sister from the same liter.
I dream of going to Italy.
dialogue: I've started packing for my trip to Italy! I'm making sure to bring a camera to take lots of pictures while I'm there.
Yes you must take lots of pictures. Maybe you could post your adventure in a blog.
A blog is an interesting idea. I might look into that. Have you been blogging much lately?
Yes i try to blog several times a week. Do you plan on visiting your wife's family while you are in Italy?
Oh yes! I'm very excited to meet everyone and to site see. I hear it's lovely!
Is your dog going to be traveling with you? It can be difficult to travel long distances with pets.
They usually stay with my family when I travel. It makes it a lot easier. How are your pups doing?
They are doing great, I just posted a blog about their adventures at a nearby lake.
I bet they loved that! I'll have to go check out your blog post.
If you like my blog, After your trip, We can always get together and i could feature your dog on my page.
When would you like to?
How about 2 weeks after you return from Italy? That jet lag can really get to you.

persona: I am in third grade.
I go to Disney ever year. Mickey is my favorite Disney character. I also enjoy going to Epcot which is educational.
I enjoy collecting Disney movies and singing along to them. I like music and singalongs.
I have never seen Singing in the Rain. I like to dance.
I live with my parents.
I like board games.
The new Frozen movie is my favorite movie. I like the movie The Lion King.
dialogue: I watched another musical with good dancing.
Ooh. I love musicals! They combine my favorite activities - singing and dancing. Was it a Disney musical?
It was not. It was another film similar to Disney that you might like.
Oh, What film was it? Did you like it? How's it rated on Rotten Tomatoes?
I cannot remember the name but I did like it. Have you seen any new movies?
I love the new Disney movie Raya and the Last Dragon. It's a touching movie about a girl and the last dragon on Earth trying to stop the Druun, An evil species of monster.
I think my niece would like that movie. I will plan on showing it to her if you would be interested in watching it again...
I would be interested! How old is your niece? I'm 8, So if she's around my age, She'd probably love it too.
She is also younger. We used to play a lot of board games together.
Great! I bet she'd enjoy it, Then. What board games did you used to play, And why don't you play with her any longer?
We used to play every board game. I have been busy teaching to have much time now though. I would like to start playing again...

Gotcha. I hope to spend a lot of time playing board games in the future, Too. Summer break is coming up, And I bet I can spend hours a day on board games, Especially on the Disney theme park version of Monopoly.

persona: My name is Andie.
I build houses. I work as  part of a construction crew. I do roofing, laying carpets and installing cabinets.
I am not married.
I was really close to my dad. My father was in the construction business too. My father passed away when I was 16. I will never start my own business.
I have 5 cats. My cats bother me sometimes. My cats names are Oliver and Sandy and there is one more named Hudini. My youngest cat was out of the house for 3 days. I love Hudini.
dialogue: How are your cats? Has Hudini gotten out again>.
Yup! He truly lives up to his name- he is a master at slipping out of the house unnoticed. Does your puppy ever get into places he's not supposed to be in?
I'm going surfing this weekend.
Oh cool! Where are you going surfing? Do you surf a lot?
I understand about your cat. My mother had a cat that escaped all the time.
What did your mom do to keep the cat from escaping? I feel like I've tried just about everything!
She took out the doggy door. Ha Ha. She kept asking how the cat could get out and I pointed to the doggy door.

LOL. I don't have a doggy door but that makes sense as to how her cat kept escaping. I think I need to fix the locks on my doors. They don't quite close fully and I think Hudini might be able to squeeze through the crack.
Sounds like a plan. My puppy is doing fine. He stays where I put him right now.
Aw! Sounds like a good boy. What's his name?

persona: I'm 23 years old. I love food. I enjoy cooking, but I'm not great at it.
I own a yacht which I rent out.
I play soccer.
My mom gets annoyed easily.
I live with my mother.
dialogue: I had a conversation with a friend who said they were interested in renting a yacht.
I totally would recommend it. Renting a yacht has eased up some of the annoyances in my life. Have you cooked anything recently?
I have been cooking a lot lately, With all the free time. Last night we made Chicago deep dish pizza, It was very good if I may say so myself. I will relay the yachting info to my friend.
That deep dish pizza sounds so good. You'll have to email me the recipe so I can try making it. I'm sure my mom would like to try it too.
Of course, It's pretty easy to make I'm sure you and your mother would enjoy it also. How is she? Relaxed I hope.
She's been good for the most part but sometimes the little things still bother her. Thanks for asking. How's your wife?
She's chill as always, She's taking our son to the gym today then I think she's going swimming. I'll tell her you ask about her. With them out of the house it gives me a chance to look for a job.
Your household always sounds so active with between your son's sports and wife's water adventures. How is the job search coming along?
It's going ok, Yes it's always crazy her. We'll all have to get together soon anddine out. Try something new.
Dining out sounds amazing. I love trying new food. If we want to stay in maybe you could teach me how to make one of your recipes.
That could be fun too, I'm always up for teaching and show off my culinary skills. Just let me know what you and your mother would like and we could set it up soon.
Sounds great I will make sure to let you know.

persona: I live in the US.
I like traveling.
I have birds as pets. I work a lot as a chef.
I'm expecting a baby. I have a bright green nursery. We have a crib and I ordered a mobile. I buy on Etsy.

I love cats. I have 2 cats: Tag who is a Maine Coone and Henry. My cat Tag is 10, and Henry is 11. My cats like human food.  My cat Tag loves avocado / guacamole.  My cat Henry loves meatballs.  I love how they chew their food.
I chose Rachel if my baby is a girl and Gregory for a boy. We will wait till the baby is born to find out the sex.
dialogue: Work has been good, I brought home a new frozen pizza with olives to try. I am also thinking of purchasing a cat toy from Etsy. Have you purchased any cat toys off Etsy?
I haven't purchased any cat toys off Etsy. I usually get them from the pet store, As I like to see and feel them before I buy them. How was the pizza?

It was good as expected. Pretty much any pizza with olives on it is good. I don't think I've had a bad one in my life. I was thinking about getting a cat nip toy off of Etsy. I love watching cats go nuts on cat nip.

I think olives are an acquired taste. Luckily, I've acquired it! I like olives on my pizza, Too. My cats don't really like catnip. They get a little hyper for a short period of time, Then they get bored and leave it. I've tried a couple of times, But with the same result. Now ping pong balls drive them crazy!
Hmm, I've never tried to ping pong balls thing. I'm going to have to get some and see what my cat does. Any other toys your cats like?

The ping pong balls are great. And they're cheap, So I don't mind when I step on them and break them! Tag and Henry bat them all over the house. They bounce off the furniture and base boards and really move on the hardwood floors of our house. They do get stuck under furniture, But I just use a broom to scoop them out. It is getting harder to bend down with my belly getting bigger. Laser pointers are another good toy for cats, And easy on my back!
That sounds like a lot of fun for the cats. I wonder if they are playing a game against each other that only they know about. The laser pointer sounds like fun as well.

Yeah, It seems like it sometimes. When one gets going, The other joins in. It's like they're talking to each other, "Hey, Come on. Let's play!" The one drawback with the laser pointer is that there is only one, So they compete a little bit with each other. The looks they give each other are priceless!
Haha, That sounds like so much fun. I am going to be doing some searching on Etsy now to find these things. Do your cats ever try to eat your birds?

No, They pretty much ignore them. I think they know they're not food. But the birds get nervous around the cats, For sure. They quickly become silent when the cats are around. I keep the birds in a separate room, So as to not stress them out. The birds outside are fair game though. I often get little presents on the porch after the cats go out.
I've had my cat do that as well. They've also brought back some little rodents, Like chipmunks.
My yard is mostly gopher-free because of Tag and Henry. It's a little bit gross, But I guess it's their nature to hunt, Even if it's not for food.

persona: I worked for human services for 10 years. I am a stay at home father. I am widowed. My wife Lisa was murdered.
My goal is to raise my son. My son is in junior high and has PTSD.
I watch horror movies with my son. My favorite movies are horror movies.
I wish my son would go away sometimes. I have a hard time dealing with the loss of my wife. My son reminds me of the wife I've lost. I am excited for my son to go to college.
I am considering a sabbatical to travel.
dialogue: I hope you and your son are doing well. Is he starting to get excited about heading off to college?
We are doing ok. Thank you for asking. He is nervous. I am more excited than he is. How are your children doing?
My sons are doing great. Thanks for asking. We have been going for walks as a family lately.
Are they runners like yourself? My son and I are slowly getting into fitness. We are also trying to take walks everyday. The fresh air helps our moods everyday.
They don't enjoy running as much as I do that's why we've been sticking to walks, But at least I can get them outside and active. I agree the outdoors helps me destress from my school studies.
Fresh air just has so many health advantages. How are your studies going?
My studies are going well, But sometimes I just want to get away. Have you been considering leaving to travel still?
Yes, I am saving for a big Europe trip. I think my son would love it. Do you have plans to travel or just hopes to?
That sounds so exciting for both of you. I hope some day to maybe after I complete college. I'm looking forward to hearing about your experiences in Europe.
It'll be a dream come true to actually make it after talking about it for so long. You'll get to travel soon too I hope. Studies first then comes all the traveling.
You and your son have been through so much I.
Thank you. It helps to have each other when going through a trauma like we have. You are very kind.

persona: I am pregnant with twins. My due date is in 2 months. I have a toddler.
I work in a bank.  I own a home.
I believe in moderation. I believe in God.
dialogue: How are you feeling the pregnancy still treating you well? I was thinking about what you said about God. I found a book for you.
Yes, So far so good, Although I feel like a whale. What is the book? Is school still going well?
It is really hard when you're pregnant you do get so body conscious. School is ok, My parents are helping me with my baby.

That is awesome! You should be so proud of yourself for juggling school and being a mother. The last time I was in school was college, And I cannot imagine caring for a baby while taking classes. Good on you!
I find the a lot of people judge me for having a child so young it's been really hard on me actually. Thanks for your support it means a lot. Not many people realise just how hard it is!
That's sad, Because I bet they don't realize how much extra work it takes. Does your husband help, Too, Or is he not able to because of his disability?
He does what he can and he helps out massively but it's not the same as having a fully able-bodied husband. I do feel like I have more challenges than the average person my age lol.
You most definitely do, But God gives his biggest challenges to His strongest soldiers.
I do sometimes find quite a lot of comfort in prayer. Do you go to church on Sundays?
I do go to church, Do you?
I do believe but I don't go to church myself. I have been thinking about starting. I think it would be good to meet like minded people.
It can definitely be helpful to meet like minded people. Churches often sometimes have daycares, Too, So that could help!

persona: I like walking my dog.
I have a growing family. My husband is a doctor.
I play tennis professionally. I train and practice for it every day.
I live in a three storey house.
My husband and parents are very helpful in taking care of the kids. I have been married for 5 years but have lived with my husband for 8 years.
I have 2 children.
dialogue: I met an awesome guy during my shift at the gas station today!
That's awesome! Is he a regular?
I'm not sure. I've only been working this job for a month or so, So I don't know how often he frequents the place.
What made him so awesome?
He had a great personality, Was very courteous, And was humorous. Maybe I should reach out to him to see if he's interested in meeting outside of work.
Yes, Next time he comes in to your work i think you guys should exchange phone numbers. This will make your dad happy.
I think so, Too. You know, You've been married for quite a while. In your opinion, What are things that make a relationship work?
There has to be communication and honesty, Without those 2 things a relationship can break down very fast.

That's good advice. Are there any thing you two do (either together, Or along with your kids) that helps you two maintain an open and honest line of communication with each other, Even during disagreements and/or stressful times?

Always try to have a date night without kids a couple times a month. Sometimes as a parent you forget about your adult relationships because you are so busy with kids. Also going hiking outdoors as a family gives a good opportunity to have discussions.

That's some great advice. How about communicating with your kids? How do you make sure they feel heard and understood? I don't think I'm ready for kids yet, But I'm collecting advice just for future reference, And I'd love your opinion.
Whenever the kids talk i always try to pay close attention to everything they are saying. I try to not blow off their concerns or issues even if they do not seem like a big deal to myself.

persona: My name is Larry. I work as a head chef.
I like comic books. I like big dogs.
My favourite comic is Spiderman. I have Spiderman comics.
My favourite colour is blue.
My brothers used to build stock cars.
I am not married. I have no children.
I'm thinking of developing a new dish that will attract more NASCAR fans. I was thinking of bring a ribeye to the menu.
dialogue: Hm, Let us try a new place in order to eat out this weekend.
Great idea! Where would you like to go? You choose!
Somewhere that has good steaks. I'm craving a really big ribeye... No change there then, Ha,
Haha! I was going to suggest the same thing. How about that new steakhouse downtown? I heard it's really good there, Although it's pricey.
Money well spent in my opinion! Sounds perfect. I'll get a reservation forsaturday night if that works for you. I'll probably still be full for the NASCAR race on Sunday!
That works for me perfectly. I'll be full too! We are having some people over for the Nascar race and I plan on ordering pizza and chicken wings.Mmmm.
Oh that sounds SO good. I might have to plan that for the next race and go light on Saturday's dinner just to be sure I have room. Are you planning a big thing for the race?
Not a big thing, No. Just my brothers and their wives are coming over to watch the race. We might have a few beers while we enjoy the race and pizza. Feel free to come by if you'd like!
Aw, Thankyou! I might stop by if I build up an appetite, Then I can help you finish those wings. You really gotta come up with a way to eat bitesize ribeyes.
Bitesize ribeyes! Ha! You are making me laugh over here. What flavor wings would you like? Is BBQ okay?
BbQs awesome. God, I'm hungry just thinking about it. So excited to sit down and do nothing all weekend!
Me too! It's going to be a fun weekend. I'm really looking forward to it. Make sure you wear comfy clothes in case we have a campfire outside!

persona: My name is Chelsea. I am female.
I have a gold in gymnastics. Gymnastics is not my true passion.
I want to collect yellow items. I like to collect items by color. I like to shop at yard sales and thrift store.
I am a gymnast. I have won a gold medal.
dialogue: My parents saw me looking at apartments for rent and they gave me yet another lecture on "What Would Jesus Do". So annoying.
Have you told them how you feel? Maybe if you talked to them they would understand?
I've tried talking to them a bit. My dad listens but not my mom. Have you started your collection yet? I saw a mini yellow school bus that would be a perfect start lol.

Well maybe work on your dad. I think over time he can work on your mom. Well, The thing about collecting yellow things is where do you start. I think a yellow school bus would be great and I can add create a yellow area to store my items!
I'm a fan of yard sales too. It's one of the few things I enjoy doing with my mom. Did you get to travel a lot for gymnastics?. I'm still really impressed you have a gold medal.

I know. Lots of hard work but it is a great talking point with people, I think I need to move on to something new though because yes, Like any competition there is lots of travel and lots of championships to compete in which gets draining over time.

Something more laid back does sound nice. Having a choice sounds nice honestly. The women in my church have to be chicken farmers and my parents and the church are really pushing me into that. it's why i need my own place, Off the farm. The chickens hate me.
LOL. Well farming chickens can be rewarding though can't it but if it's not your thing then definitely push back regarding the chickens. You shouldn't be forced into things.

I keep telling them that I could make a living with mytik tok dancing but they thinktik tok is for the devil. I hide in my room and dance my heart out. I have 100 followers now. It's only been a year. I'm really excited.
I'm not sure the devil has an iPhone but if he did I'm sure he would watch TikTok :-).
Lol. I'll have to disagree, I know for a fact my mom DOES have an iPhone lol. Have you found any good items at the thrift stores recently? My town is too small to have one but they sound cool.
They are and there is so much cool stuff people throw away. Can you travel to one?

persona: I have a dog. I like walking my dog.
I am skinny. I like skinny jeans. I go to church weekly on a Sunday.
I was always glad when finals were over. I teach 2nd grade.  I used to teach 1st grade and kindergarten.
I enjoy being with my students every day. I love hearing what the kids have to say.
dialogue: I was accepted in to school to study for my master's degree today!
You must be thrilled. That sounds like a lot of work but it will pay off in the end.
I hope so. It seems like your education paid off for you, Since you really like your students. Is second grade the one you want to stay teaching forever?
I think that's as far as I'd like to go I think. It's in those years that you can really help shape a young person and have the biggest affect on their lives.
I don't think i could be an educator. There are many other ways I can use my agricultural engineering degree. I dream of owning a farm.
To be your own boss and get out of the rat race would be great. I don't think we have enough respect for farmers. It's a noble proffession!
I will be glad when the weekend comes, Since school was so stressful today. I will probably just chill out to music and workout. Do you have any plans for the weekend?
Apart from church on Sunday no. I might try a new Asian fusion restaurant that has opened up, I like trying new food.
I love to try new foods as well, It is a good thing i can still eat like a teenager but keep my girlish figure. You will have to let me know how it is.
LOL me too. I love having the 'skinny gene' it does help keep the weight off. Yes I'll let you know. What is your favourite food?
I like to eat easy to cook food, Since school keeps me so busy. My favorite for other people to prepare for me is probably curry.
Nice. Well I wish you well in your studies. If you need any help with a study schedule or anything let me know!

persona: I live in the city. I take many medications.
I grew up in a farm.
I am good at mixing drinks.
I used to have a farm. I miss my farm.
I live in the North in a city.
dialogue: I am thinking of visiting New York City for my vacation.
Oh that's sounds like a great idea. I grew up on a farm so it's always been a dream of mine to visit New York.
Ohh yeah new york looks so neat!
What kinds of things do you want to do while you're there?
I want to see the empire state building first.
Yes, I've read all about it. I think it would be exciting.
Ohh so you have never been there?
No, I have never had a chance to visit the empire state building yet.
Well i hope that you get to go some day!!.
Yes, So do I! I loved being on a farm, But the big city seems like such a great change in pace.
I wish i could live on a farm to be honest.
It definitely has its perks but can get kind of boring at times.

persona: I like mountain biking.
I like coffee.I like coffee flavoured ice cream. I don't drink alcohol.
My dad works at construction.
I love my mother. I saw my mother recently. My mother likes to come out with me.
I like nature.
I enjoy spending time with family.
dialogue: I found an interesting trail for you and your mum, I just had to tell you before the weekend. It's supposed to be beautiful!
That's great. I'm always keen to try new trails out. My mother will be pleased but it needs to be manageable for her. Is it difficult?

My youngest is 10 and she managed to hike the trail well. It is a little under 3 miles and the terrain is fairly flat and the trails are well groomed. Does that seem a good level for your mom? The park has one that is just a bit harder and longer.

Oh that should be fine then. She isn't as confident as she used to be but if a 10 year old can do it then I'm sure she can too. It's good that you go out with your family and get some exercise. That's so important for young ones these days I think.
Does your mom just hike with you, Or does she mountain bike as well? I love hiking because it is such good exercise and quality family time as well.
She likes mountain biking. We do hike also. I sometimes forget that she is older and do worry what would happen if she fell off. Lol.
My mom liked hiking when she was still healthy enough, I wish she was still around to go with me. It does seem safer than mountain biking.
I'm sorry that she's not with you any more. You must miss her. Sorry all this talk about my mom and I didn't think about your situation.
It is nice to talk with someone who loves their mom as much as I did. I think the apple blossoms will be coming out this weekend, And the cherries just finishing up. Do you ever photograph nature?
I don't actually. I mean I do take some pictures on my phone sometimes but not like real photography. How about you?
I have a nice camera setup. It seems like a nice family activity taking pictures of the family in nature, Since we are outdoors so much.
The kids must love it. I think given the time I spend in nature myself that would be a good hobby to pick up. Not when mountain biking but hiking.

persona: I am a rock musician. I play the piano and guitar. I sing.
My parents are not supportive.
I am interested in the search for the family.
dialogue: My husband has already got some new information on his family, It was so quick!
Wow. Was he able to find his biological parent? That was quick.
Not yet, But with his handy detective skills, He is getting close! He thinks he may have a definitive answer by end of this week.
Aw that is amazing!! I know he is nervous, But he is a great man and I think it will go great. I hope so for his sake!
I hope so too! He reserved a spot for us at the Blues Brother lounge this Friday to celebrate the news. You should join us!
I would love to! You already know I love me some music!!! I look forward to seeing yall. Will his brothers be there to? Have they met the parents?

We haven't met his parents yet. We're supposed to receive their personal details such as a home address this Friday. Yes, His brothers will be there as well. It will be the four of us plus you. I can't wait! Will you have a plus one?

I actually did meet someone at my last show downtown. So maybe if everything goes to plan you guys will get to meet him as well. I am so happy for you guys and getting to meet parents I know that it will go great!! Cuz you guys are awesome!

Thanks! I hope your special someone can tag along too. I look forward to meeting them. If not this Friday at the lounge, I can come to your next show and meet them. When is your next show? Whats the name of the place downtown?
It's called Margaritville haha. And the show would also be on that Friday and I'm sure he'll b with me. You would love him. We match great.

Oh I know of that place. I love their Margaritas! No salt on the rim for me though. That's a bummer your show is on the same Friday. Some other time for sure. Keep me in the loop! I am about to run to the farmers market and grab more eggplant for my famous eggplant lasagna. Its baking day today! Haah.
Sounds like a plan I look forward to getting together!! Have fun.

persona: I like to eat out.
I have visited Japan. I have just visited Paris. I am currently travelling the world.
I like to cook. I am not a very good cook.
I have a yacht in Florida. I rent my Yacht out while I'm travelling.
I love fishing. Deep sea fishing but closer to the shore so I catch small shark and weird fish with lots of teeth. We always release sharks but keep some types of fish to eat.
dialogue: How was fishing in FL, Catch any sharks?
Yep! About 5 foot sand shark, Good eating it was!
Oh wow, That sounds cool! I am terrified of sharks, I saw the movie Jaws when I was a child and it scarred me for life.
That was a pretty scary movie for its time, Haha! How are you feeling with your pregnancy?

I am feeling good, Just really tired! And since it's triplets, I am already starting to get huge. I'm already at the waddling point of the pregnancy, I can't imagine how it will be if I make it full term!
That doesnt sound very comfortable at all, Is there anything the doctors or you can do to alleviate some of the symptoms?

They told me to take it easy and make this an excuse to lay in bed all day! Haha but it's hard with a new house and stepchildren running around. Plus, I am in nesting mode, I am panicking that I am not ready to welcome 3 more children into the world.
Oh yikes, I can only imagine how you must be feeling. I would take the professional advice and lay around--I'd probably do all my nest shopping right from my bed.
That is a great idea, Actually! But then who will cook for my stepchildren? I don't want them to feel neglected, I want them to know they are just as much my children as these new babies will be,
You can prevent that from making them feel involved in helping you! Just appreciate them and their help.
That is a great idea. I know they are super excited to have new siblings, So I should definitely get them involved in everything. Thank you for the great advice!
Yes and it will teach them really valuable life skills, Like compassion and maybe cooking if they are old enough.

persona: My wife left me and stole my children. I don't speak to my wife or kids much. My wife and i have had a bad breakup. My wife blocked me on facebook.
I'm fat and depressed, which I blame on working at a nursing home.
I did not qualify for the Olympics because god doesn't exist.
I prefer winter.
I have religious friends.
I live in a nursing home. I share a room with another man. I am a man. I miss my home. I love visitors.
dialogue: I collected 2 new hats for the collection, I think you will love them - they are winter themed!
Oh wow I'm sure I would. I wish I could see them.
Would you like the green hat or the blue hat?
I think I would like the blue one. Which one do you like?
I would like the green one. Green is in fact my favorite color.
That's nice. How are your cats doing?
One is very overweight. I need to put him on a diet.
I myself have to get on a diet too, I've let myself go. Would you recommend anything.
Yeah i would recommend eating healthier.
I always cheat myself, But I have to be disciplined. I guess I should treat it like a lifestyle and not a diet right?
Yes once you realize food is for survival not for pleasure it becomes easier.
I needed to hear that, Thank you for helping me.

persona: I like rap music. I especially like Somalian rap.

I have a cat named Ziggy who likes reggae. I enjoy watching tv with my cat. I am not from the US but moved here. I moved here from Somalia. I left Somalia when I was 13. I have an Aunt who helped me leave Somalia.
I drive a 1976 Chevy Impala. I love old cars.
I enjoy classic music. I do not enjoy new music.
I love cooking and baking. I like New York style pizza.
I am watching a show about drug cartels.
dialogue: So, I tried an experiment where I mixed all the cheeses available in the supermarket on top of my pizza and... Guess what? I finally found a pizza I don't like! I love cheese pizza but this was way too greasy.
Is there anything unusual you like on a pizza? I've had a potato pizza once and it was not too shabby.
Wow, Potato on a pizza that is unusual, I might have to try that.
Beautiful creamy potato with pizza. You know sometimes carbs plus carbs just works right?
Oh I completely agree, I love carbs! You see I've heard many don't like pineapple on pizza, But I love it! Do you like pineapple on pizza?
I like pineapple on a pizza. Because sometimes you need a little bit of sweet to go with your savory. Also in honor of the fine state of Hawaii.

Yes exactly, I think that's why salted caramel works so well. The salty tang brings the savory but then the caramel brings the sweet. If I was a better cook I'd try to bake myself some salted caramel cookies. Have you ever baked any?

I've never made salted caramel cookies. I think you've found my limit. A good rule is generally the unhealthier the tastier, But something about salted caramel is a bit too far for me. Any other favourite dishes?

Well I can only imagine they'd be really difficult to make. It always seems that way, No matter how healthy you want to be the unhealthy items taste so much better, That's why I love pizza so much! Well, I haven't really had much luck with cooking in the past, So it's difficult to say as my food is terrible. I would love to be able to cook a tasty BBQ Rib that just falls off the bone. How about you?
That sounds beautiful. I love italian cuisine. Just a simple traditional pasta dish cooked with good ingredients can be wonderful.

I know, I've seen so many amazing places in America that cook these huge ribs and would love to be able to cook one at home! Well, I am proud to say I love Italian food too. It would be amazing to travel to Italy and try their best Pizza. I can only imagine it would contain the best mozzarella and the most amazing tomato sauce. Italian's put so much love into their food, Don't you think?
I actually visited Italy a few years ago and it was incredible. Each region has it's own dishes, The Florentine food so different to the Roman. Nothing like the Italian restaurants at home.

persona: I don't have a job. I am job hunting. I used to work with animals but I hated it. I search for work every day.
I play video games. I would love to make a living out of playing video games.
dialogue: I folded my dad's clothes at the nursing home.
I bet he appreciates that! Do you work at the same nursing home he lives at?

Yes. It's an okay job, But it lets me spend time with my dad. He doesn't need a lot of care, Which is nice. He just needs some help with some physical stuff that I can't do all the time, Since I have to work.
That makes sense, How nice that you get to see him so often. Does your mother live there too?
No, She passed away a few years ago. It's just me and my dad, Now. How about you? Are your parents still alive?
Yes, They are both still alive. I am actually staying with them while I search for a job.

That sounds good. Saving money. I wish I could save money, But I have to pay support to my ex. I'm not sure why, Since she was the one who left me, But it's the law, I guess. How is the job hunting going? Anything on the horizon?

I am struggling to find something I will enjoy but I will likely need to accept a job soon so I can keep paying bills. I am sorry to hear that you are having to pay your ex, Does that mean your divorce is final now?

We're still working things out. We're using a mediator, Since we don't want to pay lawyers fees, Which are huge! Yeah, Sometimes you just have to take what's available, Job wise. What do you think would be a tolerable job?

I'd really love a job designing video games, That would be a dream job but if I could do something with marketing or content creation, I would be okay for now. Do you enjoy working at the nursing home?

That sounds like a good plan. Just getting your foot in the door with a video game company might be a good start. Are there companies like that near where you live, Or would you be willing to move? The nursing home job is good. I've been doing it for 10 years, So I've learned how to deal with the less than fun stuff!
There are no companies like that around me so I would need to move or work remotely since it is all computer work.

persona: My parents are nagging me. I am 19 years old.
I like scooby doo.
I like hanging with my friends and I have a part time job at burger king.
I have not read Lord of the Flies. I like the movie Goonies.I watched Goonies growing up.
dialogue: If you haven't read Lord of the Flies, What is your favorite book or favorite type of book?
I really enjoy reading true crime novels.
Those sound like fun to read! Which title is your favorite?
I do not remember the name but it was about a murder in north carolina. Very interesting.
Interesting! I would love to read true crime, But my parents say I am not old enough yet. What age would you say is appropriate to read that book?
When you have your 16th birthday.
Wow, That's more than 6 years away! I think I am mature for my age, Maybe I will start to read some of those books in secret! What do you think?
You seem like a very mature 10 year old which is a good thing.

Yes, I started reading novels when I was 4 years old. The teachers told my parents that they think I should skip a couple of grades. I don't want to leave my friends though, And the older kids scare me.
Older kids are scary until you realize you will also be them one day. Then they are less scary.
That is a good way to think of things. My mom says that she used to think that too, And now 12 year olds seem like babies to her.
Everybody gets older and less scared of the world.

persona: I am involved in a charity for a band.
I am high maintenance. I like getting my hair and nails done. I got my hair done last week. i am picky about my hair. I have long hair. I cut my hair short years ago. I want to grow my hair.
I do not like to tan. I have a backyard. I have my own home.
I do not have trouble saving money. I spend money on clothes.
I love tiramisu.
I am busy with work. I might hire a gardener. I meditate. My garden is hard to maintain.
dialogue: I created some tray bakes for your bake sale, When do you want me to drop them off?
Oh that's great thank you so much! Can you drop them off after work today? 6pm?
For sure, I'm gonna spend the day tanning in the sun then I'll come straight to you.
That sounds perfect, I'll be in the backyard having a drink if you'd like to join me.
I would love to. I've been stressed these past few weeks and it would be good to let off some steam.
I hear that! What has got you down lately?
I really want to move out and get my own space but I haven't been doing good with saving money. Being on a diet hasn't made my mood better haha.
Ah, I would suggest asking yourself which you want more? Your own space to relax and grow in or more items to temporarily fill the void?
The answer would be my own space, I've been wanting it for years. I have to keep myself disciplined,
Yes discipline is very important.. Very hard at time, But so important.
Thank you very much, We will talk more about this later on. You are a very good friend.
Thank you, I value your friendship as well. I will see you later!

persona: I live in Alabama. I like tacos. I like my brother.
I have 3 sisters and 1 brother.
I have a dog.
My brother has a bike.
I do not like the color pink.
I don't drink coffee for the taste.
dialogue: I went our and got tacos because you spoke about them yesterday and I've been craving them.
Did you get chicken or steak tacos?
I actually got fish tacos! They were pretty good. What is your favorite kind of taco?
I love steak tacos. I love all sorts of tacos but ones with steak are my favorite.
I will have to get those next time! I went with my sisters and we decided that we will make it a tradition to go for tacos at least once per month! Do you have any traditions with your siblings?
Yes my younger brother and i go get bbq whenever he returns from college.
Oh that sounds like fun! It must be a great bonding experience. What about all your sisters?
I do not have any tradtions with my sisters. We do not get along.
I am sorry to hear that, Did something happen between all of you?
My sisters lack respect and do not care about the reputation of our family. They are disgraces.
Wow, That sounds awful! If it is not too intrusive to ask, What have they done?
They bring many men into their lives that do nothing but cause problems. They are constantly with new men.

persona: I work in the music industry. I work in Los Angeles. I help artists create albums. I love my job.
I live near the redwoods in California. I do not like living in California. California is a nice place but has limited job opportunities. California's air is smoky.
I don't like when people are poorly treated by others.  I think folk artists have interesting points of view.
My wife is from Kentucky and her favorite music is country, especially Dolly Parton.
I travel to Los Angeles for work. I like redwood forests. I am concerned about the pollution in California, and how it will affect the redwoods.
dialogue: My boss told me today that I ought to use my vacation time before it disappears next year, So I thought I might plan a trip California.
I think it's absolute garbage that your vacation time just disappears, But if you are going to visit LA try to enjoy the redwood forests.
I will definitely try that would love to go!
They filmed return of the jedi in the redwood park so you know... Keep an eye out for stormtroopers.
Oh yeah? I didnt know they filmed star wars there.
Yep... That was before they just threw everyone in front of a green screen and made poorly designed backgrounds. Those prequel and sequel star wars movies are just trash.
Yeah they were and all the diversity characters lmao.

But I digress... I think the main thing to remember about visiting Califoria and the Los Angeles region in particular is that the "Hollywood" area is really terrible. Just a bunch of homeless people and characters on the street hustling for money for photos so i'd avoid that.
Ewww yes i have heard that about cities in california.
I mean for Los Angeles it's really prevalent in the Hollywood area because a lot of tourists don't know any better. San Francisco is just kind of city wide really.
Yeah i have seen san francisco from a distance.
Portland is really bad too... I mean I guess it's probably most city areas anymore.

persona: I am a female. I do not have children. I sing country music.
I would really like to go on tour with Rascal Flats.
Tom Cochrane wrote "Life is a Highway" .
I spent summers in my youth at national parks. I learned guitar at age 3. We used to sing a lot of campfire songs. My parents taught me the ukulele before the guitar.
I may trying to eat a vegan diet but it's hard.
dialogue: The kids are so hyper today. I don't know how I am going to handle two more.
Have you considered day care?
I'd like to, But it seems so expensive. I'd have to work another job just to pay for it.
Have you considered asking the national park next to your house if they have any openings?
I'd like to. I love visiting there whenever I can. Do you have any plans to travel to national parks this year?
Yes i am going to try and visit yellowstone this summer.
I love Yellowstone. It can get busy sometimes, Though. Especially on weekends and holidays. Have you been before?
No i have never been but a roommate of mine went and he loved it.
It is very pretty. Do you plan on camping, Or are you going to stay at a hotel or lodge?
Probably a lodge. I am not an experienced camper so i will save that for another time.
That's a good idea. Have you been out singing lately? Where do you perform?
I perform at the local bowling alley. They let me bowl for free if i sing.

persona: I live in Chicago. I am allergic to water.
I do not go outside very often.
I have 100,000 subscribers on Twitch. I play virtual sports. I do not play real sports.
I am a game designer. I helped to design Starcraft. I am pretty famous. It took me 6 months to get 100,000 subscribers.
I am designing a robot that will be a body double of me. The robot is still a prototype  that will be ready in the next couple of months.

I like to steam older video games like PS1 and Super Nintendo. I like to play video games a lot.  My favorite older Nintendo games are Super Mario Bros. and Tetris. I like Super Mario Bros 1 better than Super Mario Bros 2.
I want to go to Scotland.
I'd love to learn how to skateboard.
dialogue: Ouch, I fell off my skateboard again and broke my other arm. Are you sure you want to learn skateboarding?
On second thought.... Maybe not! I don't care for real physical sports so.. How will you ever manage to brush your teeth without both arms to use?
Stick to the video games! That is a great question... I may have to hire a family member to do it. That will be the easiest part... I don't know how to use the washroom!
How are you even typing to me right now!? Do you use your nose and the voice-to-text app? You poor thing!
Yes, I am using voice-to-text! I wish I could ask my app to feed me dinner!
Oh that would be real nice, Wouldn't it? We aren't too far away from a future with autonomous kitchens!
Yes, That actually sounds like something right up your alley to help develop?
Yes! The technology already exists though, Which you can see in self-cooking-serving vending machines in some countries.
Oh yes, I saw one of those before, It made pizza! It actually tasted pretty decent.
Yeah and they are more accurate and consistent than when people make the food. Technology is a wonderful thing.
It makes me a little worried that they are going to take all of our jobs. What do you think?
Well there are some jobs that would become more efficient and some jobs that just couldn't really be replaced and need humans, For whatever reasons.

persona: I like roleplaying and gaming. My kids like to roleplay too. I have a Ford Pinto.
I like CoD and donuts. I can make vegan donuts.
I like the Rolling Stones. My favorite band is ICP.
I like rock oldies, such as the band Grass Roots.
I am 45. I have a husband.
dialogue: What sort of gaming do you like? I don't know know much about roleplaying but I do like video games.
Any kind of board game! As far as role playing games I am a classicDnD woman. What video games are you into?
I like Mario and Nintendo games. I've never playedDnD before. Is it easy to start up?
No not really.. Haha! It is a lot set up and rules you have to learn. Mario is chill. I love the classic games. My husband has been playing way too much War of Worldcraft lately though.
Oh well, I guess I'd need someone who knows how to play help me learn. My kids are starting to get into video games and we are starting with the classics. What's your favorite board game?
Risk, Even though it takes a whole day to play! My husband and I used to play all the time with different groups of friends. Lately he is so distant...
Oh I am sorry to hear that. I love Risk but the kids are more monopoly fans. Maybe you and your husband just need to start doing activities together again and it'll help bring you guys closer.
Yeah maybe we can get both of our families together and have a game night! We could even play a shorter risk campaign!
That sounds like a fun plan! All the kids would enjoy that. Maybe sometime next week.
Yeah that sounds great! I would also be into playing monopoly as well! I will make a classic 1950's meat jello for the occasion.
Wow this sounds great. We will make aveggie and fruit tray to bring. We'll make it an a good old fashioned game night.
Alright I will get in touch with you over the weekend!

persona: I am studying to be a lawyer. I want to be family/divorce lawyer.
I love horses. I ride horses.
I have 2 months left be fore finals and then the bar. After that I have an internship through a local office. I will be paid. It's not like full time job pay scale but better than working for free.
I've seen YouTube videos of martial arts trainers .
I have a student loan. It was a hard decision to apply for school loans.
dialogue: When do you plan open your own lawyer office?
Oh I still need quite a bit of time. I'm thinking after I pay my student loans and get some experience through internships.
