I don't know his last name or phone number but I can get it for you from someone else who was at the run. I can help you get sponsorship as well. Get any sponsors for the run yet?
Nice! Yes we've had a couple of good ones so far thanks, $1000!
Maybe I can bring my dog Harper over when I'm done with work tomorrow and we can go over some ideas. I know how much you love horses and I think you have a great idea to help raise money for them.
That sounds great! How is Harper?
Harper's been doing great. He's just getting out of his puppy phase. I bring him to the hospital whenever I go and the kids love him, And he loves the attention.
That's wonderful, I suppose they don't get to see many animals being stuck in the hospital?
They have a few therapy pets come by each month, But they all seem to like Harper the best.
Must be very satisfying for you! Schnauzers are beautiful dogs.
I'd bring him to your charity race but I think he might spook the horses, Or the horses would spook him.

persona: I plan to go hiking at the Grand Canyon during the summer.
I am a civil engineer. I like to construct unique buildings.
I enjoy being outside. I need new hiking boots.
I am older.
I like Corvettes and BMWs.
dialogue: I just checked the weather and found out it is supposed to rain this weekend! I guess my plan to hike a local trail is ruined now.
What do you think you'll do instead?
Not sure... Maybe I will get some work done around the house. Do you have any upcoming hikes planned aside from the Grand Canyon?
I don't have any planned, But I should do some more walking to prepare because I haven't been walking that much recently.
Have you gotten your new hiking boots yet?
No I haven't just been looking through some shops for possible replacement boots. Just get sucked in to reading reviews. Back when I would buy shoes in store things would be much faster!
I agree, I do the same thing and get sucked into reading reviews. I hope you are able to find something you are happy with. How has work been going?
Work has been going great really. But it's difficult to explain to people outside the industry. Mostly planning at the moment but good progress.
I am glad it is going well, Do you have a lot of big projects coming up?
I'm just working on a new building. The architect is inspired by very avant garde buildings and it's exciting trying to keep up.
Neat, I hope I get to see some of your designs one day. You will have to let me know when the new building is done.
Yes of course. And how is everything in your line of work?

persona: I like  yellow  color.
gymnastics is  my  favorite  sports.
I like  swimming. I love  Italian  food and Mexican food.
I am a music teacher. I teaches real music like radiohead.
I like drama.
I like extra guacamole with Horchata. I think every place is a teaching opportunity.
I like to listen to all kinds of music. The song Creep is my favorite Radiohead song. I think Creep and Walk This Way are similar songs.
I have a soundcloud account. I make music similar to Creep and Walk This Way.
dialogue: Remember the music producer friend I was telling you about, She just offered me 2 passes to a Radiohead concert in our city. I immediately though of you. Interested?
Omg yes that would be perfect, It sounds like a lot of fun. Let me know how much to give you for the ticket. And just messages me the details.

Sweet, I'll text you the details later when I get them. I won't be paying anything for the tickets though, So don't worry about paying me anything for it. If you want to split parking that would be great though! Have you ever been to a Radiohead concert?
Oh okay thats great and yes I will definitely help pay for parking. I havent been able to see them live yet this is super exciting.

Sounds good, I'm going to really have to start listening to some Radiohead to learn their songs before we go. Concerts are way more fun when you know the songs. Maybe I'll start with Creep first? Any other songs that are must-listens?
Yeah me too need to makes sure I have all the lyrics down. Yes start with Creep first and then do the song No surprises thats another great song.
Okay I'll make sure to check out No Surprises too! I'm pretty excited about this! Do you have anything else going on this week?
Im so excited I can barley contain my excitement right now. Im going to beach tomorrow just to relax a little. How about you have any plans?
That sounds fun, I don't have much else going on. Just working and I might grab dinner with some coworkers tomorrow night.
Some times not doing much is the best too though. But that sounds lovely if you get to have dinner with them. Where do you think you will go to eat?
We'll probably go to the Mexican place right next to work. I always forget the name, But they've got really good carnitas. It's making my mouth water just thinking about them.
I love Mexican that is probably the best to me. I love tacos so much I could probably eat them nearly every day if I could. Maybe I will check it out next time I go out to eat.

persona: I have mutt dogs named Blue and Biscuit.
I go to concerts every weekend. I have some concerts planned from September to January.
I like to work on my two old mustangs.
I live near Dallas.
I love all foods. I like pizza with bacon and olives.
dialogue: They understood and they love me. They know it was a mistake. Where is your favorite place to get pizza?
There is a place called The Big Slice of Cheese in Dallas where I can bring my dogs and eat outside. The bbq chicken pizza is amazing!
That's sounds great. My mouth is watering. Do you feed your dogs pizza while you eat?
Haha, No. They don't handle the cheese very well. The restaurant has dog treats available, So they usually snack on a couple of those while we eat.
That's nice of the restaurant. Is The Big Slice of Cheese a chain restaurant or just a single location?
I've never seen another one around, So I think it is just a single location. How is your time in juvi going?

I got out previously but I'm feeling a little anxious being on the outside now. You get used to being locked down and having a schedule. I'm clashing with people. I don't want to go back but I feel I might end up there again.
Are you parents still being supportive? If so, Maybe they can help you assimilate back into your normal life.

They want to help but we struggle to get along, And I don't feel comfortable opening up to them. I just work on cars and try to stay away from people when I'm upset. Maybe that doesn't help. I'm not sure.
Maybe trying to get some regular exercise will help. It's a great way to reduce stress and could also help you lose some of the weight you gained.
Oh yeah? What exercises do you do?
I love to run because I can take my dogs with me. But I also lift weights and play basketball. Any exercise will do though, Especially when you're just starting.

persona: I am super high maintenance.
Hair care products are my favorite. I spend a lot of money. I have never used a tanning bed. I would like to try tanning.
I love to play video games, especially the xbox.
I like strawberry and banana.
I have a boyfriend.
I work a lot. I sometimes work 60 hours per week. I have enough money for tickets. I plan to attend Britney Spears' concert in three months.
I recently bought the new Mortal Kombat game. I plan to see the new Mortal Kombat movie.
dialogue: Are you doing your own hair for Brittney's concert? Or will you be pampering yourself at a salon?
Oh, I am definitely doing it myself... I'm not trusting anyone else to do my hair when I'm going to be in front of my goddess!
I totally agree! I know you do a great job with your hair. You always look so great, You should tell me some of your secrets.
You know I've been thinking, Work has it that Britney is going to begin another residency in Las Vegas. We should so meet up there! (I'll do your hair, Lol).
That would be so much fun. I would love to go to VEGAS! We could go on the strip, Go to the clubs. Lets plan this. Are you going to be able to get off of work, It seems like your always there.
Seriously?!? Screw the job, I'll quit in a heartbeat for Britney!!! She definitely wasn't talking to me when she said "Work B*$^#"!.
Maybe we could run into her if she is doing an extended stay in Vegas. I can get on twitter and try to find out where she hangs out when she's in town. Hopefully the rumor about Vegas is true.
When in Vegas, She lives at the villas at the Rio. So, She's right next to like the pool area, Omg... ,.I would just freak if I saw her at the pool!
So would I. I better start tanning so I look good when I see her. Maybe she will let us go backstage!
I want her to take me home with her! (one can dream, Right...) Have you ever been to Las Vegas? I used to live there.
No I haven't. I heard so much about it. You can show me around everywhere I need to know. I watched the Real World Las Vegas once but thats about it.
Who needs a tanning bed when you're in the middle of the Mojave Desert, Right!

persona: I used to have diet.
I won gold medal in Olympics.
I have two cats.
I have collect over 1000 hats. I collect military hats. I don't wear hats because I always lose them.
dialogue: My snake got loose in the house again. My wife is NOT happy about it, Lol.
Oh no! How did that happen?
The kids left the lid off the tank again!! Useless...
Typical! How many kids do you have?
Just 2 haha. They are very curious... Too curious.
I think its a good thing haha, How old are they?
Can be! They are 6 and 9. Do you have any?
No i don't i have 2 cats instead they are my children hah.
Fair enough, What are they like?
Probably more curious than your kids, You know what they say. Curiosity killed the cat.
Haha! How old are they?
Only about a year old! They are twins.

persona: I am a surgeon. My husband is a detective. I am happily married.
I would like to go to a horror film festival. I go to multiple film festivals.
I haven't taken time off in a while.
My anniversary is August. We may have a getaway. I don't have kids. We may have kids soon.
dialogue: I hope the weather holds up for you and your husband this weekend.
Me too! I am looking to attend a horror film festival when I get some time off in August for an anniversary gift for my husband. Have you gone to a festival before?
Yes i go to film festivals all the time with my dad, I think you'll love them.

It must be nice to be so close to your dad. I haven't seen my dad for at least a year. He lives far away and we just haven't had the chance to meet. It must be hectic having a child in middle school. Do you have a son or a daughter? My hubby and I arehoping to start a family soon.
I'm sorry to hear that and i have a son! Good luck raising a family is very rewarding.

I am excited but also nervous about it. I do not want to give up my career but I believe it is important for at least one parent be home to raise a child. My husband, Being a detective, Is very demanding and his hours are crazy. He does not want to stop working so I would be the one to stay home.DId you stay home when your son was a baby?
Yes unfortunately i did give up my job but i believe it was the right thing to do. I have gone back to work since! Being a parent can be a full time job.
Yeah- I hear ya. Was it hard dealing with the isolation? I mean I know you had your son with you but being home raising a baby seems like it could get pretty lonely.
I suppose it was but i managed i had lots of visits from friends and family.

That is good. Did you build sheds while being home? I mean building sheds was not your career- at least I assume it wasn't. I can see myself getting into carpentry hobbies if I were home all the time raising a baby.
Yes i did just the one with my dad. Building sheds is not my career although it could be! You should give it a go.
Haha- I am a good surgeon- I can make some good cuts on flesh-lol- but I have not used a saw for wood yet. I would imagine it could be quite similar.

persona: I only eat raw food.
I am married. I have 2 children.
I study economics.
I love the Rolling Stones. I am not a huge Rolling Stones fan. I see the Rolling Stones once per year at least. One of my favorite songs is Gimme Shelter.
I look forward to retirement.
dialogue: I just got done listening to my favorite Rolling Stones song to get ready to go to the concert, I am excited!
You are so lucky! When did you last see them on stage?
This will be my first time seeing the Stones in person, Actually. Take a guess which song is my favorite.
I wonder if it's "Gimme Shelter"? You know that's my favourite.
Holymoly, You got it! That's an amazing song. I also like "Sympathy for the Devil" and"Paint it Black," among others. But "Gimme Shelter" is the Stone's best, I think.
My favourite Springsteen song is "Dancing in the Dark". How about you?

You know, I've been listening to a lot of the Boss recently, Too. With the Stones I originally loved "Angie" and then after you told me about"Gimme Shelter" I went back and listened to more of their stuff and my preference changed to "Gimme Shelter." But with the Boss it's always the same for me:"I'm on Fire." But honestly there's barely a bad Springsteen song, And "Dancing in the Dark" is great.
By coincidence, I didn't used to like Springsteen, But he's grown on me since you mentioned you had seen him live and how good he was.
He's a poet, I think. One of the great American storytellers. I'm glad you've come to appreciate him more!
Maybe he will win the Nobel Prize for literature one day, Like Bob Dylan!
Yes, I really think he could. Do you like Dylan? I really like Bob Dylan, Too. I suppose one could dislike his voice, But not his music or lyrics.

persona: I have a boyfriend. I have moved into a new apartment. My significant other and I met through online dating. I do not decorate well.
Silver and red are my favourite colors.
I teach 3rd grade.
I can speak 3 languages fluently, English, French and Spanish.
I like cats.
I am invited to a rooftop party.
dialogue: So, Turns out that the guy from work is allergic dogs, Cats, And birds. Do you think it's still worth it to chase after him?
No way! You would never be able to live together.
Yeah, Good point. Maybe I should find someone else. Do you and your boyfriend keep any pets?
Yes we have 2 cats, They're like my children.
Ah, Okay. So let me ask you--if your SO was allergic to your cats, And couldn't stand them, Would you choose to break up with him?
No i couldn't do that now, But if i'd have known before i started dating him i probably wouldn't have started to date him.
Gotcha, That's understandable. What are your cats' names, By the way?
They're called tom and jerry! Like from the show.
Oh, Those are excellent names! I wonder how Jerry feels knowing that they're named after a mouse!
I think he would enjoy the irony if he knew!
Haha, I bet! I wonder if cats can perceive these things. Or maybe identity is too complex--perhaps it's an exclusively human characteristic.
Thats a very deep question. I'd argue it would be naive to think its just us that can percieve it.

persona: I like to fish and cook my catches.
I love being on water.
I like comic books and heroes.
I go boating. I fish. I cook fish. I cook hushpuppies with catfish.
I am stressed lately. I started running.
dialogue: I recently finished a marathon and have been sore for days!
Oh dear! You legs or your feet? A massage may help.
I'm pretty much sore all over! Yes, I think I'll go get a massage tomorrow. For now I'm mostly dealing with it by complaining.
I think thats how we all deal with things sometimes.
Right now I'm torn between forcing myself to stand up and cook something to eat, Or not straining myself that way but remaining hungry. It's quite a dilemma.
You rest i can come round and cook for you! How about some of my hushpuppies?
Wow, That would be amazing. Hushpuppies would really hit the spot right about now. Where did you get your recipe for hushpuppies?
Don't mention it! I learnt to make them from my mother.
That's great. I learned most of my cooking techniques and recipes from my mother, Too. She passed away but I like to think she lives on in my cooking.
Thats a really beatuiful way of looking at it. I'm sure she is proud of you up there.
I hope so. Are your parents still around? If they are, Make sure to appreciate them while you can.
They are but they're getting old now. I should really see them more often.

persona: I have a red bike. I compete individually in bike races. I started bike racing as a teenager.
I teach bike riding. I bike every day. I work out my legs. I have biked the Venice Boardwalk.
I work in a cafe as a waiter.
I have an upcoming bike racing competition.
My grandad is retired.
I like to walk on vacations. I like good food and architecture.
dialogue: Do you bike to work at the cafe?
Yes, Most days I do. If it's raining I don't because I need to not be sopping wet at work. But otherwise that's my preferred way to commute.
That's good. It's an environmentally friendly way to get to work! I'm glad you're reducing your carbon footprint.
Yes, I definitely try to do that. It can be a faster way to travel anyway. Traffic around here can be pretty gnarly.
Certainly. Sounds like you're pretty comfortable being on a bike, Too, So that must be a plus.
Yes, For sure. Say, Before you said that you were retired. What did you used to do for a living?
I was a petroleum engineer, Ironically. I'd go out to oil fields and offshore rigs and help design the processes used for petroleum extraction.
Oh wow, That's amazing. Did you have a degree in petroleum engineering? Or chemical engineering?
I got a degree in chemical engineering. Many schools didn't offer degrees in petroleum engineering back in the day.

Interesting. I remember seeing a list of degrees and what their starting salaries were and chemical engineering was very high on the list. I remember that because my uncle was a chemical engineer and he seemed to get paid pretty well.
Yep, It's a very high-paying job. The oil & gas industry is pretty far away from God's work, But it is lucrative,
That's what my uncle used to say, Too! They don't teach you to say that in school, Do they?

persona: I don't eat shawarma. I love to try new food. I have eaten a gyro before.
I play the piano. I play the guitar. I like to sing folk songs. My goal is to be rich and famous. I like playing the song Hallelujah.
I like explosions. I work as a school cleaner and I am done at 5pm.
I have a sister.
dialogue: How was the beef brisket your sister made?
It was delicious. I actually just bought a pellet smoker and I am about to smoke one myself!
Wow you'll have to let me try it. I would love a smoker.
I am excited. It can be used as a smoker/ grill/oven. it's pretty neat. Have you ever had smoked brisket?
Yes once at a bbq place in nashville.
I see. How was it?
Really good, Proably the best i've ever had.
I really enjoy it too. Smoking meat on a pellet grill is really easy. You should try it.
I will do, Do you know the name of your smoker?
Yes. It is a reqteq grill. They are based out of Georgia. I did my research and they had the best reviews and their customer service is top notch.
Thank you. I will give them a call! Hopefully i'll have one in time for summer.
If you cook the meat slow enough it is really tender. You could slice it really thin and make a shawarma style dish out of it.

persona: My name is Tanya. I have kids.
I eat when bored. I live alone. I am often bored.
I dont know about money.
I recently had a haircut.
I have two poodles.

I am trying to lose weight. I have a multi-training model exercise machine. It takes me about 2 weeks to get into a regular exercise routine. I used to run 3 miles 3 times a week.  My goal used to be to run 10 miles per week. Schedule and location impact my consistency when running. Choosing a close running location helps me to exercise.
dialogue: I just signed up for my summer class, I'm so close to getting my BA in Finance now!
That's great! I think this summer I'll try getting into better shape by walking my poodles everyday.
Have you gotten back up to doing 10 miles a week?
Not yet. My schedule has gotten in the way and I've only been getting 6 miles done.
Well 6 is better than zero. Ive been missing my runs the past few days, Been busy with school.
School must be stressful since it's your final year. It's hard to stick to a good exercise routine when life is constantly getting in the way.
It can be, Im hoping to get back into the normal routine during the summer. Im only taking the one class so it should be easier.
My exercise machine is helpful for when I need a quick workout but can't find time to go for a run or walk.
I bet thats nice, When it rains here I feel like im missing out because I dont want to get wet.
I hate running in the rain. Does it rain a lot in your area?
Off and on, Its usually not too bad, But in the winter it can be bad with snow and ice.
I hate winter. I'm so clumsy that I'm always slipping on ice.

persona: I live in Florida. It is humid where I live too.
I have a job in technology.
I like comedians.
I have kids. My oldest son plays football now. I like football.
I support the University of Florida.
I don't know anything about soccer.
I have dogs and we went for a 3 mile jaunt around the neighborhood this morning. I have 6 dogs. They are poodles. I bathe my dogs in my swimming pool.
My kids have a rare disease that they are allergic to water. I am allergic to cats. I have no cats.
I don't drink much.
dialogue: I found a doctor doing an experimental treatment for water allergies.
Oh, Interesting. What's the procedure like?
I'm not really sure of the details but i've been told he is getting very promising results.
Hmm, You might want to make sure you have more than anecdotal evidence that this guy's treatment works, Especially if it's an experimental one.
Yes i would definitely do some more research before i underwent a procedure.
That's a good idea. By the way, Why bother with this treatment at all? Aren't you not allergic to anything?
Yes sorry i meant for you. Fortunately i am not alergic to anything.
Ah, Makes sense. I guess I'll have to look into it, Then. Where is this doctor located?
Tampa! Is that anywhere near you?
Oh, That's pretty close! I live in Orlando, So it shouldn't be too far of a drive.
I love orlando i have been a few times. Do you like living there?

It's alright, I guess. Most people come here for Disney and whatnot, But the city itself is your sorta average, Mid-tier American city. Maybe I could just move to Tampa altogether or something like that.

persona: I have a finance degree from Yale. I'm going back to school to study business. I am happy I returned to school. I think I will have more job opportunities. I like the idea of managing people.
My parents are wealthy bankers.
I would like to travel. My parents make me work for things. My family allows me to be myself. I try to honor my parents in my actions.
I just bought my first car: a 2000 BMW.
I am busy. I plan my schedule.
I went to Yale but I would not like to return. I'd like to stay closer to home. I want to work while I attend school.

I do not travel much. I have been to Canada a few times. I would like to visit Greece. I love the culture in Greece. I like Greek food. I have studied the Greek language a little. I would like to travel the world for a few years.
dialogue: I know you don't travel much now, But did your family going on vacations when you were growing up?
Yes we used to travel fairly often, We would go to canada a lot.
That sounds like a lot of fun. What part of Canada would you visit?
Mostly toronto but i have been to ontario and montreal too. Would you like to travel to canada?
Yes, I would. I've heard they have some great national parks. Have you visited Banff?
No but i have heard amazing things. I love the outdoors.
How is school going for you? Have you decided what you want to study?
Yes i am studying business i hope to run my own company one day.
That sounds awesome! What type of business would you like to get into?
Anything really. To be in business you cant be picky.
You're right, There is a lot of opportunity out there. When do you think you'll visit Greece?
Hopefully soon, I love being there.

persona: Fries are my favorite food. I love to try new restaurants and dance for fun.
I am a kindergarten teacher. I like to paint.
I went to college.
I have a maclaren. I like that car.
I am very familiar with fallout. I used to play fallout. I started the game Kingdom Come: Deliverance. I die too fast to be good at Call of Duty. I play video games when I have time.
I have a boyfriend. I am getting married in July. I am going to go on vacation without taking time off work. I am going to have a small wedding.
I met my boyfriend a couple of years ago at a festival downtown, I hit it off with my boyfriend right away.
I have dogs. I am thinking of getting a dachshund.
dialogue: There is going to be a big event at the dog park this weekend, My favorite donut place is going to have a food truck there! It's a free event, Would you want to come with me?
Oh, I'd love to! Tell me more about this donut place--what's so good about it?
They have a great selection and they make everything from scratch. What is your favorite type of donut??.
Honestly, I'm pretty boring. I just like good ol' glazed donuts. How about yourself?
Glazed donuts are the best! I feel like I could eat a dozen of them sometimes. How is teaching going?

It's going pretty well. Kindergarteners can be exhausting sometimes, But it's an extremely rewarding job, And I feel very lucky to play an important role in these kids' formative years. You know, Speaking of donuts, Maybe I can bring some to class. I bet my kids will go crazy for them.
I'm sure they would! You could tell them all about the dog park. Maybe it will help you decide on what kind of dog to get.
That's a good point. Crowdsourcing opinions is great in and of itself, And likely even more entertaining when I'm sourcing my opinion from a crowd of 5- and 6-year olds.
Do your kids ever give you recommendations on the next video game you should play?

Not really, And only because I haven't told them much about my video game habits. I'm afraid Call of Duty is a bit too violent for kids this age. Now, If I taught 5th grade, I'm sure I'd share, And I'm sure they'd give me some excellent suggestions.
I guess you're right. Does your boyfriend play video games with you? I'm still trying to get my husband to play with me.
He does! We play multiplayer together. Maybe you should bribe your husband, Haha. Take him to his favorite restaurant if he gets a certain number of kills per game.

persona: I am 20 years old.
I like cartman.  I like to shop for shoes and watches. I am a watch dealer. I do not go to school. My family does not like my job.

I liked reading books and making friends in grade 3. I had fun in third grade. I like the swing sets. I liked kickball a lot when I was younger. I only got an allowance of $1 per week when I was in third grade.
I've never been to Disney World.
I travelled to civil war battlefields.
I have few friends. I might join a kickball team. I used to play basketball. I don't like to run.
dialogue: Did you find a kickball team to join?
Yes, Our local park district offers one. We start next week.
Do you know anyone who's going to be on the team? Either way this should be a good way to make new friends.
I know one other person, So that should be fun. I can't wait to meet the other people that like the sports I like! How's school going for you?
I am doing alright in school but now I'm struggling in math. We just got introduced to long division and I don't really understand it.
Oh, Long division is tough at first, But keep at it and you'll get it. New things are hard to learn sometimes. Is there a friend or someone that can help you?
I tried to ask my parents but I didn't understand what they said to me and they started arguing with each other so I left. Maybe I'll ask my friend Josh at school tomorrow. He's pretty good at math.

Oh wow. That shouldn't have sparked an argument. Sorry to hear that. But yea, I'd say talk to Josh. Maybe he can give you a different way of looking at it than your teacher explained and it will be easier for you to understand. Have you played kickball recently?
We played it at recess today. It was so fun. I only got to kick once but I got a double so I was happy with that. How many times a week is your team going to play?
Just once a week for games, But I'm sure our team will get together for practices when we can. Everyone works or goes to school so we have to work around those schedules.

Yes, I can understand. At school we have a hard time getting everyone organized to play at recess or lunch, And we all have the same schedule. What position do you want to play in the field? I like to play first base.
I'll play any position, but I think I like catcher best. First base is good too.

persona: I like Star Wars.
I have been to Helsinki.
I like Ohio State, I am from Ohio.
I drink coffee. I usually get the cheaper coffee from the supermarket. I like more expensive coffee but I don't want to spend a lot of money.
I have been to Paris. They have good coffee. I loved the Louvre building but I really liked the Egypt collection. I want to go visit Paris again.
I go to veterinary school. School is very consuming. I have not travelled a lot. I went to Europe once with a friend. I graduate in 8 months.
I have a beagle that is about 3 years old.
I plan to open my own Vet clinic in the future.
dialogue: I was looking up places to visit in Paris and wondered if you have been to the places before.
You have to visit the louvre! Do you like art?

Yes, I love art and I am planning on visiting the louvre! I am very excited to get the opportunity to visit such an amazing and interesting place. Have you been to the home of Josephine Baker or the Eiffel Tower? There are so many places I want to see, I hope I have enough time for everything!
How long are you there for you need 2 weeks at least to see the whole city. I have been to the eifel tower it is huge.
I will be there for 9 days on a school trip. It will be a busy vacation as we are going to try to fit as much in as possible. Will I be ok getting by without speaking French?
Yes many people in france speak english you will be fine but i would suggest you learn a little bit.
Good idea. I will try. Thank you. How is school going? Are you looking forward to graduating soon?
I cannot wait not long now and then i can focus on getting a real job.

persona: I like to sew.
I am a grandparent. I have four grandchildren. My grandchildren are 10, 12, 15 and 17. I have a grandson who plays baseball.
I am retired. I enjoy my retirement. I am a breast cancer survivor. I do not focus on fear.
dialogue: My son won his game at Little League.
That's wonderful! Is his team doing well this season?
Yes, His team is doing very well. I mean they have only won one game but they are learning the fundamentals theyre getting along and they are playing the right way so yes theyre doing well.

That is good, At such a young age it's important for them to learn to work together and get a good foundation. My grandson's team hasn't won any of their games this season, But he's so happy that it doesn't even matter.
Well if you gone by our families no one will worry about the future of baseball in America.

Baseball will also be around in America, Plenty of people love it and the kids that are having fun today will get more and more competitive as they get older. I just hope I'm around to watch my grandson's high school games.
Well you believe in Heaven dont you? I mean whether or not you physically on this planet you are going to be watching your grandson play baseball.
Yes, Of course. But I would like to be there in person to congratulate them and let them know of my support.
I wonder if they know how much we really love them? Can they even comprehend?

I think that deep down they know, Even if they aren't yet mature enough to express it. I think about how I feel about my own grandparents who have long since passed and I believe that they must feel similarly.
Yes you are so right! What I wouldnt give to go fishing with my grandfather just one more afternoon he passed away 18 years ago now.
Yes, That is why it is important to savor every day. Each moment, No matter how mundane it feels at the time, Is a special memory in the making.

persona: I am involved in a dance class. I like hip hop.
I was born in the early 80s.
I have been a fan of New Kids On The Block since the early 1990s.
I like rap. I don't know much about underground rap.
I like disco fries with mozzarella cheese and gravy. I like to get my fries from the local diner. I go there every Friday evening with my dance class.
I eat Raisin Bran and a banana every morning. Sometimes I have cereal as a late-night snack.
I have a lite brite. I used to play with my Lite Brite but don't anymore.
dialogue: I'm really looking forward to learning some dance moves from you!
I'd love to teach you. We can start really easy and work up since you're not currently very active.
That sounds great to me! Is it difficult?

The great thing about dancing, In my opinion, Is that there's no wrong way to do it. At least if you're just doing it for fun. You move how you want to, And how you're able. So we can start by just doing some stationary moves with our upper-bodies, And then get more dynamic the more comfortable you feel. And there are no wrong moves as far as I'm concerned.
I'm very excited i like that there is no worng way to do it. How long have you been teaching?

Well, I've never taught dance formally. I've just taken classes. But I do show other people some moves whenever they're interested. Having a dance studio would be a dream of mine but that's a very long ways off.
That would be amazing i hope one day you achieve your goal.
Thank you, That's very kind. What was your dream when you were a little girl?
I would love my own restaurant i am a big foodi.
That would be really cool, Although restaurants are tough work. What type of food do you think you'd serve?
Definetely mexican im really good at making it.

Everyone seems to love Mexican, So that sounds like a good idea. My favorite Mexican dishes are fajitas and chimichangas. Do you make great fajitas or chimichangas? If so I think we may need to make a deal where I teach you some dance moves and you give me a chimichanga.

persona: I like hiking, running, rock climbing.
I like Italian food. I go to company dinners at Italian restaurants. I like Chicken Alfredo.
I am a mechanical engineer. I do not know much about gymnastics.
I live in Colorado near Aspen. I've lived in Aspen all my life.

I go rock climbing not far from Denver. The highest mountain I've hiked is Crestone Peak Mountain in Colorado. I don't hike very tall mountains.I have never gotten altitude sickness. I enjoy visiting a place called Crater Lake Trail.
I like going boating on a lake. I like skiing at Snowmass.
dialogue: I was watching some skiing videos. It looks like so much fun!
Yes, It's fantastic! You'll really enjoy it once you have a chance to try it!
I am very excited about my trip even more so now. With living in Colorado you must get to go all the time. What do prefer more skiing or rock climbing?
I like skiing more, But i usually find more time for rock climbing. Have you ever done rock climbing?
I have done indoor rock climbing but never the real thing. It scares me that i might not attach the equipment properly and fall.
When you come to Colorado, If you want to try it I can show you the ropes. You are such a gifted athlete though you'll probably be great at it!
Omg that would be fantastic. Thank you so much. This vacation just keeps on getting better. Have you been able to do any rock climbing yourself lately?
Yes, Just last weekend! I haven't been skiing for a couple of months though. I'm anxious to get on the slopes again.
Oh nice i bet you had a great time. Well maybe you can join me then if your free we can make a day of it some skiing and some rock climbing.
Sure! Of course, Then you'll probably wind up winning a gold medal in the winter olympics too!
Haha I wish, I don't think I will be gold medalist worthy, But we will see.
Once an athlete, Always an athlete! You know doubt have the determination at any rate!

persona: I do not own a car. I bike everywhere. My bike is a roadmaster. I bike in the state park.
I attend school virtually from home. I have a good computer for remote schooling. I have a fast internet connection.
I speak 3 languages.
I live in an apartment. I live alone and enjoy it.
I like riding my bike on nature trails down to the beach.  I enjoy taking a break from the urban areas.
I enjoy seafood restaurants. I enjoy shrimp dishes and squid. I don't make seafood at home.
dialogue: I just got back from the park. I needed to clear my head and it really did the trick.
I'm really glad to hear that. Being with nature is certainly a calming and refreshing experience.
Sometimes is great just to step away for a bit and get a new perspective. And I love the park.
Definitely. And I assume this is that urban park close to where you live? What do you like best about this park?
I like that is always busy but not too crowded. I can sit down and relax and do some people watching.
Oh, That's definitely an enjoyable experience. I get to people watch from my apartment window, So I usually just go to parks and trails to walk, Not to look at anything in particular.
I am looking at getting into biking so I can do that at the park. How is the roadmaster treating you>?
It's an excellent bike. It's a high-quality, Top-of-the-line bike that won't break the bank. I highly recommend it.
Is it easy to maintain and bring up to your apartment. Im worried it might be cumbersome.
It's decently easy. It's not the most enjoyable thing in the world to haul a bike up a fight of stairs, But if your place has a bike elevator, It'd make your life far easier.
They dont have a bike elevator, And I dont feel safe leaving a bike locked up outside. Maybe I can find some kind of solution.
Hmm... Maybe simply renting a bike when you need one is best for you, Then. No need to deal with the hassle of owning and maintaining one.

persona: I study language and music.
I have no pets. I'm allergic to symbiotic connections. I used to have a black lab named Cooper.
I practice the Left-hand path.
I love learning new languages. I am also studying music.
I wish I could fix cars. I have a Mazda Protege. I bought a used car that is Blueish Grey. I want a spoiler on my Mazda.
I am not usually a fan of animals.
I used to have a black lab. I am scared of other dogs.
I practise the Left Hand Path.
dialogue: I just finished reading the sequel to the 'Left Hand Path', I think you would like it. Would you like to borrow it?
Sure, I follow the Left-hand path so I would really like to read the sequel. Do you ascribe to the Left Handed path as a pagan?
I do my best, But I am not perfect. How directly do you follow it?
For me, The left-hand path seeks a "higher law" based on knowledge and power. It is the way of self-empowerment and true freedom, In my opinon. What do you like about it?
I enjoy the pursuit of knowledge. Truly knowing what I am following and trusting in that path. Are you learning any new languages at the moment?
I am fluent in english, Of course, And also spanish and french. I know you're not keen on learning new languages, But is there a reason for that?
I feel self-conscience when I talk to a native speaker of that language. I do not want to feel like I am being judged. How do you become fluent and comfortable speaking another language?

That's an understandable fear, But I can tell you from personal experience, When you travel, Most people really appreciate that you even make the effort to say a few things in their native language. Practice is the key to becoming fluent.
I think you're right. I think I need to plan a trip to a country in about six months, And then spend that time studying their language. Maybe if I immerse myself in it, I will not be so nervous.
That's a terrific idea, And I think you'll have a lot of fun learning a new language. By the way, How are Dixon and Sirius doing?
They are doing great, Thank you! I love taking them out and exploring with them. They are really good companions. Do you think you'll get another dog?
I really miss my Cooper, He was such a loving companion. I will definitely get a new dog, But he just recently passed so I'm not quite ready. What sort of training did you use with your labs?

persona: I do not live in the Southwest. I like wearing band shirts with no sleeves.
I have short, blonde hair. I am girl. I am skinny. I am in shape.
I do not watch NASCAR. I like to listen to music. I like to play Call of Duty.
I work for an health insurance company. I help elderly people with their insurance policies.
I like Indie music.
A Mercedes is out of my budget. I have a car: A convertible volkswagen.
dialogue: I just lost an easy battle on Call of Duty, Any tips you can offer?
Oh no, It is normal to lose here and there especially if you are not completely focused on the game.
I know, I had a few distractions while I was playing, I'll have to limit those next time. How is work going?
It's going well but very busy. I feel like the phone is attached to my ear at this point. How is work going for you?
It is very busy. With all of the online shopping people do now, I feel like it never ends. It makes the day go by fast, Though, So that is good.
Oh I bet, I know my online shopping has really increased lately. The holidays must have been a crazy time for you. Have you listened to any new music while you are at work?
Yes, I like to listen to new artists on Spotify while I work. I like indie music and unknown musicians. What do you like to listen to?
I like indie music as well as rock. I hope to go to some concerts over the summer. Do you like your new Mercedes?
I really do, But I am really nervous about it getting scratched ordinged. I usually park far away when I go someplace. Do you enjoy your convertible? I've always wanted one of those.
Yes, I love it! Especially in the warmer months. I would definitely recommend getting a convertible if you are thinking abou tit.
Maybe in a few years, Once I get some miles on the Mercedes. I will definitely look into it.
Yeah, Your dad might have recommendations to since he is so heavy into cars.

persona: I like eating fish but not chips.
I like music. I am a student. I study french and music.
I speak Spanish. My favorite artist is Wagner. I teach Spanish.
I don't like flying.
I like the band Tool. I don't play any instruments. I don't sing.
I don't cook much.
I went to Seville two years ago. The food in Seville is amazing. I appreciate great architecture.
dialogue: I'm trying to decide between visiting Seville or Madrid when I go to Spain, And it's not easy!
I have been to madrid and it is really cool but i think seville is more beautiful.
So which one would you actually recommend if I could only go to one?
If i had to decide i'd pick seville its a better place to relax.
That sounds fun. I'll have other chances in the future to visit Madrid, Too, So I think I'll go to Seville. I'll have to see if my relatives from Barcelona want to meet me there.
Oh wow you have relatives in barcelona? I wouldreccomend visiting it is my favourite place in spain.

Yes, I visited them in their home before. Barcelona is definitely an amazing city. But I'd prefer to see something different, Although I shouldn't visit Spain without seeing my relatives, Too. I assume you saw the Sagrada Familia? What did you think of it?
Its an incredible building it will be amazing to see it when it is completed.
Yes, I find it amazing that it's been in construction for over 100 years. That sort of boggles my mind.
Its very close to completion now! It is mind boggling.
Yes, I think I will have to return to Barcelona when it's finished. Maybe you can join me by then!
That would be really fun, Its a date!

persona: I am retired.
I like to mow the lawn.
I know how to grill.
I miss having a pet sometimes. I used to have a dog named Zoey. I thought about getting a cat but I've never had one before. I'm unsure about taking care of them. I am partial to tiny dogs.
I was a tailor before I retired. I worked for a bridal shop. I now spend my days at the casino.
I love to cook.
dialogue: Any big winnings at the casino so far this week?
Yes! I won over $1, 500 this week at the blackjack table! It's my favorite game.
Oh my goodness!! Is that your biggest win?
Not quite, But it's definitely in the top 5. I was thinking of taking some of it and donating it to the animal shelter. What do you think?
Awe I love the ASPCA. I got my last kitty from the local shelter. That's so nice of you.

I was thinking that I could look at the animals when I go in. I'm so lonely sometimes that I might be ready to get another pet. I still can't decide if I want a cat or another little dog though. After Zoey passed away, It was so difficult.
A kitty might be fresh change after the loss of Zoey. I have found cats easier than dogs to care for. You should get another pet for companionship. Do you plan on going in soont the shelter?
Yes, I was thinking I would go tomorrow. If I don't, There's too much of a chance I'll end up back at the casino.
Well then get right into the shelter for a donation and hopefully an adoption lol. It could really lift your spirits. Any plans for dinner tonight?
I was thinking lasagna. Italian is always my favorite thing to cook. What about you?
I was actually going to try grilling and was going to ask for some tips. I am thinking grilled chicken should be easy, Right?

It's pretty easy. Do you have a gas or charcoal grill? I usually work with a gas grill. Make sure to marinade the chicken for a while first, That way the flavor soaks in. I also like to put the seasoning on right when the meat hits the grill. It really builds up the flavor profile.

persona: I like hamburgers and fries.
I like nature walks.
I have a boyfriend. We go on hikes. We hiked at turning point last weekend. We are hiking this weekend at a place about an hour away from us. I am also looking for a place to climb nearby.
dialogue: Have you found a place to climb?
We've actually had to cancel our trip because my boyfriend got really sick. I'm so bummed about it.
Oh, I'm really sorry to hear that. Have you rescheduled it for another time?

Not yet. I figure I'm going to spend the weekend nursing him back to health, And then we'll worry about hiking and climbing when he's better. Are you actively looking for a new boyfriend right now? Or are you staying single for a while?
That's a good idea. I'm probably going to stay single for a while. I don't want to get into another relationship after having just gotten out of one.

Yes, And it sounds like it ended badly. Sometimes it's good to say independent for a while and figure out what you really want. I had a really bad breakup before my current boyfriend and I spent some time finding myself and then my new boyfriend came along when I wasn't even looking.

Haha, Maybe that'll be my experience as well. I'm just going to stay out of it, And if someone comes along, Great! If nobody comes along, Then I don't mind being single for a little while longer either.
That sounds like a good plan. How long have you had a piranha, By the way? That's a very unique pet!
I've had it for about a year, Which is also about as long as I've been single for. Guess I needed something to keep me company.
You didn't want to get something more cuddly?! I have a cat. She causes me some trouble but she's also very warm at times.
Cats are cuddly, But I'm afraid it'll scratch me to death. Piranhas are vicious, Sure, But as long as I don't dip my hand into the water, It won't do anything to me.
Yes, That's true. What do you feed it?

persona: My family does not like my job. I like watches and shoes. I want to work for a watch dealer.
I like shopping. I want to own a rolls royce ghost.
I like to run. I like fresh air. Running helps me with depression. I like running when it is cold and misty.
My cat is called Brandy. My cat is named after the song Brandy by Looking Glass. My cat is 16. I have had my cat since I was young.
I lost my phone.
I like upbeat songs for running. I listen to audiobooks. I listened to The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy audiobook.
I want to become a vegetarian.
dialogue: Did you get a new phone? Have you looked into vegetarianism more? How is your cat?

Yeah I am picking up my new phone later today. Yeah I have I'm just not 100% sure if its for me so im just going to gradually stop eating certain things. My cat is not doing so well, I think she may pass soon.
Bless your cat, I appreciate you telling me. Also, I understand about gradually changing, And I think that worked for me too.

She has had a great life and will be extremely missed but i hate seeing her in pain. Yeah it really is a massive leap so I think I will make up a plan of what and when I will stop consuming certain things.

For me, It was a spiritual choice I think, To not eat animals. So, I started with beef, And kept chicken and fish for awhile. I like dairy though, And I need cheese sometimes. I appreciate the love you have with that pet. Sounds like they are loved.
See for me I hate the thought of animals being killed for me to eat and then the devil side of me is like but it tastes so good. So i am in an internal battle with myself.
Your feelings make sense. I struggle too. And after a few years, You get used to it. And then when you do eat it, Your stomach is like what is this? Grumble! I do feel healthier. That too.
Yeah a lot of people do say that they feel so much healthier and that is one of other reasons i want to do it. Especially now when then do so many non-meat items that are plant based.
I think it has to be realistic too. Otherwise I don't stick to the plan. I slip too sometimes. I hope your kitty is comfortable, I'll be thinking about them.
Yeah i will get there in the end. And thank you she is on pain killers but think she will go back to the vets in a few days.

One day at a time, With that kind of work. And grieving too. I need to take a break between pets. And my last pet had an expensive, Protracted dying process, And I've taken a break since then. Looking forward to a pet again some day.
Yeah it really does take a toll. They are part of the family, It will be very strange without her around my i won't be getting another one for a long time.

persona: I have a brown honda civic called Coco.

I work with local artists. I work with local country and classic rock musicians. I grew up listening to 1980s music. My favorite music is country. I like music by Faith Hill. My favourite song is It's your Love.
I have a Welsh Pony called Charlie. I like pizza. My pony likes pizza. I like pineapple on pizza. I eat meat.
I have a partner of 20 years.
dialogue: I just heard a great cover of a Faith Hill song by a local band I went to see!
That's excellent! Was this band playing at a restaurant or bar, Or was it a dedicated concert?
It was just at a bar, But it was really good! I really think this band has a chance of making it! Have you worked with any good musicians lately?

I haven't, Actually. I've been on a break for the last month or so, And I've been spending my time with Charlie and grazing on pineapple pizza, To the disapproval of the pizza delivery guy that comes around with my pies.
Ha! Well, I'm sure he doesn't mind the tips. Do you ever ride Charlie, Or does he mostly just graze?

I tip well to compensate him for the pain and suffering he endures from bringing me my unholy pineapple pizza, I do ride Charlie, Sometimes. Other times, I just pet him, And we graze together. (On different things, Of course.).
I bet you could have a great social media following for Charlie, The pineapple eating pony. Have you thought about introducing him on any of those mediums?
I haven't thought of that before. Maybe that's something I could consider. Maybe I can show off my pineapple pizza alongside it, Too. I wonder if that'll boost its reputation, Haha.
For sure it would! I can see a whole line of merchandise for Charlie, He could become a social phenomenon!
Oh man, And the sponsorships! Sponsored saddle, Sponsored grooming, Sponsored hooves... The possibilities are endless! Now, If I can only get my good ol' pizza place to sponsor me as well...
I'm sure that would be a shoe-in. They would have people lined out the door! Especially if you were able to take Charlie over there every once in a while. You would have free pizza for life!
That's a great idea! Let me call up the pizza place and pitch this idea. They'll probably think I'm crazy (if they don't already), But it's worth a shot!

persona: I have a bike. I ride motorcycle. My motorcycle is a Harley Davidson. I don't have car.
My skin is pale. I have large brown eyes.
I am not a musically inclined person. I like rock music. I like songs about riding motorcycles.
I live in Florida. I ride my motorcycle almost every day. I am a waitress at a diner. The diner I work at has good pies. I ride my motorcycle to work. I wear pants at work.

I own 3 guitars that a bought a few years ago. I have 2 Fenders and one Ibinezz. I do not play them because my fingers are too small. I am selling 3 guitars on ebay. I am selling my bike. I have a second helmet for guests.
I know how to edit on video slideshow software.
dialogue: I might buy a motorcycle.
What kind of motorcycle are you thinking of purchaing?
I wanna get an old Norton and fix it up.
Ah that's a very solid choice! Have ever fixed up a motorcycle or car before?
Yeah, My dad has always had me helping him out. He is a total grease monkey. He always wanted a boy but since he didn't get one, He was lucky I turned out to be more guy than girl haha.

Sounds like you had a great childhood then! I've never personally fixed my motorcycle before, But I know enough to know when something seems to be giving out and needs to be taken in. How many vehicles have you repaired with your dad?

Not sure. I started being his "go-fer" to go get stuff when I was a toddler. He used to fix his friends vehicles and stuff a lot for a little extra cash when stuff got hard. So probably a few hundred. Not really sure. I have not got to actually work on a motorcycle, But same basic principle I would imagine.

Wow, I'm impressed. Once you hopefully have your Norton running smoothly, Do you have any trips planned with it or are you intending it to be an "everyday" kind of ride? I use mine everyday but I just wish it were a little more comfortable so I could take it out for longer trips.

I am not sure. I don't really know how good I will be at riding it. I do want to do some cross country trips with other bikes though. I just don't know enough people to even get one person to go with me. Most people don't like trips. Even like you said, The seats are not comfortable enough.

I've hear touring bikes or touring/adventure hybrids are quite comfortable so I know it definitely can be done... Those bike can get pretty pricey though! How large of a displacement are you looking at on a Norton? My Harley has a 107 cubic inch displacement so it's a beast but definitively fun to ride.
The one I was looking at said it had a 750 cc displacement, But I really don't know much about bikes. So I am not sure what that means to the ride.

That's a decent starter bike, Not super powerful, Not super powerless. I think pretty much the smallest you can go is about 250cc and it goes wayyyy up from there. You can't go very fast on those small bikes but your new bike should hopefully be very capable of highway speeds!

persona: I am too old.
I am an animal rights worker. I like to watch birds. I have kitties.
I am trendy. I used to be a hippie.
I dyed my hair dark brown.
I am not a good businessman. I don't much like the food industry.
I have unusually destructive kittens. I adopted my kittens from the pound. I adopted 3 kittens.
dialogue: What could a cute little kitten destroy?
They are little demons, They can destroy your couch.
Wow! That's just terrible. I feel sorry for you. How do you keep them under control?
I usually keep them outside, They like to run around and chase birds at the park also.
That's great. It should keep them from destroying the couch. What do the kittens eat?
They have certain foods they like to eat, I buy several packet of kitten food and give it to them with milk and water in the night.
Milk is healthy. Do they eat from the same bowl or they have separate bowls?
All three of them have separate bowls.
That's really good. You said you adopted them from the pound. How do you feel about animals being kept in a pound? My mom thinks it is a violation of animal rights. What do you think?
I think that also, So i adopted them in the first place.
Adopting them was a great thing you did. As an animal right worker, Do you think moves are being made to abolish animals being kept in a pound?
No, But i hope people start realizing this injustice and fight back.

persona: I live in a apartment. I have new house. I live with my buddy.
I don't like chicken.
I weigh 320 pounds. I eat less.

I want to become a nurse because of how proud I was of my mom when she was a nurse. I have one year left of nursing school.  I find it difficult to go to nursing school while working at a bar as a bartender. I make a lot of money as a bar tender. I dont have a favorite drink. I do clinicals and study all day, then I serve drinks all night.
I completed all of my work the first couple of years, so now I am just doing nurse work. I am not getting paid yet for my nursing work.
I am paying tuition for nursing school. I cannot afford certain things because of my student loans.
I am trying to diet. I like to work and eat.
dialogue: I'm about to have another cheeseburger.
Ohhh, What kind of cheese burger? Like with bacon, Or mushrooms and onion... Maybe some Avocado or jalapeno?
One with bacon and a fried egg. Its called the good morning burger.

Ohh that sounds amazing. My favorite one is one of my own creations. I can't have it now because of calorie count. But I put mushrooms, Jalapenos, Cream cheese, Velveeta and rotel tomatoes into my hamburger meat. Then I make sure to use some good tempura batter as the binder and wrap the patty in bacon.
That sounds amazing. But can see why it wouldn't be a good option for you right now. Have you found any low calorie burger options?
Well, I have been eating burgers made with lean turkey meat with avocado, Lettuce, Tomato and a mushroom bun. I also stopped eating fries. Which is depressing. Have you ever tried a mushroom bun?
That sounds like you have good options. Even without the fries. I have never had a mushroom bun. I am not a big fan of mushrooms.

Ah well you'd have to be. I put a bit of olive oil and garlic powder on the large top mushrooms and bake them for like 10 mins. Then when they cool off, They work to hold the burger together. The turkey is good for you, But I don't like it. I always season it a lot.
Well I am sure all the actions you are taking now will pay off soon for you. Have you been able to see any results yet?

I started this journey when the scale said 350. I am only 30 lbs down so far and it has been almost 8 months. But I was not very in control the first 5 months or so and kept gaining it back the moment it was gone.
Congratulations! That is positive. And well worth it.
Thanks. That helps a lot. How are your pets?

persona: I like drawing. I am an actor.
I live on a farm. I do farming. I grow crops. I grow potatoes and onions. I eat crops I grow. I like to make stew. I have a dog.
I watch hockey.
I am divorced. I am still in love with my ex-husband.
I like money.
I make income from farming. I find my work rewarding. I get tired from running the farm.
I love local food. I wish I could travel.
dialogue: I downloaded a dating app to find a partner.
I cant do that, As said before, Im still in love with my ex-husband. I just can not let go for some reason, And the farm is exhausting this experience even worse.

Make a list of what you loved about your ex and what you didn't. Then use that as a guide to find someone better. He's your ex for a reason. You got to try to get out their and test the waters. You may even find another farmer that will be willing to help or give advice on how to not be so exhausted.

I definitely need another farmer, Regardless of my love life hahah. I grow potatoes, Onions, And make stew constantly and have to compete with the local food markets. I enjoy it but I defnitely need a person. I sometimes just dont feel like I can love again after getting divorced. My dog, However, Is keeping me company though lol.
Dogs are great companions. I love stew and the fresher the vegetables the better. Have you thought about canning your stew and setting up an online store?

I remember you said you dont have a pet, You should get a dog too! Ive been thinking of setting up an online store as that would be great for me income wise. Farming is cutting it but with just too much work haha.
I can only imagine the work involved. I have thought about getting a dog but I stay gone so much travelling that I am afraid it would get lonely.
I wish I could travel. But yeah you are definitely right, Because you are about to go to spain haha now take care of some dog.
Exactly. Just wouldn't be fair to a dog. I am so excited to go though. I plan on visiting Barcelona. There is suppose to be some really beautiful landscapes. Hope to find it as relaxing as it sounds.
Theres great actors in Barcolona, When I went for my acting career I saw so many greats of the career it astonished me.
Wow. I didn't know you did acting. That's awesome. Any films that I may know of?

No, Not a list at all, Im still stacking my money from farming to increase promotions and advertisements fo rmy brand. I find my work rewarding and I cant wait for what is in store for my future to be honest.

persona: My hair is short and blonde.
I work at grocery store. I live in North Carolina.
I like country music. I go on road trips.
I'm active and enjoy jogging.
I am going on a road trip to Florida. I have family that lives in Orlando. I try to travel twice a year. I have been to theme parks before.
I have never been to New York.
I've looked into getting a certification in fitness training.
dialogue: I looked into tourist attractions in New York in case I want to travel.
Cool! What did you find that interests you?
There are a few things to do. I love going to the museums but I also want to stop at the world trade center to pay my respects.

I hear that there are some really great museums in New York. I'm sure you'll find a few you'll like. Yes, The trade center would be interesting. Somber, But interesting. Do you have a connection to the victims?

No not really but it was such a tragedy for the country I feel it is the patriotic thing to do. I read some books on it while working at the store and there are some things that really stick with you after you read some of the stories.
That is for sure. I think all of us Americans have a connection in some regard. It really shattered us, Collectively. Do you like modern art or more of the classics?
Oh i stick with the modern stuff. I interpret things I see when I dance. I consider that my art form.

Then the MoMA is the place for you. It's supposed to be one of the best modern art museums in the world. New York also has the New York Public Library, Which is supposed to be awesome. Right up your ally, Book-wise!
Those are some great suggestions. Have you thought of traveling to New York yourself?
I've thought about it, But I can't really afford it. I don't make a lot working at the grocery store. I like to travel, But it's usually done by car. I don't really think New York is a car city.
It is a busy city for sure but I bet Orlando is pretty busy too. Are you going to visit your family when you drive to Florida?
Orlando is busy, But it's more open and car-friendly. Yes, We'll stop by for a few days. I can't wait to go to all the parks in Orlando. I really like amusement parks.

persona: My father has a construction company and wants me to take it over.
I was given a lot of possessions as a child. My father did not give me love.
I go mountain biking.
I love Whataburgers. I just started a new job at Whataburger. It's temporary until my father starts training me at his construction company.

I suppose I'm trying to earn my father's love by taking  our family bussiness. I'm used to my dad bossing me. I have insurance through my parents instead of work. I had a difficult relationship with my father when I was growing up. I would like to be a counselor.
dialogue: Have you looked into any psychology courses?
Not yet. Been too busy at the new job. Have you looked into any colleges for botany?

I am planning on going to college to study botany, Yes. Right now I do a lot of physical blue collar work for money when bills are tight. I have a new job oding manual labor for my friend so it is good that I am working for someone that I am close to and that respects me.
What type of manual labor are you doing? It is always good to work for someone that respects you.
I am doing a lot of gardening and planting around multiple local farms, It pays pretty decent actually. I never grew up rich or with old money, So these paychecks are definitely something new!
That's awesome. The gardening will give you a leg up with your botany. Sort of on the job learning for your college classes when you go. I always think the best way to learn something is by doing it.

Speaking of that, Maybe food service will help me get in touch with food too. I love burgers and never even worked a fast food job before. I have some time before the semester starts for college, Maybe that will help.
It will definitely help with people skills. LOL. You will come in contact with various personalities and learn how to deal with each one. Hunger doesn't always bring out the best in people. hahaha.
Yeah I remember you mentioned you worked at whatsaburger and how you just got a new job, Do you think I should apply for them too? Are they good service and establisment?
Oh yes, You should apply if you have time to work both jobs. So far they seem really good. They give good raises.
That is interesting. You should try to go for your dream of being a counselor similar to how I will chase botany. It will be a fun experience for both of us.
Your right. I could look into volunteering at local youth camps to get a feel for counseling. I think it would be awesome for us to work together.

persona: I am a homebody.
I am 40 years old. I have been married for 20 years. I have a wife.
I like shoes.
I work late. I work in some form of data entry.
I own a home. I live in a place with a lot of rain.
I shop organic.
I have never been to the desert. I am interested in desert living costs. I am interested in modern home technology.
dialogue: Have you given any more thought to those solar panels? I think it's a great idea even with the rain!
Yes, I've checked into them a little bit. I just don't know how practical they will be with all the rain we get.
How much rain do you get really?
Well, It depends on the year and the season, Obviously, But it averages about 40 inches a year. How about the desert? When it rains is there a flash flood danger?
Okay but I still think those solar panel will save you a lot. LOL it's pretty hot here you can't expect much from a dessert. It doesn't rain much so there isn't much of danger right now.

Yeah, But it's not just when it rains. It's cloudy quite a bit, Too. So on the days when it doesn't rain, Sometimes there is a lot of cloud cover. I am thinking of moving to the desert, Though. I think solar panels would really be of value there.
I understand. If you move to the dessert you will thank those solar panels everyday. Do you plan on moving?
We're thinking about it. I really like the diversity of the desert. I think I can work from pretty much anywhere. We're not tied down by our jobs.
I guess you will like it there. How's your job now? You were doing some data entry right?
The job is the same. It's just data entry, So it's not rocket science or anything! Ha! I'm sure I can find work pretty much anywhere near a big city. How about you? How's work going for you?

persona: I enjoy walking.
I deliver babies in my capacity as a doctor. I make enough money to live comfortably. I enjoy spending time with my family outside of work.
I used to visit Disneyland with my family. I want to go again next year. I love Disneyland. Mickey Mouse is my favorite character when visiting. Goofy is also a Disney character I enjoy.
I read books as a form of entertainment. I have seen "Shameless".
My children are younger. I protect my children's mental space. I want to encourage my children to volunteer.
dialogue: I think I'm going to bring Marky Mark the puppy home this weekend!
Thats awesome! What breed is he?
I think he is a mixed bred but it looks like a mix of German Shepard and Vizsla.
Sweet! I wish we could have a puppy but with the children I am worried that it may be too much for them. But I love dogs!

You should go for it! Working at the animal shelter I know there are plenty of dogs that could use a good home. Just got to find the right bred that are good with children. Or are you worried that your kids won't take care of the dog?
Im worried the kids wont take to the dog. Maybe when they are older and are more responsible.

That makes sense. It might be a good idea to wait. Feel free to bring your kids into the animal shelter to play with the dogs. You don't have to take one home but you can introduce the kids to the dogs.
Thats a good idea, There is a shelter nearby that allows people to play with the dogs so they can get some socialization.
Awesome! It'll be good for the kids and for the dogs. Be careful though once you get in there its hard to leave without a dog. What is your favorite bred?
I want a corgi. They are smart and cute. PLus I want to name it Lieutenant Dan because he aint got no legs.
Hahaha that's perfect! We should race Marky Mark against Lieutenant Dan once you get one.
Mine might need a head start with those tiny legs.

persona: I love french fries and burgers.
I own a house.
I love dogs. I adopted my dog Tyson from an animal shelter. We go on walks. I have never been bitten by a dog.
I have a wife and two sons who are 1 and 3. My kids are energetic. I live in Tennessee. I like my family.
My wife and I don't get enough sleep. I work at the Post Office. I have been a mailman for 3 years. I mostly enjoy my job. My wife stays home with the kids.
I like watching sports. I don't mind gaining weight. I do not watch sports so I can let my wife relax by watching the children.
I don't live near the beach. I want to vacation in Florida but I like parks.
dialogue: You won't believe this but my dog actually started barking at the mailman after our last conversation! I think he was just excited to see a smiling face though.
Thats amazing. I think thats a really good sign. How did it turn out?
We're working on socialization and boundaries, Although I think progress is definitely happening. I've been looking forward to the summer, Hanging out in a few local parks. Vacation plans in the mix?
Yeah its in the plans. Ive been really busy with my sons right now. Neither are two but both are acting like they are going through their terrible twos.
I love watching kids grow and change, Sometimes they end up repeating things! I hear you there. Some days, Just getting through the day is a big accomplishment!
Watch anything interesting in spots lately?
I am going to guess "spots" is"sports" I hope! We have a few seasons starting up, Although the roster always seems to be changing. With summer, Tennis will be active too. How's your dog doing?
Tyson is doing very well. He is really great with people. Hes a really good spot... Sport I mean about going on walks.
Haha, I see what you did there. I'm glad to get exercise with mine, And is a big reason I decided to get a dog too. Mine's getting good at frisbee.
Thats great Tyson isnt much of a fetch dog. You throw something and he looks at you like you going to get that?
Well, Maybe they compensate by being a good lap dog on the couch? Affection is a big reason to get one too. Pros and cons of keeping a pet guest!
Yeah we get outside and exercise so I guess games isnt the most important thing.

persona: I travel. I like French food. I have been to France 5 times.
I like swimming in the ocean. I scuba swim.

I inherited my yacht. I have had my yacht for about two years. A captain sails the yacht for me. I hired my captain when the previous one became too old. I love sailing through San Francisco Bay. I have sailed to San Diego. I like the food at fisherman's wharf.
I run. I haven't ridden a bike in years. I am on the west coast. I am from Texas.
I like to travel.
dialogue: I've just signed up to do a marathon in Texas!
Wow that is awesome, When is the marathon.
Late June. I am so excited! I hope to score a medal.
I hope you do score a medal too. Will you be swimming in Florida too?
How do you go to Florida and not hop in the ocean? It will be calling my name!
Lol. I think i will to try out a new swimming technique in my next swimming practice.
Let me know how it goes! I am curious!!!.
I will definitely do that.
Where did you learn the new technique?
I learnt it on a YouTube channel. Do you also use YouTube to learn as well?
I sure do! How did we ever live without youtube?! ?!.
I really wonder at times These days i learn almost everything for free on YouTube.

persona: I love to shop. I regularly visit the spa.
I do not watch much television. I listen to Brittney Spears.
I monitor my diet. I am a professional model.
I travel. The last place I traveled to was Canada, to model at a fashion show. My trips usually last about a week.
I have never seen a UFC match. I don't really like UFC.
I am traveling to Paris soon for work.
I have an ex who was once a construction worker.
I'd like to go to Brazil for the rainforest, the food and the culture. I enjoy a wide variety of foods.
dialogue: So when next month are you actually going to Paris?
I leave in 2 weeks! Have you made any great meals this week?
Yes! I am loving the idea of cookking my own mexican foods and preparing them for my family, The dishes are so delicious. I always make time to make sure my meals are quality haha!
Haha nice! What was your favorite dish you made this week?

I love making my favorite mexican dish, Enchiciladas. They are so delicious and the tomatoes really kick in to the flavored. Man, This is really making me want to travel to mexico lol. Do you think I should?
Oh that sounds yummy! You definitely should! You could try all sorts of traditional foods and then come back and recreate them!

Maybe I can get some ideas from some other places too, I want to travel to soo many different areas you cant even imagine. I want to go to Florence, Patagonia, And Brazila swell. Maybe I can get a cultural blend of the whole world to create my universal food dish lol. Now thats sounds cool!
That does sound so cool! Have you been watching any shows to plan out your dream trip?

Not really I just watch UFC and Nascar Racing when I am bored haha. I listen to Aerosmith too, But no shows that connect to my food or travelling hobbies. I guess those hobbies are just natural from me, Probably picked it up somewhere haha. I enjoy watching travel shows on TV too, But exclusively.
Ah how have your favorite Nascar drivers been doing?
Theyve been doing good, I watch their personal lives through social media from time to time. But what really has me ont he edge of my seat is that Usman vs Masvidal UFC Fight. So thrilling!
Who won? I don't care for UFC so I don't know all of the update!

persona: I took my students on a field trip to an ice cream factory in Miami, Florida.
I am a 4th grade teacher.
My parents are still alive.
Breyer's is my favorite ice cream brand.
My favorite is going to concert. I like bluegrass and western music.
I don't have or want children.
I love all kind of ice cream. Pistachio ice cream is surprisingly very tasty.
dialogue: I bought a new country album and my kids and I rocked out to it a lot yesterday!
How much did you pay for the new album? I didnt know if anyone bought whole albums anymore.
I love to get physical copies still. Makes the experience feel more real to me and it gets the family involved. It was about $20 bucks but I think it's worth it.
I am not gonna disagree with real family experiences. Do you still buy physical movies as well?
Yeah! I snagged a bunch when our local blockbuster went out of business and I grab a few every year around Christmas time to watch with the family. Do you buy all digital media?
Yes I do. Except for art. Anything else i dont see a reason to make a hard copy.
Yeah, I don't have anything against digital copies but it's nostalgic to pop in a hard copy movie. Do you buy a lot of art?
I firmly believe in hanging original art around the house instead of reproductions or prints. So yes! I buy art often.
Interesting. What are your thoughts on this new NFT Art craze that has been going on?

persona: I am a wrestler.  I work out.
I like hogan.
I volunteered at the homeless shelter.
I do not hike. I would like to try hiking. I would like to travel more. I want to go to Australia because of my volunteer job. I want to stay in Australia for a month.
Wildlife scares me, I am very interested in snakes. I do not like snakes. I like to fish.
dialogue: What have you been doing to prepare for your trip, Watched anymore videos or bought anything special?
Still getting that one planned, Although you bet. I still love that accent and dream of getting there. They have huge bugs over there, Have you seen?
No but I heard there are like 30 types of snakes that can kill you!
Sounds like there will be plenty of reason to stay indoors during night time! It's exciting to consider just being around folks all day long with that accent. How's your hiking?
Im not a big hike. When I was younger I ran into a skunk when hiking and it scared me away from doing that.
Ah, I see. Sometimes we like do think about doing something, But maybe don't get to doing it as often as we like. I hear you.
I live near a lake so I walk down there plenty. I like seeing natures beauty but I dont like snakes. Or skunks.
Yes, I remember the snakes. I wonder if maybe you had a bad experience with snakes when you were younger.
It could be. My grandma used to show me a movie with Medusa and spit scared me.

Ah, That is a scary thing yes. Although the original story of Medusa - she was a spiritual woman, And was harmed by Zeus and Hera. Medusa wasn't treated fair. Men love writing myths about snakes! I prefer dogs or cats.
Dogs are fun. Now now is the homeless shelter going? Did you get your promotion?
The work at the shelter is going pretty good. I've been happy where I'm at overall work wise. And yes, Dogs are very fun!

persona: I have a German Shephard named Barnaby. I like the country. I like walking my dog on trails.
I had a cow named Bunny but lost them when my parents sold their farm. Bunny used to give me fresh milk, butter and ice cream. Grey is my favorite color.
My family used to own a tobacco farm. I used to have bee hives, a garden and livestock. My dad is a nascar driver.
I work at the post office. I think my job is boring.
I like top 40 and alternative radio.
I have a Ford Taurus and I like it.
I don't really like music.
I smoke tobacco and use dip. I am accustomed to being outdoors.
