dialogue: I'm curious -- what exactly do you do at the post office?
I sort local main and out of state mail. Its very boring and exausting.
It doesn't sound very interesting. Maybe you can move up into a different position.
I would like to. I keep hoping a driver spot opens so I can at least get outdoors and have a change of scenery.
That would be great. Then you control your day also. Once your route is done, Your work day is done.
Yes! people come in from open to close dropping off mail and the rucks keep dropping mail off through out the shift. It feel like it never ends.
I bet it keeps you pretty busy then. Can you listen to music while your sorting?
Yes! thats the only saving grace about the job, But im running out of music to listen to.
Have you thought about listening to podcasts or audiobooks?
I have tried but then I get to focused on what im listening to and my work slows down. But with music its just in the background and I can keep a steady pace.
Oh, I didn't think about that. So true, Some of the podcasts are really interesting and very easy to get caught up in. I like listening to mystery podcasts.
I can listen on the way to and from work. I need something to break up the monotony. What podcast are you into currently?

persona: I like gardening. I like walking outdoors.
I teach 3rd grade.
I own a golden retriever named Sally. I like to walk my dog.
I like shopping. I am a woman.
I don't know much about valuing old cars.
I have an old Honda Civic. I like Rolls Royce cars because they look comfortable.
I love to be outside. I find mountains to be beautiful.
dialogue: Have you taken your dog out on any scenic drives lately?
Yes always, I takesally out on walks every day. I drive her in my old Honda Civic hen I am going somewhere but I really want her to see how a Rolls Royce car feels.

Oh I would love to drive a Rolls one day but they are quite expensive. Even the older ones are. I wouldnt mind finding a classic and fixing it up. I wonder how it would do in the mountains. They tend to be large cars and some of those mountain roads are narrow!

Haha funny you mention that, I find mountains to be beautiful. I know Is aid that last time we talked but I have to put emphasis! Rolls are great but what about that old italian car you were thinking about getting? The retro style is sick man!
I found an old Porsche but havent decided if I am going to go that route or keep looking for something more Italian. What do you like more?

I definitely like the italian cars better, They give a more mysterious and cynical look to them. Reminds me of the old gangster movies, Probably why I think hey look so cool. However, I dont know much about valuing old cars.. So dont ask me lol/.
I have a good down payment but it is hard to find those old italians around here. Once you find something shipping it can be a nightmare too!
You do have around $20, 000 to spend on a car haha. Which is massive, Especially since I am a teacher you know pay isnt that great haha. Whatever you get make sure to drive it down the mountain! Ha.

Half the fun is just shopping for the perfect car. You can be amazed at some of those old bar finds. You really never know what you are going to come across. I can say though, You teachers are so underpaid! You are helping shape the future of this country and planet by molding the minds of our children. I applaud what you do!

I appreciate that, I enjoy being with the kids and being active a lot so it makes up for it. I like walking outdoors with them and the recesses is always really great for teachers aswell. It is always a fun environment!
I imagine so. Do you ever get to take Sally with you? I bet the kids would love playing with her!
I takesally with me everywhere! We go shopping together too. My kids really love her, You should get that boxer breed you always wanted. I still remember you talking about it from last week!

persona: I'm a little league coach. I have a mini van.
I drink a lot of coffee. I occasionally drink wine.
I've never kayaked. I'm going to attempt kaying with my sons.
I have five sons. They are 7, 8, 9, 10, and 11. They all play little league together. All my children play baseball.
I was a pitcher in high school. I have 5 little German Shepherds.
dialogue: I got ChiChi the CUTEST new outfit, She looks like a Disney princess.
Haha! What Disney princess does she look like?
Definitely Belle. I would say you aren't an expert on disney princesses with 5 sons though, Right? What movies do they prefer?

You got that right haha!! I'm in the dark about them. Belle is the one who likes books right? They're into anything sports or action related although I encourage them to actually play the games not just watch them!
Yes, She is! That is great. Better to play and burn off the energy and get exercise. I get plenty of exercise walking dogs. Do you like any kinds of exercise?

Haha! I'm blown away that I actually knew that! I play baseball with friends, Go hiking, And with the little pups I get plenty of exercise chasing them around to get shoes out of their mouths! Are you interested in other types of exercise or just walking?

Oh that is true. Dogs do love to chew shoes - luckily mine is too small to chew on too many things. Nah, I am kind of lazy. I think i would spend too much time on my couch if it weren't for my job! Maybe i should get some kids too to force me to be more active! have you set up a time to try out kayaking yet?
Actually I think in a few weeks I'm going to head out somewhere, I just haven't found the right place to go yet.
That is great! I am happy to give you some suggestions if you need them. I know all the best spots!
That would be awesome. What's the first place that comes to mind? I'm eager to get out and try this!
I would recommend starting out on a small lake. You dont want to be too ambitious and try the ocean or a river, That can be dangerous! Do you think your sons would be interested to try?

Haha! I was thinking of diving right in to a bumpy river with a trainer, But I guess you would know best how to start things out. The boys do want to come but I think my buddy and I are going to head out and get the hang of it first! My kids won't let me live it down if they see me tip.

persona: My name is George.
I am a bee farmer. I enjoy dancing.
Papaya is my favourite food. I like french fries.
I'm not close to any of my family. I love dogs. I don't have a dog.
For fun I play shows, record music, and read. The music I record is like the band Radiohead, or slower rock music in general. I recorded a jingle for a television advertisement.
I don't know who Thom Yorke is. I am not interested in band members' names. I have trouble remembering people's names.
dialogue: What type of dog would you want to own?
I would definitely love to have an Alsatian dog. You said you love dogs, Do you have any?
I don't have a dog, But I would love to have one, I think they're cute.
They definitely are. What breed would you like to have?
I like australian shepherds, I've always wanted one, I always have fun with them.
Australian shepherds? I've never heard of them. Please can you tell me more about them?
They're really furry and the one i met was named Radiohead.
Oh! It was named after the band. You like rock music?
Yes, It's my favorite rock band, I love the Radioheads.
Me too. The music I record is very similar to the Radioheads. Have you been to any rock concert?
No, But I would love to, It's my favorite music genre.
I fell in love with rock music when I heard Freddie Macquarie. That guy was a super genius.

persona: I got a new job as a life coach. My job is not interesting. I am scared of the ocean.
I had cancer. I am going to run a marathon.I wear blue sweatpants when I run.
My parents are athletic.
I like the color green.
I love black cats. I have one black cat named Jackson.
I am not a vegetarian.
dialogue: I just heard from a coworker that a person claiming to be a representative of the Egyptian government came by the yard with some kind of warrant-like document claiming that they have a right to seize the Ever Given. It's NUTS. No one knows how to figure out if he's legit or not.
Wow that is nuts! I think you can start by calling someone in local government. They should be able to direct you to find out!
Yea I think that would be best. Also do my diligent research online as well.
Yeah, Look up as much as you can! How long do you have before they try to seize it? I don't get why the Egyptian government would want it.
They told us we had two weeks but it seems sketchy but that could be my imagination!
That does seem really sketchy. That thing belongs in a museum or something haha. Didn't you get directions of where it was going when it was brought in?
Yea I'm just joking haha. Ummm, My coworker had got the address but I haven't asked yet.
Haha so no Egyptian government? Man I was so ready to go Sherlock and Watson on this mystery with you!
Haha, I had to get your adrenaline pumping for your workout today. Don't you have a marathon to prep for?
Haha yeah that'll do it! Probably not as good as stretching my muscles but it's a start! Marathon isn't for two months but I'm training every day!
Right! Two months is the decent amount of time to get ready for it. So what's the purpose of the marathon?
This one is actually in support of cancer research so its close to home for me. I think I'm pretty ready for it, But I never stop training!

persona: My name is Wanda. I am 60. I am a librarian.
I am not married, nor have any children. I will be retiring in a few years. I am single woman.
I want to retire. I have been to Spain.I like to travel the world. I have plans to visit Iceland. I want to go to Finland. I like to read about traveling.
I use internet dating. I have a date next week at a coffee shop with a college professor.
dialogue: So, Tell me all about the date. What happened? Is there going to be anything happening soon?
I think it went really well. Although it was hard to tell as he was a little odd.
A little odd? Now I'm curious! Well, Share what you like, And if it's private, That's okay too. I appreciate that you're taking your time.
Well to start with he was wear a bow tie witht shirt and seemed to not follow on from my conversation. Like I hadn't eve spoken.
That sounds rough. And the bow tie is a little off. Wonder if he learned that from a famous person maybe? Sorry that they ignored you.
Apart from that we did kind of click. I mean I am probably just as odd! The bow tie must be a professor thing.
It helps if there was a tweed jacket I guess, Although, I'm on the fence with that detail. If it makes you happy, That's all that counts!
No tweed jacket. I do remember me making some comment about that. I got a lecture about how no one in the world can make a good quality tweed jacket anymore.
Well, I suppose a professor, Might lecture, Even for a living! Sounds like the date was a mix of emotions.
I am not sure if is a good at lecturing though. I bet he would be one of those that rambles about non related things and then the class just ends.
So this is the guy you clicked with on the date? I'm confused! Do you think the two of you will go out again?
Its the oddities I was drawn to. Plus I am bit like that myself, Its why I never married.

persona: My parents take me to Disney World every year.
I am a kid and I play on the playground. I am in third grade.
I love the movie "Frozen". I saw Frozen 2. I love the "Do You Want to Build a Snowman?" song. I like Olaf.
I have two brothers and a sister. My siblings are nine, six and five years old. My older brother takes karate. I don't like karate. I like to play t-ball.
I'll be taking a family trip to Disney this summer.
dialogue: I booked a trip to Disney World at Christmas.
Oh my goodness, That is so exciting! I am envious. Have you told your kids?
No i want to surprise them with it. They will so love the surprise. What are your plans for Christmas?
That will be the best surprise ever! What are you most excited about? I think my family will go skiing this Christmas.
Family Skiing is fun. I am most excited about spending this Christmas with my family and friends in Disney world.
Yes, That will be so much fun. I think they do a really cool Christmas parade and other Christmas activities there. I have not experience that as I usually go in the summer.
Okay. Have you ever wondered what it will be like going there during winter?

Yes, I have. I would love to go during the winter, And it also may not be as hot. It can get way too hot in the summer and you cannot fully enjoy going on the rides, Because all you want to do is go back to the hotel pool to swim!
Okay. Apart from Skiing do you have a family dinner during Christmas?
Yes, We usually have a turkey and a ham, With all the fixings! How about your family, What are your Christmas traditions?
My parents and my wife parents come together to have a large family dinner with exchange of gifts.
That is wonderful that both sides of the family get along like that. I have to visit my grandparents separately.

persona: I am a librarian. When I'm not working I go to Spain. I retire in a few years. I may move to Spain.
I love adult coloring books. I'm in a group for planning and stickers. I am 60.
I have an old farm house. I have cats.
I enjoy the holidays. I love my life.
I have 5 and 3-year-old grandchildren. My grandchildren and I like to spend time indoors coloring and crafting.
I am not very comfortable with the internet. I'm learning the web from my grandson. I have a deep connection with books. I don't mind when I have no internet access.
I like to drink tea.
My daughter punishes my grandkids by taking away their internet.
I just finished reading Killing Caleb. I like to read all genres. I like a story with some drama. I have been reading to my grandchildren since they were young. I am proud of my grandchildren.
dialogue: I've been looking for books that take place on a farm, Might as well start reading about something I know!
Great idea! I love steering people toward books they will enjoy! Have you read any james herriot? He was a vet surgeon and has some very interesting stuff.
I don't think I have. But that sounds really interesting. Does he right fiction or non-fiction? What are his books about?
He writes non-fiction. One is "All Creatures Great and Small". They are about his life as a veterinary surgeon with all kinds of animals. What do you like most about living on a farm?

I'll put that on my books to read. That will be right in my wheel-house. I really enjoy being able to go out a accomplish something everyday and actually see what I have accomplished. I get to work hard and when the job is done relax and enjoy the beautiful country I live in.

That sounds wonderful! I am looking forward to retiring in a few years and enjoying the scenery everywhere I go. It makes me reflect on life and serving the community. You must put a lot of effort into your work.
It is tough work but it is rewarding. If you retire in Spain do you think you will live in the country or live somewhere in the city?
I will keep my farmhouse and live there primarily. I would also like a vacation home but don't want to be too far from my grandchildren, So I haven't decided exactly where that will be yet.
Sounds like an ideal retirement! Family is important If I had grandchild I don't think I would want to move away from them either. How far do they live away from you now?
They only live 30 minutes away right now so I get to see them often. I travel to visit them as often as I can. They are the light of my life!
I hear being a grandparent takes the best parts of being a parent without the downside is that true? 30 mins isn't too bad at all.
Yes it absolutely does. I was a stressed out mother, But I am a very calm and caring grandmother. I feel like I can correct all my mistakes now!

persona: I have a twitter account.
I don't want to go to the playground. I'm busy surfing the internet all the time.
I think women rule the world. I will be attending a feminist march later.
I don't like Mickey Mouse because he is a boy. I favor women more than men.
I have solar panels on my roof. I'm a fan of organic food. I don't eat fast food.
I have a mother. I am a student taking political classes.
I like to fish.
I use Twitter to connect with others. I find Twitter informative. I am not comfortable with the influence of big companies. I value having a say.
dialogue: I started a conversation today with my parents about Twitter. I told them that I understand their concerns but that I want to use Twitter to connect with others and learn. They said I should be more specific about what issues I want to learn about and what kinds of groups I want to connect with on Twitter and then we can discuss it more.
I can see their point, But it wouldn't be difficult for you to come up with something. Lots of cultural groups have Twitter accounts you could follow.
Yeah that is true, Maybe next time I will write down different types of groups I would like to join and if they see it on paper maybe they will feel different.
You probably like reading or music or something. You could find a literature group or an author that tweets.
Yeah that too. I will ask my friends what there parents allow so I myself can get a better idea. Thanks for the insight.
I don't know if you're interested, But there were lots of younger women and girls on the march yesterday. It was great!
Maybe I can ask my mom if I can join you at the end of the month for the feminist walk. I think my mom would enjoy doing that too, If that is ok if we tag along.
Yes, That would be great. Do you think she would mind that we met online?
I never actually thought about that. Maybe I will leave that part out. She will be with me anyway so shouldnt be too much of a problem.
I would love to meet your mother. I'm sure she's a really great person.
Other than her style of parenting she is super kind and very goofy. Im sure you both will get on great.
Sometimes it's hard for parents. I get on better now with my parents than I did when I was in my teens.

persona: I love cars.
I work form home.
I go to the gym with my girlfriends.
I am lazy. I love to binge watch tv.
I love Narcos. Better Call Saul is another favorite. NARCOS is a good way to learn history.
My boyfriend has a girlfriend. They are judgmental about food.
Lamborghini is my favorite kind of car. I love the Lamborghini Aventador. I can't afford a Lamborghini.
I have no park within walking distance. I can drive to a park if I need to.
I am currently watching Handmaid's tale season 4.
dialogue: I would want to share with you my plans for my 10 year anniversary with my husband.
Wow, 10 year anniversary. Congratulations on that, That is amazing.
Yeah it's been a wild ride! I can't wait to get to California! We went there on our honeymoon and are recreating the trip.
California is somewhere I have never been too. I'm sure it is pretty there and would be an amazing place to visit. Do you have special plans while you are there?
I think we will head to Silicon Valley and be on the look out for Teslas. Planning to rent one as our rental car!!.
Cool car... You can drive the Pacific Coast Highway in that thing!
I think we will! We plan to drive up the coast and be on the lookout for good restaurants.
So you said your husbands car is blue and that is your favorite color. Are you going to try and rent a blue Tesla?
I don't know if we will be able to choose the color but that would be awesome! How is work going for your this week?
Work is work. Some days are better than others. I wish I was eleigible for a vacation right now. I would go on a cruise though.
Oh! A cruise would be so nice! Where would you go to?
I love the islands... All of them. I would probably go to Grand Turk and Nassau.

persona: I love to dance and paint.
I am a mother of two.
I was born in America.
I don't like chili cheese fries.

I go dancing five days a week. I love the samba style of dance. I don't care what people think about it. I take Samba dance classes 5 days a week. My friends don't dance. I don't have a lot of dancing skill. I am not a professional dancer. My friends laugh at my dancing.
dialogue: After eating all of that food, I definitely want to start exercising and dancing more!
Sounds like a lovely time! Nothing like some music to kick it off!! What's your favorite dance?
I like to boogie and waltz. Do you have a favorite dance as well?
I don't. I'm currently in a dance class, Though. My friends always laugh when I do, So I'm not too great. Haha. What kind of food did you eat?
I hate 50 pounds of french fries covered in cheese. I call them frachos. I need get back in shape after that!

There's no way you ate that much! You're over exaggerating. That sounds good. Most people like chili on it, too. I don't like it, Though. I do enjoy dipping salty fries into vanilla milkshakes. Just the sweet and salty taste is amazing!
I very much enjoy spicy food and cheese curds! I love a good milkshake though! Do you like to dance when you're at a fancy dinner?

I sure do! If I'm not too tired I like to finish my night off painting afterwards. That's what I call a good day! I do agree, Though; spicy foods are great. I'm just a sucker for milkshakes and smoothies. Haha.
I mean, I love fries so much that i really did eat 50 pounds. I want to dance so I can eat more fries. It's all i think about.
I think that's my favorite form of potatoes. Potatoes are such an elite food with how many things you can cook with them. Dancing will help burn some calories. You'll have to work it, Though!! Ha!
I was almost married once, But I arranged to be saved by a man in a french fry suit, And it worked! I'll dance all night thinking about that.
A man in a french fry suit. I'm rolling!! Ha!! Man of the dreams. Lol.

persona: I still live with my folks.  I live in an urban area. I'm in the 10th grade.  I have great grades. I study biology.
I listen to music while I do homework. I love rock concerts.
I want to train people.
I live with my mom and dad. I get along very well with my dad. We are training to run in a marathon over the summer. I like listening to music while I run
I want to be a physical therapist someday. I want to help athletes, the injured or disabled

I enjoy the subject of Biology. I like the subject of genetics. I like to understand natural systems. I'm looking forward to graduating. I have three semesters left in school. In college I will study physical therapy. I want to learn about nutrition. In two weeks, I have Spring break.
dialogue: I've been helping out more on the farm this week.
Wow! How has that been? What kind of vegetables or fruits are you planting right now?

We have tomato, Corn, Wheat, Watermelon, Potato, Etc. We have little bit of everything. We own quite a chunk of land and it can take quite a while to care for. Have you been interested in agriculture before?

That's impressive! I haven't thought about agriculture in depth before. I am interested in biology though, But more on the natural systems and genetics topics. When I go to college, I want to study physical therapy, But i could change my mind. What was your favorite class in college.
My favorite is biology, But the biology I study is for the crops. I study the photosynthesis process. Is there anything new you've learned recently in your class?
What a coincidence! We just learned about plant biology and went over the photosynthesis process. Do you also have animals on your farm?

We have milk cows, Pigs, And horses. I've been flung off of a few with only a minor concussion. I wouldn't give it up for anything, Though. I love the way it feels and the wind in my hair. Are there any activities you participate in that give you a sense of a freeing feeling?

That must have been painful. I hope that doesn't happen too often. Concussions are dangerous! I love running. It gives me this feeling that I don't have to worry about anything in the moment. That's why my dad and I are training for a marathon.
That's sounds exhausting. I've never been a huge fan of running. I never understood the whole runner's high thing. How do you do it? Lol.

Honestly, You just start somewhere and go for as long as you can! I love the feeling of accomplishment when I've completed a good long run. Do you feel a sense of accomplishment when you have a good crop season?
I feel a sense of accomplishment when I get to donate the extra crop we have. I love helping people. It's hard and honest work. I love my community.
That's so nice. I should look into opportunities to give to my community. I thin k it would look good on my college applications. Did you volunteer in high school?

persona: I sing country music. I can play guitar.  I like to go to national parks.
Rascal Flats is my favorite band. I am a Britney Spears fan. I don't know Rascal Flatts music very well. I like "Hit Me Baby One More Time" by Britney Spears. I like all Britney Spears songs.
I'm nostalgic for my teenage years.
I am visiting Yellowstone soon. I prefer to go to parks with others for safety. I became lost in a park.
dialogue: I've just booked concert tickets to see guess who? Yep Rascal. Are you booked yet?
Yes you know it! I had an alert on my phone for when they were released. Do you have any plans for the weekend? Any national park trips planned?
I do. I'm stopping by Britney Spears' house and then heading to a hike in Yellowstone. Do you think she'll come with us if you sing a song to her?
Me and Britney are good friends, She recognises me now after meeting her at so many concerts so I'll see if she wants to come to Yellowstone. Are you going to go fishing while you're there?
Of course I am. Fish is great for my keto diet. I'm trying to stock my freezer at home. I want to be friends with Britney so we can store any extra fish at her house. I plan to catch a lot!
Brit's favourite food is fish too so she will love that. I'm scared of running into a grizzly bear in Yellowstone. What's your biggest fear?
I'm afraid of showing up to trivia night where all of the questions about country music. I'd be a horrible team mate. I know so much more about fish!
I'm so nostalgic about music from my youth, Any quiz questions about 90s pop and I'd be great. What would be your best quiz category?
I'd be great with questions about Rascal Flatts. I just booked tickets to see them it would seem!
I love Rascal Flatts. We have so much in common.
We sure do. I love talking to you! I hope you never get lost anywhere again!
I bought a map for Yellowstone so no way I'll be getting lost again hahahah!

persona: My religion is Buddhism. My spiritual journey is important to me.
I live in Alaska. I meditate under the northern lights in Alaska. I have seen Northern Lights. my home is around wildlife. I love spot foxes.
I like line dancing with friends. I love 80s music. I would like to take salsa lessons in the future.
I don't speak verbally by choice. I communicate with friends and family by phone. I like being non-verbal.
I am employed as a pilot. I am on sabbatical. I haven't flown a plane since becoming non-verbal.
dialogue: I hope i get to see those spot foxes soon.
I live in a cabin with so much wildlife around, Do you want to stay over?
I'd love to as long as I can bring my lite brite with me. It's my favorite toy. Does your cabin get cold at night?
Yes the temp drops quite low but it's so peaceful. We can dance and meditate together.
I love to meditate. What kind of meditation does your religion involve?
I like to practice mindfulness. Would you be able to give me a salsa lesson? I would love to learn.
Of course I can. I love teaching dance. Are there any other styles you'd like to learn.
Don't laugh but I've always wanted to try ballet. I'm too embarassed to have lessons as people don't always understand that I am non-verbal. Are you a very talkative person?
No not really. I tend to speak through my art. Do you like to speak with people?
I communicate by phone mostly. Do you know any sign language?
I don't but I've successfully communicated doing the choreography from the new kids on the block videos. How about you?
Yes I've been practicing. I would also love to learn French.

persona: I like shawarma.
I live in Canada.  I am in the Army.
I watch American football and my favorite team is the Steelers.
I like to stay fit.  I have a family. I once had health issues from exercising too much.
I'm a football fan. I've tried Fantasy Football but I didn't really like it. I think Najee Harris is a promising football player.
I can watch football on three different cable stations.
I enjoy watching the Olympics. I admire the strength of the gymnasts. It's difficult for me to watch competitions. I don't like to watch gymnastics on TV. I want to go to the competition.
dialogue: You never told me your favorite football team.
I am a die hard Steelers fan! I have been for years. In fact I just got tickets to their next game and I'm super excited! What about you?
I am not too interested in football, But I love the Olymipcs.
Oh I thought you liked Alabama.. My mistake. I love the Olympics too. It's always a good thing to watch. Do you still compete in gymnastics?
Yeah I do, In fact in my previous gymnastics tournament, I came first!
Wow way to go! Were there a lot of spectators there? I'd love to go to the next one.
Thanks! You should try exercising maybe you can become a gymnast one day.
I exercise a ton actually. Working out is one of my favorite things to do. And I'm in the Army so I'm definitely in shape. I may try gymnastics sometime.
Oh really, I thought you had health issues, But nevermind.
I did from over exercising actually. Weird how that works isn't it? I'm much better now so I know how to regulate myself better.
Congrats on feeling better! Have you ever been to Niagra Falls.
Thank you! No I haven't yet. My family has been asking to go but it's hard to get time off work. Have you been there?

persona: My wife is a doctor.
I am a professional tennis player.
My wife and I own a three story house and have children.
We also have a 4-year-old black Labrador called Bear. My dog is a very good swimmer. My dog sheds a lot of hair.
I have been doing work on the house recently and not much tennis training.
dialogue: What work have you been doing on the house?
Mainly cleaning, And some light renovations, I replaced an old sink. And you what did you do lately?
I've been watching dog videos on youtube all day. Do you have a dog?
Yeah, It is the reason why I clean to much the house. Dog hair everywhere.
Even with all the shedding, I wish I could have a dog of my own. My friend has a big dog and I get along with it really well.

I would not give my dog for anything in the world. I love it very much. But I never suspected that it would need so much cleaning. I don't have time to watch dog videos on youtube. Do you plan to get a dog?
I would have to ask my parents for one soon. It would be a good replacement for a friend since none of the kids at school like me.
You have your friend with a dog, He does not go to the same school as you?
No, He does not. I'm an outcast at my school. I hate it. At least I still have tennis that I enjoy. Do you still practice tennis as well?
I did not practice tennis in a long time, I should make time for it. It is my job. Do you need any tips?
I might ask for tips later. How is your wife doing?
She has been very occupied lately, But I think she will have so time off in the next day. We plan a small vacation, Do you have any recommendations?

persona: I listen to classical music.
I am a christian.  I like christian rock.
I ride a tractor.
I like camping. I like the outdoors. I cook on an open fire outdoors.
I like the color red.
I have a sister. My sister is pregnant.
I enjoy reading thrillers. I don't like gore.
I buy sweaters on Etsy. I crochet blankets and scarves. I am working on a baby blanket for my sister's daughter. My sister's daughter is like a daughter to me.
My daughter is pregnant.
I am not a god parent. I have plenty of nieces.
dialogue: I took a small camping trip. I was so exciting and I really enjoyed it.
What did you eat while you were on your trip?
Surprisingly, I spend a lot of my time reading while camping. Are you a fan of the outdoors?
I love camping, I really do like to cook while outdoors. It stimulates my creativity. Do you have any favorite recipe?
I don't, Unfortunately. I have little time to cook since I've been spending most of my time crocheting. I'm almost done with my current blanket.
I am also working on a blanket, For my sister's daughter.
That's awesome to hear! Speaking of which, How is your daughter doing?
I don't have a daughter, My sister's daughter is like daughter to me. She is adorable.
Oh, I thought you said your daughter was pregnant before. Did you mean your sister's daughter then?
My sister is pregnant and has also a daughter.
It sounds like it, But I'm still happy for you. I never had any children myself.
They keep my occupied, I always have a blanket or a scarf to crochet.

persona: I have superpowers. I can make time stop. I have superpowers that make me feel good.
I am a small young girl.
I am going to be a flower girl in a wedding.
I'm going to be in a wedding as a flower girl.
I like to dance.
dialogue: I practiced dancing in my living room.
Really. Do you dance slow dance or break dance?
I love to do both, Mainly i admire slow dancing, It's easier to do other than moving really quickly.
I definitely agree with you. Does your fianc like to dance too?
Yes, I dance with her all the time at special events.
That's really great. She must be a wonderful person. How old is she?
She is 21, Which type of dancing do you prefer.
I love slow dance. They are really good for intimacy.
How can you make time stop, Ive always wanted to do that.
It's very easy for me. I just close my eyes and think about the present moment, Erasing both the past and future from my mind. When I open my eyes, The earth stops rotating and time stops.
That must feel nice, How often do you use this power.
Not very much. I use it only when it is necessary.

persona: I have blonde short hair.
I like jeans and leggings. I like shoes, shirts and nirvana shirts.
I play games and listen to music on my PC.

I like country music. I listen to Dolly Parton. I want to go to the Dolly Parton concert at the Boston Civic Center in August. I'm open to going to additional concerts by other artists. I'm open to going to a concert that's more modern than John Denver.
I think Dolly Parton puts on a great show.
I love the band Nirvana. I like Nirvana more than Dolly Parton. I have several Nirvana shirts.
dialogue: I am a fan of both Nirvana andDolly Parton, But I'm partial to Nirvana.
Wow! I love Nirvana too. Like a lot! I also thinkDolly Parton is great. Have you heard Jolene byDolly Parton?
Yes it's a pretty good song actually. Aren't you going to that concert of her's soon?
When is the concert going to hold? I would love to attend the concert if I have time on my hand.
I'm pretty sure you said it was in August sometime. I'd go with you if you are free to go.

Yeah. I know it was holding in August but I don't know on what day in August it's going to hold. I'll be free from August 8-10. If the concerts holds between those days, Then I'll be able to go and I would love to go with you.
I'm also available during that time. I'll check it out and see when it is and get back to you on that. Do you have any plans this weekend?
Not really. I'm just going to be playing games and listening to music on my computer. How about you?
Well a group of us are going to a sale at the male. The shoe store is having a 40% off sale and well you know me.. I love shoes! We're all going to cruise the mall and hang out.
40% of sale! That's wonderful! Are you going to get sneakers or corporate shoes?
I'm not sure to be honest. I have my eye on a new pair of Nikes but I also love a good sale on fashion boots so really I could come home with 2-3 new pairs.
That's nice. Can I tag along with you guys? I would love to get some shoes too.

persona: I have a dog. My dog is a Border Collie named Larry. I take Larry to pet classes.
I work at Barnes and Noble. I am a Chemistry Graduate student. I enjoy chemistry. I am not working in the field I studied.
I don't think fashion is important.
I want to get into dancing. My coursework takes a lot of time.
I applied for a job with a Biotech company.
I like salted caramel pie.
dialogue: I can give you a recipe for salted caramel pie! That's one of the things I haven't baked yet but I could try making it as well.
That sounds great. Yes please do give me the recipe. I would love to try and make it.
It's a great desert. It's the first thing I learned to make as a baker. Would you like a cake shaped like your dog?
I would love a cake shaped like a dog for my birthday or made when I graduate. Could you do one like a border collie?
That sounds like a real challenge but I sure will try. Should I deliver it to your work?
No, Barnes and Noble is too big. It could get lost. Could I pick it up from somewhere? Maybe your bakery?
Sure we can coordinate that. Will you have time to stop by after school?
Yes, Maybe when I take my dog for a walk. I could see if he likes it too! Have you thought about getting a dog yet?
I have not, But I really like pets. I like them so much I worked at the pet store for a while. I'll name mine Potato.
That is a great name! I wish I thought of something so creative! What breed would you get?
I'd probably want a caramel pie shepherd! I'd make a cake shaped like it as well.
That would be a good idea. To make a cake too!

persona: I live with my mom and dad. I am 19. I would like to move out of my house.
I work at Burger King.
I enjoy hanging out with my friends. I don't drink or smoke.

I've never before seen any eagles in person. I don't have any pets but I want a corn snake. My favorite animal is a snake.  I want to get a snake when I get my own place. My parents won't let me have a snake. I am saving money to move out of my parents house.
I couldn't feed a snake live mice. I don't want a large snake. I've never owned a corn snake. I am not responsible enough to have a pet.
dialogue: I did some research on the eagles by my house and found out the next month is the best time to watch them. They should be at the nest the majority of the time.
Are you serious? That's just wonderful. How are you going to watch them?
I have a pair of binoculars, It is really nice observing them.
It must be thrilling watching eagles. I've never seen an eagle in person. I would definitely love to watch them.
You can come over whenever you want, There are also quite a few snkes nearby.
Snakes! I love snakes. But I once watched a documentary on Nat Geo Wild. It said eagles eat snakes.
That is why the snakes keep dissapearing! The eagles are like pest control for them!!.
It would really hurt me to see a snake get eaten by an eagle. How do the eagles even manage to eat the snakes? Do they have teeth?
No, Their talons latch onto a snake and kills the snake. It eats the snake by swallowing it.
Isn't the snake able to fight back?
No, Because the eagle would have killed the snake by then.
Eagles must be really tough. I definitely would love to watch them with you next month.

persona: My name is Eduardo. I am 13 years old. I have an older brother.
I like playing soccer.
I own a small giraffe called Earl. I have a backyard full of leaves. I try to feed my pet giraffe lettuce.
I can teach soccer. I cannot win a race. I play soccer and help the goalie. I am part of a soccer team.
dialogue: My Mommy bought me a new Ken doll! I ripped his head off and tried to feed it to Water MelonDrea. But Water MelonDrea wouldn't eat it. Mommy says turtles don't eat dolls.
Probably for the best, I can't imagine a plastic toy is going to do his gut much good.
You're probably right. He has to be in good shape for the race next week, Even though I run faster than he does. How is your giraffe? I wish I could have a giraffe like you.
Exactly, He needs top quality lettuces. Giraffe is doing well, But he isn't a racer.
I bet he can run fast with those long legs though. Did you win your last soccer game?
Not really, His legs are so slow. The soccer game was awesome, First I've ever won.
That's great! Did you get a trophy? I know how hard you've been practicing. My mommy says I can join the soccer team when I start school next year, If I get better at my kicks. Got any tips?
We need to win more games before we get a trophy unfortunately. Best tip is just out in the garden and start kicking, You'll get better in time.
Thanks, I'll do that. It's too bad mommy won't practice kicking with me, She says she's too tired. And daddy works all the time. I bet your giraffe kicks good with those long legs.
Can't your turtles play kicks with you? My giraffe has kick some so hard they are now orbiting the Earth.
Water MelonDrea is smaller than the soccer ball! Maybe my neighbor can kick with me. He's mean though. He tried to paint sha nae nae with acrylic paints.
That's horrible. Maybe throw lots of grass seed in his flower beds.

persona: I enjoy eating donuts while driving. I ate 12 donuts at once before.
I speak Spanish.
I like role playing on weekends. I have a role playing session this weekend with the setting taking place in a future where magic becomes real. I do role playing with two other people and the GM.
I own a ford pinto. My car is brown with pink dots.
My favorite band is Insane Clown Posses. The only band I've seen live is ICP. I might go to gathering of the Juggalos to see ICP.
Sausage and peppers pizza is my favorite.

I enjoy playing games and my favorite is Call of Duty. I do not play RPG's. I've heard good things about Skyrim though. My GPU is an Nvidia 3090. I bought a pre-built computer because it took too long waiting for individual parts to come.  It cost me extra to buy a pre-built computer.
dialogue: I ordered a new gaming PC from Digital Storm! It actually was not as expensive as I was expecting, And they had some of the nicer NVIDIA GPU's in stock.
That's great! Did you decide which RPG you want to break it in with?
I still don't know. I quite liked the old elder scroll games from many years ago. Maybe I'll check out Skyrim.

Maybe I'll start up Skyrim too, There's a mod out there that allows for multiplayer functionality so we could meet up. That is - if you can get your wifi issues worked out. It would drive me nuts to run a brand new machine on an unstable connection, Is that your next goal? Or are you going to let the wifi be for a while?
On the one hand I only have so much money and can't fix everything. But on the other hand what's the point of a brand new PC if I can't use it? In short it depends on if I have money.

I think that's smart; definitely save your money for now. You can use the time without wifi to play it as it's meant to be played and to build a good foundation in the game. How long do you have to wait for the new PC to arrive?
Just a week I think. Can't wait for it to arrive!
I think you're going to be blown away; you'll wonder how you ever survived with your old laptop when you see how much better a new system will run. Will you need help getting everything set up?
Yes I do! Is that an offer?

Of course! When I come over, I can also bring my rulebook for that in-person role-playing game I was telling you about. No pressure, We can just go over some of the rules and character basics. I know it's not everyone's cup of tea, But if you're into it I have a ton of connections into that community.

persona: I can cook Paella. I enjoy fresh vegetables, Fish and Chips.
I haven't been to Australia. I enjoy sailing. I was raised around water. I am related to Columbus.

My favorite European country to visit is Italy. I might visit Italy again and a few surrounding countries. It has been a year or two since I was last in Italy.  I recommend visiting Lake Garda, Tuscany, and Florence.
I am studying different kinds of art at college. I have a year left until I graduate. I don't plan to be a professor.
I am going to travel to Europe. I am reaching Switzerland and Austria. I would love to visit the Alps.
I learned some Italian in high school. I learned some French in high school but can't remember it. I have never used Duolingo. I will think about using Duolingo.
I like nature photography and portrait photography. I am not good at painting.
dialogue: Are you able to get study abroad credits for your travels? I imagine there has to be studying you can do related to art while you're abroad.
I think so. I'll have to look into it.
I am sure there are many places in Europe that have so many museums and what not. I would advise that Australia isn't really a place for art though haha.
You don't think so? I still think it would be fun to travel there for a bit.

Oh definitely. Make sure you are ready to see the outback. It is an amazing, Yet terrifying thing. I want to go again, But not until my kids are old enough to be out of the house. I know that even if they don't have great art, You can get some amazing photos there!
I love taking photos. I want to get a picture with some koalas and kangaroos.

Oh yeah, Those would be great, Just don't get too close to the kangaroos. They tend to be friendly to a point, And can be aggressive. If you get really lucky, You might get some good shots of dessert snakes or crocs. They are beautiful, And the lighting there is really unlike anything I have ever seen. What type of photography do you prefer?
I like nature photography. Just love the scenery and the animals.

Have you ever considered going to the Amazon? I hear that the scenery is amazing, But I am kind of nervous about all the bugs and disease that way. I wanted to go when I was younger, But big cats are scarier than kangaroos.
I haven't ever thought of it before but now that you mention it it would be a fun trip to go on some time.
Do you ever do anything with the photos? Like graphic design? Or do you just take the photos and use whatever you happen to capture?
So far I just take them. I should probably do something with them though. I have some pretty cool pictures.

persona: My dog is a Shiba named Gabriel. My dog, Gabriel, is 3.
I enjoy knitting. I learned how to knit from my grandmother when i was young.
I enjoy baking cookies. I volunteer my baking skills for a county bake sale.
I work at an office and have overtime.
I know recipes for brownies and for croc pot cake. I like teaching others how to cook.
dialogue: Have you ever knitted a sweater for Gabriel? Or would he get too hot wearing a sweater?
Oh he has several sweaters I've knitted, For winter-wear of course. I also bake home-made dog treats for him, He's very spoiled. So have you found a dog of your own yet?
Nice. Home made dog treats is awesome. You ever thought about selling them?

Do you think anyone would want to buy them? I'd put them in the county bake sale but I fear someone would mistake them for people cookies - you know people don't read or pay attention much these days.
Oh course they will. I would buy them if I had a dog. I am still looking for a Golden Doodle. I want to learn to bake. I only enjoy cookies though.

Well I do make a mean cookie. I'd be happy to share some recipes with you. I do hope you're able to find a dog soon, They make such lovely companions. Shiba's are a bit stubborn but Gabriel is very sweet when he wants to be.

If you could share some recipes with me I would greatly appreciate it. I was just thinking. I might have to get to the county bake sale and watch a person eat one of your dog treats. That would be picture worthy haha.
Oh that would be terrible! Funny though. I hope you're not too lonely dear. Are you keeping up with your golfing?

I haven't been lately. My golf buddy has beenditching me lately. He has a new friend in his life. Maybe we can go golfing sometime. If you can get out of work. I know you usually do a lot of overtime.
You'd have to teach me, I've never played. I do have my father's old golf clubs though. And afterward maybe we could bake cookies. I know how much you love chocolate chip.

Oh I would be more than happy to show you how to golf. If you promise me not only will you bake me some chocolate cookies. You have to give me the recipe. Speaking of recipes you have to tell me more about this croc pot cake? That pot can make anything now I see.
Oh you can do almost anything in a crock pot or an instant pot. I also have a great recipe for instant pot cheesecake. If you don't have an instant pot I have a spare smaller one I can give you.

persona: I graduate from Yale in 2011 at 9 years old. I studied Electrical engineering and computer science at Yale.
I live in Manhattan, New York.
My parents work as bankers.
I have a bamboo. I drive a BMW.
I work for an MNC.
I'm a dog person. I have a spouse who is a cat person. I've been with my spouse for around 12 years.
I prefer dogs but have thought about getting a cat. I've owned several dogs.
dialogue: I just brushed my cat earlier.
Did you get out a bunch of hair? When I have brushed dogs, The brush is more dog hair than brush!
So much hair. I could make another cat with all the hair that came off.
You would think that with as much as they groom, They wouldn't shed so much, But I have been in peoples houses when they own cats, And there will be hair everywhere.
Yeah, It's seems like my cat should probably be bald by now with the amount of hair she leaves all over.
What kind of cat would you say would be the best breed for a dog lover? Like one that is more loving and less evil?
Maine coons are pretty cool cats. Lots of personality, Big, Kind of dog like.
Ohhh, I will research that. My childhood sweetheart has his heart set on getting a kitten for his birthday this year. I hear you need two though, And that seems excessive.
Compromise and get a kitten and a puppy to grow up together. Then you both win!
OmG! Can you do that? I thought cats and dogs hated each other! I am so going to do that. I didn't even know it was possible.
Most the time they don't like each other, But especially if they are raised together they will get along great.
Well, Now I have to research vets in my area, And I have to not slip and let my spouse know that he's going to get what he wants. I want it to shock him. I like surprising people.

persona: I started a new job at the gas station.
I like plants and gardening. I garden daily. I enjoy gardening because I love seeing new life growing and changing.
I am adopted.
I am scared of clowns.
I am single but my dad keeps trying to get me to go on dates.
I don't agree with the act of stealing. I don't think everyone is selfish.
dialogue: I just met with my parole officer and they're going to put an ankle bracelet on me that tracks where I go. I can only go between home and a place of employment. Now will you help me get a job at the gas station? There's no reason for me to steal anything because I won't have anyway to sell it...
I only just started there myself, But put in an application and I'll talk to the manager. She's very understanding, And you deserve a new start.
Thank you, Yes i feel like a new start is just want i need. And i think working would help me stay right.
It's a hard job, But fun in some ways. We get some crazy customers, Especially on the weekends. I'm glad you're being released, I think deep down you're a good person.

How long have you been working at the gas station? Lol, I bet you guys do get so characters. I would probably want to work weekend alot so i can see the crazy. Yes i am a good person just had some bad times.

I've only been there a couple of weeks. I work the night shift but that works out really well since I can come home and work in the garden a bit before going to sleep. We definitely need help at the store though, On all shifts. Hopefully you'll get the job.
Hopefully as soon as i get out i will be putting in my application. Fingers crossed. Garden that sounds like a good stress reliever after a long night at work. What things do you grow?

I have a flower garden that I've had going for years. And an herb garden with lavender, Rosemary, Mint and basil. The mint is taking over though. I also planted some tomatoes this year along the fence. What do you like to do to relieve stress?
I would love to have a garden, Maybe one day. I like to read and write to relieve stress.
Oh, What kind of books do you read? I read a lot of books on gardening of course, But I pick up a fantasy novel now and then.
I like any type, I read all kinds. I'm not picky.
Reading is good for the mind and soul, I think. I do like to keep busy though, So my dad will stop trying to set me up on dates, Haha. He means well but I'm just not interested right now.

persona: I am older than 30. I am single. I don't drink.
I like chess.
I like dogs. I have 2 dogs.
I live in a pretty large city in the Pacific Northwest. I think my city is the right size for me.
I don't like Twitter. I spend little time on social media. I have Facebook and use it to check in on people I know. I enjoy that we can find many people that share the same interests on social media.
I like taking my dogs to the local dog parks. I don't like to take my dogs hiking because of the hard terrain. I hike by myself because none of my family likes to hike.
I am not an adventurous eater. I like burgers and fries.
dialogue: This restaurant near me just released this crazy new milkshake that is all sorts of colors and candy and flavors; they're calling it the "Magical Rainbow Unicorn Big Yum Yum". Super unhealthy, But I decided to try it for interesting new social media content and it was awful! My kids are taking turns drinking it now though.
Oh yeah, I bet kids would love something like that. I am not sure I would be into trying it at all. I like caramel milkshakes though.
I really like chocolate strawberry or chocolate caramel milkshakes. But I think it is just too much sugar when you start adding more stuff to it.
Yeah, That sounds way better than all the extra stuff. Have you ever tried anything like it before?
Not exactly like it, But I do like to try new and interesting foods at least once. It's good content for my social media pages.

How many followers do you have on there? I don't think I could get a lot of people interested even if I really liked being on social media because my life is kind of boring. Though, I could post photos of my dogs all day and not even care if everyone got tired of it.
I have around 2000. Trying to increase followers. But I bet you could get a good following just posting about your dogs. People love dogs!

Maybe I will try that. Not that I care if I get followers, But I love taking photos of my pups. The older one lets me dress her in outfits, And the puppy likes to do crazy things that are so funny. Like she chases a laser light and if you make it go up the wall she will run into it.
That's hilarious. People absolutely love silly pets and dogs wearing clothes. If you get enough of a following you can actually make money by posting.
I never realized it could generate income while having fun. Maybe I should try it out and maybe I could enjoy it more. Thanks for the advice.
You're welcome! Once you get set up send me your links and I can try to get my followers to start following you to help get you started!
Oh that would be so cool. Now I want to go through all the 5 thousand photos I have saved on my SD card and pick out the best ones.

persona: I am in Colorado.  I am outside a lot. I love the outdoors. I hike when it is not cold.
I love farms. I work in an office. I work behind a desk.
I rock climb after work.
I have a lab trooper dog named Max. My lab is black and hangs his head out my trucks window. My dog goes hiking with me.
I have a cabin by the lake in the south Axe Mountain. I unwind by going to my cabin. I see deer often. I love the wildlife in my state.
dialogue: Is photographing wildlife your hobby or do you just enjoy watching them without taking pictures?

Both really. I love to go out and take photos, But sometimes, I just need to be in nature with no electronics or other people. It is nice to get out with Max and just enjoy being alive. When was the last time you went out just to enjoy nature?
I work on the farm a lot. That's outside and the cattle and chickens count as nature, Right?

I mean, Yeah they do. If you are out in it not just in the stables, Corral and coop lol. Do you do the round up? That definitely counts as nature. I went on one once, And I saw the most amazing things.
Well we do spend a bit of time working in the stables and the coop but we do get out in the field to get work done as well.
What about driving your truck on country roads? That is kind of like enjoying nature. I only like driving on country roads, Preferably dirt ones. I often stop in random places just to walk around.
Driving on country roads is pretty relaxing. It's nice to get away from it all and just get lost driving.

Yeah it is. Max loves feeling the wind on his face, And he even tolerates me blasting music when I am in a mood. I usually keep it somewhat low to protect his ears, But some days, I just gotta unwind. Ya know?
Definitely. What's the coolest wildlife you have come across on your drives?
I have seen a lot of Elk, But the best thing ever was when I accidentally came across a bald eagle nest. There were babies!
Oh wow, That's awesome. I would love to see something like that.

I didn't have my camera that day or I would forward you a photo of it. I knew they lived in the area, But I never thought I would get to see one. Especially not stumbling upon it in a random stop to clear my head. I am glad Max didn't try to go visit them.

persona: I watch Food Network.
I am unemployed. I am looking for work. I am not into dog walking. I like being around people. I am well suited for sales.
I recently moved to Germany.
My hobbies are roller coasters and skydiving.
I am in an open poly relationship. My relationship is about one year old. I am a terrible swimmer. My partners like to swim. I do not want to swim naked. I do not follow sports.
dialogue: Any updates on finding work?

I applied to a couple of car dealerships. Hopefully I'll get a job at one of them. I'm a good salesperson, I could sell a bible to Satan. So have you talked to your partners yet? You need to iron things out if you want your relationship to last.S?

That's great! Hopefully you hear back from one of them. That sounds like an interesting job. And no, I haven't spoken with them yet. I'm going to take a little longer to think about what to say. How is Germany going?

Don't wait too long. Open and honest communication is important in a poly relationship. I love Germany, I wish I spoke the language better. I speak Swedish but that doesn't do me much good here. My partner Jim is threatening to take me to a soccer game this weekend, I need a place to hide, Haha.
Well, Even if you aren't into sports, The atmosphere at live games is still fun! And the food is great.

Yes, Brats and beer, That's enough to entice me to a game. My other partner Katja wants to go to that nude beach. Honestly, No one who isn't Jim or Katja would want to see me naked. So have you found your dad a birthday gift yet? 65 is a big milestone.

Haha, Well nude beaches are a great place to start the naked swimming journey! Everyone there is named and no one will look twice at you! That's the great thing about them, It's not a place to sexualize people, Quite the opposite actually! I've been thinking about getting him a new book on law but he has a ton already, I'd hate to get him a duplicate.

Maybe get him a first edition or a signed book. He might already have the book, But an autograph would make it special. And I know you're right, But I'm still not entirely comfortable with letting it all hang out in public.
That's actually a great idea! Thank you. And ya, I get it. You should never do something you're not comfortable with!

Despite my poly relationship, I still have some hang-ups left over from being raised in a conservative family. I'm sure I'll work past them though, I just need to take it slow. How does your dad feel about your relationship? He sounds cooler than my parents.
He didn't seem phased when I told him actually! He hasn't met them yet, It's still early for that, But he is happy that I am happy and know what I want in life.
That's great, I'm glad you have that with your family. I'll never have it with mine, But hey, They're an ocean away now.

persona: I smoke. I have a mustache.
I worked for the CIA.
I believe in aliens. I think I live on the moon.
I'm traveling for work.
I don't know anything about pregnant horses. I don't have any horses. I don't know much about horses.
I read and research to build new skills. I cannot share details about what I do for work.
dialogue: So, As it turns out -- training horses isn't very easy! The new foal wants nothing to do with me. All she wants to do is stand in the field and eatdandelions.
Oh no, Are those bad for them? Would you train foals? I figured they would need to be older before people started getting on them.
You don't ride them as a baby, But you still get them started with training with the lead and all that.
Oh. Oops. I didn't realize. I guess I should look up information about horses and learn some. Do you have any other animals on your farm?
We have some cows, Chickens, Sheep, And goats. Plus the cats and dogs.
How do you take care of all of those animals? You must have a huge family. Is anyone going to help you with the training?

My family does help. And it's a lot of waking up very early in the morning and working to keep the animals homes cleaned up and everyone fed. I wanted to do the training myself but I might need some help.

I hope it works out for you. It seems like a big job. How do you ever get vacation or relaxation time with all that responsibility? I work undercover a lot, But at least when it is over, I get to take time off for a while.

That's just farm life. You don't get to vacation or relax because the animals will always need you. I don't know if I trust anyone enough to be able to leave and relax. I'd be too worried the whole time.
I could not do that. I need my vacay time. It gives me time to study alien sitings and stuff I am interested in.
It's definitely not for everyone. But I do enjoy it.
Maybe one day I can come and see the farm and you can show me how to brush a horse. I would be scared to ride one though.

persona: I have a job at a nursing home.
I have an 8 year old son. My wife left me.
I don't believe in god.
My son doesn't watch much TV. He plays Fortnite on the computer and plays on his phone.
I went to Disney last year. I posted pictures of the trip on Facebook. I use facebook alot.
I am divorced. I have custody of my son on weekends.
I ride a bicycle.
dialogue: I played Fortnite all day yesterday, Because I stayed home sick from school.
Were you really sick or just wanted to play Fortnite?
I was really sick! My dad thinks I had a bug. I was throwing up every 30 minutes. It was bad.
I'm sorry to hear that. You sound exactly like my son. He plays Fortnite all the time. Sick or healthy!!!.
Ya. It takes my mind off it. Instead of laying there thinking about being sick!
How many hours a day do you play?

On school days, Probably 2. I do my homework after school and I play some before dinner. Do you care that your son plays? I have a hard time finding kids my age playing. Most parents don't like kids playing shooter games.
He probably plays 4 hours a days. I used to play a lot when I was young, But it Tomb raider back in my day.
Tomb Raider? I watched my dad play the newest one a while ago. I think I like Fortnite better though. I like fast paced games.
I agree. Fortnite is better. I don't really mind my son playing as long as he can separate fiction from reality.
Ya. I feel the same way. It's just a game! As long as I do my chores and homework, I can play.
Yes. As long as it doesn't affect anything else, I think it's okay.

persona: I just went to an AFP conference.
I live in Manhattan. My parents are rich bankers.
I have 4 cars. I have 2 motorcycles. I own a limited edition BMW. I would like to sell some of my vehicles.
dialogue: How is the search for a buyer going?

I posted one of my vets and motorcycle for sale online yesterday! Someone is interested in the bike but nothing on the car yet. I'd like to start riding my bicycle more. As much as I love my cars, They just aren't practical.
Well where you live driving a car seems tedious, Even if I want to drive around manhattan myself, Haha. Biking is always a great alternative. I've lost 12 pounds since I started biking to work.
Exactly! I will definitely keep one motorcycle and my BMW. The BMW is more sentimental than anything. But the other 3 cars can go. And biking will probably save me time too.

Most likely it will save you lots of time. I can understand wanting to keep the bmw. I love my mustang, Even though I bike a lot more these days. So my trip is in the planning stages. What can you recommend to see and do in Manhattan?
See Central Park for sure. It's a must. You can also take the ferry to Staten Island!
I'd love to see Staten Island! What's Times Square like these days? And we'll have to do dinner while I'm there, I'm sure you know of some great places to eat.
Time Square is fun! There are a ton of street performers there that are actually really fun. And yes, Dinner would be awesome!

Great! I look forward to seeing you. Times square sounds fun too. I booked a room at the La Quinta. Not as fancy as the four seasons but it's right across from central park. Oh, You never told me how the conference was, Did you enjoy it?
It was fun! I got to see some old friends and met a lot of new people who shared ideas and tactics they use in their corporations. It probably sounds super boring haha.
No, It sounds nefarious (haha, I kid). Speaking of capitalists, How are your parents doing?
They're well! I tried to get them to go to the conference but they're more focused on retiring now. They're currently looking for a home in the keys.

persona: I build houses. I prefer cooler temperatures.
I love outdoor activities like attending sporting events, but I also like reading and cooking. I like hunting. I enjoy fishing on the beach.
My favorite food is steak and fresh crab legs. I love yellowfin tuna.
I live 13 miles from the beach. The area I live in is expensive and has an influx of tourists.
I don't hike very much.
I have five Siamese cats. I find cats hilarious. I am able to do outdoor things without my cats.
dialogue: What types of things do you enjoy doing with your cats?

My 5 Siamese cats and I have some fun adventures together. I take them on fishing trips with me, And sometimes we just hang out on the beach. Sometimes, We'll watch a local team play a ball game at the park.
Wow! That's pretty cool. How do you keep them under control outside?
They're well-behaved and don't act out much. They love the attention from other people, Too. Come summertime, Though, They might get cranky when it's blistering hot outside.

Yes, my dogs don't like the heat either. I guess it's the fur. Luckily, They like water, So we go hiking near lakes and rivers. It cools them off. Are your cats on leashes outside or in carriers or just free to roam?

I keep them on leashes so they don't run away to find a new and improved owner. Ha! I think they know that when we go fishing, They'll be enjoying a lovely fish or crab dinner, So they play along with it. Have you been on any outdoor adventures with your German Shepard and labrador recently?

Yes, I would think leashes would work best. They must eat really well after one of your fishing trips! Me and the dogs went hiking last weekend. We had a wonderful time. I think they know when it's the weekend and we can play.
That sounds like it was fun. Do your dogs like seafood, Too? What kind of seafood have you been cooking up?

They like it okay. They're dogs after all! They pretty much eat anything. It's hard to find fresh fish and seafood where I live, So I don't cook it much. Bbqs and tacos are my staples. I love tacos. Do you have a good taco place where you are?
Well, We have Taco Bell! It's close by the jobsite that I'm on, So after a long day of working on the house I'm building, I often stop at Taco Bell on my way home.
Taco Bell is good fast food, For sure. But nothing beats tacos done at home. I have Taco Tuesday, Wednesday, Friday, Pretty much any day of the week that ends in a "y"! Ha!
That sounds like me and fishing or hunting. I'll fish or hunt on any day ending in a "y". Has your brother brought any yummy game animals home for you to cook?

persona: I have been camping. I love kayaking. I love the outdoors.
I grew up in the 90s.
I am in grad school studying psychology to become a doctor. I have been keeping my grades up. I plan to go kayaking during spring break.
I think the song Peaches by Justin Bieber is a good song.
I have no experience with a Lite Brite. I am getting a Lite Brite.
dialogue: Did you set up your new Lite Brite?
Yes, I'm having a blast with it. I love vintage toys, I'm thinking of finding a monster-maker soon. So what has you so stressed out these days?
A lot of the stress is just adulting. I'm stressed with the job and the mortgage. I guess I need a vacation.

Adulting is hard. Grad school has been kicking my butt, I'm not sure how I'm managing to keep my grades up, Seems like I'm always studying. You should definitely take a little vacation, Maybe get out in nature.
How much longer do you have left in Grad school?
Another year, Then I'll have to find an internship. Sometimes I wonder if I'll ever get a full nights sleep again.
It will pay off in the end. Just keep of the good work. Do you want to start your own practice or work for someone else?
One of my college friends and I are thinking about a partnership, Or opening up a rural clinic in an underserved area. So, What about that vacation? Have you thought about where you might like to go?
I would like to go to the beach. The beach seems to calm everything!
Now that's what you need. Sitting on the shore under an umbrella,Sipping pina coladas and listening to the waves. That would lower your stress significantly.
Yes it would. Thanks for encouraging my thoughts! I really need this!
I hope you get to do it soon! I can't really escape my own stress right now but maybe even an afternoon hike might help.

persona: My name is Betsy. I just bought my first home.

I am a teacher. I have 2 step children. I am pregnant with triplets: two boys and one girl. They will be born in three months. I prefer traditional names for children while my husband prefers unusual ones.
I am married. I just moved to the US with my husband. I live in the suburbs.
I am supportive of women who choose not to have children.
I think cellos have a deep mournful sound, and I'd love to learn to play one some day. I don't know how to play any musical instruments.
I am worried about taking care of three babies. I am not sure I will live through delivery. I could not be a surrogate. I find parenting hard.
I like dry bar comedians. My favorite comedian is George Carlin. I like the counseling minister comedian Mark Gungor.
dialogue: I have to watch my nephew since his mom and my brother went on a second honeymoon. I'm trying to teach him to play guitar but am not having much luck; all he wants to do is watch some Youtuber named Blippi. What sort of things do you like to do with your step kids?
Wow! I used to play the violin too. What age did you start playing?

I started playing when I was 6! My parents asked which instrument I wanted to learn. It was either that or piano so I chose violin because I though it looked fun. I love it! What activities do you enjoy with your step kids? I need ideas for my nephew.
That's so early! I really like to play board games with them. I also enjoy doing things like going to the movies and going to the park and the zoo. What about you? What do you like to do as an aunt?
We mostly stay home and play in the yard. I bet he'd love the zoo though! He's starting to learn animal names and sounds.
The zoo is so fun. He really would probably love the zoo. Have you thought about teaching your nephew ping pong?
No, Not yet. He'd probably have a hard time hitting the ball, It's pretty small. Teaching him guitar right now and he struggles to sit still enough to even hold it haha.
That is a really good idea to teach him music. Have you taught your nephew to speak Chineese?
I have! My brother has too. His main language is English, But he can speak in both right now.
That is so great! I love comedy too. I have heard the name Colbert but have never listened to him.
He has his own show, The Colbert Report. He covers the news and politics in a comical way. It makes the news bearable haha.
Oh, I've heard of that. I guess comedy would make politics easier to digest. Lol.

persona: I am 39 years old.
I am a music teacher. I like to dance.
I love Taylor Swift. I like the album. Folklore and Lover. I have never met Taylor Swift in person. I love the song Enchanted.
I have 2 children. I have a daughter who is a big taylor swift fan. My daughter's friend attended the Taylor Swift Concert. I sometimes use Taylor Swift songs in the class I teach.
dialogue: I bought tickets to another concert!
That's so cool! Who are you going to watch in concert?
I'm going to see Taylor Swift again! Are you a little jealous?
Stop! Yes, I am so jealous. I was actually just listening to the song August, It is really good. I also saw that the Jonas Brothers are going on tour. I would love to see them as well.
Wow! They would be awesome to see too. I like that you incorporate Taylor into you music classes. What do they students think?

Yes, Do you like the Jonas Brothers? Most of my students love incorporating Taylor into my classes. I also like to show them her lyrics and the meaning behind some of her songs. She is one of the greatest lyricists of our generation.
I do like the Jonas Brothers.... Very talented. I agree. Taylor is a great lyricist. She expresses herself very well.
I feel like I can relate to all of her lyrics at one point or another in my life. Who is your favorite Jonas brother and which song of theirs do you like the best?
My favorite song is "Hold on" and my fave is Nick.
Nice! I think my favorite song has to be "Burnin' Up"... And oldie but a goodie! I used to like Joe, But now I am starting to appreciate Kevin more in my old age haha.
It's weird how your tastes change as you get older.
Definitely! Except for Taylor, My tastes never change on her haha. Where are you seeing her in concert this time?

persona: I have a degree in chemistry.
I have a bus that I sell books from.
On the weekend I like to dance at Billy Bobs Country Line.
I have a dog named Princess Pei Pei.
I enjoy dancing.
My mother was a nurse. I am not scared of hospitals because they remind me of my mom, who worked as a nurse.

I sell secondhand books on a mobile bookstore. I sell a lot of books. i have funny customers. I prefer big sales. I started my mobile bookstore so that me and my friends could get rid of our useless university textbooks. I love antique books.
dialogue: Does Princess Pei Pei come to work with you on your mobile bookstore?
Yes, I do bring Princess Pei Pei along for the ride! Everyone loves her so much.
That is so cute! She must help with business. I was thinking of getting a dog as a pet but I am undecided. What are your thoughts?
Dogs make the best pets ever! Do you want to get one from a shelter or buy from a breeder?
Where did you get Princess Pei Pei from? I hear that it is best to adopt from a shelter, However you don't know what their temperament is going to be like depending on their past.
I got her from a shelter. Some of then let you foster to adopt where you bring the dog home for a couple days to see if they will be a good fit. Maybe you could try that?
Oh, I didn't know you could do that. That seems like a good option. Is that what you did with Princess Pei Pei?
No, I just adopted her immediately. Is there a shelter close to you?
I am not sure, But I think there must be. How should I go about doing my research?
Do you have google maps or apple maps? You can look up "animal shelter" and it will show you all shelters in the area.
Yes, I have Google maps. What should I do to prepare my home for a pet? What kinds of things do they need, Like food, Toys, Etc?
You should get a kennel and a dog trainer. I can recommend some if you'd like.

persona: I am reading a parenting book. I think self-help books can help struggling people.
I like meeting new people. I am a museum tour guide.
I am partly deaf. I can read lips.
I recommend activities such as volunteering and reading to help with stress levels.
dialogue: I got approved to help out at the jail's garden! I'll start working tomorrow. I'm looking forward to getting some fresh air and picking some veggies.
That's amazing! It's really relaxing to be outside in the garden. Have you checked the library for books on gardening? I know you don't read but that may help some.
There are some audio books in the library, Two on gardening but they're checked out. I have them on reserve for when they come back. So how are things at the museum?
Things are good! We have been getting a lot of field trips this month, It's been fun teaching kids new things.
That does sound fun. When I get out of here I'd love to visit the museum where you work. Did you finish the parenting book? What are you reading now?
I did! I haven't decided what to read next. I've been thinking about reading The Power of Now. It's another self-help book.
Maybe I can find some self help stuff on audio books, You seem to think those are helpful. Or maybe my mom could bring me some when she finally comes to visit.
Oh ya, When is she coming? Are you nervous or excited?

I'm looking forward to it mostly, And maybe a little nervous. She can be judgmental sometimes, But I know she loves me. I just have to avoid solitary until then or I'll lose privileges. But now that I'm getting outside more I think I'll be less stressed.
That's good. Ya, I think being outside will definitely help! The outdoors is a natural stress-reliever.
It really is, And so is learning new things like gardening. If I keep my mind and body busy I won't be so upset all the time.
Exactly! And on top of that, You're being productive by helping in the garden. It's a nice feeling.

persona: I volunteer at homeless shelters. I enjoy volunteering. The shelter I volunteer at is a refuge for women and children escaping domestic violence.
I am a pro wrestler. I like working out.
I like pizza. I am very social.
I have a family.
I have never been to a fundraiser. I am planning a fundraiser for the homeless shelter. I am looking for people to help with the fundraiser that are social and outgoing.
I have traveled through Europe as part of my career. I live somewhere snowy.
dialogue: I am looking up pizza recipes and considering having a pizza party before I leave for my trip.
That would be so fun! Usually people just order takeout for a pizza party, So it will be fun to actually make your own.
I've never made my own, But I think it would be cool to try. Do you have any tips for me?

I think it would be fun to set up a "pizza bar" and have everyone be able to make their own personal sized pizza and top it however they like! So have a bunch of little bowls with chopped up veggies, Pepperoni, Etc.
I think that's a good idea. It's unique and a good way to start off my trip to Europe. I need to get your expertise on Europe!
I am getting so excited for you! Which countries are you planning to visit?
