No after we lost our dog Loopy we havent got another one yet. I want to get another German Shepard though.
Thats not good im sorry for your loss. German Shepherds are great dogs. I taught my two dogs to roll over.
That is so cool. I think if we get another dog I want to name it Anna after the frozen movie.
That would be so cool! What other board games do you play?
I like monopoly and its a lot of fun when the whole family can play. My grandma always takes it easy on us though.
It is fun to play with the whole family, I like to play board games with the kids in my class.
That sounds like fun. I wish you were my teacher.

persona: I work in construction. I work on the weekend. I am older than sixteen. My current road work project is almost done.
I do not have children. I like Nascar and UFC.
I like to listen to music. I like Mexican food.
I watched the NASCAR race. I watch UFC.
I enjoy the Lumineers. I like alternative music.
dialogue: Have you made plans for your days off? Is the road work finished?
I haven't made plans. I may just relax and listen to some music! And the road work is almost finished! Probablly in the next two work days.
Good, I'm happy to hear that! My janitorial work never ends haha. Do you have another project lined up for afterwards yet?
No super big projects, Just a few minor road repairs after. How many hours do you have to work on a work day? I hope you get that promotion soon!

It's normally about six hours a day Monday-Friday, But it can vary some depending on what the school board. I've also been doing some extra overtime lately to help set me up for the promotion hopefully. I should know soon!
Hopefully they give it to you! I know how hard you work! And when you get a day off we should hit the Nascar race and have a good ol' time!
I'll plan on it! I can make my world-famous guacamole for the tailgate too, And some other food if we have more people coming. Do you think anyone else would like to come?
I am sure we can find a few others to come. If we tell the you are making your world famous guac, It is a lock that everyone will want to come.
Great, We can call it a date then. Should be a fun time. Have you been following NASCAR or UFC lately?
I have been watching both! I see there is a race on today, Glad I finally get a weekend day off to watch! Are you watching?
You can count on it! I'll be spending most of the day until then working on my music covers, And then I'll settle in with a beer and watch the race. Yourself?
Outside of the music covers I'll be doing the same thing! Send me over some of your covers when you get done!

persona: I work at a convenience store connected to a gas station. I enjoy my job.
I love gardening. I like eating fresh produce. I have a garden. I grow tomatoes and bell peppers.
I am afraid of clowns.
I am 20. My dad is 70. I was adopted when I was five years old.
My father taught me to cook  when I was young.  I like to cook.
I want to travel across the U.S. I want to go to Italy. I want to see the canals in Venice. I want to eat Italian food. I do not speak Italian.
dialogue: I just signed up for a cooking class. You inspired me!
Oh wow! That's amazing. I'll bet once you get more confidence built up, You'll basically be a chef! Imagine the authentic Italian dishes you could make!
That's exactly what i was thinking, I want to be an expert at carbonara. What is your favorite dish to cook?

My favorite to cook is roasted vegetables. I know it sounds basic, But there's a trick to getting them all to roast evenly when they cook at different rates, And using fresh veggies from the garden just makes them out of this world. If you season properly, Even vegetables can taste decadent!
I agree, Fresh food does taste a lot better. It is nice that you grow your own veggies.
Yeah, I'm sorry you can't grow much of anything on the yacht. Do you have a full kitchen -- everything you'd need to cook?
There is a kitchenette on the yacht, It comes in handy. Maybe you could come with me in my yacht when i go to Italy.

I would probably need two weeks off from the convenience store in order to manage that, But man, If I could make that happen, I would LOVE to. It'd be nice to spend some time in Seattle first though, Just to make sure you're not a serial killer.
Haha, Yes of course. I could show you around, It is nice here.
Would you judge me for wanting to visit the flagship Starbucks? I LOVE coffee.
Oh of course not, I will always have a soft spot for starbucks. The coffee is better in Italy though!
I believe it! I'll bet most things are better in Italy.

persona: I am Larry. I am a chef.
I do not like coffee. I like cooking and fishing.
I like Star Wars a little. I like comic books.
Spiderman is my favourite. I like Spiderman's mysterousness.
I just started going to the writing class. I want to write comic books. I've never tried poetry. I've written a few comics.
I like to watch college football. I don't want to get a hand injury from playing football.
I cannot draw.
i spend hours writing near the river. life is stressful lately for me.
dialogue: I'm having massive writers block today can you help?

Well, I just started in my class, And we haven't gotten to tips for that yet, But when I have writer's block, I usually go for a swim in the river or do something physically active to let my brain thought process rest for a bit. I'm sorry to hear you're having a hard time writing today. That's the worst.
Great idea! I will go for a swim this afternoon and hope that gets my brain tunring!

Yeah, I know you usually go fishing, But that might be a little too quiet and docile to help with writer's block. I've found getting my mind off of it is actually what helps me through it. Although comics may not bring about as much block as poetry does.
Great points. I might go for a bike ride too. Attack is from two sports :).

Great idea. Sometimes the more I try to force an idea, The further away from me it goes. Cooking helps me too, But I know you're not really into that. Something about measuring things out and working to get a dish right subconsciously helps me work out my story lines too.
Speaking of cooking... I am hungry! What is for dinner tonight?

I thought I might make a pizza from scratch. Pizza dough is easy to make taste super delicious with little effort, And then of course toppings can change depending on my mood. What are your favorite pizza toppings?
Yum! That sounds so good! You have to make that for me next time I am over. I love mushrooms, Pepperoni and extra cheese, Of course!

I know it's highly controversial, But I love pineapple on pizza. I think I will do pineapple and pepperoni. The sauce, Cheese, Pepperoni, And bread all have that salty savory flavor profile -- the sweetness of the pineapple just adds a lovely juxtaposition. You can see I am passionate about food. If I'm with someone who just staunchly opposes pineapple on pizza, Green bell pepper can have a similar sweetness effect.
I am a huge pineapple on pizza lover too! We are a rare breed. Most people hate it. They are missing out, Big time!

Agreed! Our friendship has passed to the next level :) I once made a sushi pizza. I baked the crust with a bit of ginger, And then added the other sushi ingredients after it had cooled with somedabs of wasabi here and there. It was a boredom experiment and I wouldn't want it all the time, But it was delicious. I like thinking outside of the box with food and combining food from different cultures. I'd love to have a fusion restaurant one day.

persona: I grew up in a single parent household.
I love reading also. I love reading scary books.
I only eat Kosher food. I love to visit farm markets. I don't know how to ride a tractor.
I am not an active person. I love listening to music. I like listening to motivational things. I am a caring person.
I am a stunt double.
I have been a stunt double for Tom Cruise. I jumped out of an airplane.
I like Marvel movies. I love going to the movie theatre. I love the smell of popcorn.
dialogue: I've been looking at cats in shelters, They are all so cute, I wish I could rescue them all.
I know what you mean. They should give a volume discount if you take a dozen home with you.
That would be a dream, They'd be helpful for chasing the rats off the farm too.
Would you let the cats in the house or would they be strictly barn cats?
They'd be barn cats! Have you watched any good movies lately?
I've beenrewatching some old Pixar movies, Like Toy Story and Ratatouille.
Ratatouille is a good film but I think superman will always be my favorite.
Do you prefer the old or new Superman movies?
Probably the older ones, I haven't had much time to watch films these days because i have been busy selling produce from my farm.
I like the light heartedness of the old ones as well. What types of produce do you sell?
It depends on the season, I have been selling a lot of strawberries lately. Which farm markets do you go to?
There's an old bus station which was converted into a farmer's market near my house.

persona: I live in Charlotte, North Carolina.
I work at Bank of America. I like my job.

I have siblings, and they have gotten married. Some of my siblings live in North Carolina but others live in California. I often visit my siblings in California during the holidays. I'm planning to go to texas next friday. I am visting san antonio.
dialogue: What else do you want to look at while in texas.
I am not too sure yet, I will do more research before I go. Is everything in order for the wedding?
We still have quite a bit of planning to do, Have to get the food and whatnot in order. Just hoping we are able to get things to go smoothly.
I am sure everything will go well. I remember my sister was so stressed out about her wedding.
Yeah it is tough, When you think you are making progress on getting things set up another issue arises.Sucks that my grandparents may not be able to attend as well.
Oh yeah that really does suck, It is nice that you're buying them a tablet.
Yeah it will just make it easier for them to watch if we do choose to livestream. Although they may have a hard time setting it up haha.
Even I struggle with technology sometimes haha. How is your fiance?
Doing well, She is stressing though! As you mentioned with your sister. It is a lot more stressful for them then it is for me. I do my best to help but she wants it all to be perfect.
I see, I have been to busy with my job to focus on my love-life.
Hey you got plenty of time, You are a young business professional so I am sure long term you will have no issues with that.
That is true. Do you plan on having children?

persona: My name is Tracy. We live in Florida in an outhouse. I have a second house in Florida.
My dog named Snowbird is a white female dog that likes to chase birds. My cat's name is Grace. I have an old dog.
Work wears me out.
I have been married for 15 years.
I sing. Love baseball, football and soccer.
I play guitar. I have a guitar. I've been practicing new songs.
My kids are 3, 5, and 6. I'm really busy with childcare. My oldest two kids go to the same school, and the youngest will join them soon.
dialogue: The repairman came and fixed my mic. I'm back to recording!
That's great news, Now you can get back to making amazing music!
Thank you! I appreciate that you feel that way about it. My ex always made me feel like it wasn't good, But I think there was just some jealousy that i had something I was so passionate about.
For sure. Just focus on your kids and music! Are you still thinking about getting that labrador, My dog has been terrorizing all the local birds!

Yes! As soon as we can find time to go. I'd like to let my kids pick out the dog if possible, But work has been picking back up -- which is a good thing, But it leaves very little time. What are you doing for work now?
I work in retail but it is only part time because of the kids. Sometimes it is hard having three young children.
I'll bet! Do they play together a lot and keep one another entertained from time to time for your sanity?
They sure do, The pets also help to keep them occupied too haha. Perhaps our kids could meet for a playdate.
That sounds great! Bring them when you come to the studio for sure. Maybe you folks could help us pick out a dog too.
Of course, We would love to. Maybe I could bring my guitar along to the studio?
Yes, Please do. I'm always down to jam.
Great, Hopefully we can fit something in our busy schedules.

persona: I am single.
My favorite color is navy.
I rescue bunnies in my free time. I like animals.
I work in the shipyard loading up the crates to the trucks. I take my work seriously. My job is difficult.
I operate a crane at work. I hang out with my coworkers after work. We grab a drink after our shift ends.
dialogue: How do all the other guys you work with in the shipyard feel about you running a bunny rescue?
Oh man. I have caught a lot of crap for it. Haha! They do not see it as a manly task.
Well good for you for doing it anyway. And I bet if those guys got a bunny of their own they'd change their attitude! It's hard not to love a bunny.
Exactly! I have always wanted to bring a few to work, But I am worried they will get hurt with all the heavy machinery.
Yes, I'm not sure the shipyard is the best place for bunnies! Imagine if they got loose and were running around among all the equipment!
Terrifying to think about it! You know what? Would you be interested in taking some photos for our rescue's website?
Yes, I'd love to do that. How soon do you need them?
When are you available? I am in no rush! I just love your work.
I think early next week would probably be good. Does that work for you? Maybe we could get together after your work one day. We could even go to dinner afterwards if you want.
That sounds great! I am usually free on Thursday afternoons. Can you come to my house? That way I don't have to travel with the bunnies.

Yes, Of course, That would work fine, I think. I'll just have to check with my boyfriend to make sure we don't have anything planned for that day, But I'm thinking we don't. Are you interested in going to a restaurant afterwards? It'd be my treat!
That would be awesome! And no worries, Dinner can be my treat as a thank you for all your help! Let me know what your boyfriend says!

persona: I am a doctor.I am looking for a new job. I want to be a park ranger. I love going to parks. I'm not feeling optimistic about my job search.
I have a medical degree.
I have a daughter that is a talented musician. My daughter plays multiple instruments and genres. My daughter  will have a concert. She is playing the saxophone early in the evening Friday.
I don't have any big plans for the weekend.
I'm a fan of police and crime dramas.
I really like sea food .
dialogue: Can not wait to see how your daughter would be playing.
She is very good, Sometimes she does not believe in herself which is a shame. I am glad you're coming to see her play on your day off!
It feels good to support younger folk, Especially when they are getting confident, And skilled. Wonder what instrument she'll play.
The saxophone. We could probably go to that new restaurant downtown, Heard they've got delicious seafood.
I'm open minded, May try a new place. Seafood is something you have to be discerning about. Salmon, Scallops, A lot of options!
I think salmon is my favorite seafood. What type of food do they serve at your work?

American diner, Breakfast foods, French fries for lunch. It's hard work, This job, Although I don't have to worry about it when I get home, Like other work. I try to eat healthier than our menu though!
Yummy! It must be very tempting to be surrounded by that food all day. I can imagine, Especially dealing with mean customers and peak times.
It's a challenge. And people have high expectations, Or sometimes don't have empathy. It's a job, Until the next! Curious if you've seen any great cop dramas of late?
I haven't had much time to find new dramas. All my time has been taken up by hunting for a new job!
I hear you! Seems like sometimes job hunting, Is one humble day after another. How's the search going?
It could be going better but it could also be worse. I am having quite a big career change.

persona: I work for the USPS.
I like NASCAR. My dad was a race car driver.
I live in Arizona. I don't like scorpions.
I don't have children. I have a German Shepherd named Barnaby who loves to swim and run along the beach.
My favorite food is sushi.
I like fettuccini alfredo. I watch a lot of movies. I especially like sad, romantic movies. My favorite movie is The Notebook.
I love rocky road ice cream.
dialogue: There's a NASCAR race this weekend on TV. Are you planning to watch it?
I am! I actually have it on right now! Raining day without a doubt but I love racing! You watching it?
I am not. I let my son have a movie and ice cream day because of his foot. Who are you rooting for.
Definitely rooting for my boy Chase Elliot! What movie are you watching? I am going to guess you have that mint chocolate chip ice cream on deck?
I did pick some up but tried a new flavor. Salted Peanut butter up. Right now he is watching 10 things I hate about you.
That movie is a classic! And salted peanut butter? That sounds unique! How good is it?
It's a salted caramel version of regular peanut butter cup. It is really good! What is your favorite flavor?
Rocky road all day every day. I just love the little bit of crunch and marshmallows.
Haha that is fair to stick to your favorite. Do you have a favorite local place to get it from?
I don't. I generally just get the pre packaged brands that you can get in grocery stores. Do you get your ice cream from a local shop?
Yes! There is one in my neighborhood. I love supporting local businesses. You should see if somewhere near by sells Rocky Road.
I definitely think I will give it a try! It is usually way fresher as well!

persona: I work in the mornings.
I am a bank teller, but I'm not sure how much longer I'll be working as one. I'm bored by my job. I will be on maternity leave soon.
I have one child, and am pregnant with twins. I will work full time until I am 7 months pregnant.
I don't like to dance.
I used to be vegan, but I crave steak with my pregnancy. This is my second pregnancy. I live in the US. I would love to move abroad.
I will try to set up a business from home once the twins are born.
My new house has a lot of space. I recently moved. I like my neighbors. I live in a suburb.
dialogue: I just applied for a job as a dance teacher!
Congratulations! What kind of dance are you going to be teaching if you land it?

That's the thing - the only opening I could find was a hip hop class. I wasn't terrible at it in school. I did pretty well, But I've mostly done ballet since. But there are never any ballet positions open.
Ballet is pretty popular for the demographics that have the money for lessons. Hip-Hop is fun though because you get to flow more with the music and add an attitude to it.
Yes. And I am mostly familiar with Dutch hip-hop music, And this is an American-style class. I may need your help down the line! :).
I dont dance unfortunately. My body doesnt move like it used to and I've got some balance issues.
Oh, I meant with which hip-hop songs are popular over there at the time. I can look it up online, But if you come across any fun clean hip-hop songs with a good tempo, Let me know!
I think your best bet would be the app calledTicTok. Theres lots of current R&B and Hip-Hop thats going viral due to people the ages that your students would be.
That's a good suggestion! How are you feeling? Are the twins moving a lot?
They do! The kick and twist around and its horrible to my organs. My bladder in particular. I have to go almost every 15 minutes now.
Oh, I'm sorry! I know it will be more than worth it in the end, But it doesn't make it any less frustrating in the moment. Do you think you'll still be able to continue to work until you're 7 months?
Yes, Work is very accommodating and gives me work that keeps me mostly able to float around the office depending on what my body is doing.

persona: My girlfriend is studying to be a financial planner.

I work for a traveling circus. People insult me for my job. Performing is my favorite part of being a trapeze artist. I am one of the main attractions in the circus. I have  been employed at my current position for 5 years.  I do not like the job. My job requires increased protein intake. I want to pursue a new career.
I move things with my mind.
I love Mexican food. I have  never watched NASCAR.
I've seen a lot of movies about the circus. I prefer modern circuses to earlier ones.
I have a girlfriend.
dialogue: How long have you and your girlfriend lived together, Or are you planning on moving in together soon?
We haven't moved in together yet. We are thinking about it. It would definitely help the budget. But I think first I want to find a new job I like more. What about you, Do you live alone?
I don't I live with my girlfriend, We actually just recentley moved in together, So, It has been very new, Fun but new.
That is exciting! Did you get a place together or move in to the space you already had together?
I originally had a place, She was living at home, So she moved in with me. Definitely an adjustment that takes some getting use to.
That must help on the bills. Did you do any of the construction or engineering of your home?
I have, I bought a house that was more of a fixer upper, So I have been doing a lot of the rennovating, Currently working on the downstairs bathroom.
I wish I was handy like that. I'm so jealous when I see how cool other people make their houses their own.
Dude, You are a trapeze artist. The thrill of that has to be insane. I wish I had those skills!
I guess. I take it for granted but it definitely keeps me in shape. I'm still thinking about finding a new career though. It's getting rough on my joints.
Yeah I can imagine as you get older that has to be very tough. But as you said you have to be in great shape.
Yea after five years I can definitely feel it more now. I would definitely keep up with the work out. Maybe work on training people instead of performing.

persona: I prefer dogs over rabbits. I have two dogs.
I am a teacher. I love children.
I don't have a large income.
I have a garden in my house. I love the smell of flowers.
My husband used to be in the marine.
I love puppies.
I like peonies and hydrangeas. I have rose bushes.
I am very busy.
dialogue: What grade do you teach?
9th grade English. They act crazy! But, I bet you are used to crazy kids having that husky!
I used to have a husky. I no longer do. He wasn't that crazy, Though. Only got that way when we played. Freshmen are crazy and rebellious. I remember being in ninth grade. Times were simpler then.
I think that's why I like gardening so much. The smell of them is like aromatherapy! I have the roses, But I want more flowers that have a strong smell. Any suggestions?

Lily has a very strong fragrance. Are you having the kids read OfMice and Men written by John Steinbeck? I can't remember if it was freshmen or sophomore year I had to. I really enjoyed the experience, Though. We watched the movie, Too, I believe.

We used to, But I hated when he would accidentally kill the rabbits in the book. It's hard reading that over and over. So, The programs you donate to? Do they help with education/school, Or fund something else?

They do help. Some are just to give the children what they need. Like extra coats and shoes in the winter. Some give the school extra money for new textbooks and stuff like that. Each one funds something different, But they all help. That's why I love donating. The children are the future. Might as well supply them with what they need, You know?

I wish more people realized that! A lot of people say they don't enough money to donate, But even if it's $1, If everyone did that it would add up. I mean, I don't make that much either, But a few bucks won't kill me.

That's true. Giving up a $1 cheeseburger for a day won't kill anyone. Besides, It could be your own children helping. Literally, Anything counts. Our time on this earth is limited. We might as well make it to where the next generations doesn't have so much to worry about while they're so young. I do understand that some people can't afford it, But if they can go to McDonald's everyday they can.

I feel the same way about people who don't take care of their pets. My neighbor's cat is on her fourth litter and she won't get her spade because she "doesn't have the money." Of course, She has some Starbuck'strenta frappachino soy extra everything concoction every day. I would love to volunteer at a shelter like you, But I think it would break my heart. I think about just taking the cat and getting her secretly fixed, Lol.

The shelter I volunteer at don't euthanize. We keep them until they find a home. That's my favorite thing about it. I'm not afraid to pull money out of pocket to feed the animals, Either. It's a passion. They're scared animals.
It was great talking to you! Gotta get going, Busy, Busy! You'll need to send me some pics of your flowers as they come in.

persona: I'm depressed because I am turning 40.
I am a car salesman. I hate my job but don't know what else to do.  I do not like interacting with customers. My wife never had a job.
I recently bought a sports car. I own two cars. I am preparing to be single.

I was married for 20 years. I am going through a divorce, which was hard at first. I will be moving soon. I have gotten a new place but cannot move in until my divorce is finalized. I have bought a new house but it is small. I do not have a lot of money right now.
I enjoy working on cars. I know how to work with a computer. I am thinking about quitting my job.
dialogue: I know you might not care but my website for my cosmetics line had it's highest ever visits today! So excited to get new customers, This has been my dream for as long as I can remember.
That is amazing, Well done! My wife used to love buying cosmetics with my money!
If there were more women like her in the world, I could quit my day job and focus on selling cosmetics.
That would be handy but trust me, We do not need more women like my wife in the world, I can't wait for the divorce to be over with.
She must have some good qualities. Why did you marry her in the first place?
I was young and naive. I wonder what being single is going to be like after being in a relationship for so long.
I'm sure you'll enjoy the freedom for a while, But then the lonliness creeps in. At least that's what happens to me after a breakup.
That is quite depressing. I should find some new hobbies or something. How good are you at playing the piano?
I used to be alright but I've been so busy with my cosmetics that I have not practiced in over a year. Hopefully it's easy to pick up again when I have the free time.
Yes it must be hectic running a business.
There is never enough time. I wish I had the money to hire someone to help me with marketing and sales.
Wouldn't we all love to have more money. I might sell one of my cars.

persona: My favorite movie is Mean Girls. Top Gun is my favorite action movie from the 80s. I love the Batman movie.
I love the Rolling Stones.
I don't like to study. I like to go out and party.
I volunteer at a food bank near my house.
I am good at replacing floors.
I want to invest in stocks and shares.
dialogue: How's it going with the stocks and shares? Have you learned anything interesting?
Yes I've learned so far that its basically like gambling and I think I will reach out to an investment firm to help me so I don.
I'm also thinking of reaching out to an investment firm to learn more about it.
Yes I think that's for the best so I don't make any mistakes that would significantly hurt me financially!
Do you have any investment firm in mind?

There's actually a local firm near my local food bank that some of the other volunteers have told me about so I think I will check them out. I love to support local small businesses. Once I meet with them, If you'd like I can pass on your info if you'd like them to give you a call.
Please pass my info and let me know how it goes. I'm already excited.
Yay! Will do for sure. So aside from the new floors, Have you done anything exciting this weekend?
Yes, I took my baby to the park and i also needed some air.
That sounds like fun and the weather has been great for a day in the park. I partied until late the other night and I'm still recovering, Lol! Getting old I suppose.
I love being active and having fun. Your nights must have been interesting.

Indeed they are! I don't think I mentioned to you the last time we spoke but I am actually free most of next week so if you would like to to come back to help with finishing the floors I would be glad to. I'm really starting to enjoy home improvements!

persona: I play and teach the piano. I play guitar, violin, and the flute. I like classical music such as Mozart.
I work in music but I wish I studied architecture.
I don't plan on going back to school. I would go to school for architecture.
I have a sister.
dialogue: My sister is going to be by next week and can jam with us.
That's awesome! Will she be playing the keyboards or a different instrument?
She will be playing the same old piano. Honestly i like it the most. She is amazing with her piano skills. I dont know how someone can still get better when they are so good. I bet you know.

Yes. I'm not one of those people who underscores customer service workers on surveys saying "It could always be better!" But I do feel that way about music. But sometimes better isn't always in a technical sense; often it's less technical and more soul... Especially with guitar. Piano and flute require quite a lot more accuracy, Not as forgiving in my experience.

I know i am talking to an expert here! I wish i could be better in the music field. You know the irony about being a muscian that you have to be soooo careful with your fingers. I guess I use that excuse when I wasn't my best at basketball. Anyway, I am excited to see my sister. How about yoursis? Any plan on meeting up?
That's very introspective of you! No, Carmen is still in San Diego. I probably won't see her again for a while. Did you have your big final yet or no?

Oh I wish you guys can hang out soon. Don't get me started on my FINAL!!! It is in 3 weeks actually. I feel i am so doomed. I totally needed more time! But I guess my pressue level has been way too unhealthy so having a break to jam with family will probably save my sanity lol.

Definitely. Making music helps me do other things -- give my brain a break so I can go back in refreshed. At least you do have the three weeks! I'm sure you're not doomed, Although I understand the feeling. Finals are stressful!
Oh i almsot forgot to ask! Any good places to rent pianos? Mysis asked me and i totally forogot...

I would go local if you can! They're usually much more affordable to rent locally than those chains that charge you an arm and a leg for drop off and pickup. I'd call the local music stores. If they don't rent them out, They probably will have a recommendation about the best place to try.

Oh ok i'll pass that to mysis. She is just trying to help out her friend. Anyway, Have you been following the news on the shaky building in China? It's so bizarre that it shoke for no reason for 5 consecutive days! I would be scard to death if i worked there!
No, I haven't heard anything about that, But that sounds terrifying! And with all these instruments around, I feel like the shaking would create its own ominous soundtrack.

persona: I play music. I drink alcohol.
I grew up on a small farm. I miss the home farm.
I enjoyed organized sports. I haven't played any sports as an adult. I was busy with lots of activities while I was in school.
I'd like to make new friends. I love to host dinner parties. My parents had big parties.
I last played basketball in fourth grade. I played soccer.
I invite people over to jam and have dinner.
dialogue: Are there any recreational soccer leagues near you?
I'm not sure, As I haven't been looking to join an organized sports league in many years. Did you join the basketball league yet?
We have! It starts in a couple of weeks. I am really excited about it. Do you think you will ever play soccer again?

Good for you. Between not drinking and getting some exercise, You'll be in tip-top shape both mentally and physically. I'm not sure, But summertime is coming, So I'd like to play basketball or soccer for fun, If not competitively.
I think you should! It would be a great way to meet new friends. That is a big reason I am doing it.
I hope that you enjoy it. How is your sobriety coming along? Are you struggling or do you have your demons under control?
It is going well thank you. Have you ever stopped drinking or do you have yours under control?
I mostly drink on weekends because I don't have to work. Occasionally, Though, I'll have a gig playing music on a weeknight, And I'll have 2 or 3 beers to take the edge off and socialize a bit.
That makes sense. I don't have a problem with other people drinking as long as they don't get messy. Do you sing or do you play an instrument? You never told me.

I play the bass guitar in a band with my buddies. We do all cover songs, So we get gigs from time to time at local bars, Weddings, And private parties. Have you thought about giving learning to play guitar another go?
Maybe. I just have no natural rhythm that makes it hard. What kind of music do you guys tend do to at your gigs?

You can make up for a lack of innate musical talent or inclination through hard work and dedication. You know what that's like, Having doing all the grueling work on the farm before. We play cover songs, Mostly classic rock and 80s and 90s pop.

persona: I play ping pong.
My father and I are both electricians.  I learned my trade from my father.
I live in the south. I love eating chocolate.

I'm currently learning to play Beethoven's Für Elise on the piano. I have been practicing Beethoven's Fur Elise. I have been studying the piano on Youtube. My goal is to learn and master one full song on the piano each week. I practice the piano at least one hour every day.
I play the violin, but only as a challenging hobby; I am more serious about the piano. I've been playing the violin for about 4 or 5 years. I've been playing the piano since I was 8 years old.
dialogue: I'm thinking I might do a YouTube guitar course, To get back into playing.
That's a good idea. Youtube is a great resource to learn. What type of music do you like playing?
I like playing a little bit of classic rock. I think putting my work on youtube will motivate me to get better knowing other people will see it.
Yes! That's great motivation. Let me know when you post something, I would like to hear it.
Absolutely! You should consider putting some of your piano work on Youtube!
I may do it. Do you think we should do a musical duet together?
Could you imagine that! It would be straight heat! We absolutely should. We may get enough views on youtube to get paid too!
That would be sweet! What type of guitar do you have?
I have a Gibson electric guitar, I just love how powerful it sounds.
Ah man!!! That's a great guitar.
All this music talk is acutlally and oddly making me hungry, What is your favorite kind of chocolate?
It's odd, But I like dark, Bitter chocolate. Odd, I know!!!.

persona: I'm am not vegan. I have a brown german shepherd. I love my dog. My dog thinks he's a lion.
I like to eat hummus.
I like to watch NHL hockey.
I have been to Disney world. I like to ride the rollercoasters at Disney. I'm afraid of heights. I don't like roller coasters. I do not like to sky dive. I'm not brave.
I live in a farming community. I raise my own food. I do not have a pool. I have a television.
My husband is adopted.

I have a vegetable garden. I have bought seeds for this year's garden that I have not planted yet. I have chickpea and herb seeds. I want to make hummus with chickpeas that I grow. I have a dog that is good at digging.
dialogue: Since hockey season is over, What kind of movies would you like to watch when we hang out?
Im good with almost anything. I like thrillers, Action, And comedies. If you have one you wanted to see Ill be okay with it.
Okay cool! I am pretty flexible when it comes to films I seem to mostly watch cooking shows.
Speaking of cooking, My garden is coming along very nicely. If you ever wanted to have some for your great recipes I will trade you for a little of your great homemade hummus.
Deal! I have been trying to recreate the hummus that i ate in disney land, It was excellent!
Yeah you told me about it and I really want to try it. I couldnt find anything online about how they make it. Must be a secret recipe.
Possibly. Maybe we can find out if we go to disney world again.
We should plan a trip. I love the rollercoasters and really want to go on space mountain again.
I havent been on that one yet, Was that your favorite ride?
Yeah I liked it the most. Its got a cool futuristic theme and was really fast and fun. I like space themed things. Hows your dog doing by the way?
Disney world never fails to amaze me. My dog is great, How is yours?
Hes good. I thought he got sprayed by a skunk the other night but the skunk sprayed something else. It really stunk by the garden the next few days.

persona: I have a black lab dog named Trooper.
I am a mechanical engineer. I work long hours.
I love hiking and rock climbing. I climbed Mt. Everest for the first time last month.
I am from Colorado.
I do not speak any other languages. I want to learn Spanish, but it seems hard.
I have never thrown a frisbee.
dialogue: I have to tell you what my boyfriend said about hiking up Mt. Everest!
OmG, What did he say?
He said it is for losers! I was like what the heck! You are so mean!
I don't think that me and your boyfriend would get on very well with each other then... It was an absolutely eye opening and amazing experience. Does he just hate the outdoors?
Like I said earlier, He is not a fan of hiking. He claims he is a fan of the great outdoors... But from the comfort of his own home and sofa. Lol.

Ahhh, So I guess he is an avid David Attenborough documentary watcher then. Yes, I knew he hated hiking, But I thought maybe he liked camping, Or adrenaline pumping activities like sky-diving or base jumping. There is more to the outdoors than just hiking!
Maybe you can convince him to come hiking with us! I think he is tired of hearing my try to change his opinion.

Some people are just set in their ways. To be honest, That is what makes having a connection with someone all the more enjoyable - hearing about the things that they enjoy and are passionate about. I am sure he actually likes hearing your enthusiasm.
I sure hope he does. We tried to talk things out yesterday, But he still isn't too pleased with me right now. You know what people say though..."opposites attract!".
I mean, I guess. But he also needs to be tolerant of you. Is he mad about the hiking, Or is it more than that?
Oh it is definitely more than that. I am slow to pack up my apartment and move into his. He is trying to be patient though.
The real question is, Does he have a wardrobe and a side of the sink ready for your arrival?

persona: I ride horses. I do not have a horse. I like mini horses. I would like to have a horse, but I can't afford one.
I have 2 more years of high school. I don't like high school. I don't get along with my teachers. I am worried about the PSAT test.
I have purple walls. My carpet is lime green.
I am vegan.
I'd like to learn to do jumps and other tricks on horses.
I love Arabian horses. I consider horse riding a tradition in my family. My father is a farmer. I want to be a horse vet.
I don't have the money to take a vacation.
dialogue: I have a friend that lives a reasonable to travel distance from you and I have arranged it for you to ride his horses and get paid to exercise them I will send you his number.
That sounds amazing, Thank you so much. I am happy to know you are still willing to help me after all this time.
Of course! That's what friends are for, Right?
Definitely, I have always been able to count on you and I thank you so much for that. How are you kids?
They are doing well. Thank you for asking! You will have to babysit them sometime soon so that my wife and I can have a date night!
I am more than willing to do that. It will be nice to see them and also give you two time alone. I can stay overnight if you want to book a hotel away somewhere?
That would be amazing! Are you still trying to save up some money for a vacation?
Yes, But the washer broke so I had to pay for that fixing. I have enough to go, But I want to wait for the perfect holiday to come up!!.
Well just let me know what your rates are and maybe you can babysit more than once!
Oh, Honestly, You don't have to pay me. I am happy to do it for free. It is the least I could do, Thank you though.
Oh no. We will pay you! Our kids love you and we really appreciate you helping us out!
If you insist, But I feel bad for it... I will bring round some treats for the kids as well. We will have a great time!

persona: I do not like hiking. I collect vintage cars.
I own an orange alfa romeo owned by Johnny Carson.
I am allergic to dogs. I work from home.
I own an orange car. I like red Mustangs.  Wife doesn't want to buy a car right now.
I work out at a gym. I like cardio workouts as well as weights.
I have a pet goldfish named Bubbles.
I enjoy driving trucks, it was one if his first cars.  I don't have a need for a truck.
dialogue: I got a new fish, I named him Sunrise after Sunrise Trail.
Oh cool! Does that make you feel less sad about Nemo? What is Sunrise Trail?
I'm still sad about Nemo, But Sunrise Tail makes me a little happier. He is a beautiful little Beta fish. I want to get him a big aquarium. How is Bubbles doing?
I love betas, They are so pretty. Bubbles is great. He seems pretty happy, But I am thinking about getting him a friend! I'd love to have a huge tank with tons of fish.
How's your car collection? Any plans on getting something new?
I'm a lot more likely to get more fish than I am to get more cars! The wife still isn't supportive of my car collecting.
Well, Maybe if you collect enough fish, She'll decide it'd be better to get more cars, Rather than more fish. Lol.
Hahaha yeah, I could go really crazy with the fish and the tanks! You can spend as much as you do on a car on some of those fancy fish tanks! Do you want to get more fish too?
Yes, I'd like to. I think a salt water tank would be really interesting, But probably a lot of work and maintenance.
Yeah they are a lot of work! I know a guy who had one, But he hired a professional to come and take care of it! Doubt the wife would like that extra expense at all!
Ya, That would be a tough one to get the go ahead on. How is work going for you?
Pretty good. I like working from home. I wear sweatpants all day! How about you? What do you do for work?

persona: I am an accountant. I got a finance degree in 2011. I would like to go to business school to become a manager.
I just got a Yorkie yesterday; my parents bought it for me. I love dogs. My parents are wealthy bankers.
I like listening to punk rock.
I sometimes volunteer.
I own a BMW.  My BMW is the first car i have ever owned. I go on road trips every weekend. I like older cars as well. I take my M3 on road trips. I like to drive on open roads.
I like spending time with other socially.
I have never been to Miami. I live close to Tampa.
dialogue: I just saw the sweetestM3 that had been fixed up.... I hope they kept some of the original parts though.
Nice! What color was it?
It is a classic blue. What color is yours?
Mine is black on black. Did you work on your stangs at all this weekend?
I did a little work. I had to do some work on other peoples cars though this weekend. That extra money for being on call is great.
I bet! You must bank!!!.
Yea. I am hoping to have enough to buy a new project car over the summer.
Cool! What do you have in mind to buy?
I'm not sure yet. I'm just going to keep my eye on the classifieds and see what comes up. Having cash makes it easier to just wake up one day and buy one.
That's true. I wish I had time for that. This tax season has had me too busy for fun.
I bet. Now that is over do you have any plans to take a few days off?
I sure do! I am dreaming of vacation. Maybe somewhere tropical.

persona: I am in Pennsylvania.
I just started a new job as a personal assistant.
I'm pregnant with my first child. My baby is due in 4 months. I'm waiting until birth to learn the sex of my baby.
I have a husband who is into skateboards. We have been together three years, married for one.
I'd like to try skating. Having healthy hobbies and being in shape is important to me.
dialogue: Have you already made a gender party?
No way! I don't want to know until birth, As long as the baby is healthy the gender does not matter to me.
I envy you. I don't think i could wait. Is the pregnancy going well? Are you feeling okay?
Yes it has been going quite well lately and the hubby is so supportive. I've been walking the park daily and trying to continue to eat healthy. I can't wait to meet the baby!
You guys will make great parents! Do you have names ready?

Yes, We've chosen the name Parker, As it was my husband's grandfather's middle name. And because it's unisex the gender of the baby won't matter. We plan on having a baby shower after the baby is born, To introduce them to the world! It would be great if you cold make it, I will be sending out invites about a month before.
I would love to attend. It would give me and you husband time to talk babies and skateboarding.

Definitely! Maybe you can help to hang the skateboard in the baby's nursery too! How has X Games prep been going? As soon as they baby can walk I know my hubby will be asking you to come over and give some lessons.
It's going slowly. My arm still isn't 100%. I can't miss the X games!
Just take your time, Follow the doctor's orders and you will get there. Where are the X Games being held? I'd love to come check them out if I can.
They are in Aspen. You should come. I need some support!
That sounds incredible! I know my husband would love to bring our future skater Parker along too.

persona: I'm a cashier at the local supermarket.
I live in Ohio. I've never traveled. I think Ohio is boring.
My favorite food is pizza with black olives.
I like to swim. I like going to the beach.

I have a cat named Spook. He is at least 14 years old. He is a Persian black cat with orange eyes. My cat sleep over 16 hours these days but he is still very active. He likes to eat pizza with me and makes me happy.My cat only eats the crust and beef topping. He likes to go on walks but just not on sand.
I had 2 dogs and 2 cats that passed away. I used to be a dog person but now I have a deeper connection with cats.
I love to play games on the computer. I am into a game called "Among Us".
I have been busy at work with the extra shifts.
dialogue: I found a pizza place near me today. I will try it out and let you know how it is so that I can bring you there when you come visit me if it's good.
Sounds good. Maybe we can go out for Chinese if that doesnt work out. I like lo-mein also, And I know you love Chinese.

Your cat Spook would love the pizza from this place! I haven't tried a slice with olives yet; I ordered a white pie with broccoli and a pepperoni pie so far. I haven't found a great Chinese take-out place near me yet.
I think Spook knows when I call to order pizza. He gets excited when I say the word pizza. Its going to be hard leaving him when I come to visit but I can have my neighbor Rodge watch over him.
Did you put in for time off from your job at the supermarket yet? Let me know when you're coming. I'll plan a nice beach getaway for us.
Sounds good. I think around the 4th of July will be a good time for me. Did you get finished putting the solar panels on your house?

Maybe you could come on Thursday, July 1 or Friday, July 2. That way, We can rip it up all weekend, Since the 4th of July is on a Monday. I'll have to work at the coffee shop that Monday for sure. I bought the panels, But I'm waiting on my friend, Who does roofing and contracting for work, To be free to install them.

Sounds like a plan I will make sure Im off those dates. Going to the beach sounds great as well. I like doing things like that in the summer. I never travel so this is all so exciting for me. Maybe we can do some swimming,
Great. I heard that there are some nice beaches along Lake Erie in Ohio. We can go swimming, Walk along the boardwalk with Spook, Down some cold ones, Listen to tunes, And have a jolly old time.
Sounds like fun. I like drinking beer by the sand. Spook would love that as well, As long as he gets his nap time in. I think.
It's going to be killer. Just think of what you have to look forward to while you're working at the supermarket. I'll try to do the same. Soon enough, It will be 4th of July weekend!
Yeah it wont be too much longer. I cant wait. You should start playing games on your computer we can play sometimes. I know you said you dont do that but you should give it a try.

persona: I finished painting my room purple and lime green.
I travel for my horse competition.
I have not been to Europe. I would like to visit Paris, Berlin, England, the Eiffel Tower. I would like to try the bread and pastries in France.
I like seafood. I like the culture in London. I would like to see Big Ben.
I am studying high school. I did four years of high school.I was in Equestrian club. I placed 7th in youth division. I keep up with Equestrian club. I had an accident.
dialogue: I have made plans to go to France.
That's so exciting. What all are you planning on seeing and doing in France this time?
I'd like to do some bike riding and probably just relax more than usual. You should really plan a trip there, I could help you out!
Are you only going to Paris or are you going to visit other cities and regions as well? I think I'd really like to see the South of France. I saw a show about it and it seems gorgeous.
I think I'll stay in Paris this time. I'd like to explore the city on bike and foot and see the sites. Do you have any travel plans?

No, Not right now. For the time being I'm worried about finishing up this school year. But this summer I hope to go somewhere, Even if it's just to a lake for some relaxation. Have you been to any continents other than Europe?
I've been to South America, But nothing major. Just some stops on a cruise I went on. What about you?
I haven't been outside of the U.S., Although I think I've been to 24 different states. I'd have to check my journal to confirm that, Though!
That's pretty good, Though. What state is your favorite to travel to?
I really liked going to Kentucky. I'm not sure many people know how beautiful and green it is. Besides, With my love of horses it also makes sense for me to like it.
Have you been to the Derby in Kentucky? I think that would be a lot of fun.
Yes, I did go and watch it with my parents. It's more of a party than I thought it would be, But I just loved seeing those majestic horses.

persona: I live in Memphis.
I like to sing.
I am male. I like country music.
I am training my dog. I have a dog who knows sit, lay down, and roll over. He doesn't know how to stay and then come yet. I haven't talked to a dog trainer.
I have an Australian shepherd with blue eyes and tan and white fur.
dialogue: I just trained a dog with blue eyes who has tan and white fur - he looked just like your dog!
Awe! What did you train him/her to do?
I train them to do a bunch of things, Mostly follow commands, Do tricks, Or chase tennis balls. The good stuff!
Awesone, I bet the dogs love it. Was this one another Aussie?
It was Aussies are simply the best dogs, I enjoy being around them so much!
They are so loyal. I love them a lot. One of my friends has one and it loves to guard or herd things like birds or kids.
Most definitely! They are as you said so loyal and that is great! What are you training your dog to do?
Right now we are training her to take basic commands to keep the kids engaged with her. We are also training the kids on how to train a dog so they can work with her too. She has boundless energy.
Haha that is awesome! How much do the kids enjoy training the dog?
They are loving it. And its a good lesson on patience for them too.
I hope to one day have kids so I can also have them train dogs, I think they will truly enjoy it! And as you said it teaches the patience.
Definitely. I went through the same lessons with my parents and it has applied to a lot of different things.

persona: I can charm people with music. I am a country music musician. I am into good school country and new school music.
I play the guitar. I play music on the weekends.
I have a week long gig coming up next month at a small venue. I like smaller venues because I am more personal with my fans.
I have been trying to make Let It Go country.
I love rain.
I like colors that pop.
dialogue: I learned another quick dinner recipe.
Oh? What is it for? I need to get a new recipe in the mix. Mealtime is getting a bit boring.
I do chicken in a skillet with vegetables and spices. It is a delicious! The while family loved it.
What kind of spices do you use? Anything spicy or exotic?
Paprika, Salt, And turmeric. Chef's kiss!
Do you listen to music while you cook? I do that all the time.
I sure do. I had one of your country albums on yesterday actually! You are so talented!
Well thank you. I don't listen to myself while cooking but listen to my inspirations.
Who are you favorites? If you like them, They must be good.
I listen to Shania Twain a lot. A lot of people that are less known but making waves to stay up to date with new bands.
I love her. She always gets me dancing.
She is pretty great. She should come out with a new album soon. What else do you listen to?

persona: I am a Doctor. I have been a doctor for 10 years, but I was recently fired because I was making a video for America's funniest videos while doing heart surgery.
I like papayas. My favorite movie is Friday.

I like going to the park and tripping roller skaters with logs. I have not been to a park lately.  I have a bird that swears in Spanish. I do not understand Spanish. I'd like to learn Spanish for my job. I speak French.
I like farms. I like playing with piglets.
I am looking for a new job.  I interviewed at a local non-profit hospital.
I used to operate on people.  I need to reform myself before I go back to operating.
I am scared on beestings.
dialogue: Have you had any luck in your job search?
I interviewed at a local hospital, I havent heard back yet. I used to operate on people, Im looking forward to doing it again.
Yeah hopefully you can. You were good at your job just made a few bad decisions. I hope you get the job.
I hope i do too, I did make a bad decision at my old job. How is your bee farm.

Very well. Getting more honey than ever. Ive made a lot of money at the farmers market. Also I got my own label I use now so people can recognize my product. Do you want a bottle sometime when I see you next?
I would love a bottle! Thank you! We should learn Spanish together, I heard you want to learn.
Yeah I do. Maybe we will know what your bird is saying all the time!
Yeah that would be great! I think hes swearing at me! I like playing with piglets, Do you have any on your farm or just bees?
No piglets but it would be fun to raise some. They are so cute when they are little. I dont like animals that much though but piglets are fun.
It would be adorable to raise them, We should go in on some together, It would be a fun hobby to do together.
Yeah it would be. Let me know how your job search goes maybe we can get together and celebrate soon and talk about going in on the farm together.
Will do! Hopefully there will be something worth celebrating soon. I havent been to the park in a while, We should meet there.

persona: I live in the country. I work on a farm. I have a farmer's tan. I have a pet milk cow named Betsy.
I love country music. I drive a Dodge Ram.
My parents live on a farm.
I have a house.
I am the same age as Brittany. I'm a Blake Shelton fan. I'm not a big Brittney Spears fan.
I'm an electrician. I've been very busy lately.
dialogue: Has Betsy been a good girl this week and giving you lots of milk?
She sure has! I jam out to Blake Shelton while milking her. I think she likes his music too!
That is awesome! Probably puts her in a good mood! Who else do you enjoy in the country music game aside from Blake Shelton?
Gath brooks is obviously a legend. Luke Bryan is really talented.Dolly Parton will always be a favorite!
Yes! All three are absolutely legendary. Have you ever seen Luke Bryan in concert? Dude puts on a great show!
I haven't, But it sure is on my bucket list! Maybe we can do that together some time?
Most definitely, We should look for a show to go to this summer if you are down?
I am! I am happy to travel too. Make a trip of it!
Sounds good! You are going to bring me some of that legendary Betsy milk though, Correct?
Of course! You won't ever drink other milk again!
I am super excited to try this, Will be a great pre game drink before the concert!
For sure! That would be cool if Taylor Swift opened for him.

persona: I am forty. I am a car salesman. I hate selling cars.
I am unhappily married. My exwife doesn't work. My exwife takes my money. I am recently divorced. Its a relief to have the divorce finalized.

I moved into an apartment downtown. I am excited about decorating it. I like having my own space. I want to decorate my apartment with white and gold colors. I will splurge a little decorating. I will buy all new furniture. I want a completely fresh start.
I like to cook.
dialogue: Crate and Barrel is having a huge sale. You should check it out for decorating your new apartment!
Can't shop for a few months until my cash flow starts moving again.
Maybe you could go and look, Just to see what they have. You might be able to get some good ideas.
That sounds like a plan, I do want to see what is trending these days.
How is work going? Have you been able to move much inventory?
Not really, With the horrid weather folks would rather stay dry and warm than browse our car lots. Hoping that next month will bring more moderate dry weather.
That's a good point. Maybe I could stop by to see what you've got in stock. I've been in the market. What would you suggest?
Depends what kind of driving you do. Are you on the expressways into work every day or is most of driving for shopping and country driving on weekends?
A little bit of both. I will be using it to commute, But I also want to do some camping.
So a sturdy sedan would meet your needs. The new year's offerings will be out next month, So there will be great deals on last year's models because we have to make room for the latest models. The.
I'll totally come in and check it out! I'd love to help out where I can.
Your need for safety in the larger sedan like the Ford leSaber. It is ofren gotten by police departments because of its reliability and protection. Can you come by Saturday? Ought.

persona: I volunteer at a soup kitchen.
I like hamburgers and fried eggs. My favourite food is cheeseburgers. My first job was in McDonalds. I grew up poor.
My name is Ariel.
I like watching movies. I'm been watching the Bridgerton series.
I like country music.
I like intelligent animals. I have a German Shepherd named Ruby. My dog can count.
dialogue: I just got a call from the police. Someone came in to rob the convenience store, But my employees on duty knocked him out and tied him up until the police arrived.
Wow, Thats a really traumatic event. Is everyone ok, Did anybody or anthing get hurt or damaged?
I can't believe it happened when I was off duty. Thankfully no one was hurt but my poor employee is going to need a few days off to recover from the shock of it.
Totally understandable. Its a shame that people feel the need to go do things like that. Its a cry for help that winds up getting them in more trouble later.
That is true. It reminds me of the Elvis song.
Im not a fan of elvis but there are tons of songs centered around that trope. I like Johnny Cash's interpretation the most.
I wish that I could take one of the dogs to work to make everyone feel safer.
That would be a good idea. Only problem is all the food. Butive been in convenience stores that ignored the regulations and no one cared. Especially if the store is in a rough area.
Do any dogs come to the soup kitchen you volunteer at?
Yeah! Theres a few people that have companion animals and we make sure to serve them extra in case the dog is also food insecure.
That is great that you do that. How often do you volunteer?
Just a few times during the month. The company that owns the property shuffles through various services so that their clients are eating a wide array of things instead of stew all the time.

persona: My name is Jess.
I have my own dog-walking business. I plan to expand and hire more dog-walkers. I want to start a doggy day care.
I have three pet dogs named Biscuit, Gravy, and Simone Biles, after my favorite gymnast. I feed them French fries from Burger King as a treat.
I sometimes bring my dogs to work at my dog-walking business, but it can be difficult to walk so many dogs at once. They get along well with other dogs.

I graduated from college with a degree in accounting. I enjoy math and gymnastics. I took a political science class in college that I did not enjoy. I like economics. I want to take animal health classes to help my business.
I like jogging. I like hiking. I like to watch gymnastics.
dialogue: I just watched the national qualifier event for the USA Gymnastics team, Did you catch it on TV?
No, I missed it! I had planned to watch it and then I go busy with something else and missed it. How was it?
It was awesome, I can't believe some of the routines that they pull off! Have you competed in any gymnastic competitions?

When I was young I did a little bit of competitive gymnastics, But I didn't participate in college or anything like that. I had just become a spectator at that point. I wish I could have been out there, But I didn't have the ability or dedication for it.
I bet it takes a lot of dedication. How is your dog walking business going?

It's going quite well! Thanks for asking. We seem to be getting more clients and more clients sticking with us for longer periods. I tell you, I am absolutely going to have to hire another dog walker to help out, And I'll give you right of first refusal. No pressure or anything, But the offer stands, Otherwise I'm going to have to look for someone.
I would love that! Thank you! What do you like best about the job? Have you ever had issues with the dogs not getting along?

I just love being around happy-go-lucky dogs all day. They bring such warmth and joy into life. And yes, Sometimes dogs don't get along. But dogs are great because they can usually be distracted with some treats. And in the worst-case scenario, I just have to struggle with them a little more than usual.
I think I could definitely handle that! I love dogs, They all have such unique personalities. I used to not really want them, But once I got one, I totally understood why people love them so much.

Yes, They're wonderful animals. And if you're a little apprehensive at first I would make sure to start you out with dogs that I know are really cooperative and get along. I really don't have too many rambunctious dogs that I work with regularly.
I'm sure you check them out before agreeing to walk them. So what made you decide to go with the dog walking business, Rather than accounting?

I like being outdoors too much to work in an office, At least right now. But it's great because I get to use my accounting degree on my own business. I don't feel like it was a wasted education. I use it every day!

persona: I have been unpacking.I recently moved to the USA. I am from Romania.
I have stepchildren. I am six months pregnant with unnamed children. I do not have a job.
I speak English. My parents and grandparents are from Yorkshire. We moved to Romania when I was three.
I lived in Paris as an exchange student in high school.
I live in the USA.  I have been to Spain. Spain is my favorite place.
I am not a good cook.
My favorite food is meatball soup. I also like dishes with Mamaliga and Mititei as well.
dialogue: So What brought you to the states?
I came over to marry my new husband, Who I met online.
That's wonderful! What do you miss most about home?

I think just the familiarity of it. You get used to a place and you like it largely because it's familiar, Not necessarily because it's better. And so now the U.S. Is becoming familiar, And my husband is good to have around. I'm hoping my parents can come over and visit soon, Especially when my babies are born. That would be nice.
That makes sense. I would very much miss the familiarity of "home". I enjoy Romanian food. Do you cook? What is your favorite dish?
No, I'm not much of a cook, Although as I think I said before, My favorite dish is sour meatball soup. How about you? What's your favorite food?

Yes that's right. My favorite guilt pleasure is pizza of all kinds. I enjoy plain, With toppings, And everything in between! I can't get enough but I don't allow myself to have it too often. I do not cook very well, Although I would like to learn. Perhaps when I learn Spanish I will travel and take cooking classes as well!

That sounds like a great plan. Do you like ice cream? While pregnant I've been craving ice cream. I think my favorite is Rocky Road or Butterscotch Ripple. My husband has had to make a lot of late-night runs to the convenience store.

I love ice cream!! Rocky Road sounds delicious, I haven't had it in so long. I'm sure your husband is happy to do something that helps you. You're having twins right? So exciting! Your role as a stepmother must be good preparation for having new babies.

I'm actually having triplets! And yes, It has been good to take care of the stepchildren, Although I'm so big and immobile right now that their father is doing most of the parenting. My feet and back hurt a lot. I'm looking forward to having my children, Although then it will likely be chaos on this house.

Oh wow! That is such a blessing. I cannot imagine the chaos, But it will all be worth it. I hope you're feeling well, Although I'm sure your body can be in a lot of pain at times. I know I was in pain with just one baby, Nevermind 3!
Yes, I'm a little scared about it but I trust the OB/GYN we found for me. He's handled multiple births before and thinks everything will be fine, So that puts me at ease a little.

persona: I love poetry. I love coffee.
I love Star Wars.
I played football in college.
I like to run.
I like to cook. I love sushi and spicy food. I am not good in making sushi.
I have a kid. I listen to fairy tales on YouTube.
I like odes and haiku.
I am not vegetarian, possible to be pescatarian.
dialogue: My partner really enjoyed the chicken and shrimp chimichurri dish!
Thats good. That sounded like a fun meal to make. Ive been practicing making sushi but Im still not that good at it yet. I cant seem to get it just right.
You will get better. Do you have any sushi tools? Those might help.
Yeah I have the stuff to make it. Maybe I should watch some how-to videos on YouTube to get more help. If you see a good sushi video on there you should let me know.
I will keep an eye out. Do you have any suggestions for me on different recipe videos?
I saw one for a really good salmon and asparagus dish. I think youd like it.
I may need to check it out. I haven't had fish in a while. What do you do for work?

I work as an architect. Mostly doing commercial designs and things like malls and retail stores. You didnt tell me what you are doing now. I know you got your major in art, But wasnt sure if you found a job yet.
I have an internship but not a "real job" yet. I hope to go into design.
That would be nice. You were always so creative. I hope you find something soon.
I'm not in any rush. I want to enjoy the school experience.
Im keeping really busy between my job and my.

persona: I am a chef. My Name is Larry. I have a restaurant.
I like fishing. I fish at a nearby lake.
I like comic books. I enjoy snowboarding.
I don't have pets.
I have experience with job interviews.
I want a dog. I like to travel, snowboard, and fish.
dialogue: I have an interview tomorrow for a restaurant job.
I love working in my restaurant! What are you interviewing for?
I'm interviewing to be a cook, Since that's pretty much where my skillset lies. I do enjoy it though!
That is wonderful! I wish you the best of luck. What kinds of foods will you be cooking if you get the job?

Thank you! My experience was working at a burger joint, So you know, Meats and things like that. I meant to ask you, What kind of restaraunt do you own? With your interest in fishing I want to guess seafood haha.
That is a very good guess. I feel like you only can truly learn to cook fish when you get your own hands dirty. My favorite thing to cook for people in salmon. That is just a wonderful fish.
That's some pretty good logic. My grandpa used to catch and gut fish. He never made it for us though. Salmon is pretty delicious. Is that the most popular dish at your place?
It is... It's also the most expensive so it works out well! Haha. Shrimp is very popular as well though.
That does work out! Where's your restaurant located?
We are actually right on the beach! There seems to be something about eating seafood while you can see the ocean. People seem to like it alot.
That's the perfect spot! I was just about to ask if you were by the water. Sounds like you're running a great business! Are you always busy, Or do you get a lot of free time?
Oh I am always busy, But I like it that way. I trust my cooks, But I always want to know if anything is going wrong. If I need to come in and help on my time off I will.

persona: I work at a job that has late hours. I work at Burger King part time. I love the Whopper. I go to school part time. I'm not the boss at work.
I'm trying to save money and move out. I live with my parents. I'm looking for a space to rent.
I don't drink alcohol.
I don't have any pets.
The place I'm moving to is close to my work.
I'm in college studying business. I like business because it has the potential to open up many doors for me.
dialogue: Is there anything I can do to help make the move easier for you?
Well, If would be helpful if you would consider renting that extra room to me?

I would have to ask my boyfriend because its his place. And he would want to get to know you more. Since hes a CEO he is very particular about everything and has some trust issues from when he was making a name for himself.
I totally understand that. Would you mind setting up a time for me to talk to him? I think if we got to chatting he would see I will make a great roommate.

He is temporarily agreeing since we've known each other for a while. But he will still vet you like everyone else. So if you're willing to answer a bunch of personal questions we cant see why you cant come stay here.
Cool! Thanks! I will bring you guys Burger King after every shift too!
Awesome! Maybe just some fries when the cravings hit. I've got us on a diet that he loves to hate and its doing wonders for my curves.
BK has the best fries, In my opinion. Most people prefer McDonald's, But not me.

I share the sentiment. Burger king standardizes the amount of salt they use too so you dont have to roll the dice when you're travelling. My meds make me crave salt like crazy so its paramount I know which brands believe in it.
Tell me more about the diet that you are on.

Its mostly vegan and paleo. We both respond well to low carbs but we also struggle with finding fast alternatives that we can grab on the go. So by adding paleo in we can find enough variation in the diet to support it no matter where we are.
You will have to cook for me once I move in! I am happy to try and shave off some of my BK weight!

persona: My name is Andy. I am in aaa. I am 45 years old.
I'm taking medication. I have low energy due to the medication. My doctor assures this medication is the best for me. I take sleeping pills and it helps. I used to have difficulties falling asleep.
I like BBQ. I can eat a lot of food in one instance. I don't drink alcohol because of my medication.
dialogue: I was doing some research on some sleeping medications, But I wanted to know what your stance/what you would recommend I do personally.
I've been using Ambien for a while and it seems to do me well. It has made a huge difference in my life.
Wow that's great. It's such a great a huge difference I hope you can recommend it to me.

I just like sharing what's effective for me. I can't really recommend anything to anyone because every person is different. Its best to see a doctor and go through the pros and cons of each available option!
I like that, Thank you for helping me realize that. But I feel it has a lot of negative side effects I feel it may harm you in future. What do you think.

I think its possible, But it's nothing I'm worried about really. There are always risks to any situation, Especially when it comes to medication. Maybe if you're feeling too uneasy you could see a homeopath. They might have a more natural option they can share with you.
Thank you. May I ask, What's the main reason for you to use Ambien because I believe its a sedative drug.
Its for difficulties falling asleep. The sedative helps me get to sleep and stay asleep throughout the night.
Okay. I think you can seek a medical doctor's counsel to give alternative natural ways which may not harm you in future. Also value your sleep and manage time well.

Yeah, I think we discussed this last time. I already went to the doctor and he assured me this was the best medication for me. Although it makes me groggy sometimes I trust my doctor to tell me what's the best option out there. I've tried natural remedies but they haven't had any affect!
That's great then. I wish you well.
So have you read any interesting books lately Richard?

persona: I love ice cream. Chocolate is my favorite. I had a hand crank ice cream maker that I miss. I currently have an electric ice cream maker.
I love my wife and kids. I have 3 children. I work as a plumber. I am a man.
My wife is in a cooking club. My wife cooks different ethnic cuisines. My wife has more friends than I do.
My wife is abusive. We are getting divorced. I am having a hard time with the divorce.
dialogue: How old are your children?
They are triplets. They are 5! I know you live alone but do you have any kids?

No I never had kids. My cows are like my kids. They keep me busy but I really want to go out and make some more friends. I think it might be too late for me to have children. I bet triplets keep you really busy!
They do keep me busy but I cant remember life before them though. It is two girls and a boy. How many cows do you have in total?
Twenty six cows total. Its enough to make a decent profit and to keep me active. I end up making a lot of ice cream and with summer approaching its a good time for it.
You know I love ice cream! Do they all have names?
Yes since I have one for each letter of the alphabet I named them with names A-Z. I dont know what I would do if I got another. Are things still going bad with you and your wife?
We try to keep it civil for the kids but we are going forward with the divorce.
Im sorry to hear that. It must be hard on you and the kids.
Thank you, It is very hard. But in the long run I think it is for the best.
If you want to bring the kids over for some homemade ice cream and just get away for a while you can. I could use the company.
That would be great. I think they would get a kick out of the farm and cows. Do you have any other animals on the farm?

persona: I like to ride skateboards. I injured my arm. I broke multiple bones. I ride my skateboard with my friends. I do tricks and jumps. I will start skating again when the doctor releases me.
I like hats. I have a German shepard dog. I watch skateboarding with my dog. German Shepherds are my favorite breed of dogs.
I play card games.
I have never played hockey or ice skating.
I broke a bone while skateboarding. I will be healed in about one month.
dialogue: I just went to the store and picked up a skateboard. I'm going to practice in my driveway.
Congratulations! What kind of skateboard is it?
I'm not sure to be honest. I got it from a thrift store. Once I learn more I will invest in a fancy one.

Thats a good plan. Ive seen that they have a life expectancy and its probably best to get used ones while you are learning so you can go through more of them. Do you have any hardware that you are looking forward to getting for it if you like the sport?
I'm so new to it. Do you have any suggestions for me?
I dont but there are some good brands on YouTube that seem environmentally responsible and good for a budget. I'd bet one of the kits that has springs incorporated would be the best for a beginner.
Thanks for the suggestion. Have you been skating long? How is your injury?
My arm is healing well, I can feel it patching up and its a bit itchy. I cant wait to get these screws taken out of me.
Ouch! I didn't realize it was that bad. Are you going to go skating the minute you can?
I still skate right now but I stay on flat land so I dont run the risk of falling. Im on my longboard too which is good for balance.
Wow. I would be so nervous to reinjure myself. Does your dog go to you with the skatepark? I bet hes smart enough to do some tricks of his own.

I was nervous, But waiting on the doctor ws getting to me because I also use my board for my commute. I hate taking the bus and need space so I found a route that has few bumps and areas where I can rest if needed.

persona: I'm near retirement. I enjoy Nascar racing. I love going to the racetrack but have not been there lately.
I work in a library.
I don't drink.
I live in Spain.
I have a Labrador named Jack and a Golden Retriever named Axel. My dogs like playing in water. My dogs always get muddy.
I am reading a book series called "Truly Devious" by Maureen Johnson. I am enjoying reading my new book series.
dialogue: I was thinking about your two dogs,Tater and tot. Those are such cute names. I love them!
Since they do everything together its easier for them to respond to the same letter name. Otherwise they get distracted.
Thats great that its helpful for them. My dog is a terrier mix and she loves puddles.
Its always exciting when dogs arent nervous of the water. I love water breeds. What breed of terrier is she?
She is a mix. She always gets muddy in the water though, Do your dogs like the mud?
My labrador does but the golden, Not so much.
Ah its always a hassle to clean. Do you like racing?
I do like racing but not nascar. I prefer the drivers of formula one.
Oh i thought you liked Nascar?
I do but only when they are racing on a different kind of course. I only watch and go to events because im stuck in America and cant get the euro channels where I live.
You live in America? I thought you lived in Spain? I dont have my license but my dad races and has let me do a lap in his car.
Its exciting getting into the drivers seat the first time. I hope you learn tons about racing and its finer details.

persona: I like watching television. I wish I had someone to watch with.
I want a husband. I live alone. I work from home.
I love pizza.
I like to buy cars. I don't build any.
