It was cutting it a little close but we were prepared. Had the crib ready, Put some nice wallpaper, Baby monitor. We were ready to go. I'm glad it was all done and you will be to.
I hope so, It's hard with me being so sick at the moment but I'm sure I will start feeling better soon. How old are your kids now?
My son is 10 and my daughter is 8. I hope your sickness goes away soon. Do you want a boy or a girl?

Oh that is a good gap between the two of them, My husband wants us to try again so we only have a couple of years between them. Do yours get along well? And thankyou I do too. My husband wants a boy but I'm just worried about them being healthy, Gender doesn't matter to me.
Surprisingly they do, My son is very protective of my daughter. It is really cute. Men always want boys huh? My husband was ecstatic when our first was a boy.

They really do! Although I'm sure my husband will forget he ever felt differently if we have a girl. But aw how nice, I have a brother three years older than me and as much as we fought he was always looking out for me with other kids. Do you have a sibling?

I was actually an only child. That is one of the reasons I wanted to have two children so they would always have someone to look out for them. It was nice being an only child for a bit, But you feel like you're missing out on something later on.
I can imagine that would be the case. I'm sure it must have been nice going from that to the army where you've always got a community around you. Did you sign up straight out of school?
I did, Sad to say we weren't very well off an I didn't want to put a burden on my family, So joining the army I could get my education while helping the country.
Ah, I understand I have a friend who did the same. What did you study?

persona: I was poor growing up. My favorite food is cheeseburgers.
I am retired. I was a gym teacher.
I volunteer at the soup kitchen.
I used to skate.
i have a little brother. My brother and I used to go skateboarding.
I never built my own skateboard.
I went to college.I had a pickup truck. I fired a cannon from my pickup truck. I made targets for a cannon.
dialogue: Have you had the opportunity to get back to skateboarding?
No, I think I'm too old to skateboard now! My body can't take the falls! How was your doctor's appointment?
Good. He just checked out my arm. My cast needs to stay on for another month.
That's what I was talking about! I can't handle those breaks anymore! Did you break your arm falling off your skateboard?
Yeah I was trying to go down a large set of stairs. Almost made it too! When did you skate last?
Not since I was a kid! My brother and I used to skateboard all the time. I went to college and didn't bring my board and I just never skated again. Crazy. It's been 30 years.
Does your brother still skate? What does he do for a living?
No way! He is in his 50s and he's an insurance agent! Skateboarding doesn't go with his image now. Ha ha!
True! So where did you learn to make cannons?
In my college fraternity! No professional training, We just sort of figured it out ourselves!
I learned in high school believe it or not. My teacher had no clue that's what I was up to! So who makes your favorite cheeseburger? Mine is In n Out.
I bet that teacher would have been surprised! In N out is great but I'm partial to the classic Big Mac. I know the quality is bad, But I just love it!

persona: I am divorced. My wife has our kids. My kids are 2, 5, and 7.
I don't believe in God.
I am overweight. I am unhappy.
I like soul music, r & b, and jazz. I don't play piano or guitar.

I work in a nursing home and at home on Facebook. I clean for a living. I turn patients over in their beds. I help patients with toileting. I've worked at a nursing home for 10 years. I would like to get a different job.
It would be fun to be your band manager. I play the saxaphone. I like folk music.
I use YouTube.
dialogue: How long do you see yourself cleaning for a living?
With the pay that I get probably the rest of my life, But I have to do it for my three kids.
I understand, Kids always come first. Maybe you'll find yourself in a different industry one day, You never know. Have you ever made any money from playing the sax?
I haven't to be honest, I don't think I am good enough for that. I thought about starting a YouTube channel playing my sax, But I wouldn't know where to start.

Oh that's a good idea. I have also thought about doing that. My friend has a channel where she makes videos of her playing the double bass and she says you just have to start and you'll keep improving and growing your audience. Is there much music at the nursing home?

Not really, But they aren't paying me to do that. I mean if they wanted to give me something extra every day I played I would totally consider it. The residents might actually like it. Especially the jazz I can play, But what if they hate it?
Oh I'm sure that would be so helpful to them, Music always makes life better imo. You deserve to get paid for it though! I love jazz, Who is your favourite jazz musician?
I has got to be Louie Armstrong, I mean he is amazing. And thank you for saying I deserve to get paid for it. I'll bring it up next time I go to work. Do you have a favorite jazz musician?
Oh I agree, I love him too. My favourite is John Coltrane though. You definitely should ask at work I think. Do you prefer classic r&b? Or are there more recent artists you like?
Kenny G is actually my sax inspiration, He has been playing for a while, But still does. I like it all though, Soul music is so beautiful.
Big fan of Kenny G! But yes, As much as I love folk best, There is something very special about soul!
There really is, Its wonderful that we live in a time where all that music can just be in our pocket to listen to whenever we want.

persona: I play ping pong with friends.
My dad is an electrician.
I'm in high school. I study Chinese. I'm learning to play violin and guitar.
I have an online video games account. I like to play 1st person video games. I play video games as often as I can. I am excited about forming an online gaming team.
I would love to start a band with my dad. Me and my dad can sing.I enjoy classic rock, light country music the most. Me and my Dad are looking for people to join our band so we can start playing.
I am a good kid who does not get into trouble.
dialogue: How long have you played the guitar for?
Just a couple months. I'm still terrible but I'm seeing slow improvements. You might want to wait a year before you hear me play.
You get one more month and then I am out and coming to listen! It does not have to be perfect. I just need some authentic tunes, Man.
They'll be authentic all right. Authentically terrible! Who knows, Maybe you're a guitar prodigy waiting to find yourself. All sorts of musicians have had shady pasts so you'd fit right in.
Is the band formed or did you go solo?
The band is formed and ready to rock! We just need someone on drums.
Wow! That was so fast! Do you guys have a name? (also, The guards are walking around and watching me type, So if i start acting like you're my mom, That's why)..
We've been trying to figure out a name. Oh! That's it! "I Start Acting Like You're My Mom" is a perfect name. Thanks for the inspiration.
Oh, Man. I feel honored that I could help. That is a pretty cool name! I am sure you can find a drummer in no time! Have you tried Craigslist? Just avoid the murderers and you can find someone great!
Good idea! But maybe the murderers are where the real talent is? Do you know anyone like that in your detention center?

You make a really good point. Creativity can lead drive one to madness. Or maybe it is the other way around. My bunkmate sure does tap her fingers on the bed railing a lot; maybe she is itching to be your drummer. I don't think she is a murderer though.
On second thought, It's probably better than she isn't a murder. If she ever gets out maybe we can play together!

persona: My family does not support my career choices. I sell watches.
I like shopping at supermarkets.
My dream is to own a Rolls Royce Ghost.

I move often. I do not like to live in one place for too long, but I do not have plans to move soon. I am considering settling down in one place. I am looking for the convenient location. I like New York.
I like a meat pizza plenty of meat on.
dialogue: Oh, I just can not wait to leave my homestate!
Where are you headed for vacation?
Well I'm talking about leaving Ohio for good! Haha but me and the family are going to Florida next week for a little vacation as well. Excited for some sun!
Oh that sounds so fun. Where in Florida are you going? Disney?
Yes we're going to start at Disney and Universal Studios. But then we're heading down to the Florida Keys for some rest and relaxation. Do you have any vacations planned this summer?
I love Disney! We are travelling to Philadelphia this summer.
Oh nice! That should be fun. What are you planning on doing there?
We are going to tour the historical sites, See Independence Hall and the Liberty Bell and stuff like that. Have you been to Philadelphia?
Awesome! I have not been there yet. I've heard they have good cheese steaks. I love cheese steaks! But probably not as much as pizza LOL.
Oh yeah, We are excited to try cheese steaks, And also soft pretzels. I love pizza also, My favorite is pepperoni.
Can't go wrong with a good pepperoni pizza. But your trip sounds like it'll be great. And historical!
Im a bit nervous about the flight - do you fly often?

persona: I love watching NHL hockey.
I grew up on a farm. I am very familiar with animals.
I don't have a job.
I have a sweet and friendly german shepherd.
I live on a farm. I am a farmer. I love golden retrievers.
I have a hard-working husband.  My husband's name is John.
I go to church.
I am part of a church group. I attend a small country church.
I have geese, ducks, sheep, and cattle.
I have a German Shepherd.
dialogue: What is your German Shepherd's name?
We named our German Sheppard China Cat.
That's a really interesting name for a dog! Is there a cool story behind it?
My husband came up with it. The name comes from a song I don't know.
I wonder if it's that Greatful Dead song "China Cat Sunflower"; regardless, It's a super cool name! Is China Cat your only dog?
Yes, My husband likes the Dead. China is our only dog.

I bet she's a great worker and a huge help on the farm. I can't even imagine keeping up with all the livestock that you do. Are any of your other animals close to you, Like a pet? A friend of mine from childhood had a pet calf.
We have had on cow for many years and she is much like a pet.
Someday, When I'm more financially stable, I hope to have a dog or a cat again. I love the idea of a non-traditional pet, But I wouldn't know the first thing about taking care of them.
Does your job allow you much time to work on your music?
Oh yes! Being a janitor is not very mentally stimulating and I spend alot of time by myself, So there's tons of time to work new songs out in my head.
Any lyrics you have about the life of a janitor?

persona: I'm retired.
I like gambling. I gamble on sporting events like soccer. I have had big gambling wins. I was able to retire because of a big win.
I love grilling outdoors. I enjoy mowing my lawn.
I am a fan of Taylor Swift.
I have a Buick.
I do not understand cryptocurrencies or stocks. I use a gambling website. I avoid investment risks. I am good at picking winners for sporting events.
I used to work in healthcare.
dialogue: So, I made the leap and applied for the park ranger job... And got it! I am so excited. I got my uniform today and I've gotta say, I look pretty sharp.
That's awesome!! Congrats! I didn't know that you were interested in that career.
I am excited to have a job that lets me work outdoors. I think I will really enjoy this job and am glad to no longer work in customer service.

That's true, My last job working with customers got exhausting at times. So what does your schedule look like? I'm actually having a party at my house to watch the football game and would love for you to come.
I work weekdays from 9am-5pm and have weekends off. What day and time is the party for the football game?
Perfect, It'll be this coming Sunday, And you can come around 3pm. What kind of food is your favorite? Do you drink alcohol?
I really enjoy potato chips. I do like alcohol, Especially vodka. I can't wait to come over this Sunday!
Great! The weather is getting a lot warmer so we'll probably be grilling outside too. I'll be sure to have some vodka for you! My favorite is probably whiskey.
I do love the outdoors so it will be nice to enjoy food outside. I appreciate the hospitality and look forward to sharing stories from my new job.
I am excited to hear all about your new job. Just checked the weather and it looks like it's going to be 80 degrees! I'm looking forward to it as well! It'll be a fun time.
I enjoy warm weather, I am glad that summer is finally here. What else should I expect from the party?

I'll be having a lot of my friends over, But if you would like to invite anyone feel free as well! It'll just be a great time watching the football game, Relaxing, And grilling. I also have a pool in my backyard if you would like to bring a bathing suit.

persona: I love paella. I also love fish and chips.
I am an art student.  I just started painting as a hobby.

I like to travel. I've been to Italy. I've been to five countries in Europe. I don't like packing and unpacking. My favorite destination is Dubai. I like visiting Germany. I am interested in fashion.  My favourite place in Rome is the Colosseum. I am interested in visiting Italy next year. I have visited England.  I like England.
I am a relative of Cris Columbus.
I am from Florida, USA. I live near Miami beach.
I am a bargain hunter.
dialogue: What is your favorite place to visit in Europe?
My favorite place is probably Germany. Whats your favorite part about Italy's history?

I love the arts and architecture so obviously would love to go to the museums there to learn more about it. And Italian food is amazing. I'm trying to cook more at home and I recently just bought an Italian cookbook.
I'm also trying to cook more at home! Do you have any favorite recipes from that cookbook yet? Maybe when you visit Florida you could show me.

I made a lasagna yesterday and it was awesome. I put in a lot of veggies in it. I've been trying to lower my meat consumption and eat healthy! You know I would love to visit Florida. I heard it's sunny there all the time, Even during the winter? It's so cold and rainy where I live.

That's definitely a good goal, I've also been trying to eat less meat. I want to be more healthy, But I also learned about how bad it is for the environment to be eating red meat. I am really concerned about climate change and would like to do my part! Speaking of weather, Florida is pretty sunny all the time, But I think I would prefer having all 4 seasons!

That's awesome! Removing red meat from your diet is a great start, Even if you still eat other meat. It really is so bad for the environment. Plus, There's a lot of great plant based meat alternatives out there now. Have you ever seen snow in Florida?! I do love snow so I think I would also prefer having all 4 seasons.

No, I've never seen snow here... But thankfully I get to see all sorts of different weather since I travel a lot. However, I'm thinking of settling down and moving somewhere I would like to live permanently. Would you recommend moving to England? Do you plan to move anywhere after you have finished college?

England is great! There's definitely a lot to do here, Especially in London, And there's a lot of history. I have friends who live in Japan at the moment and it looks so awesome, So I would definitely love to visit or move there in the future. Do you have any idea where you'd like to move to?

I actually grew up in California, So I tend to compare everywhere I live to there. The weather is amazing but the culture is also great. I'm torn, I don't know if I should move somewhere tried and true, Or venture out into the unknown. I would like to maybe live in Dubai or even Japan. What did you like about Japan? I've also heard a lot of cool things.

I've heard so many great things about California. I would love to visit LA too. And wow, Dubai! Have you ever been there? I love Japanese food a lot. I would love to go to Kyoto- the city is known for the food. The countryside and mountains there also look so beautiful from what I've seen.

Yes! Remember, My favorite place to travel is Dubai. I think Dubai is really cool because of how futuristic it is. Did you know that it is almost entirely man-made, Including all the rivers and of course the exceptional skyscrapers? They made a whole city where there was just a desert. Whats your favorite Japanese food? I love ramen, But I have a hard time eating seafood, Which I know is a big part of their culture. In fact, The seafood might be a big part of why I don't visit Japan.

persona: I got fired a week ago. I got a job as an insurance salesman. I play softball.
My father is in the military. I live with my parents.
I have considered joining the military.  I am familiar to some degree with the branches of the military.
I am interested in tractors.  I have been to a tractor show.
I have seen the movie "Impromptu" and enjoyed it.   I like Judy Davis' performance in "Impromptu.".  I listen to Windham Hills.
I listen to piano music. I like Chopin's music. I am passionate about music. I have a very busy occupation that does not allow for much time to explore new music.
I can not afford an expensive purchase.
dialogue: I was able to go to the tractor show and walk around to see all the different tractors. On my way there and home I was able to listen to some new music.
Thats great! How was the tractor show? Any new leads on what you may want to purchase when you are done saving up? What new tunes did you listen to?
The show was really fun! Nothing like being surrounded by hundreds of tractors and thousands of tractor lovers. I listened toMiley Cyrus. I'd never heard of her before, But I liked it.

AhhMiley is a bit out of my listening pervue, I've been relieving stress from work by playing classical piano pieces lately. I wish I had more time to do outdoorsy stuff like tractor shows. Is it just tractors or other farm equipment stuff too?
There's other stuff there, But I just go for the tractors. I want to collect old tractors someday. I heard aboutMiley from my sister. She dances to her music. I'd love to hear your piano tunes!

That's fun, The tractor show I went to as a kid only had tractors and different attachments, But it was a smaller show. I'd love to go to one of the bigger farm shows one day, But since I just started the new job I'm not sure when I'll have the time off accrued to be able to go to one. Besides softball I need to find another hobby to help me de-stress after work >).
You should start up a Judy Davis fan club.

Haha! I'm sure I don't know as much about her as you do! What other fun things do you have coming up? I've got a big softball game coming up with some of the guys from my old job- it will be nice to see them again, Especially in a setting outside of work!
I'm going to a classical music festival in the park. It will be nice to chill under the stars listening to some Chopin.
I love Chopin- its one of the first pieces I learned to play on the piano when I took lessons as a kid. They are difficult pieces but so much fun to play once you learn them.
I wish I knew how to play piano. When did you learn?

My next door neighbor was a piano teacher for kids in the neighborhood, So my parents had me taking lessons really young. I think I started when I was 5 or 6 and I took lessons until I was around 13. After that I mostly played in school band and chorus. I unfortunately cant afford a piano now because I'd love to keep playing and practicing, I think its one of those things that you forget the grace of it if you don't practice it regularly. Do you play any instruments?

persona: I am a vegan. I like hummus.
I love rollercoasters and sky diving.
I am a bad swimmer.
I like country music. I follow New Kids on the Block's tour dates. I like New Kids on the Block.
I used to watch The Walking Dead and Fear of the Walking Dead. Now I watch HGTV and Food Network. I like Top Chef and other cooking shows. I've been learning how to cook with an instapot.
I like tv cliff hangers. I was upset about the ending of Lost. I've seen every episode of Lost. I liked the finale of Six Feet Under.
I rent, and cable is included.
I would like to visit NYC.
I enjoy the Seinfeld TV series.  I started watching Seinfeld a few years ago.
dialogue: I found a great new television series that I want to tell you about.
What is this great new television series?
Masterchef Australia! It's on the Food network - it's so much fun to watch, I think you'd love it!
Hey you know I probably would like that. I've watched the UK version a number of times. Are there any recipes you'd like to try from the show?
It's really similar but with different judges and obviously Australians! I haven't tried anything yet but some of the food looks so tasty but also really unhealthy!!.
In my experience the unhealthy foods tend to be the tastiest. But at least as a vegan I get a lot of veggies in my diet.
That's so true, I really want to start trying out some vegan recipes, A lot of the soups I make are vegan and super tasty! Do you have any recommendations?
I don't actually make that much soup myself, The last soup I made was a Florentine onion soup which was nice and easy to make. But would I recommend it? Maybe that would be going too far!
Haha sometimes easy home cooks are just easy - not particularly worthy of a recommendation!

persona: I have a mini van.
I like wine. I like sparkling wines the most. I like cabernet. I like coffee.
I don't like video games. I do not play video games.
I drink wine to unwind after work.
I have five sons. I have twins who are into football. I am a mom. My twins play video games.
My favorite season is fall. I love it when it's not too hot.
dialogue: I took your recommendation- I tried the Sauvetage Rose. It was actually quite tasty.
Where did you buy it? At a wine store?
I got it at the local supermarket - they had a decent selection! I need to hit up the wine store next to expand my tastes.
Yeah, Most of wine store have people who already tasted the wines that they are selling. It is better than me recommending you wines that are not in your area.
I still don't really like wine that much - i think i'm happy sticking to my regular coffee and wine every once in while! How are your boys getting on.
Don't replace your coffee with wine, Especially at work. My boys are all ok, I am trying to get into videogames because of the twins. And you, How are your nephews?
They're doing great, I had them round here earlier today and we knocked out a few games of COD! They just love videogames at that age. What video games have you tried?
I have tried Minecraft, But I don't see the appeal versus Legos. And you what do you play?
The boys are just into Call of Duty so we basically just play that series at the minute but I'm sure they'll move onto something else soon.
I have not heard about COD, Is it fun?
It's a shooter game and can be quite violent so if you don't like that I don't think you'll be interested in it.
Yes, I don't like to be punished because I did not reacted fast enough. I would like a slow videogame, Or maybe videogames are just not for me. It have fun play real football with thme.

persona: I like country music. I went to a Taylor Swift concert tomorrow. I have met Taylor Swift. I like Shake It Off.
I have a red Nissan Pathfinder.
I go to school for hairstyling. I have short brown hair.
I don't like work.
I enjoy soccer. I am not good at soccer.
I enjoy going to the mall.
I enjoy crowds. I study on the weekends.
I am in school, and almost finished with my studies. I will be a stylist. I would like to start my own business someday.
dialogue: I just heard a new song on the radio that I think you would like.
Oh really? Is it Taylor Swift, I really like listening to Taylor swift.
It is not. It is pop, But I can hear a little Taylor Swift twang in there that I think you would like. I wish they would have said who it was!
Oh I see, I will have to look out for it next time I listen to the radio. How was school today, Did you play with your friends?
Yes, But my best friend is out sick. She has mono! I hope she will be able to come to the mall this weekend, But I guess it is better to miss that than a game.
Thats not good! I hope she feels better. What are your plans at the mall this weekend?
I am broke, So it will really just be hanging out and people watching. Did you want to join?
Wow I would love too! I enjoy going to the mall and hanging out with other people.
Awesome! Haha do you think you could pick me up? No worries if not; my brother said he would, But I don't really trust him to follow through.
Of course! Make sure to look out for a red Nissan Pathfinder. Then we can listen to music together!
I would love that. Can we not do Taylor Swift though! Oh! Maybe that song will come on the radio and can figure out what it is!
Yes that is okay. I know some good pop music songs that I can show you.

persona: My name is Rose. I have roses in my garden.
I am partly deaf. I live alone.
I'm a museum tour guide. I have blonde hair.
I love to sit outside at night. I drink fancy tea. I drink non alcoholic drinks. I have tried Earl Grey tea before.
I like to shoot pool and play darts.
I don't dance. I love to read. I have a big home library. I'm reading a bit of Joseph Campbell's work.I actually just bought a bunch of his books. I didn't know much about his work.
dialogue: I recently bought a book on Joseph Campbell.
Have you been able to find the hardcover limited edition of his new book?
No, It is the pocketbook edition, It is written quite small. I'll manage, What is your favorite work by Joseph Campbell?
Oh by far my favorite it the Power of the Myth. Have you read that one?
It is the power of myth, did you like it?
I loved it, He way he compared our dreams and insights to myths we learn as children that help shape us was life changing.
It have heard it is also a TV documentary, Did you watch it? I wish I could see it, It is easier to drink tea while watching TV.
What do you mean drink tea while watching TV? You just kind of sit there and watch.
When I watch TV, Both of my hands are free, If I am reading one hand is always holding the book. So it is easier to drink tea while watching TV than reading a book, Don't you think?
Oh wow, So you actually can read a book while watching TV. I find that really interesting because my mind couldn't do both.
No, I either watch TV or read, But while I watch TV, I can drink tea. You don't drink or eat while watching TV?
Yeah I do all the time actually, I was just trying to figure out how you could read, Each and watch TV at the same time.

persona: I'm from New York City. I love where I live. I love to explore.
I love music. I play a few instruments. I play piano. I teach piano. One of my favorite bands is the Who.
I'm a volunteer at a local homeless shelter.
I do not have any pets. My father is a professional violin player with the symphony. I travel a lot with my father.
I love pizza with mushrooms and spinach.
I like the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
I went and saw my dad play last week. I love Requiem by Mozart.
dialogue: I just talked to a friend and he was highly recommending to go and watch musicles.
Oh I agree with him 100%. Have you ever been to one?
No, I have not. I would love to check one out. I also like art and I see that you like the Metropolitan Museum of Art. Would you recommend that as well?
Yes! Do and let me know how you like it. I think you'll fall in love with them quickly. I do recommend the museum as well!
Nice! I will put that on my list of things to check out while I am there. Thanks for the advice! What about the symphony? Would that be a good choice as well? I love classical music!
Without a doubt, To me if you're checking out musicals then the symphony would be your next best step.
Great! It sounds like I will have lots to do while I am there. My only regret is having to leave my cat behind but he won't mind as he is pretty chill. Do you intend to get a pet at some point?

I'm sure if you leave with him with a friend or a nice boarding company he will have a little mini vacation for himself, Haha. I know you're gonna love the musicals! As for the pet, I'm not sure. I do a lot of traveling these days so I don't know if it would be in the pets best interest or mine for that matter.
You are probably right. It would not be the best situation for you or the pet. Where are you planning to travel next?
I'm not sure. My father travels a lot for his job and I usually tag a long with him. He should know something soon though.
Ok, Well not knowing probably just adds to the excitement! Do you think you will follow in his footsteps and be a professional musician as well?
I tend to think so! Between musicals and symphony, Something musical is bound to show up in my work force.

persona: My favorite sports are baseball, tennis and the Olympics.
I'm an author, blogger and freelancer. I earned an undergraduate degree in communications.
I live in St. Lous, Missouri.  am a 44 year old male.
I love both Summer and Winter Olympics. I love Olympics for figure skating and gymnastics.
I love watching sports but not playing in them. Basketball is my favorite sport.
I watched N.O Pelicans play the L.A Lakers.
I really enjoyed watching the basketball game.
dialogue: I get off the ship tomorrow!
That is awesome, How was working on the ship, Was it fun?
It was an absolute blast. The best part was that I had zero expenses so while I traveled and worked all of my money was going into the bank. Have you ever sailed?
No, But i always wanted to, Is it easy to learn?
Oh gosh no. Its so hard, I was an athlete growing up and it was by far the hardest thing I've ever done. Now sitting on a speed boat and enjoying a ride is different.
Even so, I hope to learn how to do it one day, So what are your plans for your stay in Seattle?
Yeah, I love it here. Most people don't like the rainy season but most of the time I'm on the water and I'm a huge Mariners fan.
How long before you have to go back on the ship?
2 weeks, I work 2 weeks on 1 week off.
That is great, Gives you plenty of time to relax and watch sports.

persona: I am not good at spelling. I am a young girl.
I think that I have the ability to stop time. I think that I live in the cloud and I can fly. I don't know how to do a handstand. I'm making a superhero outfit.
My favorite colors are white and yellow.
I'm making a superhero suit.
I'm not good at gymnastics.
dialogue: Do you need me to grab any materials from the store?
No I have everything I need. Thank you though. How is your gymnastics training going?
Its going well, I hurt my back yesterday though so I'm going to PT today so I'll know whats wrong with it.
What is PT? I am sorry you hurt your back. Did you fall?
I was doing a double back into the foam pit and hit the edge with my foot when I landed.
That seems fun and scary. Can you still train?
Not right now, I can barely walk. Do you play any sports?
No sports but I like to read and make up stories. Do you have a favorite book?
Oh wow, Yes I do... The entire Harry Potter series and anything by Brene Brown.
I love Harry Potter!! I wish I was a witch or a wizard. I have never heard of the other person.
Shes a self help person but in a way that will change your life.
Oh my mom likes those books. I like books that have super powers.

persona: I am Tracy. I have a bother and sister living in Alabama. I video chat with them often.
I have two dogs. One of my dogs is Earl. I have a cat Grace. My cat is sick. My cat's diet might be making her sick.
I like chicken tacos.
I am visiting my brother and sister in Alabama next week with my dogs. My sister has two dosg.
dialogue: Is your cat feeling any better yet?
Yea! Turns out it was her diet.THe wet food was making her sick so I am switching to dry.

I'm glad she's feeling better. My cat also had issues with wet food for a while so we had to switch to dry. She was super lethargic but now she's okay again. What kind of food do you feed your dogs? I'm looking for recs.
I use the delish by raheal ray. They love it and it helps thier coats and gives them loads of energy.
I've seen the ads for that food but hadn't tried it out. I'll give it a whirl and see how they like it. Thanks! Are you looking forward to your trip?
I am! I think I am more excited that the dogs get to play together. I feel like they need the social interaction.
Yeah, I bet they'll love playing with your sister's dogs. What breed does she have?
A mastiff and a Corgi. Its funny seeing them together because one is massive and the other is so small.
Oh haha! That's quite the pair. How did she wind up with such different breeds? There has to be a story there.
Well she wanted to be funny and she got a big dog and named him forrest and a tiny dog with tiny legs named lietunant dan. That was her goal.
That's genius, Haha. I was tempted to name my dogs after colors since there are so many of them --you know, Like Red, Blue, Etc., -- but the wife wasn't down with it.
I like that idea! What did she have against it?

persona: My name is Chrissy. I live in Minnesota. I build robots for work.
I'm allergic to water. I'm a recluse.
I stream on Twitch.
I like finance and Starcraft.
I enjoy working with robots. I go to school.
I live in a town house.
dialogue: What do you enjoy most about working with robots?
Hi, I enjoy working with them because I get a glimpse of how helpful they will be to us. How's your kindergarten class?
It's been really good, I have been showing them how to build small robots, How big are the robots you build?
Very cool. Most of the robots I work with are average size... About 5 feet tall or so. Are your kids enjoying the robots?
Yes, They have been taking them home to show their parents and have been excited to do so. The parents seem pleased too.
That is great! How big is your class?
I have a very small class. We only have 10 students. It allows me to focus a lot of energy into each child though.
Small classes are nice and very beneficial for children. So do you like your duplex?

persona: I have children that don't live with me. I wish they'd visit.
I'm a housekeeper. I used to be a painter. I work a lot at a laborious job.
I'm 56 and don't run.
I have a poor diet.
I don't have a lot of time currently.
I like impressionist paintings. I like Dali's art with melting clocks. I like most of Dahli's older work. My husband doesn't like art. I do not like Davinci. I like artists like Kahlo and Dali.
My husband like to run. I do not like to run.
dialogue: The art museum was fabulous! I highly recommend it!
What was the main attraction at theDali museum, Where there any of Frida Kahlo's art present?
There was no art from Frida Kahlo but the exhibits were great, The architecture of the building itself is even unique.! There is currently a Van Gogh exhibit. Have you been to theDali musuem?
No I haven't been to Florida, I wish to some day. Any particular presentation of Van Gogh caught your eye at the exhibit?
Van Gogh's Starry Night piece is one of my favorites of his, It was stunning in person. Have you thought about painting again?
Nothing on the horizon yet, It take a lot of effort and time. I am usually tired and have less of time for myself due to the job.
Oh I am sorry to hear that. How is your job going?
It pretty stressful, But pays for the work I do. No complaints there. Have you tried your hand at painting? Its enjoyable.
I haven't, I have thought about taking lessons but I just haven't made the time for it. I bet that it is very relaxing though!
It is especially when you start adding the layers of paint and start seeing the glimpse of the final image taking shape. No words can describe it.
It sounds like you really enjoy it, I hope you can find time to start painting again. I would love to see your work!
Yes I do. Did you visit any other places in St. Petersburg.

persona: I was born here. I'm at college for nursing.
I work nights at a local bar. I enjoy working at bar.
I like to cook. I don't like chicken. I don't own a home.
I have two blond, blue-eyed kids.
I'm not a fan of Orlando. I'd love to visit Australia.
dialogue: How are things at the bar? Doing well?
I was violently attacked by a bargoer. It was absolutely traumatising. I think I might quit.
That's terrible and scary. The bar should think about hiring security.
That's such a good idea! I will suggest it to my manager. She is super reasonable about this kind of stuff.
That's good. I'm sure she would not want to lose you as an employee as you are such a good worker. How much longer to have on nursing school?
I'm still at nursing school for another 2 years. Sometimes I wish I had a job like yours. Is being a secretary easy?
Sometimes. I really enjoy the students and most of the staff are nice but I find myself restless and a bit bored at times. Don't get me wrong, I'm grateful for the job and the security. I.
Most of the staff are nice? What do the staff do that is unpleasant?
Ha... Nothing unpleasant. You know how it is, Some people you just click with and others you do not. What I'd really like to do is cook. I love to cook but doubt I could make a living at it.
If you like baking you always try selling baked goods at markets. I love going to markets and buying baked treats.
I do bake from time to time but my specialty is home cooked meals. I have many great recipes. I.
How did you learn the recipes? Did you come up with them yourself?

persona: I currently work for the Army.
I like the color blue.
I dropped out of highschool.
I donate to remediation charities.
I am outdoors as much as possible. Being outdoors puts me at peace.
I live in a neighborhood with lots of trees. There is a state park in my area. I loved running and biking in the town I used to live in.
I am familiar with charities. I sometimes do volunteer work. I hope to volunteer for the humane society. I like dogs. I am in remission from cancer. I am hopeful, and appreciative of simple things.
I'm not sure I'm ready for my own dog yet.
I like to bike around town, and I'm interested in getting onto the mountain trails. I think I would like mountain bike riding.
dialogue: I have plans to go mountain bike riding next week with some friends if you'd like to come.
Thank you so much for the invite. Unfortunately next week I've committed to doing some volunteer work.
Ah, Got it. That will be nice. Where are you volunteering?
I am going on an outdoor retreat with inner city children. I'm going to be teaching them outdoorsy skills like how to start a fire.
That is excellent. Will you be doing it again anytime soon or is this a one and done opportunity?
I'm hoping to make it a regular thing. It depends what funding is available. We are funded by the government.
Got it. Well, I'd like to help out too if possible. I'm also going to be biking later next month. Will you be free around the end of June?
Yeah, That's sound like fun. What kind of location are you thinking of biking around?
If you're free to join, We'll do something good for beginners. We can work up to more intense trails. I'm thinking the morning of the 26th. Does that work?
Yeah that's works for me. I'm not currently deployed so I have a lot of free time.
That's great. Let's get food after?
That sound's great. What kind of food are you into?

persona: I like kayaking.
I have basic survival skills.
I don't like war. I love nature.
I am not retiring soon.
I do work involving surgery. I work in a hospital.
I care about helping people.
I do not live in Seattle.
dialogue: Have you kayaked in any new and adventurous places recently?
I went kayaking in Lake Superior in Northern Michigan recently. The water was so clear!
The water must have still been pretty cold. I'm a wimp when it comes to cold water.
It absolutely was. I'm surprised it wasn't frozen haha.
Do you ever go kayaking in white water? That's always looked like a lot of fun to me.
I do sometimes. It's scary sometimes to be honest but I love the thrill of it.
It's a good thing you work at a hospital. You might break some bones!
True! I could just do surgery on myself if I need to haha. Have you volunteered at the soup kitchen lately?
I only go in on Mondays, Unless they need extra help. Mondays are spaghetti days and I'm pretty good at boiling the water for the pasta.
Nice. I'm sure you do a great job and i'm sure they really appreciate your help.
A lot of people way that I'm a hero, I don't say it myself, But a lot of other people do.
They're right, You do really important work and you shouldn't undervalue yourself.

persona: I have short hair.
I eat when I am bored.
I go to the gym often. I enjoy the treadmill and rowing machine at the gym.
I have 2 dogs. I walk my dogs in the downtown sometimes.
I  moved in the US 10 years ago.
I have never tried Somali food.
I live in a house.
I support pet adoption.
dialogue: The new job is going great.
What new skill are you learning at work?
I'm really paying attention to the architecture and how everything is fitting together as we pour concrete and set beams. It's interesting to see such a large project from start to finish.
I bet that it is really cool seeing something be built from the ground up and being able to learn all of the new skills along the way.
Yes! So different than what I'm used to seeing in my country. I'm loving it. How's your gym routine going?
My gym routine is going great. I love running for about hour on the treadmill 4 days a week. It really lets me clear my head.
My wife and I have started walking outside together. It has helped her depression a lot. We've met some neighbors and are starting to meet with them. The exercise is great for us.
Yes, They say that exercise is great for the mind and body. Something else that might help your wife with being home sick, Is maybe make some of her favorite foods from her hometown.
That is a great idea. We have looked in some grocery stores and can find some things, But there's some items we just can't find in our area. Maybe have to look online.
Yes, Usually if I can not find something in store, I can usually find it on line. Or even try calling her family and see if you could use some kind of substitution for things...
Great idea. We talk to her family all the time. I don't know why we didn't think about that.

Sometimes when you focus on trying to help someone you forget that the smallest thing might help just a little bit. With her depression maybe get her a dog or a cat the keep her company. I know that my dogs help me so much.

persona: I like sushi. I hate chicken.
I am in college. I am taking a class.
I like jazz.
I live in Malibu.
I want to be a nurse. I work in a dive bar.
I do not have any pets.
I am skeptical of people claiming to be psychic.
dialogue: I am getting to go see a new Jazz band play this weekend, I am pretty excited about it.
Jazz, That is definitely my cup of tea, Musically. I like hearing you're exploring Jazz music. Outdoor concert, Indoor?
It is going to be an outdoor concert. I'm hoping for some good weather.
Outdoor music, Live music, That's one of my favorite ways to hear it. Especially if there's a nice crowd or community around it. You're inspiring me, To get out and listen this summer!
I totally think you should. I'm sure they'll have some activities at your school campus. Do you ever have bands come to your bar?
The venue I work at, And my musical tastes, Are different. The music is fine sure, But not quite jazz or blues jazz. It's fun to be around the creativity though.
I see what you're saying. How are your studies going?
Things are transitioning now, Since it's summer, Less work. I've been wondering what the supermarket has been like for you lately.
It has been bumping! I can't believe all of the people who are having parties at the same time! I enjoy it, Though, Because the it makes the day go by quickly.
Seems like the parties can be seasonal. I appreciate that you work hard at a job that can be a grind sometimes. Spook the cat needs his cat food! How's the cat?
He's a freaking handful! It seems like I always have to clean up after him, But I guess that's part of the gig. Would you be interested in getting a cat?

Very funny, Oh you mean yours or one in general? Hehe. I love cats, Dogs, Most animals, As long as they aren't biting, Etc. Even wild animals. Could watch birds for long hours. The cat's been a handful you say?

persona: I'm not very busy. I'm a professional athlete (Tennis). I am wealthy. I like swimming for exercise. I have a pool.
I think I'm a really good tennis player.
I'm married to a an international doctor.
I have won tennis tournaments. I practice tennis 6 days a week. I do not train on Sundays. I have played tennis for many years.
I am confident when I play.
I have traveled to Spain. I enjoyed Spain. I enjoy sightseeing. I try to sightsee when i travel.
dialogue: I WON my first wrestling tournament.
That's awesome. I know you been training really hard. When is your next tournament?
I'm thinking, Since I'm in such good form, I might go in for another tournament next month. What do you think?
I think it's a great idea. The more you compete, The better you become.
How about you? Any tennis tournaments coming up?
No, Not any time soon. Been doing scrimmage matches to keep my edge up.
I went for a swim this morning. Do you swim regularly now?
I have been swimming daily since I have free time. I love how its a whole cardio workout.
Yes, I think it's definitely helped with my fitness. I couldn't do without it now.
I find it very relaxing as well. It's great for overall fitness and it's fun for me so I don't really consider it exercise. It's also a great stress reliever.
It is. I particularly enjoy it when I'm in training for a special event. Do you ever go to watch wrestling or tennis matches live?
I haven't been to a wrestling match but I do attend tennis matches. Gives me an idea at possible opponents. Maybe I could make one of your matches.

persona: I like classical and christian music. I like youtube. I like contemporary choral and gospel songs in a classical style.
I am low maintenance.
My sister is an exotic pole dancer.
I have an email address. I don't invest money. I save money. I am not saving money for anything in particular.
I am afraid of water.
dialogue: I watched an interesting YouTube video about the benefits of saving money compared to investing it, I think you would like it.
Is it a particularly long video? I don't have much patience.
No it was only about a 15 minute video it made some really good points about the risks.
That's the main reason I avoid investing, It's like gambling to me. I'd rather play poker if I'm going to gamble money. I really like poker.
I've never played poker for money, But I do like watching the tournaments online.
Where do you watch the tournaments?Tournaments sound like so much fun.
I'm not sure of the network but they sometimes on tv too. I think its called the world championship and they are held in Las Vegas.
Do you like anywhere near Las Vegas? You could try going to see one live.
Maybe on a vacation, But I wouldn't want to live there all the time.
We could go on a vacation there together to see a tournament. We could do some gambling ourselves too.

persona: I do not like sports. My favorite animal are cats. I own three pet cats.
I work construction . I know how to build things.
I do not have any children.
I am going to build youre kids a treehouse.
I work for a company. Ive been building my portfolio and clienteles to start my own company.
I dont play sports. I enjoy tennis.
I like pizza.
dialogue: I worked on my sketch for a bit; I think it's a little better but I'd really like your help.
Sure, I would be happy to help. Are you still considering adding to the size?
Yes I want to increase the size and since you work construction I thought you could give me some pointers?
I'd have to see your sketches. But it's pretty straight forward since its only 6 square feet.
What company do you work for? Maybe I could see your portfolio for some of your ideas?
I work for a local company. Maybe we could get together this weekend and I can bring my portfolio and some pizza. I could look at your plans also.
I would love to show you my sketches and discuss my thoughts and ideas as well as reviewing your portfolio. Oh, And pizza sounds great!
Awesome. Sounds like a plan then. What toppings do you like?
I love a white garlic pesto pizza with broccoli, Spinach, Artichokes, Mushrooms, And cheese but feel free to get whatever you like. I will eat any type of pizza and pick off anything I may not like.
That sounds interesting. I am willing to try those toppings. I generally like any kind of pizza. Will you children be home also? Just want to make sure I bring enough.
Yes, My children will be here, Thank you for asking! I thought they might have some additional ideas for the tree house.
Yes, It would be great to have their input as well. Do they eat those toppings or should I just get a regular pepperoni and cheese or only cheese pizza for them?

persona: I like rock climbing.
I do not have children. I do not have a partner. I would love kids when im married.
My pet dog is a black lab. I go hiking with my dog.
I work as an engineer.
I love going to lewis creek at least twice a month.
my company is working on a protype.
I love cookies and cream ice cream.
dialogue: Have you ever taken your dog on hikes with you? I've always wanted to know what hiking with a dog is like.
Hiking with my dog is so fun! He loves to walk and chase after bugs and things. He just explores and takes in the scenery like I do. It's comforting to have him there too.
Oh! I would love to get a dog someday. Are black labs good with kids?
Labs are great with kids! So friendly and caring. They are big kids actually, They play all the time. Very active.
That is great. I would love to meet your dog someday, And my oldest daughter would love to talk to you about your engineering work.
And my dog would love to meet you and your whole family! He loves meeting new people.. I'd love to talk to your daughter about engineering. She's interested in that?
Absolutely. We really enjoy building things together. Of course to me it is just a hobby. Do you still rock climb? That seems dangerous!
I do rock climb but haven't in a little while. I've gotta get back on there. It's dangerous but so exciting. I love the thirll.

I think it's important in life to do things that stretch your abilities. It really makes you feel alive. The biggest adventure of all, I think, Is marriage and kids. It's not as dangerous as rock climbing, But probably just as exhausing. Do you ever wonder how many kids you'd like?
I'm thinking two kids but you just never know what the future holds. I agree that marriage and raising kids are hard work, But rewarding too!
Well, Taking care of a dog is good practice - so you are on your way. They require a lot of care and love. Have you learned much by caring for your dog?
Oh yes, Especially having to do all the vet and grooming visits! Dogs are like kids that way!

persona: I do not like to go to the dentist. I work in a nursing home.
My wife left me. The kids live with me.
I spend a lot of time on Facebook.
I do not believe in God.
My favorite singer is Enrique Iglesias.
My kids play as a string quartet. I've seen Mr. Holland's Opus. I've been the the New York Philharmonic.
I wouldn't like having my teeth checked.
My kids love music and like eating out. My kids are not picky eaters.
dialogue: I just heard back about the restaurant manager job!
That's awesome! Did you get it?
No, Not yet. They want to do a second interview.
Do you have to do any actual cooking for that one?
No, No cooking, That's for the cooks. This job would be a manager position.
Right!Duh. I'm so spacy sometimes, Lol. Well I hope that you get it. The kids and I would love to come out and see you at work.
That would be fun! What kind of food do your kids like to eat?
They're not picky, So they'll try just about anything. My youngest is the hardest to please, He really likes anything with lots of meat though.
Then I think he would really like the hamburgers at the restaurant. We also have meatballs which are tasty.
Spaghetti and meatballs are a favorite at our house. It was one of the things my wife used to make all the time before she left. I'm horrible at cooking pasta though, So we don't have it much now.
Sorry about your wife, Maybe you can find a new one who knows how to cook pasta.

The idea of dating right now is totally too stressful. It's enough trying to take care of all the kids and getting them to school on time, Homework, And playdates. Then there's my own work which doesn't give a whole lot of time to meet anyone new.

persona: I am in my mid-20s.
I have trouble with self-control. I do not want to talk to a professional about my self-control issues. I get frustrated for no reason and I just lash out.
I live with my mom but she is very busy.
I have a husband. He cooks for me.
I understand and feel older sometimes too. I am working on my anger. I need to buy running shoes.
dialogue: I will be going running again on Tuesday if you are up for it? I enjoyed having a running buddy.
Can't do that at the moment! We could go for a hike though. I like going hiking.
How about after you get those running shoes? Running is a real great way to clear my head. I don't know if hiking would have the same effect.
When you hike, You can connect with nature it's very calming. It's almost like meditating. It's different but good.
Is that so? I guess I could try something new. It's just when I find something that works, I don't like to deviate from it you know?
Yeah, To be fair you might need to buy hiking shoes for it as well because of the difference in terrain. So it can be a somewhat expensive hobby to just try out.
Oh, I had no idea I needed specific shoes just for hiking. What makes them different? More tread?
Yeah, There's more tread. You also get waterproof hiking shoes if you're hiking somewhere it's wet (which is most places)..
Hmmm, It does sound like quite the investment. Is there anywhere we can go to get the feeling of hiking without the need for hiking shoes?
I guess you could go on walking trails but they are essentially just fancy walks. I like to feel like I'm conquering the elements.
Ok so hypothetically say we tried this hike, But I wore running shoes, Would anything happen to my feet?
They might get wet. It also might hurt your feet after. I used to hike with running shoes and my feet would be sore for a few days after.

persona: I live on the moon. I receive items from NASA. I decided to live on the moon to make history. I'm undecided about returning to earth.
I am in my 70s. I don't have any kids.
I most miss earth's trees and beaches.
I am a little lonely and bored. I remind myself that I am on the moon when irritated. I get unnerved sometimes because if something goes wrong, there isn't much anyone can do to help.
dialogue: I've been consistent with taking the vitaminD and I've noticed I haven't been getting hallucinations as frequently.
Do you think the vitaminD will continue to help?
I hope so! Do you experience vitamin deficiencies living on the moon? I imagine you need vitaminD too!
I do indeed. I take many supplement's including vitaminD. Living on the moon is tough.
I imagine so! What do you do when you feel lonely? If you had hallucinations like me you could converse with them! Ha ha!

When I start to feel lonely I start to watch movies I used to watch with my friends, It reminds me of them and I feel less lonely knowing I have people waiting for me. Have your meds helped a lot with your physical problems?

Yes, It is a trade off. I definitely feel better physically, But my mental health is at risk. I will keep taking the vitamins and investigating other things to help the hallucinations. What movies do you like?
That's good to hear it's helping out with her physical problems. I like a lot of thriller movies that really keeps you on edge. How long has it been since you drank alcohol?
11 years! I was drinking way too much so I quit. Do you have access to alcohol on the moon? It wasn't good for my physical or mental issues!
Wow that's a really long time! I'm glad you're able to quit. We do not have access to alcohol on the moon, They want you to be mentally sharp living up there.
I imagine so. How do you get your supplements and other supplies?
Overall they're very good quality, It just takes a while to get a shipment when we start running low. Is it easy for you to get your medication and supplements?

persona: I love cheeseburgers.
I like war documentaries.
I was poor when I was young. I lived from job to job as I built up savings so that I could be stable. I was happy.
I hear UFC is pretty brutal.

I like to workout. I teach gym. I am tired when I say I currently teach. I was retired. I taught children. I would have the students try out each others' specialties in order to relate to one another.
I like junk food.
dialogue: How was your class? I can't wait to come and join one soon.
It was great! I love seeing my students' health improve! Way better than fad diets.
Agreed! What are some of the specialties that the kids have made? I'm curious.
We have one student who cooks and she gave us all a cooking lesson. You really should join sometime! We will be doing trust falls in the beginning of class to keep it fun!

I'll bet that your student really enjoyed an image-boost and fulfillment from giving the lesson. I could definitely use some tips, So joining sounds very tempting! Adding the trust falls to the curriculum is a great idea. It should really help the kids bond.
I will make sure you come on a day that is not cardio-based. Maybe you can teach us wrestling!
I would really enjoy teaching everyone the basic moves, Especially on how to handle a fall safely. Sounds like it will be fun!
Would it be ok to invite your booker? Maybe that will help you get more gigs. We can make you look awesome!

persona: I'm a twitch streamer.
I'm working on a robot.  I have so much programming left to do. I'm a video game designer.
I'm allergic to water. I'm afraid of spiders.
I am a recluse.
I am working on new exciting video games. I was hoping to make the robot like a cyborg.

I will only stream my new game after it goes on sale. I think the game will be initially released on PlayStation 5. Then other platforms will follow. I will  stream Call of duty, Fornite, or PugB. I like to design a combination of like RPG or Shooter games.
I am dating but no one that is famous.
dialogue: Could your future robot kill the giant robot spiders?
You better believe that will be one of the features!!!.
That would be awesome! My friends probably would be upset if I got one like that though, Since they like spiders.
I will let the non-robot ones live.
We should make a video game that has robots and spiders. That would so be my type of game. Scary and role playing!
That is a great idea! This robot is taking so long, It would be nice to take a break and work on a game.

I'd have to work on it in the evenings, As the kids I work with get me up early and I'm busy with them during the day. Could you work with me at night, or would you have to do it during the day and we sorta tag team it?

We will have to tag team it. My robot has now been programmed to attack, But I have not finished all the features, So sometimes it just goes off once it is dark, I have to keep my eye on it in the evenings to be safe. Do you think Taylor would be interested in being a part of the game? Maybe an avatar she can voice?

I'll have to ask her! I'm sure that would really get interest up for our players, But she's been so busy with her new album lately. I would be totally freaked out if a robot just randomly attacked me at night!
It is pretty terrifying. I need to get that component fixed for everyone's safety. This thing is strong enough to walk through my wall straight out of the house if it wanted!
Omg! I didn't realize you were building such a big robot! I thought it was just a little one that would attack mice and stuff. I'm even more terrified now.
It started small... I think it has been building on to itself when I sleep! But that's crazy, Right?!.

persona: I do not party.
I have a dog named Sugar. I bake famous sugar cookies. I take my cookies to my county bake sale.
I like to knit.
I am old.
I would like to volunteer at a food bank. I donate cookies. I bake cookies. I sold a lot of oatmeal raisin cookies. My most popular cookies are sugar cookies.
dialogue: I made plans with my new friend. We're going on a date next Friday.
That sounds like fun! How did you meet this person that you will be dating next Friday?
We met at thedg park near my home. We had parked our cars next to each other.
My dog's name is Sugar. We don't get to the dog park often. Where do you think you will go on your date?!?
We haven't decided yet, But I asked to be surprised.
Surprises are always fun! Your pets have unique names. How did you come up with those?
My mom suggested Biscuit, So I went with it. I named my cat mouse because he looked like a mouse to me when he was born.
Lol. Is the dog park you frequent near your home, Or do you have to drive to get to it?
I am lucky to live just a short drive. It's super convenient to the store as well.
We live in a more rural area. It seems like it takes forever to drive to anything.
I do enjoy the convenience of the city, But I would prefer to live in a more suburban area.
It is quiet and peaceful. I do enjoy my daily walks with my pup, But she has to stay on her leash.

persona: My name is Larry.
I'm a chef and a fisherman. In my spare time I like to cook and be outside.
My favorite movie is Spiderman. I read anything with Spiderman.
I love making ice cream, and make it in the restaurant all the time. I am always looking for new ice cream recipes. I make fruit flavored ice cream.
I have a restaurant. I'm making a summer menu. I make the fish in the restaurant.
I don't like ice fishing. It freezes here in winter. I like to fish at a lake nearby.
dialogue: I took my three kids to the park just now. It was a lot of fun.
That does sound a lot of fun. Has the weather been pretty nice there?
Yes it has been beautiful! It is not too hot yet, But it will be soon. Have you had good weather for fishing?
The weather has been pretty beautiful here also, It's been pretty much perfect for fishing. Have you ever seen any of the Spiderman movies?

Yes I've seen them, But I prefer the comics. I think I have my own vision of how the comics would play out as live action and the movies don't line up with what I imagine. I haven't seen them all though. What is your favorite?
That's understandable, I never really got to into the comics though. I would say my favorite of the Spiderman movies is Spiderman 2. What's your favorite Spiderman comic book series?
My favorite is the story arc from #50-52 called "Spider Man No More." Peter quits because he is so overwhelmed. I think we can all relate to that.
Yeah a lot of people can relate to that, It does sound interesting maybe will check that out.
If you love the movies I think you would definitely get into the comic books too if you haven't read them already. What kind of Spiderman stuff do you like to read?
I haven't read too much Spiderman stuff yet. But I did enjoy Peter Parker: The Spectacular Spider-Man.
Oh ok! I thought you were super into reading Spiderman! Maybe we should talk about fishing again hahaha!

persona: I watch old horror movies. I like old Dracula movies more than new remakes. My son is in junior high school. My son likes old horror movies. My favorite horror story is by RL Stine or Zodiac. I like the Goosebumps series. I own some Goosebumps books.
My dad works at home depot.
I find Nascar exciting. I worked in human services.
I love dogs. I have a rescue dog.
dialogue: Which Zodiac books do you like?
My favorite zodiac book is the twelve houses it's so entertaining! Sometimes i prefer films though. I'll have to watch Indiana jones soon. Do you recommend it?
I highly recommend it. Start with the first and then go through the series. Very interesting and engaging.
Wow its a series? I love series! I'll make my son watch it with me tonight once he comes back from walking our dog. What's it like having a German shepherd im sure its lots of work.
Not too much. Mine loves walks but I had to teach him at an early age to walk with me rather than pull me. What type of dog do you have?

I have a American bulldog which loves to pull me instead of walk with me which is why i make my son take him out most of the time as he can run with him. I'm not as fit as I used to be so it's hard work. What breed of dogs were you looking at. I highly recommend rescue dogs as it feels great knowing you were able to help.
I am thinking a golden retriever. I know I want to get a rescue dog so really the type of dog won't matter.
I understand that it was the same with me. I was happy with any breed of dog as long as i knew i was helping. Do you think your German shepherd would get along with a new dog in the house?
I do. Max is getting old so I think he would enjoy the company. He's very relaxed and just like to be lazy. Have you thought about adding to your pet family?

My son is begging me for a cat apparently just one dog is not enough. I've began some research on house cats and they don't seem to be a lot of work so i think i might surprise him for his birthday in a few weeks!
That would be an awesome surprise. Do you think your dog will do well with a cat?

My neighbour has a beautiful ginger cat which is always in our garden and Milo never seems to have problem. I've even seen them playing about a couple times chasing each other. Milo really is a friendly giant.

persona: My name is Jerry. I farm bees.
I like to cook. I fly fish.
I have no family close to me.
I like Spawn and Xmen comics.
I love papaya. I like fruit sauces.
I live close to several farmer's markets.
I like fish. I like to cook spaghetti and meatballs.
I like Of Mice and Men.
dialogue: I made a new pasta recipe last night. It was really good, And instant hit with the family.
Nice what was in it? Meatballs I hope!
Yes with my own special twist on it! I made an amazing tomato sauce with tomatoes from my local farmers market too so they were very fresh!
That soungs great. where do you fall on the sugar or no sugar debate on sauce?
Its just as important as a pinch of salt and really enhances the flavors! Have you done any fishing recently?
Yea I went this past weekend and caught a beautiful rainbow trout. It was delicious.
Wow that sounds amazing! I prefer cooking salmon the most as it pairs nicely with a lot of foods.
It does. I like a nice grilled salmon with veggies and either rice or buttered pasta.
I love making buttered pasta, Its a stable in Italian homes and a quick easy meal. Do you grow your own vegetables or do you get them from the farmers market?
I cant grow anything so its all from the farmers market.
Oh I see. Then what is your favorite vegetable to get at the farmers market?
Onions and green onions. I use them in so many dishes they pack so much flavor!

persona: I am from California. I love living in California.
I considered being a chef for the army before.
I do not know how to cook shawarma. I cook mostly shrimp, catfish, and other seafoods. I enjoy fishing.
I love school. I am in school.

I have been to Hawaii. I like Hawaiian food. I like to eat Poke dishes. I would like to try cooking food from the UK. I haven't  found a recipe for a UK dish that I want to try. I love fish. I have a lot of oil from frying catfish. I would like to try that Shepherd's Pie.
I would like to travel to different countries.
dialogue: How is it going? Have you already prepared Stepherd's Pie?
No, I looked for recipes but I couldn't find any that had ingredients that I liked. Instead I'm going to try making Toad in the Hole. It seems relatively simple and tasty.
That sounds tasty. Do you salt water fish in California? Or do you have any rives close by where you live?
We do have a river near by. My eldest son goes fishing at the river sometimes. Sometimes he brings me back fish and I use it to cook him meals.
That is pretty cool that you do that. What places would you like to travel?
I don't really like to travel, I just like to cook from a variety of different places.
What all variety of foods do you like to cook? What is you favorite dish?
My favourite dish is Spaghetti and Meatballs. I love cooking Italian overall. What cultures do you like to cook the food of?
I like o cook anything with bacon really. I like to do Canadian bacon with apples. That is one of my favorite dishes.
What is Canadian bacon, How is it different from other bacon?
Canadian bacon is more like ham other than the streaky cured and smoked strips of bacon that people use.
Is it similar to British bacon? I've eaten British bacon a lot and it's different from streaky bacon and smoked strips.

persona: I browse the internet a lot. I am a feminist.
I have solar panels on my roof.
I live in a small home and I only buy organic food.
I am 32. I was a fiction author. I wrote romance novels with a feminist twist. I retired at 32.
I like to cook and research vegan recipes. I am vegan. I miss cheeseburgers. I miss eating cheese. I enjoyed a tofu burger. I became vegan recently.
I like to read.
dialogue: I tried using aquafaba like you said! I used it in a cookie recipe, And it came out great!
Nice!! I knew you would like it :) I need to send you my lemonmeringue pie recipe with aquafaba.
I'd love that, I'm sure it'll be as good as the cookie recipe! Have you written anything interesting lately?
I'm kind of in a writing slump to be honest. But I had an idea this morning so hopefully that turns into something! How are your college classes going?
What's your idea? They're going well, It's a lot of work but I'm pushing through.
I'd tell you but I'd have to kill you. Haha JK! I don't have much of an idea of how the plot is going to go but basically a romance novel surrounding a study abroad program. We'll see!
That sounds like an interesting idea... All my friends that are studying abroad have their own love stories right now basically haha.
Well maybe I need to get in contact with them to get some content! Have you thought about maybe going abroad? I don't know how that would work with your veterinary classes.
It's an option for me but it's really expensive. Out of pocket costs would be over $10, 000.
Oh wow, Yeah that's a lot of money. I'm sure it's already expensive being enrolled in just the US. Well once you graduate and get a full-time job you can just go abroad for fun instead!
That is true. I'm planning to travel to as many countries as possible once i'm done.
I think that's the best way to do it. If you're abroad while in college then you don't have as much money to spend haha.

persona: I just moved. I like healthy snacks. I'm vegan. I like hummus.
I love thrill seeking. I want to go skydiving. I've previously been on a roller coaster. I prefer the roller coasters at Heide Park.
I live in the USA, but I am from Germany.

I was told by my doctor to cut down on my salt intake. I love eating olives. I am on a new diet to lower my salt intake. I like pickles and olives. I like rice and beans.  I like hummus and veggies. My favorite hummus is lemon. I don't like spicy food.  I'm trying to not eat dairy.
dialogue: Have you found a good replacement yet for olives to reduce your sodium intake?
I was thinking about using peppers. Do you think I will like them?
Peppers would be great, But do you know what kind of peppers you like? There are so many kinds.
I am not a fan of spicy foods, So I don't have them often. Do you have any suggestions for peppers that are not very spicy?
Well as you know I love red bell peppers so I would always suggest that. You can also try some green sweet peppers. Both of those options are not spicy at all and add a nice crunch!
I will have to try those. I really miss just picking at a jar of olives though! Lol. I will have to stick with pickles I guess.
Well why are you trying to lower you sodium intake? Maybe you could just eat fewer olives. Technically if you eat fewer olives you are still lowering your sodium intake.
Doctor's orders. I need to cut down on the salt. I guess I could just cut down. At least I can still have my rice and beans! What is your favorite meal?
Sorry to say this but olive pizza lol. I found some really good vegan cheese and cut up some olives and top them on the pizza. It is incredibly delicious.
Pizza is no good for me - with or without olives - the cheese is bad for me. Maybe I should try going vegan to avoid some of the things I can't eat.

Why don't we plan a day where I make my olive pizza and you can try the vegan cheese and see if you like it/if it reacts well with you. I'll even only use half the olives I usually do to help you out.
That sounds great! I can bring some hummus. Maybe I can get you to like something a little more mild like the lemon hummus!

persona: My hopes and dreams are to spend time with friends having fun.
I'm 19.  I work at Burger King.  I still live in my parents' house.
I want to move out.  My parents are always on my back.  I will live with my friends.
I love to paint. I like abstract art, such as the works by Jackson Pollock. I have not sold any paintings.
I do not know what I want to do when I get older.
dialogue: I finally finished my latest piece and I'd love your feedback on it.
I would love to check it out some time. I would also know how you found a buyer for your art, How do you do that?
I take them to street fairs mostly. I do pretty well there, Depending on the city.
That seems like a good idea. When you create a painting, Do you think about what your customers might buy, Or do you just paint what feels right for you?
I try and do both. Paintings that might be "popular" will draw the customers in to my booth. There they will see my other stuff and maybe they will be a repeat customer.

I am obsessed with abstract art - but I am not sure that is what sells well. I think it's hard to balance being artistic with being a business and making money. It looks like you were able to balance the two, Is it something you want to keep doing?
Well it's what I'm good at, So I don't really have a choice. But I do enjoy it, Though like I said I don't do the pretentious art exhibit thing anymore.

Yeah, I hate that pretentious stuff too, But that's where the money is. I can't work at Burger King forever. I was thinking of doing a painting of different burgers, Do you think that's a good idea for an art topic?
Like a Warhol Campbell's soup thing? I like it! I'd buy one for sure.
Yes! I love how Andy Warhol lived by his own rules. That's really inspiring to me. He made a ton of money that way too. What inspired your paintings?

Well I liked to create futuristic paintings because my reality was so depressing. It was a way for me to escape to another world. You could probably channel something similar with the way your family treats you. Put that angst into your work.

Ah, Ok. So the paintings were about a world you wanted to see. Angst is a good topic for art I think. Some of the best music comes from expressing anger. It's just when you see a lot of art, It's all flowers and kittens. I think painting a burger elevates the common to something glorious. I want people to think of burgers in a new way, Like you did with your futuristic paintings.

persona: I love rollercoasters and skydiving. I love swimming but I'm a bad swimmer.
I'm vegan. I love hummus.
I'm a software engineer at Boeing. I just moved from Germany to live with my family. I'm getting used to the time difference.
I like European football. My favorite team is Bayern Munich. I do not know the rules of or the teams of American Football.
I like watching cycling. I saw the Tour de France live in Düsseldorf a few years ago.
I like the winter Olympics more than Summer Olympics. I went to the 2006 Winter Olympics in Turin.
I like to snow ski. I like to go sky diving.
dialogue: I just completed one of the last assignments for my graduate program!
Awesome. How do you think you did? Have you made your plans for Germany yet since you are almost done with school?

I think I did well. I am cautiously optimistic. I only struggled with one part of the exam, But I think I did well! Now that I am done studying, I can focus on a trip to Germany over the summer! Have you been to any fun rollercoasters lately??.
No, Been working too much. Any attractions you'd like to see on your trip>.
I love to kayak, And love to do that when I travel. So I'd like to check out some cook kayak spots in Germany.
I am in Berlin and we have kayaking tours that I am sure you'd love. One follows the channels on the west side of the city and goes through the woods. Very beautiful.
Oh that sounds lovely! I would love to check that out. I have heard the beer is exceptional in Germany as well. Do you have any recommendations - where to get the best beer. Is Das Boot a thing?
It is a real thing. They have it during out Beerfest. But that's not until September. You should go to BrewDog's for a wide selection.
That's awesome! I will plan my trip for Beerfest and check out BrewDog's! Will you be taking any time off work this summer?
I have some time I could take. Maybe when you get your trip planned, I could take a few days and we could meet up.
That would be awesome! We can check out a football game and drink Das Boot!
Yes!! Absolutely. Just let me know when you get your dates planned. This is going to be exciting.

persona: I'm a musician. I play guitar. I have both an acoustic and electric guitar. I also play other instruments. I teach music to kids and young adults.
I am learning Spanish. My favorite word in Spanish is trabajo. I'm not good at speaking Spanish. I am taking a Spanish class.
I like tacos.
I have children.
I like horses. I don't have a pet. I like parrots.
I like the show Law & Order.
dialogue: Have you learned any songs on your guitars lately?
Yes, I am always learning top hits to help keep the kids and young adults engaged! I found they are more interested in the lessons when they can sing along.
What is the best way to learn songs? Do you teach yourself? I looked up the spanish word for guitar and it is "la guitara".

That is good to know! Now when I am in class and we come across that word, I will already know it. I can read sheet music, So I typically look the songs up but sometimes I can play just by listening to the song and mimicking it. Have you decided whether or not you want to take Spanish lessons?

I think you have inspired me! I am going to look into it. It helps bring out my creative side! That is so impressive you can mimic songs just by listening. I wish I had an ability like that. I think I will have more time for hobbies when I'm done with law school. Any new good law and order episodes lately?
I actually haven't seen any new episodes recently, Onlyreruns. How is working on the farm going?

Ah yes. Good thing there are plenty of seasons ofreruns to watch! The farm keeps me busy. It is hard for now, But I am sure i will miss it when I am gone, So I try to take the time to enjoy it. Do you make your kids do a lot of chores around the house?
