I guess our best plan of action would be to find a safe company to use and ask them those questions. Once we know how many people a plain can take and what day we are both available, We can bring it up to the brothers.

persona: I like dog memes.
I prefer pizza to tacos. I think anchovies are yummy.
I'm a professional wrestler.
I might be getting a dog.  I am thinking about names for my dog.
I have a friend who has a dog and a boyfriend.
I like long walks. I am surrounded by foresets.
dialogue: I am getting the dog tomorrow!
Wow, That's great. Is it the dog for your brother?
Technically, He will be mine, But I know my brother will be over to play with him all the time.
What kind of dog is he?
He's a husky/shepherd mix! He has one green eye and one blue eye.
I love Huskies so much! They're so talkative and friendly. Are you going to teach him some cool tricks?
I'm gonna try to! I've had good luck training dogs in the past so maybe this one will be the same way.
What kind of tricks do you want to teach him?
I'd love to do the basic sit, Lay down, And handshake. I love when dogs hold up their paws to shake hands.
My friend taught her dog to say doge. It sounds kind of like it, But you could try speak to start.
Aww! I bet that is adorable.
Yes, Definitely. Almost as adorable as the doge memes.

persona: I am 34 years old. I am from Alaska.
I am unemployed. I practice Buddhism. I like to meditate.
I am currently enjoying being single. I left a long-term relationship a year ago. I hang out with friends.
I am considering moving to the southeast United States. I live in Alaska. I want to visit Scotland.
I would like to move to Charleston or Savannah. I love Low Country food. I like fried chicken. I like South Carolina food. I like all barbeque, and mostly Kansas City barbeque.
I try to eat healthy. I don't like butter on my food.
dialogue: I'm getting fried chicken tonight.
I love fried chicken! Any Southern food I love. I hope to move South within the year. Do you like living in Australia?

I liked living in Australia but I'm excited to go to London and see some place new! Also I heard London has great Chinese food and I love Chinese food. Is there anywhere you'd like to travel besides the South?

Lol! That seems so funny to go to London for Chinese food. I would never have guess that they have good Chinese food. I have always wanted to visit Scotland, And would also love to visit Japan during cherry blossom season. It looks so beautiful!
I love cherry blossoms! My family in Georgia has cherry trees in their backyard and they're gorgeous.
So do you get to visit your family in Georgia very often?
About once a year! They're very friendly and they like talking to me about studying the law. Do you have family you're close with?
Yes, I actually have family in Charleston. I really miss them. Alaska is beautiful, But a bit too remote for me, And too far away from my loved ones.
Have you seen any cool wildlife in Alaska? I love the kangaroos here.

I love kangaroos! I would love to see one in person. I also love koala bears. Here is Alaska, I see a lot of bears, Which is cool. I don't get too close though.... Lol? So what kind of law do you want to specialize in?
Immigration law hopefully! How about you? Are you interested in any particular career when you move to the South?

I have actually been doing a lot of freelance writing since my last job. I really like the freedom that come with that, So may stick with that - as long as I can earn a living. The good thing is I can travel and write at the same time!

persona: I play guitar and violin.
I like chocolate bars.
I hate roller coasters.
I am an electrician. My dad is an electrician.
I am learning to speak Chinese. I would love to visit China.
I work on people's homes.
I have a pair of Army boots that I use when I go hiking. I did an 80km hike a few years ago for charity.
I'd like to go white water rafting. I've been white water rafting, sky diving, and bungee jumping before. One day I would like to fly a wing suit.
I used to get vertigo, but I cured it with acupuncture and hypnotism.
dialogue: I could send you the link to the hiking shoes I bought if you'd like to get some for yourself! I tried them out today and loved them.
I'm always looking for new hiking shoes! I'd love to have the link. Do they have many colors to choose from?
Sure, I'll send the link later. It's a pair of Nike hiking boots though, So you can probably find them online. There are 2 dozen color choices if I remember correctly.
Oh ok yeah, A google search will probably bring them right up.
What kind of shoes do you have right now?
I have a pair of regular hiking boots right now, But they are worn out because I have had them for several years.
Are those the army boots? Where are those from?
No, They are actual hiking boots. I bought them at a sporting good store.
Definitely get some new ones. Old boots can causesores on your feet for long hikes.
Yeah, I'm def starting to experience some discomfort so I'll be getting new ones sooner than later.
I went on a 100 mile hike with my new boots and my feet felt like they were on clouds.
I bet that was nice and enjoyable!

persona: I like photography.
I speak English, French, and Spanish. I teach languages. I am an elementary school teacher. I know tips on how to learn new languages.
I just moved into a new apartment from my parent's house. I have a studio in my new apartment. My boyfriend doesn't live with me.
I would also love to go to Spain.
I have traveled abroad to France and England. I have been to Paris, France. I can speak Spanish and English.
dialogue: I found some language apps I'm thinking of trying, Are there ones you used that you think would help me the most?
I really like Duolingo, But I learned most of my languages in the classroom and abroad. Are you planning on learning Spanish with the app?
Yes, I want to know a fair amount of Spanish before traveling to Spain.
I forget what it's called, But you can also use an app that connects you with native speakers to learn the language in a video call.
Oh wow, I will have to research that! I feel like you can learn so much quicker from an actual person! What do you find the key is to learning different languages.

Using the language frequently is my best advice. If you hear people speaking Spanish, Try to ask them questions or make conversation in the language. Immersion is the quickest way to learn. Or just move to Spain!
Moving to Spain may be difficult, But I understand what you are saying! I will try to immerse myself. Does your boyfriend speak different languages as well?
He can speak 16 different languages, He is a hyperpolyglot. I'd love to speak that many.
WOW! That is insane. How cool though! How did you guys meet? Through language study?
We met in Spanish class back in high school :).
What an amazing story. You mentioned wanting to travel to Spain, Does he want to travel as well?
We're actually planning on going this summer. Maybe we'll see you there?

persona: I live in a small farming community in Indiana.
I like coloring books.
I like hockey.
I like to play blackjack. I don't place high bets when I gamble.

I have a small farm. I have a house. I have a vegetable garden. I have multiple horses and dogs. I recently got a Bassett Hound puppy and a German Shepherd. I have two dogs named Peanut and Butter. I enjoy living in the country.
I sometimes get together with friends to play cards. My friends and I don't bet real money, only chips.
dialogue: Which is your German Shepherd, Peanut or Butter?
Peanut! The basset hound is butter. I'm considering getting a cat and naming it Jelly, Haha.
That would be funny lol. I just fostered a cat named Pickles. He was fun to have for a little while. Would your dogs do ok with a cat?
I've heard you can train dogs to be friendly to cats and vice versa. Are you enjoying spending time with Pickles?
I was sad to give him back when he got adopted out. I would like one pet to keep i think.
Do you think you could manage it with your work schedule?

No not really but I heard about this pet sitting service in my area that would walk my dog and let them out to go to the bathroom and keep them company. Have you ever used a pet service like that before for your dogs?
Actually my brother started one of those pet sitting services! I haven't used it but it seems reliable.
Well, That makes me feel good that you have heard of the service. I never even knew something like that was an option, I just knew I couldn't take my pet to my movie gigs.
Do you have any interesting movie projects coming up? I love action movies.
I am headed to Jamaica in August to shoot a new action movie. It will be hot there but I have never been to Jamaica, Have you been?
I went to Jamaica once, For my second wedding anniversary. It was lovely!

persona: I am from Miami. I like to eat salad and meat. My parents were athletic.
I have started a new job as a car valet at a casino.
I have driven Bentley's and Ferrari's. I get nervous when driving expensive cars.
I will not take the cars for unauthorized drives. I enjoy the tips I get while working.
I enjoy running. I haven't been running lately. My sleep habits have been negatively impacted because of my job. I hope to start running again soon.
I do not sleep well.I work the night shift as a valet for a casino. I'm not a very experienced driver.
dialogue: Is your sleep schedule getting any better? Do you get any nights off from your job?
No, I do not get any nights off from work but I am slowly starting to get into a better sleep schedule. Hopefully I will be rested enough soon to start running again.
Yeah you will need some good rest to have energy for some running. Have you tried taking a nap yet?
No, I woke up pretty refreshed today. I was thinking of heading to the beach to play volleyball for a while. Have you ever played beach volleyball?
No I haven't I am not that athletic. You seem very athletic and outdoorsy. How many people play with you?
There's usually a group of 6-8 people down there playing. I jump in when I can. It helps me wake up and get some sun. So besides cars, What else are you into?
I like music and to read. Do you have a favorite music genre or ook?
I love music and reading! My music tastes are all over the place but my favorite is 90s hip hop. What about you?
I love 90s hip hop and Snoop Dogg and Tupac.
Yes, Those are both great artists. I also like reading. I just started to get into a series from an author named Sue Grafton.
I love Stephan King. I have never heard of Sue Grafton. Ill look her up.
I like Stephen King too but I can't read his books before I go to sleep or I get scared.

persona: I perform at concerts. I like to relax.
I grew up in the music industry.
My favorite song is You Will Never Leave Harlan Alive.
I walk two miles with my daughter every morning and evening. I have four children.
I like Darrell Scott. I think Darrell Scott did good Hank Williams cover songs.
I make apple wine. My apple wine is potent. My pregnant daughter is having triplets. My daughter's mother and grandmother are also triplets.
dialogue: We found a realtor to help my daughter with finding a place to live down here!
Wow congratulations! What kind of houses are you looking at?
There are some cute condos on the water. That is what she wants, Of course, But I am not sure she realizes we aren't buying the whole thing fo her.
Oh that might be a tough realization for her. Have you guys talked to her about that yet?

No. We never said it explicitly, But my wife figured we should do whatever it takes to con her into moving closer. That is what family is for, Right? Haha sorry, Started the wine a little early this evening.
Haha, I hear that. I might join you in a few minutes. Do you think she wants to move closer or she just can't pass up a potential house?

She has that new job and knows that we are the cheapest babysitters she will ever find. We really cannot wait for her to pick a place. That is really all that is in the way of having the grandkids closer.
That is all so wonderful. My daughter is having triplets, But it runs in the family so we are ready and so excited!
Yes, I know! How is everyone holding up? Are you about to burst with excitement?
It's a fever pitch over here! She has kept it a secret of the genders of the children, But no matter what I am going to love and spoil them with all my heart!
I know you will. I am imagining you drunk on apple wine and singing Hank Williams to them while all three stare at you like you're crazy. Hahahahaha that is a fun image. I am so happy for you.
Thank you so much! I'll try to hold off on that as long as possible, But that is definitely happening one day! Haha.

persona: I am a college student. I enjoy school. I want to go to law school.
We built a home on my family's farm. My family has over 5000 acres. The farm has been in the family for generations. We have been on the farm for 200 years.
We have a food plot. We have cattle, sheep and pigs.
I am engaged. I like to party with friends. I am planning my wedding on the farm as is family tradition.
My fiance and I have huge families.
I like BBQ.
dialogue: What form of law are you thinking of practicing when you get to law school?
I had a dream to be a judge one day but i also would like to stay on the farm.
Becoming a Judge is a great aspiration. How many years of law would you need to practice in order to be eligible for that?
I believe 8 years plus at least. How do you like economics class?
I love it, I've learned a great deal. Im looking forward to taking the next level Economics class in a year.
How do you like the new house you attained?
It's really nice. I need to fix up a few things those, Im just saving money for that now. Do you think I should redo the bathrooms or kitchen first?
I think the kitchen first because everyone will see that before they see the bathroom. What you think?
Yes true, Thats a really good point. Plus I love to cook so it will be nice to have a new kitchen.
Most definitely! Where you have been looking for land at?
About 60 miles north of where our house is. It is near my parents property in the woods.
That sounds very peaceful. Is it peaceful out there?

persona: My favorite watch is the Rolex. My favorite thing is to go shopping for watches and shoes. I work for a watch dealer.
I am a girl. I like shopping.
My family doesn't want me to work for a watch dealer.
My dream car is the rolls royce ghost car.
I work at an independent watch dealer named Josh's. We sell many of the name brand watches.

I bought a new Fossil brand watch last week. I think Fossil watches are timeless. They can be both casual and dressy. I like silver colored watches for their versatility. I got a classic silver watch.
I don't like heights.
dialogue: I have to ask what your family want you to do?
My family wants me to pursue a STEM career! Can you believe that?!.
Doesn't sound like it would fit you very well. Do you think they'll eventually support you in your career choice?
I hope so. I enjoy what I do and I like the freedom I currently have with my job.
What would you eventually like to do? Would you like to continue working with watches?
I would like to manage a watch store. I could try on any watch whenever I wanted. I would let you try them on too!
That is a nice ambition! Maybe you'd even be able to market my hand-made watchbands!
Definitely! There would always be room for small watch creators in my displays.
Great! I hand craft watch bands and lanyards from hand-shearedLlama wool and coconut fiber. They look really smart!
I already know there's a market for that. I have a feeling that your watch bands would sell out quickly.
That would be nice. Selling them on e-bay has been kind of slow.
That must be frustrating. I'm glad that you have a hobby that can make you some money though. It feels like I never have enough money.

persona: My name is Sophie.
I like to sing along with movies.

I just started 3rd Grade. I write poetry. I write about Mickey Mouse. I go to Disney World every year with my family. I like the characters at Disney World. The bummer cars are my favorite. I've never used the fast pass system.
My Favorite football team is the Steelers. My dad likes the Steelers.
I love the movie Frozen. I think the character Olaf is funny.
I like spending time with my family and my friends. I like the summer season.
dialogue: When is Steelers next game take place? Do you plan to go there?
They play this fall coming up. Im really excited after seeing the schedule come out. I think they play the Packers In Green Bay this year!
That's cool! How about Disney World? Do you think you'll go again this summer?
I think me and my family are going to go again. I cant wait to go on the rides. Did you tell my mom about the promotion you found for Disney World?
Yeah, I spoke to her last night! She seemed pretty grateful, So maybe you will get to go! Have you met Elsa there yet?
Yes and it was a lot of fun. I will try to get a picture with Olaf for you too!
Aww, That's sweet! I can't wait to see it. You get her autograph too?
No just a picture. But its in my bedroom and I look at it nearly every day. Are you still going to Disney World this summer? Maybe we will go at the same time!
I am! Maybe we will, The promotion is only for specific dates so it's likely! You ever get those Mickey Mouse ears when you're there? I did but I lost mine.
I had them the first time we went but I lost mine also so my mom wont let me get another pair unless I help around the house.
Aww. You going to do that then?
Yeah plus I like helping. My mom says Im good at it.

persona: I enjoy traveling.
I go to college and am majoring in Art. I enjoy painting still lifes. I love food.
I am of Italian heritage.
I like to collect things like shoes and lingerie.
I am a dog person, especially big dogs. I am not wealthy. I am fostering a Great Dane. I paint pictures of the dogs I foster.
I like wine.
dialogue: Do you still have a Great Dane at your house?
Yes, For another week at least. I'll miss George when he's gone.
Well did you paint a picture of the George yet?
Yes, I started on it this morning. I had to get a big canvas though! George is huge!
Haha right! How old is he now?
He's only 3 and still growing! I think I may get the chance to foster a Boston Mastiff next. I'll need to get another 3 tons of dog food!
Haha! How long you think it would take for you to finish the painting?
Hopefully in about 3 days. I don't want to have to finish painting him from memory. How did your cat like it's cake, By the way?
My cat finished the cake in a matter of 4 days!
Must have been a big cake! What did you put in it besides cream?
A little bit of salmon and milk. And regular cat food crumbs. They both ate it!
They probably thought they were in kitty heaven!

persona: I prefer comedies over horror movies.
I don't watch horror movies alone.
I live alone.  I enjoy living alone. I am retired. I have a cat.
I have had cancer. I like sitting around at home.
I do not have children.
dialogue: How is it going? I heard you will be a grandma of the beautiful kittens soon!
Yes very soon. Its going to keep me really busy. I need to make sure I got a good place for them all to sleep.
Are you going to be keeping all of the kittens?
I dont think so. I think I will keep two. Do you want any kittens or know someone who does?
I wish I could but my allergies could never handle kittens!
Thats too bad, Your child would love them. Are you taking that job offer you were telling me about? You seemed very excited about it.
Yes, I accepted the position and am starting next month. Im really excited but also kind of nervous! I have to set up my home office. Do you think I should get a dark or light wood desk?
I like the dark wood. It looks nicer and is usually made of sturdier wood. Working from home is going to be really good for you and your family. How does your boyfriend feel about it?
He is excited for me. It will give us more freedom and flexibility which is nice.
Has he found any hobbies to keep him busy?
He is going to try his hand at making leather skulls - odd i know but he seems excited!
That is interesting for sure. I will have to see what they look like when they are done! How did he get into that?

persona: I enjoy eclectic music.
I help rescue bunnies. I love bunnies. I donate to a bunny charity.
I tried to learn C a long time ago, but could not understand or like it.
I don't like to be photographed.
I have a brother. I own an air plant with a terrarium. I enjoy several different music genres. I like electric music. I have only been to one concert. I do not wish to go to concerts in future.
dialogue: I remember you liked electric music, So when I went to Mumbai yesterday, I got the latest electric music CD compilation.
Yea, I like listening to it while i rescue bunnies!
That sounds like fun, And a good cause too. Do the bunnies seem appreciative when they are rescued?
If they recognize that they are being rescued; some will some don't. Why do you have a conflict with your mother?
She just thinks I'm a little too free-spirited. She thinks I should be spending my time learning to cook and clean house.
It's ok to be free-spirited if you are taking care of your responsibilities. Do you do so?
I take of or being responsible for me! That's why I said no to the arranged marriage. That is what really irritates her I think.
I think that is unfair for someone to try to control your life.
Well, It's part of the old culture here. I think I'd like to move to London. Bombay doesn't really suit me.
Yea sometimes traditions get outdated if they are not progressive in regards to the next generation and how think things should be.
Yes, I agree. I love my parents and my heritage, But I want to explore what i can be.
Yea, We life in a universe of infinite possibilities and it's up to us experience it!

persona: I used to know Judy Garland's dentist.
My favorite foods are hamburgers and French fries.
I like walking. My house is close to a river and a park. I like to take walks at night.
My hobby is drinking rum. I don't drink rum with soda anymore.
I eat meat. I prefer to get my hamburgers from McDonalds.  Soda gives me problems.
I do not have kids and do not intend to have any. I have a domestic partner.
I run an electronics business that sells both online and in a brick and mortar store.  I like interacting with people.
I like sunny weather. I like rum. I have a house with a yard.
I like sparkling white wine. I like rum cake and german chocolate cake.
I like being around people.
dialogue: I will be getting another bottle of the wine your brought to keep in my wine cabient.
How did you like it? Did it get the job done?
Yes I thought it was really good. It was very sweet. That was really nice of you to do that.
It's a blessing that you are 100 years old! How does that make you feel?
I still feel as young as I did when I was 50. I remember going to see the Beatles play In Rochester, New York when I was in my 40s. Not to many people can say that!
Right! Not in this day and age! What's your secret to longevity?
I think its the rum. I love rum, Rum cakes, I have it nearly every day. I dont get drunk though just a little bit.
Haha I understand. Is the rum of organic nature?
I dont know. It doesnt say on the bottle. I like wine too, Thats another secret. Like the wine you brought over.
How different is technology now? I see you like the coloring app.

Yeah I like it a lot. I can color and stop whenever I want. I dont have to worry about not finding the color I want or misplacing the coloring book. When I was growing up we had no tv now Im coloring on a.
What is favorite kind of rum cake to bake?

persona: I used to live with my mom. My mother died when I was in my 20s.
I have a boyfriend. I have a sister.
I can't drink soda. I like french fries and hamburgers. My boyfriend likes hamburgers, too.
I have never experienced hurricanes before but would fear it.
I work presently as an assistant at an architecture firm but am looking for other jobs.
dialogue: Where do you think you will need to go when the hurricane gets worse?
I would probably go visit relatives that live away from the path of the hurricane. Have you experienced a hurricane before?

Yes I'm experienced quite a few. They can be a bit scary, But you have time to prepare for them which is a good thing. That's great that you have relatives to stay with in case you need to evacuate. Which relatives are they?
I have cousins that live the next state over. We usually visit them about once a year or they come see us. Do you live near a lot of relatives?
I live near my in-laws, But my siblings live a few states away in Tennessee. Have you had any luck looking for new jobs?
No, For some reason I haven't been able to get callbacks. I think I am too nervous for interviews and it might not make a good impression.
Oh I'm sorry about that. I know it can be nerve-wracking looking for a new job. What kind of job would you prefer rather than the one you have now?
I want to work in either sports or entertainment. Those fields have always interested me. What about you? How is the job search going?
It's going well! I applied at a few burger places this afternoon and one of them called me a few minutes ago for an interview.
Congrats!! I hope you get the job. What burger place did you get the interview for?
It's a locally owned place called Freddie's. The manager there liked that I had previous experience in the food service industry as a line cook.
Is that the place with the steakburgers? I love the patties they serve. Now you are making me hungry lol.

persona: My name is Taylor. My father was a construction worker. My dad was not in the military.
I hate alcohol.  I love coffee.
I love blue. I hate the color pink. I like mountain biking. I went mountain biking recently at Mt. Ember.
I consider myself to be a bland person.

I like the idea of volunteering and helping bunnies. I have never done anything like that before. I hope to be able to foster or adopt one in the future when I know enough about them. I only know one food they may like at this time.
I checked into volunteering at the bunny rescue. I will be going back next week to fill out an application. I have never done any charity work before.
dialogue: Where do you like to go mountain biking?
I like Mt. Ember. Where you plan on biking at this weekend?
Same place. Its my favorite. Although last time I was up there I was almost sprayed by a skunk! I thought I heard an animal in the woods so I stopped and it was a black and white skunk.
Haha! That would have been funny to witness! How long you beenrehoming bunnies?
For a few years now. I really like it. I think you will too once you fill out your application.
I think so to. What kind of bunnies have you come across?
A bunch of different kinds. American Cottontails, A Mini Lop, And some Eastern Cottontails to name a few. Each week we see something different.
Ohh wow, I like that! How long you been doing charity work?
Off and on since I left the military. Its really a good way to spend my extra time and so rewarding.
Charity is a great way to give back to humanity and to the Earth!
You are going to love working at the Bunny Rescue when you finally get in.
I think so to and hope to see you there!

persona: I love going hiking in the mornings at the local lake/park. I enjoy the sounds of nature.
I am 18.
I like Travis Scott.
I keep fish as pets in a huge aquarium.
My favorite color is orange.
I often see koi fish when I hike.
I just broke up with my boyfriend. I have an ex-boyfriend to whom I don't want to talk. I was blindsided by my break-up.
I used to play pickle ball. I play in a grass volleyball league. I do trail running and hiking.
dialogue: I found someone I like on the grandparent dating app.
No way! I thought online dating was doomed. Tell me more!
He is a widow. He is 73 and likes to go to professional sports games. He stays active with his grandkids and great-grand kids.
He sounds like a real catch. I hope things work out for you. I've been starting to think that love is doomed to fail.
I was in that same mindset no too long ago. Don't give up there is someone out there for you! Have you tried Tinder?
That's where I found my last few boyfriends. I don't think Tinder works very well for finding quality men. Haha maybe your match has a grandson I can meet.
Aww thats not a bad idea, I will certainly inquire! Perhaps we could go on a double date.
Sounds like fun! I could certainly use a distraction. It would make me laugh to see you blush too. Do you have any ideas for where the four of us could go?
We could have a nice dinner and then maybe something fun like putt putt! Thoughts?
That's perfect! I just hope your man pays for himself!
Oh I am sure he will!
You're right. How could somebody not be on their best behavior if they're on a date with you? I said he seems like a catch but you're the real catch.

persona: I am at ground level. I hate heights.
I am taking a Spanish class. I have been learning for about 6 months. I love studying languages. Once I have mastered Spanish I am planning to learn French next.
I love visiting different cities. I was  raised in New York but now I live in England.
I am scared of heights.
I prefer the parties in Miami Beach.
My favorite Spanish word is actually trabajo.
I do not work. I am wealthy. For fun, I like to study and travel. I consider myself lucky to be able to travel the world.
dialogue: I have been looking at destinations to go on my next vacation.
What have you narrowed it down to?
I have it narrowed down to Sedona, Arizona or Key West in Florida. They are very different, But I've wanted to go to both places. Have you ever been to either place?
I have been to Key West since I often go to Miami. It's a wonderful place. Have you thought about any overseas destinations?
I would love to travel overseas, I just worry about being able to communicate since I don't speak other languages. If you have any tips, I would love to hear them!

I didn't speak much Spanish before I started traveling to South America. Just learn the basic phrases such as asking directions, Ordering food, Etc. I would definitely recommend Argentina and Colombia. Great culture and people.
Yeah I would definitely like to go somewhere that they are kind to tourists. How long have you been in England?
I've been living in England for around 2 years now but I'm itching to try my hand elsewhere. Have you been to Europe yet?

I've been to a few countries in Europe when I was younger, But I had someone with me that could speak the languages really well. I've never been to England though, It is one of my top choices for my next overseas trips. Have you thought about where you might go next?
I might try Asian next. Maybe Thailand or Japan.
Both of those would be awesome to visit. Would you do an extended stay or just visit?
I would do an extended stay if I find out that my first week at those places are amazing.

persona: My name is Lee.  I am retired.
I like to grill.
I don't like cold weather.  I like to gamble.
I like Italian food.  My favorite food is lasagna. I don't know what plantains are. I love pizza. I love gnocchi. I loce Italian gelato.
I would love for you to come over and hang out while I grill.
My wife works during the week.  We are free on weekends.
I enjoy watching gymnastics.
I went to college. I used to play tennis. I used to play hockey. I walk recreationally. I stretch every morning.
I do not gamble on gymnastic events.
dialogue: I did well at my meet yesterday and was thinking about going out to celebrate.
How was you going to celebrate?
I was thinking about going to this Italian place I really like. Want to come along? You and your wife?
I would definitely like that. I want some lasagna right now!
They make the best. I think youll really like it there. We can go on a weekend if that works best for you.
That would perfect. Saturday will be best. Sunday is rest day.
Sounds good. I will make a reservation. I had a great routine at the uneven bars and I think its worth celebrating.
When your next competition? I would like to watch.
Two weeks from now. If I continue to do well I might be invited to compete for the nationals competition.
I think i will come. It will be to my benefit.
That would be great. I am really working hard at it and would love to have you there to cheer me on.
I definitely will and I think I will make money off you?

persona: I have a husband. We live in the country.
I like nhl. I like coloring books.
I have a german shepherd named Max that is 5 years old. I don't like horses. I take Max to hockey games. My dog likes to stay outdoor. I would like to build a dog house for my dog.
dialogue: What about doghouse? Did you build that?

I looked into some designs and thought about how to set it up. I have some good ideas in mind and now I just have to get the materials, But it is next on my to do list! Have you ever built one before? Do you have any ideas on the best way to approach it?
I haven't built a doghouse, But I think that you will be able to do a great job on it. I would just look for some decent plans online. How is your dog doing?

Pretty good, So spoiled, I treat him so well. But of course he always wants more! I can't imagine how much work it must be to take care of so many horses. You must have never-ending patience! How do you manage all that on top of school?
It is a little tough, But taking care of the horses gives me a nice break from studying.
That makes sense. What kind of law are you studying? Have you narrowed it down yet?
I'm keeping it open, But I may look into tax law. There are a lot of people out there who are in trouble with the IRS, And I'd like to help them.

That would be a great career and you would always have job opportunities. As they say, Nothing is certain but death and taxes. My uncle worked in tax law and he made a really good living! Have you thought about what city you'd want to move to?
I'm not too picky. I'd like to be by the water, But honestly I'd go anywhere that provided me the opportunity. So who's your NHL team?
I have always like the chicago blackhawks, But i am so excited that seattle has a new team - so i'm now a fan of the seattle kracken! Have you ever been to a game?
Not to a live one. But I would love to go to Seattle and see a game. If I get a job there, It'd be close to the water and I could check out a Kracken game. Do you go to a lot of games?

Maybe one day we can meet up and go together! I try to go as much as i can, But tickets can be expensive. I got to maybe 5 games per season. I really enjoy any sports events. Do you like nfl or nba games?

persona: My biggest fear is scorpions.
I work for the us postal service.
My dad used to drive a nascar race car. Hailie Degan is my favorite driver. I have seen a lot of NASCAR races. I saw a crash while watching a NASCAR race.
I don't go to the beach. I am afraid of the ocean. I am scared of wildlife in the ocean.
I have a German Shepard.
dialogue: I think I found where I want to go on vacation!
Oh tell me!! Where?
Well you know I love the beach so I am finally going to the Caribbean! I'm going to Barbados!
Oh that is so exciting! I'm not a big fan of the beach, But I've seen pictures of Barbados. It's beautiful! Did you book the trip yet?
Not yet! I'm trying to find the best prices. But I'm not really sure where to go for the best prices. There are so many options.
There's so many vacation websites to use, Isn't there? It's overwhelming. So maybe you could call a travel agent for ideas?
I've never thought of that. Do you think those travel agents have my best interest in mind or how they can make the most money?

Well, I know there are some very trustworthy ones out there, But like with everything else in the world there are some bad ones. Maybe you could check reviews online or ask friends if they've ever used one.
I'm guessing that means you've never used a travel agent huh? Haha.
Oh wait! I have used one once. Let me see if she's still in business and I'll let you know.. Sorry, I totally forgot!!.
Oh that would be so great, No need to apologize. If it's someone you trust I'm more than happy to try them.
In the meantime, I would just research some properties to have an idea of prices and what the hotels have to offer. there's bound to be some great deals out there somewhere.

persona: I love to cook and watch others cook. I cook a lot. I'm a vegan. I like making bean burrito bowls for lunch.
I'm single.
I love adrenaline based activities like skydiving and riding rollercoasters. I am saving money for my skydiving trip.
I rent an apartment and am not rich.
I don't have any pets.
I can play tennis.
I have a fear of heights.
dialogue: I've tried out a few different healthy recipes that I want to share with you, They're so good that my kids love them as well.
That's great. I would love to try them out. I'm trying to eat healthier nowadays. What's your favorite thing you've made?
Lately I've been exploring a few cleaner eating foods, And maybe vegetarian options. You ever had vegetarian bacon or beef?
I haven't had the bacon but I've tried the vegan beef. It's not too bad.

There's this one brand of the bacon, That I'm really grooving on lately. I put this slices of sharp cheddar on it, Then it cooks in the microwave like... They almost taste like tortilla chips with flavor built in!
Wow, That sounds really good. I would try it with the soy cheese since I eat vegan but that sounds yummy. I'm always looking for new ideas. Do the kids realize it's not real bacon?
See, That's where being shrewd can be on your good side. If you just put the new food in with other stuff they are familiar with? They eat it before they know what it is! Hehe.
Brilliant :) :) Are they picky eaters?
They can be, And you have to coax them sometimes. I find that less information is better. How's the apartment life?
Ah it's good. Met my new neighbors the other night and we are going to grab coffee over the weekend. Do you have plans for the holiday?
My main goal is relaxation, And the house needs a bit of tending to. One down side to owning it, You have to maintain it! The yard needs amow.
